column2: Speak to my servants who have believed that they may establish regular prayers and spend (in charity) out of the sustenance we have given them secretly and openly before the coming of a Day in which there will be neither mutual bargaining nor befriending.
column3: Gan ya wuzhi mizhi nazhia imani jin na gan ala salla'a kua gikini ama'a wu dukiya'a mini nazhi yila arzikiu ya'a na (fi eko Soko) to swiswoci to gbangba tun kafi Efo na woce to eyada danboa na ube na.

column2: It is Allah Who hath created the heavens and the earth and sendeth down rain from the skies and with it bringeth out fruits wherewith to feed you; it is He Who hath made the ships subject to you that they may sail through the sea by His command; and the rivers (also) hath He made subject to you.
column3: Soko gayi Etsu najin alitta sanmazhi to kin nao uci cin nuwan be dagan sanmao gancin Ucia sunsunzhi la tinya be ele wuncin'y ebo ulau fe arziki uyaye. Umaa'a eya-nuwan jin foro yaye ebo'u dazan'u ta eti eduo be kagbo Sokoe ucia eduzHi jin foro yaye be.

column2: It is Allah Who hath created the heavens and the earth and sendeth down rain from the skies and with it bringeth out fruits wherewith to feed you; it is He Who hath made the ships subject to you that they may sail through the sea by His command; and the rivers (also) hath He made subject to you.
column3: Soko gayi Etsu najin alitta sanmazhi to kin nao uci cin nuwan be dagan sanmao gancin Ucia sunsunzhi la tinya be ele wuncin'y ebo ulau fe arziki uyaye. Umaa'a eya-nuwan jin foro yaye ebo'u dazan'u ta eti eduo be kagbo Sokoe ucia eduzHi jin foro yaye be.

column2: And He hath made subject to you the sun and the moon both diligently pursuing their courses; and the night and the day hath he (also) made subject to you.
column3: Ucia igidi to etswa jin foro ya ye tutunyin; ucia yeshi be batin'y jin foro yaye be.

column2: And He giveth you of all that ye ask for. But if ye count the favours of Allah never will ye be able to number them. Verily man is given up to injustice and ingratitude.
column3: Uma yaye mini yandondo na yewa be'uyin nae. Ka ye ma ga gangan yea ba ni'ima Soko zhi na ujin yaye na wun'a ye ba ya yeyea. Hakika zawangi .za nae -- iyaka gan be zwalunci jin (yan eti tacin'u na) uyio. Zana mae lo legen lo lege be mana cin boe na uyio.

column2: Remember Abraham said: "O my Lord! make this city one of peace and security: and preserve me and my sons from worshipping idols.
column3: Wyo mao pa lokaci na ibrahima gangan: "ya wyoe Tsoci! A ezhi nana la'afe ezhi aminci wyo mao la mi yin'o kpeo ya to egi mizhi be bauta jin ya kutizhi.

column2: "O my Lord! they have indeed led astray many among mankind; He then who follows my (ways) is of me and he that disobeys me- but Thou art indeed Oft-forgiving Most Merciful.
column3: Ya wyoe Tsoci! Hakika kuti wuncinzhi agbin eza kanma dagan mini zawangizhio To zana ga mi tu mi na to hakika zawuncin dan be mi yin zana ma ga'a le mi ba na to hakika soko Etsu gafara wyo yio Etsu yegun ma wyo yio.

column2: "O our Lord! I have made some of my offspring to dwell in a valley without cultivation by Thy Sacred House; in order O our Lord that they may establish regular Prayer: so fill the hearts of some among men with love towards them and feed them with fruits: so that they may give thanks.
column3: Ya wyoe Tsoci yi! Hakika mia sashi dagan mini iyalimizhi la'afe dun zhi kpankoro ndoci nama enue ye nu boa na tsabo kata wyoe (ka'aba) nayi cinwanci na; tsoci yi! Ebo ala salla'akua gikini ebo acin'o a yangban zawangizhi la ufeu kan'ula yan yangici sun-sunzhi ebo be wuncin'y ala'a fe zanazhiafe jin yebo ya wyo na.

column2: "O our Lord! truly Thou dost know what we conceal and what we reveal: for nothing whatever is hidden from Allah whether on earth or in heaven.
column3: Ya wyoe Tsoci yi! Hakika wyo kpe yannazhi yie swo kpatana to nazhi yi la wu filio na amade yandoci dan sanmao ko kinbo na swo Soko na'a.

column2: "O our Lord! truly Thou dost know what we conceal and what we reveal: for nothing whatever is hidden from Allah whether on earth or in heaven.
column3: Ya wyoe Tsoci yi! Hakika wyo kpe yannazhi yie swo kpatana to nazhi yi la wu filio na amade yandoci dan sanmao ko kinbo na swo Soko na'a.

column2: "Praise be to Allah Who hath granted unto me in old age Isma´il and Isaac: for truly my Lord is He the Hearer of Prayer!
column3: Yebo kpata ajin tabbata ya Sokona twamirya be Ismailae to Ishakae dan lokaci ekuku mibo na. Hakika Tsoci mi Etsu nae wo aduwa na uyio.

column2: O my Lord! make me one who establishes regular Prayer and also (raise such) among my offspring O our Lord! and accept Thou my Prayer.
column3: Ya wyoe Tsoci mi! A mi la'afe za nae ku salla gikini na to zuriyamizhi. Ya wyo Tsoci mi! wyo mao la aduwa mi yin'ofe gwigwoci.

column2: "O our Lord! cover (us) with Thy Forgiveness - me my parents and (all) Believers on the Day that the Reckoning will be established!
column3: Ya wyo Tsoci yi! Fa be ye yin to yanmaci mizhi to musulumizhi kpata Efo naa ga gba na.

column2: Think not that Allah doth not heed the deeds of those who do wrong. He but giveth them respite against a Day when the eyes will fixedly stare in horror-
column3: Wyo mao ga kara kpa ye gan Sokoa yaye ya ke yan na azwalumi zhie jin na lugwa ma. Hakika Wyun'e pata pa ya'a ya Efo na eye zhi ga'a la tinya wangi nae.

column2: They running forward with necks outstretched their heads uplifted their gaze returning not towards them and their hearts a (gaping) void!
column3: Atso cia fe din ye aciga eti'azhi la dan fin'o eye azhi ma'a ba'a; yangban 'azhi mayi fokoe (ebo dan sun'o)

column2: So warn mankind of the Day when the Wrath will reach them: then will the wrong-doers say: "Our Lord! respite us (if only) for a short term: we will answer Thy call and follow the messengers!" "What! were ye not wont to swear aforetime that ye should suffer no decline
column3: Wyo mao jin zawangizhi gangba eti efo na azaba abe ya'a na zanazhia eti tacin azhi jin zwalunci cia gan gan; Tsoci yi pata ya yi da eka de gi yia ye yiyi wyoe yima ga emi tu Tuci zhi "a sha payin na ujin ye ga zhikuti gan ye yea pan yeshi eti yanna ye ta tiu bo naa yin'a

column2: And ye dwelt in the dwellings of men who wronged their own souls; ye were clearly shown how We dealt with them; and We put forth (many) parables in your behoof!,Ye cia fedun zhi emi zanazhia eti ta cin'azhi jin zwalunci na Yima yannazhi Yi jin bea yin na tula ya ywe yima kezhe la misali zhi ya ye.
Mighty indeed were the plots which they made but their plots were (well) within the sight of Allah even though they were such as to shake the hills!
column3: Hakika ma ajin shiri makirinciazhi egagba yan makirinci zhima dan be Sokoe ka'a daa ma makirinciazhi ga gbota kun na uga patizhi mu yeshi na.

column2: Never think that Allah would fail his messengers in His promise: for Allah is Exalted in power - the Lord of Retribution.
column3: Wyo mao ga kara kpa ye gan Sokoa le alkawali ba be Tuci uzhi ma. Hakika soko Etsu zankpe uyio umae ga gba etun dede kpata.

column2: One day the earth will be changed to a different earth and so will be the heavens and (men) will be marshalled forth before Allah the One the Irresistible;
column3: (Wyo mao feo pa) Efo na aga gwasan la'adan kinbo na wun'ajin kin nana bea to sanmazhi (agaa sangwa). Alittazhi kpata ciga'tin ya zhi yegboro Soko  Etsu Nuni ke'te Etsu zankpe.

column2: And thou wilt see the sinners that day bound together in fetters;-
column3: Wyo ma ale lefi jincizhi ye fo wuncin  aga'a pa -- dozhi mini kuruzhio.

column2: And thou wilt see the sinners that day bound together in fetters;-
column3: Wyo ma ale lefi jincizhi ye fo wuncin  aga'a pa -- dozhi mini kuruzhio.

column2: Their garments of liquid pitch and their faces covered with Fire;
column3: Tufuwa'azhima dagan yankpa na'azun fi enao (ci yi bokun na ) wun'ayio ena ciga'a rukpea fuska'azhio.

column2: That Allah may requite each soul according to its deserts; and verily Allah is swift in calling to account.
column3: Wuncin mayi ebo ala ega gba'a ya rayi ndondo be iri woce na uce nae. Hakika Soko Etsu nafan egagbao na uyio.

column2: Here is a Message for mankind: Let them take warning therefrom and let them know that He is (no other than) One Allah: let men of understanding take heed.
column3: (Alkur'anu) Na na eyan wu uyio ya zawangi zhi ama'a la wun'ajin'a gangba ama'a kpeawo kede Soko Tsoci Nini uyio na ebo ma eza hankalizhia la'a san'atu.https://play.google.com/store/apps/detailsid=com.noorlab.alquran

column2: A. L. R. These are the Ayats of Revelation- of a Qur´an that makes things clear.
column3: ALIF LAM RA Wuncin zhi aya yan litafi zhi ayio be Alkuranu-y na'atu la gbangbae na.

column2: Again and again will those who disbelieve wish that they had bowed (to Allah´s will) in Islam.
column3: Lokacina dokun na kafirizhia jin afe jin guri gan egan:egan gan musulumizhi ayia.

column2: Leave them alone to enjoy (the good things of this life) and to please themselves: let (false) hope amuse them: soon will knowledge (undeceive them).
column3: A'yaafeagi yan'aza ama'a fea wo-man gurizhi mau fe ujin'a shagala'u zabe le yin abe de kpikpe.

column2: Never did We destroy a population that had not a term decreed and assigned beforehand.
column3: Alkarya ndoci ma danbo nayi jin hallaka na'a sai de wyoa tsun'a be litafi na'a tula nae.

column2: Neither can a people anticipate its term nor delay it.
column3: Ama de alumma na'a shi lokaci na Soko bayau na dzo naa amade na'a pa ta ya a-- lokaciu gan na'a.

column2: They say: "O thou to whom the Message is being revealed! truly thou art mad (or possessed)!
column3: Aci gan;ya wyo na acin alkuranu be ya na! Hakika wyoe ilanduci wyo yio.

column2: "Why bringest thou not angels to us if it be that thou hast the Truth"
column3: Ki'I kan wyo ci be ya yi be malaikazhi yin'a yin'o wun'ayi gan mini eza gaskiyazhi bowyo dan'o nao

column2: We send not the angels down except for just cause: if they came (to the ungodly) behold! no respite would they have!
column3: (Soko ci ya azhe gan ); yi yie cin malaikazhi be acin kawanyin'a saide be gaskiya lawuy (be azaba jin'y) Gancin ma uga'a fe acin to aapata ya'a bea.

column2: We have without doubt sent down the Message; and We will assuredly guard it (from corruption).
column3: Hakika Yiga cin alkuranu beo hakika Yiga ma'a tswa wun'o.

column2: We did send messengers before thee amongst the religious sects of old:
column3: Hakika ma yitun (Tucizhi) tun shi wyo dzu be dzu dan mini alumma na zhi yi yan mafarizhi na.

column2: But never came a messenger to them but they mocked him.
column3: Amade Tuci nduci na'a be ya'a na'a sai agaafe zanazhie lau mi na.

column2: Even so do we let it creep into the hearts of the sinners -
column3: Acinga ga ma Yia jin Yi la alkuranua gandan yangban lefi jinci zhi bo.

column2: That they should not believe in the (Message); but the ways of the ancients have passed away.
column3: Aya gaskiya be u yin'a hakika ma ekpa yan hallaka za mafarizhi (nazhi gbotika be Sokoe na) wun'a -- gan'ani (atso ma le ye)

column2: Even if We opened out to them a gate from heaven and they were to continue (all day) ascending therein
column3: Kadaa ma Yi ga eko kpe yaa dagan sanmao har afe acie gun lo bo.

column2: They would only say: "Our eyes have been intoxicated: Nay we have been bewitched by sorcery.
column3: A'gangan: Ngan a dan yi eye yi dan; a-a ade jin yi shiri jin (eyan ma uyio).

column2: It is We Who have set out the zodiacal signs in the heavens and made them fair-seeming to (all) beholders;
column3: Hakika ma Yila tswangizhi fi sanmao Yiciu pa nin ya za nazhie cin'u le na.

column2: And (moreover) We have guarded them from every cursed devil:
column3: Yi mau tswa dagan egun shetan na yi eza cice yaci na.

column2: But any that gains a hearing by stealth is pursued by a flaming fire bright (to see).
column3: Saide za na ga yi gan-wo miniabo na to ena sisaci ci ga emi tu'u gancin.

column2: And the earth We have spread out (like a carpet); set thereon mountains firm and immovable; and produced therein all kinds of things in due balance.
column3: Kin ma yiu ta cici Yicia takun wancikozhi ce ta eti ubo. Yicia yangici sunsun iri ndondo la'atinya na ma yibe tsunwan'e na.

column2: And We have provided therein means of subsistence- for you and for those for whose sustenance ye are not responsible.
column3: Yi cia kaya nazhi yega wo ma izhe na la'adanbo yaye to yan zanazhi ujin ye ye ya'a arziki na.

column2: And there is not a thing but its (sources and) treasures (inexhaustible) are with Us; but We only send down thereof in due and ascertainable measures.
column3: Amade yandocia saide na edzunba arzikiu be yi yin udan'ona. Yimae cin'ubea sai de be gwargwado tsunwan nayi kpikpeci na.

column2: And We send the fecundating winds then cause the rain to descend from the sky therewith providing you with water (in abundance) though ye are not the guardians of its stores.
column3: Yi ma kezhe'a efezhi tun acie la wan-nuwan ya girgijezhi gancin yicie du le zhin dagan sanmao Yiciu laa'ya ye fin ye made edzunba wun'a.

column2: And verily it is We Who give life and Who give death: it is We Who remain inheritors (after all else passes away).
column3: Hakika ma Yi gae dan yan rayio Yi ga mae wu rayio Yiga ma'a gi gun yandondo.Surah 15:23     And verily it is We Who give life and Who give death: it is We Who remain inheritors (after all else passes away).Hakika ma Yi gae dan yan rayio Yi ga mae wu rayio Yiga ma'a gi gun yandondo.

column2: To Us are known those of you who hasten forward and those who lag behind.Hakika ma yikpe zanazhi -- gan'ani mini yebo na ye.
column3: Hakika ma yikpe to zanazhia be gba'a zunma na ye.

column2: Assuredly it is thy Lord Who will gather them together: for He is perfect in Wisdom and Knowledge.
column3: Hakika Tsoci wyoe wyun ga'a san'a kabario ci kua ye kan'o. Hakika Soko Etsu hikima uyio etsu ilimi uyio.

column2: We created man from sounding clay from mud moulded into shape;
column3: Hakika ma Yi jin alitta zawangi dagan egun'o dagan edo-zhiko na'a zhegba (cie mantswan na).

column2: And the Jinn race We had created before from the fire of a scorching wind
column3: Aljani ma Yi jin alittau jin shi jinjin zawangi dzo dagan ena na yi pipoci nao.

column2: Behold! thy Lord said to the angels: "I am about to create man from sounding clay from mud moulded into shape;
column3: Wyo mao pa lokaci na Tsoci wyoe gan be malaikazhi gan: Hakika miajin alitta zawangi dagan edo nayi mantswanna.

column2: "When I have fashioned him (in due proportion) and breathed into him of My spirit fall ye down in obeisance unto him."
column3: To miga beujin ucia jin daidai Micia efe be fiu dagan rayi Mibo to yea nikin zhizhi ye jin sujadae yau.

column2: So the angels prostrated themselves all of them together:
column3: Malaikazhi kpata cia sujada jin bae nio.

column2: Not so Iblis: he refused to be among those who prostrated themselves.
column3: Sai de Iblisu! Wyun'a navo na wyun'ajin sujada be zanazhie jin sujada nae.

column2: (Allah) said: "O Iblis! what is your reason for not being among those who prostrated themselves"
column3: (Soko) gan: "ya wyoe Iblisu! Kila wyo ci lo sujada-be zanazhie jin sujada na'a yin'o

column2: (Iblis) said: "I am not one to prostrate myself to man whom Thou didst create from sounding clay from mud moulded into shape."
column3: (Iblisu) ci gan: u-- yin ya mi na miajin sujada ya zawangi na wyo jin alittu dagan egun'o dagan edo nae zhegba na'a.

column2: (Allah) said: "Then get thee out from here; for thou art rejected accursed.
column3: (Soko) gan: Tinya dagan miniubo (Aljannao) hakika eza cice yaci wyo yio.

column2: "And the curse shall be on thee till the day of Judgment."
column3: Hakika ma emibo (Soko) ta eti wyo bo har da Efo Alkiyami

column2: "And the curse shall be on thee till the day of Judgment."
column3: Hakika ma emibo (Soko) ta eti wyo bo har da Efo Alkiyami

column2: (Iblis) said: "O my Lord! give me then respite till the Day the (dead) are raised."(
column3: Iblisu) gan: "Tsoci mi! pata ya mi har da fo na aga'a san zazhi kabario na.

column2: (Allah) said: "Respite is granted thee
column3: (Soko) Ugan: To hakika ma wyo dan mini za nazhi a pata ya na.

column2: "Till the Day of the Time appointed."
column3: Har da Efo na yi be lokaci kpikpeci na.

column2: (Iblis) said: "O my Lord! because Thou hast put me in the wrong I will make (wrong) fair-seeming to them on the earth and I will put them all in the wrong-
column3: (Iblisu) ci gan: "Tsoci mi! Dagan na wyoa mi gbin'ani na mi ga etu dedezhi la'a panini fia kinbo hakika ma miga'gbin bae nio.

column2: "Except Thy servants among them sincere and purified (by Thy Grace)."
column3: Sai de mini wuzhi wyozhio nazhi yi lilicizhi na.

column2: "Except Thy servants among them sincere and purified (by Thy Grace)."
column3: Sai de mini wuzhi wyozhio nazhi yi lilicizhi na.

column2: (Allah) said: "This (way of My sincere servants) is indeed a way that leads straight to Me.
column3: Soko gan: Nana ekpa uyio natso yi gboro na tswitswa uma eti mi bo utao.

column2: "For over My servants no authority shalt thou have except such as put themselves in the wrong and follow thee."
column3: Hakika wuzhi Mizhi wyo de iko ndondo ta eti'aboa sai de na ga mi tu wyoe mini wawazhio na.

column2: And verily Hell is the promised abode for them all!
column3: Hakika ma jahannama ga yi ezhe keba'a baeni bo.Surah 15:43   And verily Hell is the promised abode for them all!Hakika ma jahannama ga yi ezhe keba'a baeni bo.

column2: To it are seven gates: for each of those gates is a (special) class (of sinners) assigned.
column3: Uyi be kpako gutwabae kpako ndondo ma yi be kansan ginganci (na kafirizhia fi na).

column2: The righteous (will be) amid gardens and fountains (of clear-flowing water).
column3: Hakika zanazhie sundan Soko cie tswa'u na afi miniAljannazhio be eye nuwan (managizhi).

column2: (Their greeting will be): "Enter ye here in peace and security
column3: Egan dan bo be aminci'y eza tswitswaci zhi

column2: And We shall remove from their hearts any lurking sense of injury: (they will be) brothers (joyfully) facing each other on thrones (of dignity).
column3: Yi cia yannazhi fi yangban'azhio yan nanvo na wa ya (acia zhe) yegi dozhi nazhi kpe ti gadoazhio cie baza na.

column2: There no sense of fatigue shall touch them nor shall they (ever) be asked to leave.
column3: Egun (yan ebo) ndondo ma'a tswan'a miniuboa ama'a kuatinya boa.

column2: Tell My servants that I am indeed the Oft-forgiving Most Merciful;
column3: Ya wuzhi Mizhi labari kede hakika Mi Etsu gafara Mi yio na Etsu yegun Mi yio na.

column2: Tell My servants that I am indeed the Oft-forgiving Most Merciful;
column3: Ya wuzhi Mizhi labari kede hakika Mi Etsu gafara Mi yio na Etsu yegun Mi yio na.

column2: And that My Penalty will be indeed the most grievous Penalty.
column3: Hakika ma azaba Mi gayi azaba natan nao.

column2: Tell them about the guests of Abraham.
column3: Wyo mao ya'a labari eti ega Ibrahimuo.

column2: When they entered his presence and said "Peace!" He said "We feel afraid of you!"
column3: Kamina agandan ebaubo na aci gan: "Salamu (aminci ulau jin tabbata'uya wyoe) uci gan: "Hakika yiye sundan ye".

column2: They said: "Fear not! We give thee glad tidings of a son endowed with wisdom."
column3: Aci gan: "Ga sundan ma hakika yie ya wyoe labari yangban fa be mima egi na'a yi kpikpe deci na.

column2: He said: "Do ye give me glad tidings that old age has seized me Of what then is your good news"
column3: Ugan: "Gbani yea ya mi bushara yangban fa be dide egi ala'ali ma eku kua lomi yin'a ni To kici ye gaa ya mi busharao.

column2: They said: "We give thee glad tidings in truth: be not then in despair!"
column3: Agan: "yidea wyo ya bushara yan gaskiyaa ni wyo mao ga'afe dan mini zanazhie ba kauna be yegun Sokoe na ma.

column2: They said: "We give thee glad tidings in truth: be not then in despair!"Agan: "
column3: yidea wyo ya bushara yan gaskiyaa ni wyo mao ga'afe dan mini zanazhie ba kauna be yegun Sokoe na ma.

column2: He said: "And who despairs of the mercy of his Lord but such as go astray"
column3: Ugan: A ma de za na'a ba kauna be yegun Tsoci u yin naa sai de eza gbin gbin cizhi.

column2: Abraham said: "What then is the business on which ye (have come) O ye messengers (of Allah)"
column3: Ugan: kici ma ye be be yin'o ya ye Tucizhio

column2: They said: "We have been sent to a people (deep) in sin
column3: Agan: hakika a tun yi tun-tun lo eba jama'a nazhi yi lefi jincizhi na.

column2: "Excepting the adherents of Lut: them we are certainly (charged) to save (from harm)- All -
column3: Ban be iyali yan (Annabi) Lutuzhi Hakika Yiga'a wadzun bae nio.

column2: "Except his wife who We have ascertained will be among those who will lag behind."
column3: Sai de yin miu. Hakika yia tsunwan alamariu la'a ni hakika udan mini zanazhia jin hallaka na.

column2: At length when the messengers arrived among the adherents of Lut
column3: Kamina Tuciuzhi lo eba iyali (Annabi) Lutu na.

column2: He said: "Ye appear to be uncommon folk."
column3: Ugan: yede jama'azhi yeyio na yi kpea yea na.

column2: They said: "Yea we have come to thee to accomplish that of which they doubt.
column3: Agan: A'a yi be be ya wyoe be yan na jama'a yan wyo zhie jin kelo kezhin etiu bo na.

column2: "We have brought to thee that which is inevitably due and assuredly we tell the truth.
column3: Yi ma be be ya wyoe be gaskiyae hakika ma eza gaskiyazhi Yi yio.

column2: "Then travel by night with thy household when a portion of the night (yet remains) and do thou bring up the rear: let no one amongst you look back but pass on whither ye are ordered."
column3: Ebo acin'o a tinya dan zan'o be iyali wyozhi dan mini yeshio wyo mao la mio tua zunmao zaenindondo mau ga zhe ye lo zunma ma ye mae da bana Soko jin ye foro be yin na.

column2: And We made known this decree to him that the last remnants of those (sinners) should be cut off by the morning.
column3: Yima'a hukunci jin yau gan u la mi-u-tu alamari wuncin zo ba zanazhi ma wun'ada zoba be asuba yin.

column2: And We made known this decree to him that the last remnants of those (sinners) should be cut off by the morning.
column3: Yima'a hukunci jin yau gan u la mi-u-tu alamari wuncin zo ba zanazhi ma wun'ada zoba be asuba yin.

column2: The inhabitants of the city came in (mad) joy (at news of the young men).
column3: Jama'a yan zhinin zhi cia tinya aci fe manin (be egazhi).

column2: The inhabitants of the city came in (mad) joy (at news of the young men).
column3: Jama'a yan zhinin zhi cia tinya aci fe manin (be egazhi).

column2: Lut said: "These are my guests: disgrace me not:
column3: Ugan: Hakika za nanazhi ega mizhi ayio ebo acin'o ega sun-mi zunye dan alamariabo ma.

column2: "But fear Allah and shame me not."
column3: Ye mae sundan Soko ye mae ga nyin mi yangban ma.

column2: They said: "Did we not forbid thee (to speak) for all and sundry"Agan: Asha yi kan wyoe gan wyo ga fe -- ega zawangizhi be maa.

column1: Surah 15:71     He said: "There are my daughters (to marry) if ye must act (so)."
column2: Ugan: Egi yinzagi mizhi dan na (ebe jin'a yawo) ye ga'a jin jin na.
He said: "There are my daughters (to marry) if ye must act (so)."
column3: Ugan: Egi yinzagi mizhi dan na (ebe jin'a yawo) ye ga'a jin jin na.

column2: Verily by thy life (O Prophet) in their wild intoxication they wander in distraction to and fro.
column3: (Malaikazhi gan) Yie zhi kuti be rayi wyo tsoe hakika afi mini pipeazhio acie ce za.

column2: But the (mighty) Blast overtook them before morning
column3: Gancin kabara cia wan (be hallakae) kamina igidiela tinya na.

column2: But the (mighty) Blast overtook them before morning
column3: Gancin kabara cia wan (be hallakae) kamina igidiela tinya na.

column2: And We turned (the cities) upside down and rained down on them brimstones hard as baked clay.
column3: Yicia fitia zhegba ci daa kin. Yici dule takunzhi fia dagan ezun pipocizhio.

column2: Behold! in this are Signs for those who by tokens do understand
column3: Hakika mini wuncin'o ayazhi danbo ya zanazhie la hankali tu yanzhi na.

column2: And the (cities were) right on the high-road
column3: Hakika alkarya wuncin ma u tati ekpa ndocio nayi tiyaci na.

column2: Behold! in this is a sign for those who believed
column3: Hakika mini wuncin'o ayazhi danbo ya zanazhi yi muminizhi na.

column2: And the Companions of the Wood were also wrong-doers
column3: Hakikama jama'a yan kin yan Aikata atso azwalumizhi ayio. (jama'a yan Annabi Shuaybu zhi).

column2: So We exacted retribution from them. They were both on an open highway plain to see
column3: Yicia jin azaba Hakika ma kin gubaba wuncinzhi a kpe eti ekpa ndocio na'a tula na.

column2: So We exacted retribution from them. They were both on an open highway plain to see
column3: Yicia jin azaba Hakika ma kin gubaba wuncinzhi a kpe eti ekpa ndocio na'a tula na.

column2: The Companions of the Rocky Tract also rejected the messengers
column3: Hakika jama'a yan Hijruzhi (Samuduzhi) atso'a Tuciazhi yi ganmana.

column2: We sent them Our Signs but they persisted in turning away from them
column3: Yima be ya'a be aya Yizhi acia pan ya ke aya Yizhi lugwa.

column2: Out of the mountains did they hew (their) edifices (feeling themselves) secure
column3: Amaa fe zanazhie ka patizhi yan cie laa jin emizhi na nazhima e leyan'afi be aminci na.

column2: But the (mighty) Blast seized them of a morning
column3: Kabara cia wan (be hallakae) lokaci asubaa yin.

column2: And of no avail to them was all that they did (with such art and care)!
column3: Yan nazhi afe cewou na ma kunke ya'a be yandondo yin'a.

column2: We created not the heavens the earth and all between them but for just ends. And the Hour is surely coming (when this will be manifest). So overlook (any human faults) with gracious forgiveness.Yi majin alitta sanmazhi to kin to yannazhi fi tacin'abo na jin'a saide be gaskiyae. Hakika Alkiyami maa dabe ebo acin'o efa bedozhi fifa nayi wangi na.

column1: Surah 15:86    For verily it is thy Lord who is the Master-Creator knowing all things.Hakika Tsoci wyoe uga yi Etsu naejin alitta nao Etsu kpikpe ma uyio.
Surah 15:87      And We have bestowed upon thee the Seven Oft-repeated (verses) and the Grand Qur´an.Hakika ma yi la aya gutwaba ya wyoe na ma afe gbau elo be zhin'y-na to Alkuranu na wancin na.

Surah 15:88              Strain not thine eyes. (Wistfully) at what We have bestowed on certain classes of them nor grieve over them: but lower thy wing (in gentleness) to the believers.Wyo mao ga ta eye wyozhi lo eba eyanma-wo zhi nayi laya zandocizhi miniabo na ma wyo mao ga nyin yangban etia bo ma wyo mao feo dakpyao ya Muminizhi.
Surah 15:89    And say: "I am indeed he that warneth openly and without ambiguity"-Wyo mao gan gan: "Hakika mi gangba jinci mi yio nama'a tula na".
Surah 15:90   (Of just such wrath) as We sent down on those who divided (Scripture into arbitrary parts)-Wyo mao feojin bauta'o ya Tsoci wyoe harda kamina hakika ga'tula ya wyo na (ugayi ajalio).
Surah 15:91   (So also on such) as have made Qur´an into shreds (as they please).Zanazhia Alkuranu laazhe kpere kpere na.
Surah 15:92  Therefore by the Lord We will of a surety call them to accountMizhi kuti be Tsocio yin hakika yia gbin'agan baenio.
Surah 15:93  For all their deeds.Eti etun nazhi afe lo nao.

Surah 15:94     Therefore expound openly what thou art commanded and turn away from those who join false gods with Allah.A kugikini be gaskiya tae yan foro na'ala ya wyoe nae wyo mao dzun gan zanazhie la yan pa Soko baci nao.
Surah 15:95  For sufficient are We unto thee against those who scoff-Hakika ma Yia kunke ya wyoe be egun yan zanazhie la'mi nae.
Surah 15:96       Those who adopt with Allah another god: but soon will they come to know.Zanazhi la Tsoci ndoci cie la pa Soko baci na bele yin a be de kpikpe.
Surah 15:97      We do indeed know how thy heart is distressed at what they say.Hakika yi ma de kpikpe kede yangban wyoe wun'e laa yiku be iri egan nazhie e gan nae.
Surah 15:97      We do indeed know how thy heart is distressed at what they say.Hakika yi ma de kpikpe kede yangban wyoe wun'e laa yiku be iri egan nazhie e gan nae.

Surah 15:98     But celebrate the praises of thy Lord and be of those who prostrate themselves in adoration.Ebo acin'o fe li Tsoci wyoe tsatsa yin be yebo jin'y-yau wyo mao lao feodan mini zanazhie jin yebo na.
Surah 15:99    And serve thy Lord until there come unto thee the Hour that is Certain.Wyo mao feojin bauta'o ya Tsoci wyoe harda kamina hakika ga'tula ya wyo na (ugayi ajalio).

column2: (Inevitable) cometh (to pass) the Command of Allah: seek ye not then to hasten it: Glory to Him and far is He above having the partners they ascribe unto Him!
column3: Alamari Soko (Alkiyami) da beani ebo acin'o ega din bibeu ye ma. Lili kpata'ajin tabbata ya Soko uma'a latu ke yan'nazhie la pau baci na lugwa.

column2: He doth send down His angels with inspiration of His Command to such of His servants as He pleaseth (saying): "Warn (Man) that there is no god but I: so do your duty unto Me."
column3: Wyun'e cin malaikazhi be be wahayi ndoci dagan mini foro ubo ya zana ga bau mini wuzhiu zhio na; kede: Ejin gangba kede hakika ade Tsoci ndoci na'a wun na'a sai de Mi na. Ebo acin'o ye afe zanazhie sundan Mi na.

column2: He has created the heavens and the earth for just ends: Far is He above having the partners they ascribe to Him!
column3: Wyun'a alitta sanmazhi to kinzhi jin be gaskiyae; Sokoa latu ke yannazhie la pau baci na lugwa.

column2: He has created man from a sperm-drop; and behold this same (man) becomes an open disputer!
column3: Wyun'a alitta zawangi jin dagan maniy bo gancin ucia zhe emigboci ewun sunci gbangba (be alamari yi yin).

column2: And cattle He has created for you (men): from them ye derive warmth and numerous benefits and of their (meat) ye eat.
column3: Dabba yan ni'imazhi ma wyun'a jin (yaye) ye mae de yanna ye la'a kanfe na dagan miniubo to eyan anfani na dokun na ye mae kezhe de (nakan'uzhi) gi.

column2: And ye have a sense of pride and beauty in them as ye drive them home in the evening and as ye lead them forth to pasture in the morning.
column3: Ye mae kezhe de eyan ninpazhi dagan miniubo. (Wyun'e la'azhe esa yaye) kamina ye gae kua zhin mi lozun'y-na to kamina yegae kua tinya laazhin-y-na.

column2: And they carry your heavy loads to lands that ye could not (otherwise) reach except with souls distressed: for your Lord is indeed Most Kind Most Merciful
column3: Amae la karayezhi yaye lo ezhi nazhi yea lo woa sai de be wanalae na. Hakika Tsuci ye Etsu tosayi uyio Etsu yegun ma uyio.

column2: And (He has created) horses mules and donkeys for you to ride and use for show; and He has created (other) things of which ye have no knowledge.
column3: To doko to alfadari to tyatyagi (wyun'ajin yaye) ebo ye fe tua amaa la'afe ninpa'aya ye be. Umae jin alita yannazhi yede kpikpeaa na.

column1: Surah 16:9         And unto Allah leads straight the Way but there are ways that turn aside: if Allah had willed He could have guided all of you.Kara yan bawu lo eko natso yi gboro na be Soko yin-udan'o dagan mini ekozhi nazhi yi kandan na danbo. Wyun'aba Soko ba da ugae wuba baenio.

column2: It is He who sends down rain from the sky: from it ye drink and out of it (grows) the vegetation on which ye feed your cattle
column3: Kara yan bawu lo eko natso yi gboro na be Soko yin-udan'o dagan mini ekozhi nazhi yi kandan na danbo. Wyun'aba Soko ba da ugae wuba baenio.

column2: With it He produces for you corn olives date-palms grapes and every kind of fruit: verily in this is a sign for those who give thought.
column3: Be (nuwan wuncin-y) wyun'ela yandzozhi tinya to zaituna to dabinazhi to inabizhi be yangici sunsun iri ndondoe. Hakika mini wuncin'zhio egwa wuzhi dan bo yan zankpe Soko ya zanazhi gae kpaye na.

column2: He has made subject to you the Night and the Day; the sun and the moon; and the stars are in subjection by His Command: verily in this are Signs for men who are wise.
column3: Umaa yeshi to batin jin foro yaye to igidi ti etswa to tswangizhi kpata wyun'ajin foro be kagbou yin. Hakika mini wuncinzhio egwa wu yan zankpe Soko(zhi) danbo ya jama'a nazhi ga yibe hankali na.

column2: And the things on this earth which He has multiplied in varying colours (and qualities): verily in this is a sign for men who celebrate the praises of Allah (in gratitude).
column3: To yannazhi ujin alitta'azhi ya ye fi kinbo nazhi mayi be kala (launi) iri iri zhi-na. Hakika mini wuncin zhio egwa wu yan zankpe Soko danbo ya jama'a nazhi gae kpa ye na.

column2: It is He Who has made the sea subject that ye may eat thereof flesh that is fresh and tender and that ye may extract therefrom ornaments to wear; and thou seest the ships therein that plough the waves that ye may seek (thus) of the bounty of Allah and that ye may be grateful.
column3: Wyun ga majin edu foro ebo ye de nakan managizhi nazhi yi didacizhi nae gi ye mae ku eyan nin pazhi tinya dagan miniubo na ye fan na wyo ma'a le eya nuwanzhi ye nazhie patu dan miniubo na ebo ma ye de bae wa falala (bibe arziki) dagan ebo Soko ebo ma be wuncin'y ye lae fe zanazhi ejin yebo ya Soko na.

column2: And He has set up on the earth mountains standing firm lest it should shake with you; and rivers and roads; that ye may guide yourselves;
column3: Uma'a patizhi ce fi kinbo ebo ube du ko dan yi be ye yin ma. Uma'a eduzhi to ekozhi jin yaye ebo be wuncin'y ye lae ke eko.

column2: And marks and sign-posts; and by the stars (men) guide themselves.
column3: To alama (sinsantu) ndocizhi to be tswangizhi ajin afe de bawu.

column2: Is then He Who creates like one that creates not Will ye not receive admonition
column3: Ngba za nae jin alitta na uga'azhe ye-ni be zanaejin alitta na Ki'I la ye cie kpayea yin'o.

column2: If ye would count up the favours of Allah never would ye be able to number them: for Allah is Oft-Forgiving Most Merciful.
column3: Ye ma ga gangan yea ba ni'ima nazhi Soko jin yaye na aa ye ba yaye yea. Hakika Soko Etsu gafara uyio Etsu yegun uyio.

column2: And Allah doth know what ye conceal and what ye reveal.
column3: Soko ma yi be kpikpe yannazhi ye swo na to nazhi ye tula na.Surah 16:19     And Allah doth know what ye conceal and what ye reveal.Soko ma yi be kpikpe yannazhi ye swo na to nazhi ye tula na.

column2: Those whom they invoke besides Allah create nothing and are themselves created.
column3: Zanazhi-ma ye jin bauta ya ke Soko lugwa na ajin alitta yandondo woa ngan atso ajin alitta'a zhi jin.

column2: (They are things) dead lifeless: nor do they know when they will be raised up.
column3: Eyan tsutsucizhi ayio eyan be rayizhi yin'a amakpe lokaci na a san'a naa.

column2: Your Allah is one Allah: as to those who believe not in the Hereafter their hearts refuse to know and they are arrogant.
column3: Tsoci ye ma Tsoci nini uyio amaade zanazhi jin imani be Efo zoba yin'a na yangba'azhie navo ama'afe zanazhie gbo ti ka na.

column2: Undoubtedly Allah doth know what they conceal and what they reveal: verily He loveth not the arrogant.
column3: Gaskiya uyio hakika Soko yibe kpikpe yan yannazhi ye swo kpatana to yannazhi e jin tula kpata na. Hakika Sokoe wa eza tikagboci zhia.

column2: When it is said to them "What is it that your Lord has revealed" they say "Tales of the ancients!"
column3: Ama ga gan beayin gan:ki'I Tsociye cin be o A'jin agan gan: Ecin zhi ayio yan za payin zhi.

column2: Let them bear on the Day of Judgment their own burdens in full and also (something) of the burdens of those without knowledge whom they misled. Alas how grievous the burdens they will bear!
column3: Wuncin mayi ebo ba'a la kara zunubiazhi baenio Efo Alkiyami-y to lefi zanazhi a kufi egbin'o umayi be kpikpe yin'ana. Acinga gao kara nazhi ala na wun'a biye.

column2: Those before them did also plot (against Allah´s Way): but Allah took their structures from their foundations and the roof fell down on them from above; and the Wrath seized them from directions they did not perceive.
column3: Hakika zanazhi shiadzo na ajin shiri yan makirinci Soko cia emi nazhia tu na gbin ya dagan ekpouzhio yannazhi a la kpeu na cia kpan be kpea dagan titaabo azaba ci dabe ya'a dagan bana a kpayetua na.

column2: Then on the Day of Judgment He will cover them with shame and say: "Where are My ´partners´ concerning whom ye used to dispute (with the godly)" Those endued with knowledge will say: "This Day indeed are the Unbelievers covered with shame and misery-
column3: Gancin ma Efo Alkiyami Soko ga'a sunzunye u cia gangan: Ba zanazhi ye la pa mi baci ye cie gbomi etiabo na dan'o Zanazhi ye la pa mi baci ye cie gbomi etiabo na dan'o Zanazhi ala kpikpe yana cigan:Hakika zunyesun be yangbonyin dede ajin tabbata ya kafirizhi.

column2: "(Namely) those whose lives the angels take in a state of wrong-doing to their own souls." Then would they offer submission (with the pretence) "We did no evil (knowingly)." (The angels will reply) "Nay but verily Allah knoweth all that ye did;(A g a y I )
column3: zanazhi kamina malaikazhi gea -- rayi bea yin na aafe zanazhia eti tacin'ajin zwalunci na atso ciga kpatsun ta acia gangan: yi ma fe za nazhie lo tun dede ndoci na'ani. A'a ujin acin'a hakika Soko yi be kpikpe etun nazhi ye lo na.

column2: "So enter the gates of Hell to dwell therein. Thus evil indeed is the abode of the arrogant."
column3: Wbo acin'o yea gandan eko yan jahannamazhio ye ma'a fibo fi tutunyin. Lallai zoba zanazhie gbotika naa biye.

column2: To the righteous (when) it is said "What is it that your Lord has revealed" they say "All that is good." To those who do good there is good in this world and the Home of the Hereafter is even better and excellent indeed is the Home of the righteous-
column3: Acia gan be zanazhi sundan Soko na gan: ki'I Tsoci ye cin beo Agan: " Alheri" Zanazhi ga lo tun wangi dan izhe na nao na ade egagba wangizhi egagba yan Alkiyami ma gan. Madan-la be emi (Aljanna) yan zanazhie sundan Soko na.

column2: Gardens of Eternity which they will enter: beneath them flow (pleasant) rivers: they will have therein all that they wish: thus doth Allah reward the righteous-
column3: Ugayi Emi Aljannazhi yan eman-wo aga gan fi bo nuwan managi eduzhi cia fe je fi tako abo ayibe eyan waci ndondoe fiminiabo. Acinga ga Sokoe la egagba ya zanazhi gae sundan'u acie tswau nao.

column2: (Namely) those whose lives the angels take in a state of purity saying (to them) "Peace be on you; enter ye the Garden because of (the good) which ye did (in the world)."
column3: ( A g a y I ) zanazhi kamina malaikazhi gae -- rayi beayin na afi mini yangban fao nao acia fe gan gan: Aminci Soko u laujin tabbata u yaye eganda Aljannao ebo iri etun (wangizhi)nazhi ye fe lo izheo nao.

column2: Do the (ungodly) wait until the angels come to them or there comes the Command of thy Lord (for their doom) So did those who went before them. But Allah wronged them not: nay they wronged their own souls.
column3: Ngan yandondo danbo na (kafirizhi) e tu ye na'a sai de Malaikazhi (nazhia la azaba be ya na) koma foro yan Tsoci wyoe ndoci na'abe yaa na acinga ga zanazhi be shiadzo na jin'o. Soko ma jin'a zwaluncia atso tsa jin ti tacin'a zwaluncio.

column2: But the evil results of their deeds overtook them and that very (Wrath) at which they had scoffed hemmed them in.
column3: Egagba dede yan etun dede na'alona cia de yannazhi ma afe lami na cia ma -- ba.

column2: The worshippers of false gods say: "If Allah had so willed we should not have worshipped aught but Him - neither we nor our fathers- nor should we have prescribed prohibitions other than His." So did those who went before them. But what is the mission of messengers but to preach the Clear Message
column3: Zanazhi la yan pa Soko baci na gan: "wun'a ba Soko ba da yi yia jin bauta ya zandondo baci Soko boa to yi to yanmanciyizhi da yi maa la yandoci azhe haramu baci na Soko la jin haramu na boa" Acinga ga zanazhi be shiadzo na jin'o. Ngan yandondo ta eti Tuci boa saide eyan-wu yan gbangba.

column2: For We assuredly sent amongst every People a messenger (with the Command) "Serve Allah and eschew Evil": of the People were some whom Allah guided and some on whom error became inevitably (established). So travel through the earth and see what was the end of those who denied (the Truth).
column3: Hakika ma yi tun Tuci tun dan mini alumma ndondo kede: "Ejin bauta ya Soko ye mae kpe ya be shetan yin nae." Miniabo ade nazhi Sokoa wuba na amade dan miniabo nazhi egbin'ajin tabbata ta etiabo na (harda fo mi ajaliana). Ebo acin'o edazan kpe eti kinbo ye mae cin'ele elo kendoe zoba yan ganmana zuncizhi yi yi na.

column2: If thou art anxious for their guidance yet Allah guideth not such as He leaves to stray and there is none to help them.
column3: Ka da ma wyogae bavun eti ekokeabo to hakika Sokoe la zana ugaa gbin na ke ekoa amade zandondo danbo naajin'a taimako naa.

column2: They swear their strongest oaths by Allah that Allah will not raise up those who die: Nay but it is a promise (binding) on Him in truth: but most among mankind realise it not.
column3: Ama zhi kuti be Sokoe lo iyaka yan gaskiya boa (na'akpena) kede: zana ga'atsu na Sokoa na'akin bea na. A'a ujin acin'a (ekin na Alkiyami) alkawali uyio yan gaskiya na Soko jin na amaade ekun dondo zawangizhi kpea.

column2: (They must be raised up) in order that He may manifest to them the truth of that wherein they differ and that the rejecters of Truth may realise that they had indeed (surrendered to) Falsehood.
column3: (Soko ga alittazhi la nakin) Ebo ujin bayani'uya'a yan yannazhi aga cedozhi leba etiubo na ebo ma to kafirizhia kpeawo kede hakika aya'afe ganmana zuncizhi na.

column2: For to anything which We have willed We but say the word "Be" and it is.
column3: Hakika yanna yia jin yi gan be yandoci kamina Yi ga kpa gan Yia jin'u na yia jin yi gangan: " Afe" Uci ga'afe ga.

column2: To those who leave their homes in the cause of Allah after suffering oppression- We will assuredly give a goodly home in this world; but truly the reward of the Hereafter will be greater. If they only realised (this)!
column3: Zanazhi maga kpe la ebo Soko baci na aga jin'a zwalunci na hakika yi ga izhe le wangi jin shiri ya'a egagba yan Alkiyami ma u wancin gan agaafe zanazhi de kpikpe de na.

column2: (They are) those who persevere in patience and put their trust on their Lord.
column3: (Agayi) zanazhia hakuri jin nao amaafe zanazhie yakpe Tsocia (dan alamari ndondo nao).

column2: And before thee also the messengers We sent were but men to whom We granted inspiration: if ye realise this not ask of those who possess the Message.
column3: Yima la'atun zandoci tun shi wyo dzo lea sai de eza bagizhi nazhi ma Yi ajin yi jin wahayi ya na. Ye mae gbin eza kpikpe nazhie pa Soko na gan wun'a yi gan yede kpikpeana.

column2: (We sent them) with Clear Signs and Books of dark prophecies; and We have sent down unto thee (also) the Message; that thou mayest explain clearly to men what is sent for them and that they may give thought.
column3: (Yi tun'a tun fi ye) be hujjazhi na bayaniazhi tula na to be Litafizhi. Yi ma Alkuranu (yan sinsantu) cin bea ya wyoe ebo wyo jin bayanio ya zazhi yan yannazhi acinbe ya na ujin wo be wuncin'y aga'afe zanazhie kpaye na.

column2: Do then those who devise evil (plots) feel secure that Allah will not cause the earth to swallow them up or that the Wrath will not seize them from directions they little perceive-
column3: Ngba zanazhie jin makirinci dedezhi na a sundan gan Soko tan'afi wo be kin yin'a koma azaba'ubeu yaa dagan bana a kpaye tua na'a yan'a

column2: Or that He may not call them to account in the midst of their goings to and fro without a chance of their frustrating Him-
column3: Koma u la'au wan kpantsu kui mini dalo dazhin'a zhio ama gan (Soko) gwa woa.

column2: Or that He may not call them to account by a process of slow wastage - for thy Lord is indeed full of kindness and mercy.
column3: Koma u la'au wan eti hallaka jin'o karayin. Hakika Tsoci ye Etsu tosayi uyio Etsu yegun uyio.

column2: Do they not look at Allah´s creation (even) among (inanimate) things- How their (very) shadows turn round from the right and the left prostrating themselves to Allah and that in the humblest manner
column3: Kashi acin le lo eba yannazhi Soko jin na'a ndondo miniabo fifingi azhie yagwa lo gwa'alo to gwa'apinzhi amae jin sujada ya Soko amae dakpya zhizhi baeni boa.

column2: And to Allah doth obeisance all that is in the heavens and on earth whether moving (living) creatures or the angels: for none are arrogant (before their Lord).
column3: Yannazhi fi sanmao kpata na to nazhi fi kinbo mini dabbazhio na kpata Soko gae jin sujada yao amae lati dan fin boa.Surah 16:50      They all revere their Lord high above them and they do all that they are commanded.E sundan Tsoci dagan fitiabo amae jin yan na aga jin'a foro be jin jin-y-na.

column2: Allah has said: "Take not (for worship) two gods: for He is just One Allah: then fear Me (and Me alone)."
column3: Soko ma gan: Ega la Tsoci guba Soko ma hakika Soko Tsoci Nini uyio. Mi gbaugi gama yea sundan'o.

column2: To Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and on earth and to Him is duty due always: then will ye fear other than Allah
column3: Yannazhi fi sanmazhio to kinbo na kpata Soko wun'o jin jin adini ma wyun gbaugi ga wun'baeni bo. Ngba yandoci najin Sokoa na ga ye sundan'o

column2: And ye have no good thing but is from Allah: and moreover when ye are touched by distress unto Him ye cry with groans;
column3: Yandondo nama ga dan beye yin yan eman-wo na dagan eba Soko bo afebeo; gancin ma egun ndoci ga tswan ye ebau ga ye yea la egiti lo.

column2: Yet when He removes the distress from you behold! some of you turn to other gods to join with their Lord-
column3: Gancin ma ugaa egun la'a keyabo yaye zandocczhi mini yebo ajin afe la yandocizhia pa Tsoci baci.

column2: (As if) to show their ingratitude for the favours we have bestowed on them! then enjoy (your brief day): but soon will ye know (your folly)!
column3: Ebo adeba'a cin mana'abo be yannazhi yi la twarya ya'a na. Efe wo ma izhe degi bele-yin yea be de kpikpe.

column2: And they (even) assign to things they do not know a portion out of that which We have bestowed for their sustenance! By Allah ye shall certainly be called to account for your false inventions.
column3: Ama'ajin afe la robo ndoci ya yan na akpe egun'u ko anfaniu yea na dagan mini arziki nazhi yi la ya'a na. (ke eba-san boci jin kuti jin na) Wallahi hakika a gbin'egan eti yannazhi ye fe tswa yan ganmana na.

column2: And they assign daughters for Allah! - Glory be to Him! - and for themselves (sons- the issue) they desire!
column3: Ama'ajin afe la egi ynzagizhi a ya Soko lili kpata ajin tabbata ya Soko (ke wuncin lugwa) atso cie la (egi bagi) nazhi ade shahawa'ana aya eti tacin'atso zhi.

column2: When news is brought to one of them of (the birth of) a female (child) his face darkens and he is filled with inward grief!
column3: Ama ga ya zaeni miniabo labari be mima egi yinzagi fuskau gaashi zhiko yangban'u maga'a yin sarauyin.

column1: Surah 16:59                  With shame does he hide himself from his people because of the bad news he has had! Shall he
column2: retain it on (sufferance and) contempt or bury it in the dust Ah! what an evil (choice) they decide on
column3: Ucia jin ufe swo ye ya zawangizhi ebo labari dede na'a ya wyun na ngba wyun la egiu gwo eti egbao kashi wyundau la wyun'u swo'u gun kinbo Hakika hukunci wuncin nae ba na wun'a biye.

column2: To those who believe not in the Hereafter applies the similitude of evil: to Allah applies the highest similitude: for He is the Exalted in Power full of Wisdom.
column3: Zanazhie jin imani Efo zoba yin'ana ayibe misali dede. Soko gama wun siffa natso latu gan nao. Wyun ga mayi Etsu zankpeo Etsu hikimao

column2: To those who believe not in the Hereafter applies the similitude of evil: to Allah applies the highest similitude: for He is the Exalted in Power full of Wisdom.
column3: Zanazhie jin imani Efo zoba yin'ana ayibe misali dede. Soko gama wun siffa natso latu gan nao. Wyun ga mayi Etsu zankpeo Etsu hikimao.

column2: If Allah were to punish men for their wrong-doing He would not leave on the (earth) a single living creature: but He gives them respite for a stated Term: When their Term expires they would not be able to delay (the punishment) for a single hour just as they would not be able to anticipate it (for a single hour).
column3: Da acigan Sokoe wan zawangizhi wan be zwalunciazhi (lefiazhi) da wyun'a ya dabba ndondo (zandondo nae dazan ta kinbo na) ke kpe eti kinboa amaade wyun'e pata yaa da lokaci ndoci nayi kpikpeci (ebaubo na). Gancin eka'azhi ga'akun a din'u zhin zunma ka yan lokaci ninia ama'a taulo yegboroa.

column2: They attribute to Allah what they hate (for themselves) and their tongues assert the falsehood that all good things are for themselves: without doubt for them is the Fire and they will be the first to be hastened on into it!
column3: Amaajin afe la yan je Soko na atsoe navo na gintara'azhi cia fe zun ganmana kede hakika zoba wangi ga'ajin tabbata ya a na. Egandin ndondo danboa hakika aga wun enao hakikama a cea ce fi bo ke yegun Soko lugwa.

column2: By Allah We (also) sent (Our messengers) to Peoples before thee; but Satan made (to the wicked) their own acts seem alluring: He is also their patron today but they shall have a most grievous penalty.
column3: Wallahi Yi tun Tucizhi fi alumma nazhi shi wyodzo na shetan cia etun dedezhi la pa nin fia wyun gayi ndakata'a yin nao azaba na ma tan na ga'ajin tabbata ya'a.

column2: And We sent down the Book to thee for the express purpose that thou shouldst make clear to them those things in which they differ and that it should be a guide and a mercy to those who believe.
column3: Yi ma cin Litafi cin be ya wyo ya'a saide ebo wyo yo jin bayanio yaa eti yannazhi e cedozhi leba dan mini'ubo na u mayi bawu be yegun'y ya zanazhi ga imani jin na.

column2: And Allah sends down rain from the skies and gives therewith life to the earth after its death: verily in this is a Sign for those who listen.
column3: Soko gayi Etsu nae dule be dagan sanmao nao ucia kin dan rayi beuyin baci na wyun'a tsu na. Hakika mini wuncin'o egwa wu yan zankpe Soko danbo ya zanazhi gae wo gan na.

column2: And verily in cattle (too) will ye find an instructive sign. From what is within their bodies between excretions and blood We produce for your drink milk pure and agreeable to those who drink it.
column3: Hakika ma ye de eyan yekpa dan mini dabbazhio. (ke nanko na) yie yaye fin dagan mini yanna fi gbakoazhio na (nae wa tinya) tsakani ebio be egyae na uga yi nono lilici na man-ynfin ya zanazhi gae fin'u na.

column2: And from the fruit of the date-palm and the vine ye get out wholesome drink and food: behold in this also is a sign for those who are wise.
column3: Dagan mini sun-sun dobinazhio to inabizhio yeajin ye wa egye bo ye mae de arziki wangibo. Hakika mini wuncin'o egwa wu yan zankpe Soko danbo ya zanazhi gayibe hankali na.

column2: And thy Lord taught the Bee to build its cells in hills on trees and in (men´s) habitations;
column3: Tsoci wyo cijin wahayi fi efuko kede: A emizhi tu dan patizhio to cigbanzhio to mini ba nzhi agae tu na.

column2: Then to eat of all the produce (of the earth) and find with skill the spacious paths of its Lord: there issues from within their bodies a drink of varying colours wherein is healing for men: verily in this is a Sign for those who give thought.
column3: Gancin ma wyo-ogi dagan yangici sunsun ndondo wyo mao gan'odan eko yan Tsoci wyozhio nazhi ujin foro ya wyo na Eyan finci zhi nazhi yi iri iri zhina e tinya dagan gbakoabo miniubo be egunsa danbo ya zawangizhi. Hakika mini wuncin'o egwa wu yan zankpe Soko danbo ya jama'a nazhi gae kpaye na.

column2: It is Allah who creates you and takes your souls at death; and of you there are some who are sent back to a feeble age so that they know nothing after having known (much): for Allah is All-Knowing All-Powerful.
column3: Soko gama jin alittaye zhio gancin ma wyun ga'wu ye yeo. Miniyebo ade nazhi gaa kuku baenio har na wyun'a kpe yandondo ye bea na baci nama ukpeaye le na. Hakika Soko Etsu kpikpe uyio Etsu iko ma uyio.

column2: It is Allah who creates you and takes your souls at death; and of you there are some who are sent back to a feeble age so that they know nothing after having known (much): for Allah is All-Knowing All-Powerful.
column3: Soko gama jin alittaye zhio gancin ma wyun ga'wu ye yeo. Miniyebo ade nazhi gaa kuku baenio har na wyun'a kpe yandondo ye bea na baci nama ukpeaye le na. Hakika Soko Etsu kpikpe uyio Etsu iko ma uyio.

column2: Allah has bestowed His gifts of sustenance more freely on some of you than on others: those more favoured are not going to throw back their gifts to those whom their right hands possess so as to be equal in that respect. Will they then deny the favours of Allah
column3: Soko maa falala (bagwo) la'aya sashi yezhi ta eti sashizhio dan mini arzikio; zanazhi ma Soko jin bagwo ya na ajin yeda na aga arziki'azhi la'aya wuzhiazhi harma ala zhe nini mini mulkijin be arziki wuncin'y naa. Kashi ni'ima Soko gae jin kafirinci be yin'o

column2: And Allah has made for you mates (and companions) of your own nature and made for you out of them sons and daughters and grandchildren and provided for you sustenance of the best: will they then believe in vain things and be ungrateful for Allah´s favours-Soko ga la yinzagi yaye mini nakan kpace yetso bo uci jin egizhi to yagizhi yaye dagan mini yinmi yezhio uma yaye arzikizhi dagan eyan wangi wangi zhio. Ngba ganmana tsa aye ya gaskiyao acie jin kafirinci be ni'ima Soko (zhi) yin'o

column1: Surah 16:73              And worship others than Allah- such as have no power of providing them for sustenance with anything in heavens or earth and cannot possibly have such power
column2: Amae jin bauta ya yandoci najin Sokoa na na ma de mulki arziki ndondo ya'a wo dagan sanmazhio ko kinboa na har amaa la'a sa'ajin ade kagbo wuncin'a na.
And worship others than Allah- such as have no power of providing them for sustenance with anything in heavens or earth and cannot possibly have such power
column3: Amae jin bauta ya yandoci najin Sokoa na na ma de mulki arziki ndondo ya'a wo dagan sanmazhio ko kinboa na har amaa la'a sa'ajin ade kagbo wuncin'a na.

column2: Invent not similitudes for Allah: for Allah knoweth and ye know not.
column3: (Ebo acin'o) Ega tswa yandocizhi a pa Soko baci ma. Hakika Soko yibe kpikpe yandondoe ye ma de kpikpea.

column2: Allah sets forth the Parable (of two men: one) a slave under the dominion of another; He has no power of any sort; and (the other) a man on whom We have bestowed goodly favours from Ourselves and he spends thereof (freely) privately and publicly: are the two equal (By no means;) praise be to Allah. But most of them understand not.
column3: Soko ma la misali be yan wuzhi ndoci nama ejin'u mulki jin na wyuntso ma de iko ta eti yandondo boa (uciu la san tatu) be zandoci nama yi yau arziki wangi nama dokun na ucie wu dagan mini arzikiubo to swiswoci to gbagba. Ngba zagubaba nanazhi ga'azhe yeni Yebo kpata'ajin tabbata ya Soko amaade ekun dondo azhi ade kpikpea.

column2: Allah sets forth (another) Parable of two men: one of them dumb with no power of any sort; a wearisome burden is he to his master; whichever way be directs him he brings no good: is such a man equal with one who commands Justice and is on a Straight Way
column3: Soko ma ke la misali yan eza bagi guba ndocizhi be-be zaeni miniabo edingi uyio ude iko ta eti yandondo boa uciazhe kara wyun'a yakpe ndakatau baenio bandondo nama aga zheu lo na wyun'ala alheri ndondo be woa. Ngba zawuncin ga'ajin daidai be za naejin zawangizhi foro be jin jin alheri na uma kezhe ta eti ekpa natso yi gboro nao (A a ngan ajin ye nia).

column2: To Allah belongeth the Mystery of the heavens and the earth. And the Decision of the Hour (of Judgment) is as the twingkling of an eye or even quicker: for Allah hath power over all things.
column3: Soko gama wun kpikpe yannazhi swofi sanmazhio to kinbo nao. Alamari Alkiyami ma ufea sai de ke eyeba na koma yanna tsoba gan'acin na. (Alkiyamia jin'a ni). Hakika Soko de iko ta eti yandondo.

column2: It is He Who brought you forth from the wombs of your mothers when ye knew nothing; and He gave you hearing and sight and intelligence and affections: that ye may give thanks (to Allah).
column3: Soko ga ma wa ye dzun tinya dagan ewan nnayezhi bo (kanga) yede kpikpe yandondoa ucia ganwo to eyan bacin le to yangban jin yaye. Ujin wo be wuncin'y ye ga'fe zanazhie jin yebo (Soko) na.

column2: Do they not look at the birds held poised in the midst of (the air and) the sky Nothing holds them up but (the power of) Allah. Verily in this are signs for those who believe.
column3: Kashi acinle lo eba elugia kendoe Soko jin'a foro fi sarari sanmao naa yandondo ma danbo na la gwa sun'a naa sai de (iko) Sokoa Hakika mini wuncin'o egwa wu yan zankpe Soko zhi danbo ya zanazhi ga imani jin na.

column2: It is Allah Who made your habitations homes of rest and quiet for you; and made for you out of the skins of animals (tents for) dwellings which ye find so light (and handy) when ye travel and when ye stop (in your travels); and out of their wool and their soft fibres (between wool and hair) and their hair rich stuff and articles of convenience (to serve you) for a time.
column3: Soko gayi Etsu na la efa be yaye mini emiyezhio nao u cike jin emizhi yaye dagan mini epa dabbazhio yecie fan yan'e efona ye gaa da zan na (ye mae kan'a) efona yega'cin na gancin ma dagan mini tinyin yan kingbagbao to tinyin rakum to tinyin nangikarozhi ye de eyan ninpa yan yantacizhi miniabo be eyan eman-wozhi yan lokaci degi.

column2: It is Allah Who made out of the things He created some things to give you shade; of the hills He made some for your shelter; He made you garments to protect you from heat and coats of mail to protect you from your (mutual) violence. Thus does He complete His favours on you that ye may bow to His Will (in Islam).
column3: Soko gama jin wuruzhi yaye dagan mini yannazhi ujin alittazhi na bo ucia katazhi jin yaye dagan mini patizhio ucia ewozhi (tufuwazhi) jin yaye nahie kangwa ba yi pa yaye na to ewo nazhie kangwa eyan dedezhi ya ye na (ke lokaci ekunzhi na) Acinga ga sokoajin ugun ni'imauzhi mi yaye yeo ujin wo be wuncin-y yegafe zanazhie ta kpatsun -- foro Soko na.

column2: But if they turn away thy duty is only to preach the clear Message.
column3: Ammaa aga bea zunma zheta to yandondo ta eti wyoboa sai de eyan wu natso yi gbangba na.

column2: They recognise the favours of Allah; then they deny them; and most of them are (creatures) ungrateful.
column3: Atso yibe kpikpe yan ni'ima Sokoe gancin aciafe gbomi (eba bojin'azhio) ekun dondoa ma kafirizhi ayio.

column2: One Day We shall raise from all Peoples a Witness: then will no excuse be accepted from Unbelievers nor will they receive any favours.
column3: (Wyo mao feo pa) Efo na yiga eri jinci la'a nakin dagan mini alumma ndondo na gancin ma a jin izini ya zanazhi jin kafirincina (gan'ata uzuria) ama'a -- uzuriazhio tsoa.

column2: When the wrong-doers (actually) see the Penalty then will it in no way be mitigated nor will they then receive respite.
column3: Kamina ma azwalumizhi ga azaba leye na to ajin sauki ya aa ama'a shi tukpa ya aa.

column2: When the wrong-doers (actually) see the Penalty then will it in no way be mitigated nor will they then receive respite.
column3: Kamina ma azwalumizhi ga azaba leye na to ajin sauki ya aa ama'a shi tukpa ya aa.

column2: When those who gave partners to Allah will see their "partners" they will say: "Our Lord! these are our ´partners´ those whom we used to invoke besides Thee." But they will throw back their word at them (and say): "Indeed ye are liars!"
column3: Kamina zanazhie la yan pa Soko baci na aga bea yannazhi e la pa Soko baci na leye na a gangan: "Ya wyoe Tsoci yi! Zanazhi yife la pa wyo baci na aga dan-nao agazhi yife wun ke wyo lugwao." Atso cia ce egan ya'a gan: Hakika ye ganmana zuncizhi ye yio.

column2: That Day shall they (openly) show (their) submission to Allah; and all their inventions shall leave them in the lurch.
column3: Efo wuncin atso ga kpatsun ta ya Soko gancin yannazhi afe tswa yan ganmanazhi na ci ga gbin'a yeo.

column2: Those who reject Allah and hinder (men) from the Path of Allah - for them will We add Penalty to Penalty; for that they used to spread mischief.
column3: Zanazhi ma'ajin kafirinci na acia eko yan bauta jin ya Soko te na to yia bea azaba ta eti azabao ebo iri etun dede nazhi afe lo nao.

column2: One day We shall raise from all Peoples a witness against them from amongst themselves: and We shall bring thee as a witness against these (thy people): and We have sent down to thee the Book explaining all things a Guide a Mercy and Glad Tidings to Muslims.
column3: (Wyo mao pa) fona Yi ga'ala erijinci nakin dagan mini alumma ndondo na uci gaa eri ya etiabo gancin Yiciga wyo (Muhammadu (S.A.W)) la'atinya ebo wyo-o yari eti zananazhio. Yi maa Litafi cin be a ya wyoe ebo ulau fe bayani u ya yandondo. Uma yi bawu be yegun'i be yangbanfae ya musulumizhi.

column2: Allah commands justice the doing of good and liberality to kith and kin and He forbids all shameful deeds and injustice and rebellion: He instructs you that ye may receive admonition.
column3: Hakika Sokoe jin (ye) foro be adalinci jin-y to be jinjin boloboloe to be taimako laya eza tson bazhi. Soko ma na etun zunyesun vo to etun dede to zwalunci jinwyun'e jin ye gangba ujin wo be wuncin-y ye gaafe zanazhie -- sinsantu na.

column2: Fulfil the Covenant of Allah when ye have entered into it and break not your oaths after ye have confirmed them; indeed ye have made Allah your surety; for Allah knoweth all that ye do.
column3: Ye mae fe e la alkawali Sokoe she kandondo na ye ga alkawali jin na ye mae ga fe lo kutizhi yezhi yama bacina ye gau bgboka na ma alalima yetso Soko laajin Erijinci danbo. Hakika Soko yibe kpikpe etun nazhi ye lo na.

column2: If Allah so willed He could make you all one people: But He leaves straying whom He pleases and He guides whom He pleases: but ye shall certainly be called to account for all your actions.
column3: Da uma'a ba Soko ba da uga ye la'azhe alumma nini (be adini nini-y) ammade wyun'e gbin zana gabau na umae la zana ga bauna ke eko. Hakika ma Sokoa gbin ye gan eti etun nazhi ye lo kpata na.

column2: And take not your oaths to practise deception between yourselves with the result that someone´s foot may slip after it was firmly planted and ye may have to taste the evil (consequences) of having hindered (men) from the Path of Allah and a Mighty Wrath descend on you.
column3: Ye mae ga la kutizhi yezhi ajin dozhi ha'inci ma kacan'a bici'ezhi gaa taya baci na wun'a wanshi dan kin bo na ye maafin azaba ebo eko Soko nazhi ye te na azaba na gbota na gaajin tabbata yaye.

column2: Nor sell the covenant of Allah for a miserable price: for with Allah is (a prize) far better for you if ye only knew.
column3: Ye mae ga kun alkawali Soko yeahi eyan tetengi izhe ma hakika yan na dan be Sokoe na ugade alheri ya ye gan'o ye ga'fe zanazhi de kpikpe de na.

column2: What is with you must vanish: what is with Allah will endure. And We will certainly bestow on those who patiently persevere their reward according to the best of their actions.
column3: Yandondo naga dan be yeyin na ugaa zo yanna ma dan be Sokoena wun'a zoa hakika ma yia ga zanazhi jin hankuri (be foro Sokoena) gba be egagba na gye gan etun nazhi afe lo nae.

column2: Whoever works righteousness man or woman and has Faith verily to him will We give a new Life a life that is good and pure and We will bestow on such their reward according to the best of their actions.
column3: Zaeni ndondo naga lotun wangi mini bagio ko yinzagi na alalima uyi mumini na yia yau izhe le nayi lilicina yi maa ga'a gba be egagba na gyegan etun nazhi alo na.

column2: When thou dost read the Qur´an seek Allah´s protection from Satan the rejected one.
column3: Kandondo na wyo gaa gba Alkuranu na wa etswa be Sokoe dagan egun shetan nayi eza cice yaci na.

column2: No authority has he over those who believe and put their trust in their Lord.
column3: Hakika wyun'y (shaitan) ude iko ndoci ta eti za nazhia imani jin aciafe zanazhie yakpe Tsocia zhi na boa.Surah 16:100        His authority is over those only who take him as patron and who join partners with Allah.Hakika ikou de ta eti zanazhie daya beu yin nae zanazhie pa ma beuyin na.

column2: When We substitute one revelation for another- and Allah knows best what He reveals (in stages)- they say "Thou art but a forger": but most of them understand not.
column3: Yi ma ga aya ndoci sangwa be aya ndoci. Soko ga ma de kpikpe gan'o yan yannazhi wyun'e cin be nao ajin agan gan: "Hakika ganmana zunci tsa wyo yio." A'a ujin acin'a ekundondoazhi made kpikpea.

column2: Say the Holy Spirit has brought the revelation from thy Lord in Truth in order to strengthen those who believe and as a Guide and Glad Tidings to Muslims.
column3: Gangan: Ruhul-kudusi (Malaika Jibrilu) ga cin'ube dagan eba Tsoci wyo bo be gaskiy yin'o ebo'ula kagbo be yangbanshiu ya zanazhia imani jin na umayi bawu be yangban fae ya musulumizhi.

column2: We know indeed that they say "It is a man that teaches him." The tongue of him they wickedly point to is notably foreign while this is Arabic pure and clear.
column3: Hakika ma yi kpe ke'e gan gan: "zawangi ndoci tsae wu'u katun'o" (Gancinma) zhimi yan zana ekan hankali lo eba'u na ajamiu yio (ujin larabcia) (Alkluranu) nana ma zhimi uyio yan larabci na yi gbangba na.

column2: Those who believe not in the Signs of Allah- Allah will not guide them and theirs will be a grievous Penalty.
column3: Hakika zanazhi jin imani be aya Soko(zhi) yin'a na Sokoa la'a ke ekoa azaba na ma tan na gajin tabbata ya'a.

column2: It is those who believe not in the Signs of Allah that forge falsehood: it is they who lie!
column3: Hakikade zanazhie tswa ganmana na aga yi zanazhi jin imani be Soko yin'anao; zanazhi-ma konda'a ma ganmana zuncizhi ayio.

column2: Any one who after accepting faith in Allah utters Unbelief- except under compulsion his heart remaining firm in Faith - but such as open their breast to Unbelief on them is Wrath from Allah and theirs will be a dreadful Penalty.
column3: Zaeni ndondo na ga jin kafirinci be Sokoe baci yan imaniu bo na (wun'a jin hallaka) sai de zana aga be jin'u tile be kpakae ala'lima yangban wyun'a shi be imani na ammaa zana ga kafirinci --  ucia fedun dan'u yangban'o na to ewunzhe yan Soko ga'ajin tabbata yau azaba nama gbota na ga'ajin tabbata yau

column2: This because they love the life of this world better than the Hereafter: and Allah will not guide those who reject Faith.
column3: Wuncin mayi ebona afe zanazhie wa edunfe izhe a gan yan eku nao hakika ma Sokoe jin jamaa yan kafirizhi shiria.

column2: Those are they whose hearts ears and eyes Allah has sealed up and they take no heed.
column3: Zawuncinzhi agayi zanazhi Sokoa yangban'azhi to gan woazhi to bacinleazhi te nao zawuncinzhi ma agayi eye yacizhio.

column2: Without doubt in the Hereafter they will perish.
column3: Kelo kezhin ndondo danboa kede hakika a zawuncizhi Efo zobae agayi eza hasarazhio naa.

column2: But verily thy Lord- to those who leave their homes after trials and persecutions- and who thereafter strive and fight for the faith and patiently persevere- Thy Lord after all this is oft-forgiving Most Merciful.
column3: Gancin ma hakika Tsoci wyoe (Taimako jinci uyio) ya zanazhi ga bea kpela baci yan fitina na cin dan'a nao gancin ma ajin hakuri na; hakika Tsoci wyoe baci wuncin'o Etsu gafara uyio Etsu yegun uyio.

column2: One Day every soul will come up struggling for itself and every soul will be recompensed (fully) for all its actions and none will be unjustly dealt with.
column3: (Wyo mao pa Fo na rayi ndondo atinya cia fe gbomi ya eti tacin'u na ama ga egagba yan etun na rayi ndondo ga lo na laa yau amaa jin'a zwaluncia.

column2: Allah sets forth a Parable: a city enjoying security and quiet abundantly supplied with sustenance from every place: Yet was it ungrateful for the favours of Allah: so Allah made it taste of hunger and terror (in extremes) (closing in on it) like a garment (from every side) because of the (evil) which (its people) wrought.
column3: Soko ma la misali yan (jamaa) yan alkarya ndoci be afe dan mini amincio be yangbanshi arzikiazhi cae be ya'a be bagwoe dagan kansanta ndondo aci bea jin kafirinci be ni'ima Soko (zhi)Soko ci ya'a masiba yan azaba madan be dansun'y fin ebo etun nazhi afe lo na.

column2: Allah sets forth a Parable: a city enjoying security and quiet abundantly supplied with sustenance from every place: Yet was it ungrateful for the favours of Allah: so Allah made it taste of hunger and terror (in extremes) (closing in on it) like a garment (from every side) because of the (evil) which (its people) wrought.
column3: Soko ma la misali yan (jamaa) yan alkarya ndoci be afe dan mini amincio be yangbanshi arzikiazhi cae be ya'a be bagwoe dagan kansanta ndondo aci bea jin kafirinci be ni'ima Soko (zhi)Soko ci ya'a masiba yan azaba madan be dansun'y fin ebo etun nazhi afe lo na.

column2: And there came to them a Messenger from among themselves but they falsely rejected him; so the Wrath seized them even in the midst of their iniquities.
column3: Hakika ma Tuci be ya'a dagan mini abo aciu yi ganmana zunci azaba cia cin taa ala'li ma a fe azwalumi zhi.

column2: So eat of the sustenance which Allah has provided for you lawful and good; and be grateful for the favours of Allah if it is He Whom ye serve.
column3: Ye mae gi yangici halali nayi lilici na dagan mini arziki na Soko ga la yaye nao ye mae fe jin yebo be ni'ima Soko na ye gi na wun'ayi gan hakika Soko ga ye jin bauta yao na.

column2: He has only forbidden you dead meat and blood and the flesh of swine and any (food) over which the name of other than Allah has been invoked. But if one is forced by necessity without wilful disobedience nor transgressing due limits- then Allah is Oft-Forgiving Most Merciful.
column3: Yannade u lajin haramu yaye na agayi eyan tsutsucio be egyae be nakan kpu'utsun'y be yanna azun be sunna yandoci najin Sokoa na ammaa zana tile bo gabe de na (uci gi)uma jin eti shahawa ko gbingbintu boana to hakika Soko Etsu gafara uyio Etsu yegun uyio.

column2: But say not - for any false thing that your tongues may put forth- "This is lawful and this is forbidden" so as to ascribe false things to Allah. For those who ascribe false things to Allah will never prosper.
column3: Ye mae gafe gangan be iri yan na gintara ye gae jiye (yaye) yan ganmana nama ye gafe gangan nana yi halali nana mayi haramu na ma kawanyin ebode ye tswa gan manae ta Soko hakika zanazhie tswa ganmana ta Soko na a tso guria.

column2: (In such falsehood) is but a paltry profit; but they will have a most grievous Penalty.
column3: Eman wo yan izhe nana degi ga a wo wun'o azaba nama tan na ga'ajin tabbata ya'a.

column2: To the Jews We prohibited such things as We have mentioned to thee before: We did them no wrong but they were used to doing wrong to themselves.
column3: Yima'a yannazhi yi ya wyo labaria daa na la'jin haramu ya yahuduzhi shidzo be dzo yima jin'a zwaluncia amaade atso tsae jin ti tacin'a zwaluncio.

column2: But verily thy Lord- to those who do wrong in ignorance but who thereafter repent and make amends- thy Lord after all this is Oft-Forgiving Most Merciful.
column3: Gancin ma hakika Tsoci wyoe (Etsu gafara uyio) ya zanazhi ga lotun dede eti rakpe bo (eti jahilincio) aci jin kparanyin dajin tuba baci wunci'o na acia edzuta ladan rayuwa'abo na hakika Tsuci wyoe baci wuncin'o Etsu gafara uyio yegun uyio.

column2: Abraham was indeed a model devoutly obedient to Allah (and) true in Faith and he joined not gods with Allah:
column3: Hakika (Annabi) Ibrahima wyun'afe eza ko eza yesan nae gba Soko uma ta eti ekpa ibada natsoyi gboro na uma dan mini zanazhie la yan pa Soko baci na boa.

column2: He showed his gratitude for the favours of Allah who chose him and guided him to a Straight Way.
column3: Eza uyio nae jin yebo ya ni'ima Soko nao Sokou tsa uciu wuba lo eko natso yi gboro na.

column2: And We gave him Good in this world and he will be in the Hereafter in the ranks of the Righteous.
column3: Yima yan (yetun) yan bolobolo izheo hakika ma Efo Alkiyamio udan mini za guruzhio.

column2: So We have taught thee the inspired (Message) "Follow the ways of Abraham the True in Faith and he joined not gods with Allah."
column3: Gancin ma yijin wahayi ya wyoe kede wyo lamiotu ekpa adini yan Ibrahima natso yi gboro na uma fedan mini zanazhie la yan Soko baci na boa.

column2: The Sabbath was only made (strict) for those who disagreed (as to its observance); But Allah will judge between them on the Day of Judgment as to their differences.
column3: A (cinwan la ya) Asibi la'a ta eti zanazhi cedozhi leba etiu bo na hakikama Tsoci wyo ya'ajin hukunci tsakaniabo Efo Alkiyami eti yannazhi e cedozhi leba dan miniubo na.

column2: Invite (all) to the Way of thy Lord with wisdom and beautiful preaching; and argue with them in ways that are best and most gracious: for thy Lord knoweth best who have strayed from His Path and who receive guidance.
column3: Yi zazhi lo eko Tsoci wyoe be hikimae to wa'azi nayi wangi na wyo mao gbomi beayin be egan natso gye gan nae Hakika Tsoci wyoe tsa kpe gan'o yan za na'agbin ke ekou lugwanao wyunga ma kpe zanazhi kpe ekpo gboro o na gan'o.

column2: And if ye do catch them out catch them out no worse than they catch you out: But if ye show patience that is indeed the best (course) for those who are patient.
column3: Yema gabe cia jin ga to e jinga be iri yanna aga jin ye nae ammaa wallahi ye ga jin hakuri jin to wunci gade alheri gan-ya zanazhi gaejin hakuri nao.

column2: And do thou be patient for thy patience is but from Allah; nor grieve over them: and distress not thyself because of their plots.
column3: Wyo mao jin hakuri (eti yandondo na ga tswan wyo na) hakuri maaye jin'a saide be taimako Sokoe wyo mao ga nyin yangban beayin ma wyo mao ga pin yangban be iri makirinci nazhie pa na ma.

column2: And do thou be patient for thy patience is but from Allah; nor grieve over them: and distress not thyself because of their plots.
column3: Wyo mao jin hakuri (eti yandondo na ga tswan wyo na) hakuri maaye jin'a saide be taimako Sokoe wyo mao ga nyin yangban beayin ma wyo mao ga pin yangban be iri makirinci nazhie pa na ma.

column2: For Allah is with those who restrain themselves and those who do good.
column3: Hakika Soko dan be zanazhi gae sundan Soko acie tswa'u na to zanazhi gae jin bolo bolo na.

column2: Glory to (Allah) Who did take His servant for a Journey by night from the Sacred Mosque to the farthest Mosque whose precincts We did bless- in order that We might show him some of Our Signs: for He is the One Who heareth and seeth (all things).
column3: Lili kpata'ajin tabbata ya Soko Etsu na la wuzhiu (Annabi Muhammadu) dazan (Isra'i) dan yeshio dagan masallaci alfurma (yan makao) lo masallaci na lokpa gan (yan kudus) ona na ma yia albarka la'a mau -- ba eboma yi la zankpe ndocizhi wu'u na. Hakika Soko Etsu nae wo yandondo na uyio Etsu na mae le yandondo ye yandondo ye na uyio.

column2: We gave Moses the Book and made it a Guide to the Children of Israel (commanding): "Take not other than Me as Disposer of (your) affairs."
column3: Yima'a Litafi Musa yiciu la'afe bawu be shiri ya Banu Israilazhi kede Ega la zandondo ndakata na yea ya kpe ke Soko lugwana na ma.

column2: We gave Moses the Book and made it a Guide to the Children of Israel (commanding): "Take not other than Me as Disposer of (your) affairs."
column3: Yima'a Litafi Musa yiciu la'afe bawu be shiri ya Banu Israilazhi kede Ega la zandondo ndakata na yea ya kpe ke Soko lugwana na ma.

column2: O ye that are sprung from those whom We carried (in the Ark) with Noah! Verily he was a devotee most grateful.
column3: Ya ye zuriya zanazhi yi ku keba be Nuhu-I (fi eyao na). Hakika wyun'afe wuzhi nae dokun be yebo jin ya Soko jin ya Sokona.

column2: And We gave (Clear) Warning to the Children of Israel in the Book that twice would they do mischief on the earth and be elated with mighty arrogance (and twice would they be punished)!
column3: Yicia kpa ya Bani Israila zhi dan mini Litafi Attaurao: Hakika ye yea nyin yan fi kinbo zu guba ye ma'a be lati danfin'o eti ladanfin'o na wancin na. (nade tsanani na)

column2: When the first of the warnings came to pass We sent against you Our servants given to terrible warfare: They entered the very inmost parts of your homes; and it was a warning (completely) fulfilled.
column3: To kamina alkawali (yan eyan nyin ye) yan mafari gabe dabe na yin tun wuzhi yi ndocizhi nazhi gboka tsuntsun nu na fi ye aci ga'banfi nin yan katatako emi yezhio nana ma alkawali uyio naga'ajin tabbata na.

column2: Then did We grant you the Return as against them: We gave you increase in resources and sons and made you the more numerous in man-power.
column3: Gancin Yicia ya ye dama yan zankpe ta tiabo be yicia ye gboka be dukiyazhi to gizhi yicia ye laafe zanazhi dokun gan jama'abo na.

column2: If ye did well ye did well for yourselves; if ye did evil (ye did it) against yourselves. So when the second of the warnings came to pass (We permitted your enemies) to disfigure your faces and to enter your Temple as they had entered it before and to visit with destruction all that fell into their power.
column3: Ye ga bejin bolobolo to eti tacin'e gaejin bolobolo yao ye ma ga jin dede eti tacin'e gaejin yao. To kamina alkawali (yan eyan nyin ye) yan zoba gabe dabe na (kanga makiri zhia) eboa deba'ajin ye walakanci acia kezhea gandan masallaci (yan Baitul makadisio) kendoe agandan bo caba batsozhio na aciga yandondo naejin mulki be yin na banya jigi jigi baenio.

column2: It may be that your Lord may (yet) show Mercy unto you; but if ye revert (to your sins) We shall revert (to Our punishments): And we have made Hell a prison for those who reject (all Faith).
column3: Kengi uyio na Tsociye wyun'a gun ye ye nao. Ammaa yega kega kezhe dezhin (lulo etun dede be) yitso ma'adazhin (be azabae) be. Yima'a jahannama laa zhe yantaci ya kafirizhi.

column2: Verily this Qur´an doth guide to that which is most right (or stable) and giveth the Glad Tidings to the Believers who work deeds of righteousness that they shall have a magnificent reward;
column3: Hakika Alkuranu nana wun'e wu (alittazhi) ba lo eko natso yi gboro gan na. Umae ya mumini nazhie lo tun wangizhi na labari yangbanfa kede hakika ayi be lada na wancin nae.

column2: And to those who believe not in the Hereafter (it announceth) that We have prepared for them a Penalty Grievous (indeed)0.
column3: Hakikama zanazhie ya gaskiya be Efo zobayin'ana yi yia tattali jin yaa yan azaba na tan na.

column2: The prayer that man should make for good he maketh for evil; for man is given to hasty (deeds).
column3: Zawangi ma'ajin ufe ba adwuwa dede ya eti tacin'u kendoe wyun'e ba alheri na; zawangi ma'afe eyedinci.

column2: We have made the Night and the Day as two (of Our) Signs: the Sign of the Night have We obscured while the Sign of the Day We have made to enlighten you; that ye may seek bounty from your Lord and that ye may know the number and count of the years: all things have We explained in detail.
column3: Yimaa yeshi to batin la'azhe aya guba; yicia aya yeshi laazhe (zhiko shi) yicia aya yan batin laazhe haske ebo yedebae wa bagwo dagan eba Tsoci yebo ebo ma ye kpe lisafi eyezhie ye be lisafi eyanbazhi. Yandondo ma yiu kpeyezhizhi kpala kpalae.
