Efe wu mini dukiya wangiyezhio nazhi ye cewoa na to mini yan nazhi yi la tinya ya ye dagan kinbo na ye mae ga kpa lulo etun dede mini ubo ma ye mae ga fe wu yanna ka aga yaye yea gwo'a na ma ko na kaye ga gwo ye ga eye findanna ma. Yemae kpe' wo kede Soko Etsu wadata uyio Etsu yebo ma uyio na.

column2: The Evil one threatens you with poverty and bids you to conduct unseemly. Allah promiseth you His forgiveness and bounties. And Allah careth for all and He knoweth all things.
column3: She'tan wyin'ejin ye alkawali yaji jin umae jinye umurni be lulo yan etun alfashae. Soko mae jin ye alkawali yan etun gafara be falalae dagan eba' ubo. Sokoma Etsu bagwo uyio Etsu kpikpe uyio.

column2: He granteth wisdom to whom He pleaseth; and he to whom wisdom is granted receiveth indeed a benefit overflowing; but none will grasp the Message but men of understanding.
column3: Wyun' ela hikima (fahimta gaskiya) a twarya ya za na ga ba una zandondo na ma aga hikima la'aya na akika aza wuncin ya alherina dokun na. A made za na' akpaye na'a sai de za nazhi gayi eza hankalizhi na.

column2: And whatever ye spend in charity or devotion be sure Allah knows it all. But the wrong-doers have no helpers.
column3: Yandondo na ye ga wu mini dukiyaezhio na (ba na wun'agbagba da kan na) koma emi yan alkawali ndoci na ye ga shena akika Soko yi be kpikpeu yin. Azwalumizhi ma'ade zanazhia jin'ataimako naa.

column2: If ye disclose (acts of) charity even so it is well but if ye conceal them and make them reach those (really) in need that is best for you: It will remove from you some of your (stains of) evil. And Allah is well acquainted with what ye do.
column3: Ye ga swadakazhi la'atula to ugye sarauyin yema ga'uswo ye cia la'aya talakazhi wucintso de alheri gan yaye. Soko ma ga ndoncizhi mini zunubi yezhio fin ya. Soko ma yi be kpikpe etun nazhi ye'lo na.

column2: It is not required of thee (O Messenger) to set them on the right path but Allah sets on the right path whom He pleaseth. Whatever of good ye give benefits your own souls and ye shall only do so seeking the "Face" of Allah. Whatever good ye give shall be rendered back to you and ye shall not Be dealt with unjustly.
column3: Eko ke'a udan egwa wyoboa amma'ade Soko ajin ula za na ga bau na ake eko. Yandondo na ma ye ga wu yan alheri na eti tacin yetso ye wu yao yandondo na ma ye ga wuna sai ebo wiwa yan yarda Soko bo ya wuo. Yandondo na ye ga wu mini alherio na Soko ga la'adau gunmi ya ye ama' ajin ye zwaluncia.

column2: (Charity is) for those in need who in Allah´s cause are restricted (from travel) and cannot move about in the land seeking (For trade or work): the ignorant man thinks because of their modesty that they are free from want. Thou shalt know them by their (Unfailing) mark: They beg not importunately from all the sundry. And whatever of good ye give be assured Allah knoweth it well.
column3: (Efe' wu dukiya) ya talakazhi nazhia eyanzhi la'akan'a ebo ezan na'eda yankokari ta eti ekpa Sokona ade kagbo na'alo bandondo wo be na'a za na kpea na ga le'aye wyun' aye gan ko eyandecizhio ebo minia nae wan nao. Wyoa kpeaye be ala'amazhiy e'jin zawangizhi bara wawuya yin'a yandondo na ye ga wu mini alherio na akika Soko yi be kpikpe uyin.

column2: Those who (in charity) spend of their goods by night and by day in secret and in public have their reward with their Lord: on them shall be no fear nor shall they grieve.
column3: Za nazhie wu dukiya' azhi (fi eko Soko) dan yeshio to igidi na to swiswoci to gbangba na to a yi be la'ada' ayin dan eba Tsociabo dansun ndondo ma'adan beayin'a nyangban nyin ndondo ma'adan bea yin'a.

column2: Those who devour usury will not stand except as stand one whom the Evil one by his touch Hath driven to madness. That is because they say: "Trade is like usury" but Allah hath permitted trade and forbidden usury. Those who after receiving direction from their Lord desist shall be pardoned for the past; their case is for Allah (to judge); but those who repeat (The offence) are companions of the Fire: They will abide therein (for ever).
column3: Za nazhie gi ewo riba na (yan naabe ta eti lisafio na) a nakin efo alkiyami boa sai de kendoe zana efe shetanda zhe nakan cia togwa na kendoe wyun' e nakin nana. Wuncin mayi ebo na atsoe gan gan: "akika woce ke riba na uyio. Sokoma' awoce la'azhe halali uma'ariba la'azhe haramu. "Ebo acin'o zandondo na wa'azi ga beyau dagan eba Tsociubona Ucia egwalu la'adan etun dedeo na Sokoa fa be natso -- gan'anina alamari'uma danbe Sokoe zana ma gake dazhin lulo etun dede be na  to za wuncinzhi ga yiegi mina zhio bagabo ma'afi tutun yin'o.

column2: Allah will deprive usury of all blessing but will give increase for deeds of charity: For He loveth not creatures ungrateful and wicked.
column3: Sokoe la albarka wa ewo ribao umae la bibe albarka dan ewo swadaka zhio Soko mae wa zandondo na gae ' jin kafirinci na'a umae wa zana ejin le'fi na'a.

column2: Those who believe and do deeds of righteousness and establish regular prayers and regular charity will have their reward with their Lord: on them shall be no fear nor shall they grieve.
column3: Akika za nazhia imani jin na aci ke'lo etun wangizhi na acia swallazhi kugikini na acia zakka dukiya' azhi wa na ayi be la'ada ayin dan eba Tsucia bo dansun ndondo ma'dan bea yin'a ama'aleyangbannyin yea.

column2: O ye who believe! Fear Allah and give up what remains of your demand for usury if ye are indeed believers.
column3: Ya ye nazhia imani jin na! E sundan Soso ye maela egwa lue lae dan etun ndondo na ga ke yan riba na wu'n ayi Muminizhi ga yeyio na.

column2: If ye do it not Take notice of war from Allah and His Messenger: But if ye turn back ye shall have your capital sums: Deal not unjustly and ye shall not be dealt with unjustly.
column3: To kagan ye be lugwa'a to ye kpe wo ke ekun danbo dagan eba Soko be Tuci uyin na Yee ma ga tuba jin yea egwa la'asun Nna yan ewo yeyan asali ye ga jin zandondo gun ma;zandondoma 'uga jin ye gun ma.

column2: If ye do it not Take notice of war from Allah and His Messenger: But if ye turn back ye shall have your capital sums: Deal not unjustly and ye shall not be dealt with unjustly.
column3: To kagan ye be lugwa'a to ye kpe wo ke ekun danbo dagan eba Soko be Tuci uyin na Yee ma ga tuba jin yea egwa la'asun Nna yan ewo yeyan asali ye ga jin zandondo gun ma;zandondoma 'uga jin ye gun ma.

column2: If the debtor is in a difficulty grant him time Till it is easy for him to repay. But if ye remit it by way of charity that is best for you if ye only knew.
column3: (Za na la gbata na) Uga bea zhe eza ezo (eba gbata yao) epata yau da lokaci na saukia be yau na ye ma ga'la jin swadaka yau wuncin de alheri gan ya ye ye ga kpekpe na.

column2: If the debtor is in a difficulty grant him time Till it is easy for him to repay. But if ye remit it by way of charity that is best for you if ye only knew.
column3: (Za na la gbata na) Uga bea zhe eza ezo (eba gbata yao) epata yau da lokaci na saukia be yau na ye ma ga'la jin swadaka yau wuncin de alheri gan ya ye ye ga kpekpe na.

column2: And fear the Day when ye shall be brought back to Allah. Then shall every soul be paid what it earned and none shall be dealt with unjustly.
column3: Ye mae sundsn efo nini ke'te na aga ye la'azheban zhin eba Soko miniubo na. Gancin aciga gbT wo ya rayindondo be iri woce na uga cena zando ma'jin'a gun'a.

column2: O ye who believe! When ye deal with each other in transactions involving future obligations in a fixed period of time reduce them to writing Let a scribe write down faithfully as between the parties: let not the scribe refuse to write: as Allah Has taught him so let him write. Let him who incurs the liability dictate but let him fear His Lord Allah and not diminish aught of what he owes. If they party liable is mentally deficient or weak or unable Himself to dictate Let his guardian dictate faithfully and get two witnesses out of your own men and if there are not two men then a man and two women such as ye choose for witnesses so that if one of them errs the other can remind her. The witnesses should not refuse when they are called on (For evidence). Disdain not to reduce to writing (your contract) for a future period whether it be small or big: it is juster in the sight of Allah More suitable as evidence and more convenient to prevent doubts among yourselves but if it be a transaction which ye carry out on the spot among yourselves there is no blame on you if ye reduce it not to writing. But take witness whenever ye make a commercial contract; and let neither scribe nor witness suffer harm. If ye do (such harm) it would be wickedness in you. So fear Allah; For it is Good that teaches you. And Allah is well acquainted with all things. If ye are on a journey and cannot find a scribe a pledge with possession (may serve the purpose). And if one of you deposits a thing on trust with another let the trustee (faithfully) discharge his trust and let him Fear his Lord conceal not evidence; for whoever conceals it - his heart is tainted with sin. And Allah knoweth all that ye do.
column3: Ya ye nazhia imani jin na! Ye ga be cia la gbata ya za yan dan da lokaci ndoci na yi kpikpeci na ye'u ka za na ma ga kau nawyun'u kau be adalinciy. Za na ma'aka na uga navo ma wyun'u kau kendoe Soko gala wu'una ulau ka acin. Za na ma gbata ta'tiu bo na wyuntso ga' tun gbatau yeo uma'usundan Soko nayi Tsocin na. Wyun'u ga ke yandondo minibo tukun ma. Za na ma gbata ta tiubo na wun'ayi eza danyagi uyio ko ma'za gbogun ko ma wyun'tso tun'uye woa za na ga agikini waliy yau na wyun'u tun'gbata'u ye be adlinciy ye mae wa eri guba mini bagi yezhio kagan yebe de bagi gubaa to ewa bagi nini be yinzagi gubae mini zanazhi ye jin yeda be uyin yan erizhi na ebo ka bea batan zabaci tso a pa dozhi tukpa. Erizhi ma'aga navoma kamina aga yia na ye mae ga bo be ki kae ma tetengi uyio ko wanciko ye'u ka. Dafona aga lacici na. Wuncinzhi gayi adalinci eba Soko bo wuncin ma gboka gan eba erijin'o uma tsoba gan na'ala yeajin ke-lo-kezhin'a nao saide wun'ayi woce egwa be gwae tsakanieb

column2: If ye are on a journey and cannot find a scribe a pledge with possession (may serve the purpose). And if one of you deposits a thing on trust with another Let the trustee (Faithfully) discharge His trust and let him fear his Lord. Conceal not evidence; for whoever conceals it- His heart is tainted with sin. And Allah Knoweth all that ye do.
column3: Ye ma ga'afe ta eti ezan'o ye ma de za na'akana'a toyea yandoci la'akpetso na kun' yn la shishi na. Ye ma ga aminci kun'utswa amana uma'u sundan Soko nayi Tsocin na. Ye mae ga swo eri ma zandondo na ga swo'u na za wuncin'a eti tacin 'u jin gun. Soko ma yi be kpikpe etun nazhi ye'lo na.

column2: To Allah belongeth all that is in the heavens and on earth. Whether ye show what is in your minds or conceal it Allah Calleth you to account for it. He forgiveth whom He pleaseth and punisheth whom He pleaseth for Allah hath power over all things.
column3: Yan nazhi fi samazhio na to nazhi fi kinbo na Sokwun'o ye ma ga yan nazhi fi yangban yezhiona tula ko ma ye ciu swo Soko wa dudugi uza ebo gbata wo'o gancin ucia fa be za na ga bau na za na ma ga ba'u na wyun'a jin'u azaba Soko ma de iko ta eti jijin yandondo.

column2: The Messenger believeth in what hath been revealed to him from his Lord as do the men of faith. Each one (of them) believeth in Allah His angels His books and His messengers. "We make no distinction (they say) between one and another of His messengers." And they say: "We hear and we obey: (We seek) Thy forgiveness our Lord and to Thee is the end of all journeys."
column3: Tuci Soko wyun'a imani jinbe yanna acin be ya 'udagan eba Tsocin bo na to muminizhi kpata'a a imani jin be Sokoe be malaikazhi be litafiuzhiy be Tucinzhiy a ma gan: "Yi wo yima ga emi tu (foro Soko).Tsociyi fa be yi yin eba wyo ma ga yi yio zheban zhin'o.

column2: On no soul doth Allah Place a burden greater than it can bear. It gets every good that it earns and it suffers every ill that it earns. (Pray:) "Our Lord! Condemn us not if we forget or fall into error; our Lord! Lay not on us a burden Like that which Thou didst lay on those before us; Our Lord! Lay not on us a burden greater than we have strength to bear. Blot out our sins and grant us forgiveness. Have mercy on us. Thou art our Protector; Help us against those who stand against faith."
column3: Soko mae la kpaka a'ta rayia sai natso uga'a lowo na egagba wangi ga jin tabata yan yan woce wangi na'uce na egagba dede maga'jin tabbata yan yan woce dede na'u ga ce na. Tsociyi! Ga wan yi ma be iri le'fi na yi gajin eti tanbao ko bicicin;o na . Ya wyoe Tsoci yi! Wyo mao ga la ekpinlu ta yi ma kendoe wyo la ta eti zanazhi shidzo nao ma. Tsoci yi! Ga la yi da la kara na yi kun kagboa na ma. Wyo mao fa be yi yin wyo jin yi gafara wyo mao gun yi ye wyo ga yi Ndakata yi yio ebo acin 'o jin yi taimako ta eti jama'a yan kafirizhio.

column2: Ta-Ha.
column3: TWA HA

column2: We have not sent down the Qur´an to thee to be (an occasion) for thy distress
column3: Yi cin Alkuranu cin be ya wyoe ebo wyo debao jin wahala boa.

column2: But only as an admonition to those who fear (Allah)-
column3: Sai de ebo ula'ufe sinsantu'u ya zandndo nagae sundan Soko na.

column2: A revelation from Him Who created the earth and the heavens on high.
column3: Acin'u cin be dagan weba Etsu najin alitta yan kin be sanma nazhi yi elatucizhi nae.

column2: (Allah) Most Gracious is firmly established on the throne (of authority).
column3: Soko Etsu yegun wyun'ajin dai dai ta eti Al-arashio.

column2: To Him belongs what is in the heavens and on earth and all between them and all beneath the soil.
column3: Wyun ga wun yannazhi fi sanmazhio to kin to yannazhi dan tacin'abo nao. To yannazhi fi tako yan kinbo na.

column2: If thou pronounce the word aloud (it is no matter): for verily He knoweth what is secret and what is yet more hidden.
column3: Wyo ma ga la bere tu be egan'e to hakika Soko yibe kpikpe asiri zhi to yannazhi swo-gan wuncinzhi kpata na.

column2: Allah! there is no god but He! To Him belong the most Beautiful Names.
column3: Soko ade Tsoci ndocia sai wyun'y Uma yibe sunna wangi-wagizhi.

column2: Has the story of Moses reached thee
column3: Ngba labari (Annabi) Musa be ya wyo yaani

column2: Behold he saw a fire: So he said to his family "Tarry ye; I perceive a fire; perhaps I can bring you some burning brand therefrom or find some guidance at the fire."
column3: Kamina u taye le ena ya na ucia gan ya iyaliuzhi gan: "E fedun zhi'abo hakika mi taye le ena ye mia tunbo ujin-wo mia be yaye be enacikarae koma miade bawu ndoci dagan eba ena wuncin'o.

column2: But when he came to the fire a voice was heard: "
column3: O Moses!Gancin kamina u tun bauna aci yiu ye gan: Ya wyoe Musa.

column2: "Verily I am thy Lord! therefore (in My presence) put off thy shoes: thou art in the sacred valley Tuwa.
column3: Hakika Miga yi Tsoci wyo-yo ebo acin'o a eda wyo wa hakika wyodan danna lilici yan kpanko Duwao.

column2: "I have chosen thee: listen then to the inspiration (sent to thee).Mi ma wyo la'afe eza tsitsaci (Tuci Soko) ebo acin'o shi tukpa ya yanna Yiga'ajin wahayiu ya wyoe na.
"Verily I am Allah: There is no god but I: So serve thou Me (only) and establish regular prayer for celebrating My praise.
column3: Hakika Mi Migayi ALLAHU(Soko'o) ade Tsoci ndocia sai Mi ebo acin'o jin bauta ya mi wyo mao la sallao kuo gikini ebo pipa mi bo.

column2: "Verily the Hour is coming - My design is to keep it hidden - for every soul to receive its reward by the measure of its Endeavour.
column3: Hakika Alkiyami'a da be Mi ma kpa swiswo'u ebo ade ba'a la egagba yan rayi ndondo'a yau be iri etun na uga lo na.

column2: "Therefore let not such as believe not therein but follow their own lusts divert thee therefrom lest thou perish!"..
column3: Ebo acin'o zana ya gaskiya beu yin'a naucia mitu etun yangban'u na ga lugwa u pan hankali wyo keyabo ma kacan'a wyo ga'ajin hallaka.

column2: "And what is that in the right hand O Moses"Ki'i ma yi wuncin na dan gwa'alo wyo bo nao wyoe Musa
He said "It is my rod: on it I lean; with it I beat down fodder for my flocks; and in it I find other uses."
column3: Musa ci gan: "Tsunkun mi uyio na mie kpetso na mi ma'ajin-nfe fini ya dabba mizhi beuyin mi mae wo bukata ndocizhi beuyin be.

column2: (Allah) said "Throw it O Moses!"
column3: Soko ci gan: Ci'u cici Musa!

column2: He threw it and behold! It was a snake active in motion.
column3: Uci'u ce cici edagao ma wun'azhe ewa-ko ndoci nae dazan na.

column2: (Allah) said "Seize it and fear not: We shall return it at once to its former condition"..
column3: Ugan: "A'gwa sun'u wyo mao ga sundan ma Yi gau la'a kezhe daa kendoe uyi- yan

column2: "Now draw thy hand close to thy side: It shall come forth white (and shining) without harm (or stain)- as another Sign-
column3: Wyo mao la egwa wyo yo okuofi lukontata wyo bo ugaa bokun'yeyan-gun ndondo madanboa; nana ma aya ndoci uyio kaa yin.

column2: "In order that We may show thee (two) of our Greater Signs.
column3: (Nana mayi) ebo Yi'I la yandoci'I wu wyoe mini aya wanciko-ko yan Yi zhio.

column2: "Go thou to Pharaoh for he has indeed transgressed all bounds."
column3: Fe lo eba Fir'auna hakika wyun'e gbin iyaka tu.

column2: (Moses) said: "O my Lord! expand me my breast;(Musa) ci gan: Tsoci! A yangban mi fe gwigwoci ya mi.
"Ease my task for me;
column3: Wyo mao jin saukio yami'odan alamari mibo.

column2: "And remove the impediment from my speech
column3: Wyo mao la finfan'o lao dan ekpinlu yan bea yin na.Surah 20:28 "So they may understand what I say:Ebo'ajin fahimta egan mi (na mi ga gan bea yin na).

column2: "And give me a Minister from my family
column3: Wyo mao la wazirio ya mi dagan mini dangi mizhio.Surah 20:30 "Aaron my brother;(waa to) Haruna na yi yegi mi na.

column2: "Add to my strength through himU'u la'ufe kagbo ya alamari mi.
"And make him share my task:
column3: Wyo mao la wyun'o la'o pama be mi yin dan mini alamari mi bo.

column1: Surah 20:33  "That we may celebrate Thy praise without stint
column2: Ebo Yi'I deba-y-li wyoe sarauyin.
"And remember Thee without stint:
column3: Yi ma-y tun wyo-yi-ye sarauyin.

column2: "For Thou art He that (ever) regardeth us."
column3: Hakika wyo afe Etsu nae cin yi le na.

column2: (Allah) said: "Granted is thy prayer O Moses!"
column3: Ugan:"Hakika yannazhi wyo ba kpaata na Sokoa gwo jin yao.

column2: "And indeed We conferred a favour on thee another time (before).
column3: Hakika ma Yi twarya alherizhi ya wyoe dan lokaci ndocizhiobe.

column2: "Behold! We sent to thy mother by inspiration the message:
column3: Kamina Yijin wahayi ya nna wyoe yannazhi -- yin Yia la jin wahayi yau na.

column2: "´Throw (the child) into the chest and throw (the chest) into the river: the river will cast him up on the bank and he will be taken up by one who is an enemy to Me and an enemy to him´: But I cast (the garment of) love over thee from Me: and (this) in order that thou mayest be reared under Mine eye.
column3: A (egi bobongi wuncin) ce gun mini kpatio ye cie la wyun'e ce gun mini eduo edu ci'u ce wyun'u lo nuwan misun gancin makiri Mi to makiri wyuntso cia beu la. Mi ma'a boye la'ayau dagan nko Mibo ma ala wyo-ya'a kpa be eye ladan yan Mi yin.

column2: "Behold! thy sister goeth forth and saith ´shall I show you one who will nurse and rear the (child)´ So We brought thee back to thy mother that her eye might be cooled and she should not grieve. Then thou didst slay a man but We saved thee from trouble and We tried thee in various ways. Then didst thou tarry a number of years with the people of Midian. Then didst thou come hither as ordained
column3: O Moses!Kamina yegi wyoe fe dazan uci fe gan gan:"Ngba yea lugwa Mi wu'eba lo eba zana'a kpau ya ye wangi'inaa Gancin Yicia wyo lazhin eba nna wyo be ebo yangban wyun'u ciu'uta u ma'u ga nyin yangba ma.Wyo ma jin sanadi tsutsu rayi ndoci Yi cia wyo wadzun dagan yangban nyin wuncin'o Yi ma ma wyo cinle be mimancinlezhi kakayin. Gancin wyoci fedun eye na dakun na dan mini jama'a yan Madyanazhio gbaani wyoci dabe babo eti tsunwan (yan na Mi kpa) be wyo yin na Musa

column2: "And I have prepared thee for Myself (for service)"
column3: ..Mi ma wyo tsa ya ti tacin Mi.

column2: "Go thou and thy brother with My Signs and slacken not either of you in keeping Me in remembrance.
column3: Fe lo to wyoe to yegi wyoe ye mae ga zhin zunma be yetun Mi yin ma.

column2: "Go both of you to Pharaoh for he has indeed transgressed all bounds;
column3: Efe lo ebo Fir'auna zagubabae hakika wyun'a gbin tu.

column2: "Go both of you to Pharaoh for he has indeed transgressed all bounds;
column3: Efe lo ebo Fir'auna zagubabae hakika wyun'a gbin tu.

column2: "But speak to him mildly; perchance he may take warning or fear (Allah)."
column3: Ye mae gangan beuyin be bere didaciy ujin-wo be wuncin'y wyun'a -- sinsantu ko ma wyun'a sundan (azaba)Soko.

column2: They (Moses and Aaron) said: "Our Lord! We fear lest he hasten with insolence against us or lest he transgress all bounds."
column3: Aci gan: "Tsoci yi! Hakika Yi ye de dansun ube ke fiyi ma ko ma ube gboti ka ugbin iyakatu be yi yin ma.

column2: He said: "Fear not: for I am with you: I hear and see (everything).
column3: (Soko) ci gan: "E ga sundan ma hakika Mi dan ganni be ye yin Mie wo Mi mae le yandondo ye.

column2: "So go ye both to him and say ´Verily we are messengers sent by thy Lord: Send forth therefore the Children of Israel with us and afflict them not: with a Sign indeed have we come from thy Lord! and peace to all who follow guidance!
column3: Ebo acin'o efe lo bau ye cie gan'u gan: "Hakika Tuci Tsoci wyo zhi yi yio ebo acin'o a Bani-Israilazhi ya yayi wyo mao ga jin'a azaba ma. Hakika yi be be ya wyo be ayae dagan eba Tsoci wyo bo. Aminci ma ugaajin tabbata ya zana ga mitu bawu na.

column2: "´Verily it has been revealed to us that the Penalty (awaits) those who reject and turn away.´"
column3: Hakika Yi ajin wahayi be yayi gan: kede hakika azaba uga'ajin tabbata ya zandondo na ga gaskiya yi ganmana na uci kezhea zunma zheta'u na.

column2: (When this message was delivered) (Pharaoh) said: "Who then O Moses is the Lord of you two"
column3: Ugan:"Zi'ima yi Tsoci ye yeo tso Musa"

column2: (When this message was delivered) (Pharaoh) said: "Who then O Moses is the Lord of you two"Ugan:"Zi'ima yi Tsoci ye yeo tso Musa"
He said: "Our Lord is He Who gave to each (created) thing its form and nature and further gave (it) guidance."
column3: Ugan: Tsoci yi gayi Etsu na la yandondo ya alitta'u nao gancin uci'u wu bao.

column2: (Pharaoh) said: "What then is the condition of previous generations"
column3: (Fir'auna) ci gan: "To gbani hali iri kicibo allumma yan mafari nazhi shidzo na dan-yninbo gbanio

column2: He replied: "The knowledge of that is with my Lord duly recorded: my Lord never errs nor forgets-Ugan:"
column3: kpikpe wuncin eba Tsoci mi bo udan'o dan mini Litafi (Lauhil mahfuz) Tsoci mi mae gbinka danboa Umae battan'a.

column2: "He Who has made for you the earth like a carpet spread out; has enabled you to go about therein by roads (and channels); and has sent down water from the sky." With it have We produced diverse pairs of plants each separate from the others.
column3: Etsu wuncin na ta kincici yaye parae na Ucia ekpazhi la'adan nin yan'ubo yaye Uci du ele zhin dagan sanmao Yici la yangici sun-sunzhi iriirizhi tinya be nuwan wuncin-y.

column2: Eat (for yourselves) and pasture your cattle: verily in this are Signs for men endued with understanding.
column3: Yetso gi (dagan miniubo) ye mae kpa dabbayezhi. Hakika mini wuncin'o ayazhi danbo ya zanazhi gayi eza hankali zhi na.

column2: From the (earth) did We create you and into it shall We return you and from it shall We bring you out once again.
column3: Dagan mini (kinbo) ga Yi jin alitta ye yeo miniubo (kabario) ga Yia kezhe la ye fi beo dagan miniubo ga Yia kezhe kuye tinya beo.

column2: And We showed Pharaoh all Our Signs but he did reject and refuse.
column3: Hakika ma Yi la aya Yi zhi wu Fir'auna yan baeni uci'u yi ganmana u cia navo.

column2: He said: "Hast thou come to drive us out of our land with thy magic
column3: O Moses(Fir'auna) ci gan:"Gbani wyo bebe ebo wyo la yiyin yan'o tin'oya dagan kin yan yi bo eya-ma-wyo yin Musa

column2: He said: "Hast thou come to drive us out of our land with thy magic
column3: O Moses(Fir'auna) ci gan:"Gbani wyo bebe ebo wyo la yiyin yan'o tin'oya dagan kin yan yi bo eya-ma-wyo yin Musa

column2: "But we can surely produce magic to match thine! So make a tryst between us and thee which we shall not fail to keep - neither we nor thou - in a place where both shall have even chances."
column3: To hakika yi ma'a be ya'o be eyan-mae iri'u yin ebo acin'o a efomusanmaman laa cic tsakani yibo be wyo yin yima'a le'u baa to wyotso maaleu baa uma'u yi danna na -- yin na.

column2: Moses said: "Your tryst is the Day of the Festival and let the people be assembled when the sun is well up."
column3: (Musa) ci gan:Efo na mi lacici ya ye na uga yi efo ninpa (I'idi) ye yeo zawangizhi ma'a la'a gun'a yekan kpata be yi-sakagi.

column2: So Pharaoh withdrew: He concerted his plan and then came (back).
column3: Fir'auna cia zunma zheta ucia tanadi uzhi kpata ku yekan gancin aci dabe (bana'a la shi yan gun-gun na).

column2: Moses said to him: Woe to you! Forge not ye a lie against Allah lest He destroy you (at once) utterly by chastisement: the forger must suffer frustration!"
column3: Musa ci gan'a gan: 'Takaici! Ega tswa ganmana ta Soko ma kacan'a Ugae jin hallaka be azabae hakika ma zandondo nagae tswa ganmana ta Soko na wyun'a zun-ya.

column2: So they disputed one with another over their affair but they kept their talk secret.
column3: Aci gbo mi be dozhi mini alamaria bo acia eza baa zhi swo.

column2: They said: "These two are certainly (expert) magicians: their object is to drive you out from your land with their magic and to do away with your most cherished institutions.
column3: Aci gan:"Hakika za gubaaba nana zhi (Musa be Harunae) eyan-ma cizhi ayio e wa-wa gan ala ye yea yan'a tin'aya dagan kin-mi yebo be eyan-ma'a yin acia la eyan wangi-wangi yezhia kua

column2: "Therefore concert your plan and then assemble in (serried) ranks: He wins (all along) today who gains the upper hand."
column3: Ebo acin'o yea tanadiezhi ku yekan ye vie tin'eyae be safu-safu hakika zana ga'ade galaba yin-na na gaade elstu.

column2: They said: "O Moses! whether wilt thou that thou throw (first) or that we be the first to throw"Aci gan: "
column3: Wyoe Musa! Ko wyo ka-yn-ce ko ma Yi'I la-yca yn-ce be dzo."

column2: He said "Nay throw ye first!" Then behold their ropes and their rods-so it seemed to him on account of their magic - began to be in lively motion!
column3: Ugan:"A'a yedea ce be dzo gancin acia egban'azhi to tsukun'azhi ce zhizhi acie sana fia eyeo mini eyanma'abo ke wyoe'gangan (ewa) nae dazan nao.

column2: So Moses conceived in his mind a (sort of) fear.
column3: Musa cia ya edan-yn wo dan mini yangban'u bo.

column2: We said: "Fear not! for thou hast indeed the upper hand:
column3: Yici gan:"Ga sundan ma hakika wyo ga wun zankpeo.

column2: "Throw that which is in thy right hand: Quickly will it swallow up that which they have faked what they have faked is but a magician´s trick: and the magician thrives not (no matter) where he goes."
column3: Wyo mao la yanna dan gwa'alo wyo bo nao ce'o cici u ga yannazhi a san kpata na ku yin Hakika yannazhi a san kpata na tanadi eyan macizhio eyan-maci ma'atso guria bandondo na uga lo na.

column2: So the magicians were thrown down to prostration: they said "We believe in the Lord of Aaron and Moses".
column3: Gancin eyan-maci zhi kpata cia nikin zhi kinbo a daa sujada aci gan:"Yi yia imani jin be Tsoci yan Haruna be Musae.

column2: (Pharaoh) said: "Believe ye in Him before I give you permission Surely this must be your leader who has taught you magic! be sure I will cut off your hands and feet on opposite sides and I will have you crucified on trunks of palm-trees: so shall ye know for certain which of us can give the more severe and the more lasting punishment!"
column3: Fir'auna ci gan:"Yea imani jin be'uyin tun mi laa ya ye izinia Hakika wyun ga yinunsa ye na wu ye eyan ma nao; Hakika migae egwazhi to bici yezhi ko ya dan dozhi (egwa gwa'lo be bici gwa'apin'y) hakika mima gae fo-sa dan mini cigban dobinao hakika ye tso ma'a kpe zi'i mini yi bo na azabau ta gan uma gboka gan nao.

column2: They said: "Never shall we regard thee as more than the Clear Signs that have come to us or than Him Who created us! so decree whatever thou desirest to decree: for thou canst only decree (touching) the life of this world.Agan:"
column3: Hakika yi ga wa wyoe a wyo la'ata eti aya gbangbazhi nazhi be yayi naa. Yi zhi kuti be Etsu na ca jin-jin alitta yi nae hukunci ndondo na'o gade cia jin (eti yibo na) ajin hakika hukuncio kpata izhe nana gabo wyo'ajin'u kan'o.

column2: "For us we have believed in our Lord: may He forgive us our faults and the magic to which thou didst compel us: for Allah is Best and Most Abiding.".Hakika yi'a imani jin be Tsoci Yi jin ebo ma wyun'u fa be yi yin yan bicicin yizhito yan eyan-ma na wyo jin yi kpa a ci da jinna. Soko ga ma wun egagba alherio egagba'U gama yi yan danbo dan'o.
Verily he who comes to his Lord as a sinner (at Judgment)- for him is Hell: therein shall he neither die nor live.
column3: Hakika zandondo naga be eba Tsoci'u uma yi lefi jinci na to hakika jahannama ga'ajin tabbata ya'u wyun'a tsu gun boa umaade rayia.

column2: But such as come to Him as Believers who have worked righteous deeds- for them are ranks exalted-
column3: Zana ma ga be eba Tsoci'u umayi mumini na lotun wangi-wangizhi na zawuncinzhi'ade egagba yan daraja nazhi latuna.

column2: Gardens of Eternity beneath which flow rivers: they will dwell therein for aye: such is the reward of those who purify themselves (from evil).Aljannazhi ayio yan danboda na amaafi bofi tutun yin wuncin gayi egagba yan zana ga'ali ke lefi lugwa nao.
We sent an inspiration to Moses: "Travel by night with My servants and strike a dry path for them through the sea without fear of being overtaken (by Pharaoh) and without (any other) fear."
column3: Hakika ma Yijin wahayi fi Musa kede; A wuzhi mi zhi ku tinya dan ezan yeshio wyo mao la eko'osa'oya'a dan mini eduo eko na yi wiwocina. Wyo mao ga sundan gan ko Fir'auna ga ye tso ma ye mae ga sundan kikya gun nuwan'o ma.

column2: Then Pharaoh pursued them with his forces but the waters completely overwhelmed them and covered them up.
column3: Gancin Fir'auna cia mi tu'a be ekungunci'uzhi nuwan yan edu cia rukpea baenio.\

column2: Pharaoh led his people astray instead of leading them aright.
column3: Fir'auna cia jama'a yan'uzhi kufi egbin'o baenio uma la bawu ndondo ya a.

column2: O ye Children of Israel! We delivered you from your enemy and We made a Covenant with you on the right side of Mount (Sinai) and We sent down to you Manna and quails:
column3: Ya ye Bani Israilazhi! Hakika Yia ye gangwa be egun makiri ye yin'a ni Yi ma jin ye alkawali yan gungun be yeyin kansanta gwa'alo yan pati "Turisina'io" Yima cin yangici yan "manna" be "salwae" be yaye.

column2: (Saying): "Eat of the good things We have provided for your sustenance but commit no excess therein lest My Wrath should justly descend on you: and those on whom descends My Wrath do perish indeed!
column3: E gi dagan mini eyan lilici nazhi Yi la yaye arzikinao ye mae ga gbin iyaka tu dan miniubo ma kacan'a ewunzhe mi gaa cin ta ye zaeni ndondo nama fushi Mi ga'a cin ta na to hakika zawuncin'ajin hallaka.

column2: "But without doubt I am (also) He that forgives again and again to those who repent believe and do right who- in fine are ready to receive true guidance."
column3: Hakika ma Mi Etsu gafara Miyio ya zana ga tuba jin ucia imani jin uci lotun wangi-wangizhi gancin ucia kugikini ta eti ekpa bawuo nao.

column2: (When Moses was up on the Mount Allah said:) "What made thee hasten in advance of thy people O Moses"
column3: Ki'ima la wyo ci din-ye cia jamaa yan wyozhi lugwao musa

column2: He replied: "Behold they are close on my footsteps: I hastened to thee O my Lord to please thee."
column3: Ugan: "Ngan atsoa gbami zunma be gbaani mima din-ye din be eba wyoe Tsoci ebo wyo'ojin yeda be mi yin.

column2: (Allah) said: "We have tested thy people in thy absence: the Samiri has led them astray."Ugan: "
column3: Hakika Yia jama'a yan wyozhi ma-cin le zunma-wyo bo samiriyu ma wyun'a kufi egbin'o.

column2: So Moses returned to his people in a state of indignation and sorrow. He said: "O my people! did not your Lord make a handsome promise to you Did then the promise seem to you long (in coming) Or did ye desire that Wrath should descend from your Lord on you and so ye broke your promise to me"
column3: Musa ci kezhe dazhin eba jamaa yan'uzhi be ewunzhe'e uma'a nyin yangban uci gan: "Asa Tsoci ye Ujin ye alkawali nayi wangi naa Kashi lokaci na'Uda yaye na tsa lokpa fi ye yeo Kashi ye wawa gan ewunzhe yan Tsoci ye ulau cin'u yaye ugala ye cia le alkawali mi bao

column2: They said: "We broke not the promise to thee as far as lay in our power: but we were made to carry the weight of the ornaments of the (whole) people and we threw them (into the fire) and that was what the Samiri suggested.
column3: Acigan: "Ujin banbayi la yici le alkawali ba'a amaade ala kara zunubi la ta yi dagan mini kaaya ninpa yan jamaa yan (Kibtiyyu zhio) Yicia ku ce ya acinga gama Samiriyyu otso ce yan wyun ya mao.

column2: "Then he brought out (of the fire) before the (people) the image of a calf: It seemed to low: so they said: This is your god and the god of Moses but (Moses) has forgotten!"
column3: Ucia nanko gigi na yibe nakan'ena wa tinya ya'a (dagan mini enao) uma fe ti wu aci gan: "Nana gayi Tsoci ye yeo to yan Musao amaade (Musa) a batan.

column2: Could they not see that it could not return them a word (for answer) and that it had no power either to harm them or to do them good
column3: Ale ye lea kede nanko gigi (sin-sanci) wuncin wyun'e zhegan'a naa yin'a umade kagbo yan gwakan eyan gun koma yan lilabe alheri naa yin'a

column2: Aaron had already before this said to them: "O my people! ye are being tested in this: for verily your Lord is (Allah) Most Gracious; so follow me and obey my command."
column3: Hakika ma Haruna ganya'a shidzo batso zhio uci gan: "Ya ye jamaa yan Mizhi! Hakika a maye ma cinle beuyin kawanyin hakika ma Soko AL-RAHMANU wyun gayi Tsoci ye yeo ebo acin'o yea emi tu mi ye mae laegba foro mi.

column2: They had said: "We will not abandon this cult but we will devote ourselves to it until Moses returns to us."
column3: Agan: "Yia pan yeshia yia fe jin bauta yau har sai Musao tso ga zhin cibe tsun yi.

column2: (Moses) said: "O Aaron! what kept thee back when thou sawest them going wrong
column3: Musa gan: "Wyo Haruna! Ki'i kan wyo yo kamina wyo lea ye'agbin nao

column2: "From following me Didst thou then disobey my order"
column3: Wyoci lami tumi (be gan ya mi yin'a yan'o) Kashi wyo a le foro mi le ba

column2: (Aaron) replied: "O son of my mother! Seize (me) not by my beard nor by (the hair of) my head! Truly I feared lest thou shouldst say ´Thou has caused a division among the children of Israel and thou didst not respect my word!´"
column3: (Haruna) cigan: "Ya wyoe egi-nna-mi ga din mi nunkpa yin ma wyo mao ga la gwa sun mi etioma hakika mi fe sundan na wyoa gan-gan:"wyoa jama'a yan Bani Israila zhin gan kpere-kpere wyo ma lamitu egan miyin'a na".

column2: (Moses) said: "What then is thy case O Samiri"
column3: Musa cigan: "Kici mayi eza wyo yio Samiri

column2: He replied: "I saw what they saw not: so I took a handful (of dust) from the footprint of the Messenger and threw it (into the calf): thus did my soul suggest to me."
column3: Ugan: "Mile yandoci le ye na tso a leyea na Mici to jikanna dagan bici kinpa yan Tuci (jibriluo) miciu ce (kpe nanko gigio). Acinga gama yangbanmi pau nin fi mi yin'o.

column2: (Moses) said: "Get thee gone! but thy (punishment) in this life will be that thou wilt say ´touch me not´; and moreover (for a future penalty) thou hast a promise that will not fail: Now look at thy god of whom thou hast become a devoted worshipper: We will certainly (melt) it in a blazing fire and scatter it broadcast in the sea!"
column3: (Musa) ci gan: To fe lo ammade edunfe izheo nakena yanna wyo afe gan na ugayi "La mi sa sao" mia ye lagwa toa mitso ma'a la to zandondoa wyo mayi be lokaci na a ceu lebaa na wyo mao cin kuti wyoe na wyo kanta cie wun nao le hakika yi ga'u danna gancin yi ci ga'a ce ya gun eduo baenio.

column2: But the god of you all is the One Allah: there is no god but He: all things He comprehends in His knowledge.
column3: HakikaTsoci ye ugayi Soko Etsu na ade Tsoci ndocia sai wyun na kpikpe'Uma wun'a gwo cia yandondo ma kezhe.

column2: Thus do We relate to thee some stories of what happened before: for We have sent thee a Message from Our own Presence.
column3: Acinga ga Yie gba (labari) mini labari yan nazhi shidzo na ya wyo yo. Hakika ma Yi la sinsantu (Alkur'anu) ya wyoe dagan eba Yibo.

column2: If any do turn away therefrom verily they will bear a burden on the Day of judgment;
column3: Zaeni ndondo na gau ce ci zunmao na hakika uga lefi nagbota na la Efo Alkiyami.

column2: They will abide in this (state): and grievous will the burden be to them on that Day-A fi mini'ubo tutun yin bibi maajin tabbata ya zandondo nagala kara zunubi na.
The Day when the Trumpet will be sounded: that Day We shall gather the sinful blear-eyed (with terror).
column3: Efo na a be efe fi mini kafo na Yici ga lefi jincizhi san fo wuncin eyeazhi cia yi dzukan-yin

column2: In whispers will they consult each other: "Yet tarried not longer than ten (Days);Acie swo eza ba tsakani'abo be dozhi acie gan gan: "Hakika ye fedun dan izhe boa sai de yan efo-guwo kawan yin.
We know best what they will say when their leader most eminent in conduct will say: "Ye tarried not longer than a day!"
column3: Hakika Yiga de kpikpe gan'o yan egan nazhie gan nao kamina zanazhi de yekpa gan miniabo na fe gan gan: "Hakika ye fedun izhe boa sai de yan foeni.

column2: They ask thee concerning the Mountains: say "My Lord will uproot them and scatter them as dust;
column3: Amae gbin wyo gan eti patizhio to gan-gan: "Tsoci mi gau ban ruku baenio.

column2: "He will leave them as plains smooth and level;
column3: Gancin uci ga'u ta cici parae.

column2: "Nothing crooked or curved wilt thou see in their place."
column3: Wyoa le bandoci naga'a kan kotoe na yea wyo ma'ale tutunti ndoci yea.

column2: On that Day will they follow the Caller (straight): no crookedness (can they show) him: all sounds shall humble themselves in the Presence of (Allah) Most Gracious: nothing shalt thou hear but the tramp of their feet (as they march).
column3: Efo wuncin aga mitu zanae yia (lo gungun yekan ba na) ade zandondo na'a pan ke eko lugwa na'a be rezhi kpaata ma gaa ta daa kin ebo dansun Soko AL-RAHMANUI ade yanna wyoawo naa sai de bici nae la dazan na.

column2: On that Day shall no intercession avail except for those for whom permission has been granted by (Allah) Most Gracious and whose word is acceptable to Him.
column3: Fo wuncin gwatan'ajin anfania sai zana Soko AL-RAHMANU ga ya izini na Uci jin yeda yau ga'U gan-gan na.

column2: He knows what (appears to His creatures as) before or after or behind them: but they shall not compass it with their knowledge.
column3: (Soko) de kpikpe yan nazhi fi yegboroa bo na to nazhi ke dan zunma'abo naama ma'u -- ba wo be kpikpe ndondo yin'a.

column2: (All) faces shall be humbled before (Him) - the Living the Self-Subsisting Eternal: hopeless indeed will be the man that carries iniquity (on his back).
column3: Fuskazhi kpaata ma'a gbazhizhi ya Soko Etsu rayi Etsu na gikini gbaugi na. Hakika ma zandondo na ga la kara zwalunci na (eyan la pa Soko baci na) wyun'a sunzunya.

column2: But he who works deeds of righteousness and has faith will have no fear of harm nor of any curtailment (of what is his due).
column3: Zaeni ndondo na ma gae lotun wangi-wangizhi na umayi mumini wangi na to wyun'a de dansun yan lefi zandoci na'a labe yan wyun na'a umaa de dansun laadau naa ke'u yan na'a.

column2: Thus have We sent this down - an arabic Qur´an - and explained therein in detail some of the warnings in order that they may fear Allah or that it may cause their remembrance (of Him).
column3: Acinga ga ma Yicin'ubeo Alkuranu uyio be zhimi larabci'i Yima la misalizhi be fi bo dokun yan ewun nazhi ebo de a sundan Soko ko ma ala'afe eza sinsantu ci zhi.

column2: High above all is Allah the King the Truth! Be not in haste with the Qur´an before its revelation to thee is completed but say "O my Lord! advance me in knowledge."
column3: Elatu kpaata'ajin tabbata ya Etsu na wun mulki gaskiya na wyo mao ga dinye be gbigba Alkuranu'i tun Yi la'a gun wahayizhi mi be ya wyo yaa ma wyo mao feo gan gan: "Tsoci mi! Be mi kpikpe".

column2: We had already beforehand taken the covenant of Adam but he forgot: and We found on his part no firm resolve.
column3: Hakika ma Yi jin alkawali be Adamu'i tun shidzo kafi (ugi sun-sun yan cigban na) ucia alkawali wuncin batan. Yima tsun'u zana de kagbo yangban na'a.

column2: We had already beforehand taken the covenant of Adam but he forgot: and We found on his part no firm resolve.
column3: Hakika ma Yi jin alkawali be Adamu'i tun shidzo kafi (ugi sun-sun yan cigban na) ucia alkawali wuncin batan. Yima tsun'u zana de kagbo yangban na'a.

column2: When We said to the angels "Prostrate yourselves to Adam" they prostrated themselves but not Iblis: he refused.
column3: Wyo mao pa kamina Yi gan be malaika zhi gan: "Ejin sujada ya Adamu kpata cia sujada jin saide Iblisu wun cia navo.

column2: Then We said: "O Adam! verily this is an enemy to thee and thy wife: so let him not get you both out of the Garden so that thou art landed in misery.
column3: Gancin Yici gan: "To wyo Adamu! Hakika (shetan) nana makiri wyoe uyio to ya yinmi wyoe ebo acin'o ega lugwa ukue dzun tinya dagan mini Aljannao ma kacan'a ega'ajin wahala.

column2: "There is therein (enough provision) for thee not to go hungry nor to go naked
column3: Hakika wyoa gun madan dan mini'uboa wyo ma'a za ya-vun'a.

column2: "Nor to suffer from thirst nor from the sun´s heat."
column3: Nuwan ma'a wo wyoe dan miniu boa wyo ma'a wo banagun boa.

column2: But Satan whispered evil to him: he said "O Adam! shall I lead thee to the Tree of Eternity and to a kingdom that never decays"
column3: Shetan cia swo lo'u yangban'o be wasiwaasi uci gan: Ya wyoe Adamu! Kashi min-wu-wyo ba lo eba cigban sun-sun yan danbodan be yan mulki na'a zoa na

column2: In the result they both ate of the tree and so their nakedness appeared to them: they began to sew together for their covering leaves from the Garden: thus did Adam disobey his Lord and allow himself to be seduced.
column3: Zagubaa ba'a cia gi dagan mini cigban wuncin'o yavun'azhi cia tula zhizhi yaa acife la fini yan Aljanna zhi kan yi taazhi. Adama ma cia le Tsociu ba ucia jin wahala.

column2: But his Lord chose him (for His Grace): He turned to him and gave him Guidance.Gancin Tsoci u ci beu li Uci fa beuyin U ci'u wuba.

He said: "Get ye down both of you- all together from the Garden with enmity one to another: but if as is sure there comes to you Guidance from Me whosoever follows My Guidance will not lose his way nor fall into misery.
column3: Ugan: "E cin dagan miniubo za gubaa bae sashiezhi afe na sashi vo. Ujin wo ma bawu ndoci wun'a fe be yaye dagan eba Mibo to zana ga mitu bawu Mi na to hakika wyun'a gbin'a uma'ajin wahala'a.

column2: "But whosoever turns away from My Message verily for him is a life narrowed down and We shall raise him up blind on the Day of Judgment."
column3: Zae ni ndondo nama ga zunma zheta pipa Mina hakika wyun'a le izhe pinpinci Yima san'usan Efo Alkiyami'i yebonci.

column2: He will say: "O my Lord! why hast Thou raised me up blind while I had sight (before)"Ugan: "Tsoci! Kijin wyocia mi san yebonci yin'nao alaalima mia fe zana'e lebaye nao
(Allah) will say: "Thus didst Thou when Our Signs came unto thee disregard them: so wilt thou this day be disregarded."
column3: Ugan: "Acinga ga aya Yizhi fe be ya wyoe (izhe bo) wyo ci'a batan'o acinga ga aaba wyotso tan yin-nao.

column2: And thus do We recompense him who transgresses beyond bounds and believes not in the Signs of his Lord: and the Penalty of the Hereafter is far more grievous and more enduring.
column3: Acinga gama Yie la egagba ya zandondo naga rayuwau nyin-ya umajin imani be aya Tsoci u zhi yin'a nao. Azaba yan Alkiyami ma tan gan uma'a danbo gan.

column2: Is it not a warning to such men (to call to mind) how many generations before them We destroyed in whose haunts they (now) move Verily in this are Signs for men endued with understanding.
column3: Kashi to gbani ula'a latu ya aa kede Yijin alummazhi dokun nazhi fe dazan fi ezhia zhiona hallaka na'a Hakika mini wuncin'o ayazhi danbo ya zanazhi gayi eza hankali zhi na.

column2: Had it not been for a Word that went forth before from thy Lord (their punishment) must necessarily have come; but there is a Term appointed (for respite).Kagan'ujin ebo egan ndoci na'ashidzo dan eba Tsoci wyo boani naa be iyaaka na yi bibaci na'a daa ugaazhe ti'ile na Yiga'ajin azaba'a ni na.

Therefore be patient with what they say and celebrate (constantly) the praises of thy Lord before the rising of the sun and before its setting; yea celebrate them for part of the hours of the night and at the sides of the day: that thou mayest have (spiritual) joy.
column3: Ebo acin'o a hakuri jin be iri egan nazhi agae gan na wyo mao feo li Tsoci wyoe be jin jin yeboe yau kafi igidi'u la'u tin'uya na be shidzo kafi igidi'u lo mina to mini yeshio to kansan yan igidio u jin wo Sokoa ga wo be yanna wyoa jin yeda be yin-nae.

column2: Nor strain thine eyes in longing for the things We have given for enjoyment to parties of them the splendour of the life of this world through which We test them: but the provision of thy Lord is better and more enduring.
column3: Wyo mao ga la eye wyo zhi fe cin yannazhi Yi la ya'a yan eman-wo izhe le na ma ninpa uyio yan izhe kawanyin ebo Yii man'aa cin'y-le dan miniubo. Arziki yan Tsoci wyo ma wun gade alheri gan'o wunga mayi yan danbo dan'o.

column2: Enjoin prayer on thy people and be constant therein. We ask thee not to provide sustenance: We provide it for thee. But the (fruit of) the Hereafter is for righteousness.
column3: Wyo mao jin iyaliozhi foro be sallah jin-y wyo mao la hakurio jin eti wuncin'o Ujin arziki (ku ye kan) Yigaa gbin wyoe esun'a hakika Yi ga'a ya wyoe arzikio. Zoba wangi ma ga'ajin tabbata ya zana gae sundan Soko na.

column2: They say: "Why does he not bring us a sign from his Lord" Has not a Clear Sign come to them of all that was in the former Books of revelation
column3: Acigan: "Ki'ijin uci la aya ndoci be yayi dagan eba Tsoci'u boa yin'o Ngba bayani nazhi fi Litafi mafari zhiona ube ya aa

column2: And if We had inflicted on them a penalty before this they would have said: "Our Lord! If only Thou hadst sent us a messenger we should certainly have followed Thy Signs before we were humbled and put to shame."
column3: Da'aci gan Yi jin'a hallaka jin shidzo be dzo daa a gangan: "Tsoci yi ki la wyoci tun Tuci fi yi yi'a yan'o ngan da yi ga mi tu'u shidzo kaafi yi le egba be zunyesun-y-ye na.

column2: Say: "Each one (of us) is waiting: wait ye therefore and soon shall ye know who it is that is on the straight and even way and who it is that has received Guidance.
column3: Gan ya'a gan: Kpaata-y yifi tu yan na Sokoa jin na-y-ye efe tuye bele yin ye tsoa kpe zi'i ta eti eko gboro gan'o zi'izhi ma kpe eko bawu bo.

column2: Closer and closer to mankind comes their Reckoning: yet they heed not and they turn away..	Surah 21:2
column3: Never comes (aught) to them of a renewed Message from their Lord but they listen to it as in jest-(Alkuranu) Litafi cincinci uyio dagan eba (Soko) nayi Etsu rahma nan nan yi Etsu yegun nan.

column2: Their hearts toying as with trifles. The wrong-doers conceal their private counsels (saying) "Is this (one) more than a man like yourselves Will ye go to witchcraft with your eyes open"Litafi Alkur'anu yio na a ayauzhi kpe ye kakayin na Alkur'anu na yi be zhimi Larabci'i na ebo za nazhi gayi eza kpikpe zhi na
Say: "My Lord knoweth (every) word (spoken) in the heavens and on earth: He is the One that heareth and knoweth (all things)."
column3: Wun'e ya labari yangban fa U mae kezhe nan-wun. Ekundondo zawangizhi cia zunma zheta acie wo gan'a.

column2: "Nay" they say "(these are) medleys of dream! - Nay He forged it! - Nay He is (but) a poet! Let him then bring us a Sign like the ones that were sent to (Prophets) of old!"
column3: Aci gan: Yangban yizhi fi evo kpikpecio ebo acin'o yie wo yannan ye yi yi etiubo naa to tukpa yizhi otso a tsu yekan ndoci ma dan tsakani yibo be wyo yin. Ebo acin'o fe'lo tun(eti adini wyo bo) akika yitso maa fe lo yan yi ma.

column2: (As to those) before them not one of the populations which We destroyed believed: will these believeGan gan: Akika zawangi ga mi yi dozhin ye yeo Soko mae jin wahayi be ya mi kede Soko ye Soko nini kete uyio nan. Ebo acin'o yea kugikini be bauta jin'y yau ye mae fe wa gafarau. Azaba tsuntsunnu ma gajin tabbata ta eti mushirikizhio. (za nanzhie woyan nan).
Before thee also the messengers We sent were but men to whom We granted inspiration: If ye realise this not ask of those who possess the Message.
column3: Za nanzhie wa zakka dukiyaazhia nan a mae kezhe jin kafirinci be alamari efo zobae na.

column2: Nor did We give them bodies that ate no food nor were they exempt from death.Akika za nanzhi'a imani jin nan acie lotun wangizhi nan aade lada nande iyakaa na.

In the end We fulfilled to them Our Promise and We saved them and those whom We pleased but We destroyed those who transgressed beyond bounds.Gan gan: Ngba ye ye jin kafirinci be Etsu nan jin alitta yan kin dan mini efo gubao nan. Ye cie la yan docizhi pau baci be Etsu wuncin ga yi Tsoci nan'ekpa alittazhi kpata nao.

We have revealed for you (O men!) a book in which is a Message for you: will ye not then understandUcia patizhi laata eti kinbo Ucia albarka laa fiu ucia kaddara yan yangici'uzhi jin fi bo mini efo gunni nan yi gun gunci nan ebo za nanzhie gbingan nan'o.
How many were the populations We utterly destroyed because of their iniquities setting up in their places other peoples
column3: Gancin Ucia jin daidai dan sanmao kanga u mayi enawu U ci gan'u to kin gan: E ye be be bambae ko ma be nanvoe. Aci gan: Yi da beani be bambae.

column2: Yet when they felt Our Punishment (coming) behold they (tried to) flee from it.
column3: Ucia la fe sanma gutwaba dan mini fo gubao ucia wahayi yan forozhi jin fi sanma ndondo Yi cia sanman yan izhe panin be tswangizhiy a ma ke yi etswa yau. Akika nnan shiri ndoci u yio yan Soko nan yi Etsu zankpe nan nan yi Etsu kpikpe nan.

column2: Flee not but return to the good things of this life which were given you and to your homes in order that ye may be called to account.
column3: A ga zunma zheta gan yaa gan: Miejin'e gangba be azaba yan kabara hallaka iri kabara hallaka nan de jamaa yan Aduzhi to Samuduzhi nan.

column2: They said: "Ah! woe to us! We were indeed wrong-doers!"
column3: Kaminan Tucizhi fe'be ya' to ye to zunmao na aci gan'a gan: Ega jin bauta ya zandondo ma sai de Soko gbaugi. Aci gan: U ga ba Tsoci yi (wuncin) ba ngan malaikazhi wun'a cin beo (u jin zawangia) Akika yi yia jin kafirinci be etun na atun ye beyn nan.

column2: And that cry of theirs ceased not till We made them as a field that is mown as ashes silent and quenched.
column3: Akka jamaa yan Aduzhi a gbotika kpe kinbo eti ganmanao a ci gan: Ngba ziy gboka gan yi yeo Aleye le gan Soko na jin alittaa nan u gboka gan'a Acia fe za nazhie gbomi be aya Yi zhiy nan.

column2: Not for (idle) sport did We create the heavens and the earth and all that is between!
column3: yi cia efeko ndoci nae ti'wu be kagboe na tun fia dan mini efo nahisizhio (efo nazhi de alheri ya aa nan) ebo a de ba fin azaba yan Zunyesun izhe na nan akika ma azaba yan Alkiyami U sunye ganza ndondo ma'ajin'a Taimakoa.

column2: If it had been Our wish to take (just) a pastime We should surely have taken it from the things nearest to Us if We would do (such a thing)!Jama'a yan Samuduzhi ma Yia bawu la'a ya'a acia egbin tsa ta eti bawuo. Kabara yan azaba zunyesun cia wan ebo etun dede nazhi fe lo na.

Nay We hurl the Truth against falsehood and it knocks out its brain and behold falsehood doth perish! Ah! woe be to you for the (false) things ye ascribe (to Us).Yicia Muminizhi nazhie tswa Soko na wa dzun.
To Him belong all (creatures) in the heavens and on earth: Even those who are in His (very) Presence are not too proud to serve Him nor are they (ever) weary (of His service):
column3: Efo nan aku makiri Soko (zhi) yekan lo enan na fo wuncin a'fe nyan'a nyan da fi azabao.

column2: They celebrate His praises night and day nor do they ever flag or intermit.Lokaci nan aga tun eba enan na tukpaazhi to eye'azhi to epa yan nankan kpaceazhi a fe'ya eri etiabo be iri etun nanzhiy a fe lo nan.
Or have they taken (for worship) gods from the earth who can raise (the dead)
column3: Acia gan be epa yan nakan kpaceazhiy gan: Kiy la yecie ya ri eti yi bo Aci gan: Soko nae ya yandondo iko cie gangan nan u ga ya yi iko ci gangan'o wun ga majin alitta ye tun dagan caba bo ebau ga ma ye'a kezhe lo.

column2: If there were in the heavens and the earth other gods besides Allah there would have been confusion in both! but glory to Allah the Lord of the Throne: (High is He) above what they attribute to Him!
column3: Ye ma'a kangwa wo kaminan tukpa yezhi to eye yezhi to epa yan nankan kpace yezhi kaminan a gae ya eri eti ye bo naa. Ye mae kpaye kpa gan ekun dondo etun nanzhi ye lo nan Soko de kpikpe'azhia.

column2: If there were in the heavens and the earth other gods besides Allah there would have been confusion in both! but glory to Allah the Lord of the Throne: (High is He) above what they attribute to Him!
column3: Ye ma'a kangwa wo kaminan tukpa yezhi to eye yezhi to epa yan nankan kpace yezhi kaminan a gae ya eri eti ye bo naa. Ye mae kpaye kpa gan ekun dondo etun nanzhi ye lo nan Soko de kpikpe'azhia.

column2: He cannot be questioned for His acts but they will be questioned (for theirs).
column3: Yekpa dede wuncin nan ye fe kpa be Tsoci ye yin nan u ga jin ye hallakao. Ye cia fe dan mini za nanzhi a jin asara nan.

column2: Or have they taken for worship (other) gods besides him Say "Bring your convincing proof: this is the Message of those with me and the Message of those before me." But most of them know not the Truth and so turn away.
column3: A ga ankuri jin enan tsa yi ezhe keba'ao ka ama ga ta uzuri a dan mini za nanzhiy a -- uzuria nan boa.

column2: Not a messenger did We send before thee without this inspiration sent by Us to him: that there is no god but I; therefore worship and serve Me.
column3: Yi cia eya dedezhi (masoyi dedezhi) laa pama bea yin (shetanzhi) a cia izhe na'a fi nin yin'u bo nan pa nin fia ucia emigbo eti alkiyami naa be gba alamariazhi zunma nan pa nin fia azaba cia jin tabbata ta etiabo ganni be jamaa nanzhi shiadzo mini Aljanuzhio to zawangizhiy-na. Akika afe za nanzhi a jin asara nan.

column2: Not a messenger did We send before thee without this inspiration sent by Us to him: that there is no god but I; therefore worship and serve Me.
column3: Yi cia eya dedezhi (masoyi dedezhi) laa pama bea yin (shetanzhi) a cia izhe na'a fi nin yin'u bo nan pa nin fia ucia emigbo eti alkiyami naa be gba alamariazhi zunma nan pa nin fia azaba cia jin tabbata ta etiabo ganni be jamaa nanzhi shiadzo mini Aljanuzhio to zawangizhiy-na. Akika afe za nanzhi a jin asara nan.

column2: And they say: "(Allah) Most Gracious has begotten offspring." Glory to Him! they are (but) servants raised to honour.Kafirizhi ci gan: Ega shi tukpa ya Alkur'anu nan nan maefe gan gan eti kperezhi etiubo ebo ye debae lae de zankpe.
They speak not before He speaks and they act (in all things) by His Command.
column3: Wallahi Yia jin kafirizhi azaba nan tan sarauyin nan Yi maa ga'agba be azaba nan bi ye gan etun nanzhi a fe lo nan.

column2: He knows what is before them and what is behind them and they offer no intercession except for those who are acceptable and they stand in awe and reverence of His (Glory).
column3: Wuncin ga yi egagba yan makiri Soko zhio enan gabo a fio emi naa fi tutuyin nan wuncin ga yi egagba yan emi nan a fe gbo be aya yi zhi-y-nao.

column2: If any of them should say "I am a god besides Him" such a one We should reward with Hell: thus do We reward those who do wrong.
column3: Kafirizhi cia gan gan: "Tsoci yi a zananzhiy gbin'yi ke eko Soko lugwa nan laa wu yi (ebo yi leaeye) mini yan jannuzhio ko mini zawangizhio ebo yi laa kuafi tako bici yizhio ebo a laa fea dan mini ezagbagbangi zhio.

column2: If any of them should say "I am a god besides Him" such a one We should reward with Hell: thus do We reward those who do wrong.
column3: Kafirizhi cia gan gan: "Tsoci yi a zananzhiy gbin'yi ke eko Soko lugwa nan laa wu yi (ebo yi leaeye) mini yan jannuzhio ko mini zawangizhio ebo yi laa kuafi tako bici yizhio ebo a laa fea dan mini ezagbagbangi zhio.

column2: Do not the Unbelievers see that the heavens and the earth were joined together (as one unit of creation) before we clove them asunder We made from water every living thing. Will they not then believe
column3: Akika za nanzhiy ga gan gan: Soko ga yi Tsoci yi yio na aci kezhea kugikini be etun'y nan malaikazhi'a fe'cin be ebaa (be taimako Sokoe) kede ga' sundan ma ye mae ga nyin yangban ma Ye mae fe' fa yangban be gingandan Aljannae nan afe la jin ye alkawali nan.

column2: And We have set on the earth mountains standing firm lest it should shake with them and We have made therein broad highways (between mountains) for them to pass through: that they may receive Guidance.
column3: Yi ga yi Ndakatayezhio dan mini edunfe izheo to Alkiyami-bo. Yandondo nan ma yangban yezhi gae de sha'wa'u nan fi bo ya ye yandondo na ma ye gae wa cie ba na fi bo.

column2: And We have set on the earth mountains standing firm lest it should shake with them and We have made therein broad highways (between mountains) for them to pass through: that they may receive Guidance.
column3: Yi ga yi Ndakatayezhio dan mini edunfe izheo to Alkiyami-bo. Yandondo nan ma yangban yezhi gae de sha'wa'u nan fi bo ya ye yandondo na ma ye gae wa cie ba na fi bo.

column2: And We have made the heavens as a canopy well guarded: yet do they turn away from the Signs which these things (point to)!Eyan cincinci a yio nan fe be dagan eba Soko nan. Soko nan yi Etsu gafara nan nan yi Etsu yegun nan.

It is He Who created the Night and the Day and the sun and the moon: all (the celestial bodies) swim along each in its rounded course.Ziy egan'u gaa gye gan egan za nae yi zazhi be eko Soko nao Wuntso cie lotun wangizhi nan uci gan to mitso ma dan mini Musulumizhio.

We granted not to any man before thee permanent life (here): if then thou shouldst die would they live permanentlyEtun guru ma uyi nini be etun dede yin'a ebo acin'o a etun dede dagwa ya be nantso ga gye gan nan nanvo ma ga dan tsakaani wyo bo be zandociy a za wuncin la eya nan yi masoyi nan.

Every soul shall have a taste of death: and We test you by evil and by good by way of trial. to Us must ye return.A ma de za na'a jin'u wo naa sai de za nanzhi gae jin ankuri nan ama de za naa jin'u wo na'a sai de za nan gaafe eza rabo nan wancin nan.
When the Unbelievers see thee they treat thee not except with ridicule. "Is this" (they say) "the one who talks of your gods" and they blaspheme at the mention of (Allah) Most Gracious!
column3: Kami ndondo nan wyo ga wo sharya fu yan shaitan nan wa tswitswa be Sokoe. Akika Soko ga yi Etsu nae wo gan U ma de kpikpe yandondo nao.

column2: They say: "When will this promise come to pass if ye are telling the truth"
column3: Ama ga gbotika Malaika nanzhiy dan eba Tsoci wyo bo nan e li Soko tsatsa yin to yeshi to igidi a mae wo eboa.

column2: Man is a creature of haste: soon (enough) will I show you My Signs; then ye will not ask Me to hasten them!
column3: U dan mini zankpe Soko yeshi to batin to igidi to etswa ebo acin'o ega fe lo sujada ya igidi ko etswa ma. E fe lo sujada ya Soko Etsu nan jin alitta nan wun'ayi Soko ga ye wun wun yan gaskiyao nan.

column2: They say: "When will this promise come to pass if ye are telling the truth"
column3: Ama ga gbotika Malaika nanzhiy dan eba Tsoci wyo bo nan e li Soko tsatsa yin to yeshi to igidi a mae wo eboa.

column2: If only the Unbelievers knew (the time) when they will not be able to ward off the fire from their faces nor yet from their backs and (when) no help can reach them!
column3: U ma dan mini aya Soko wyo'a le kin ye a wo kpakparae kamina Yiga ele du fi'u nan wun'a fe san-san u ciga yangici sunsunzhi yin tinya. Akika Etsu nan dan'u rayi nan U dan ekun rayi wo. Akika U de kagbo ta eti yandondo.

column2: Nay it may come to them all of a sudden and confound them: no power will they have then to avert it nor will they (then) get respite.Akika za nanzhie -- nungun gan dan mini aya Yizhio nan a la yandondo swo yi woa. Ngba za nan a'lau da ce gun enan'o nan wun ga de alheri gan'o kashi zana'a be efo alkiyamiy be aminciy nan Efe jin yan nan ga bae nan akika Soko e le ye ye be yandondo nan ye gae jin nan.
Mocked were (many) messenger before thee; But their scoffers were hemmed in by the thing that they mocked.
column3: Akika za nanzhiy ajin kafirinci be Alkuranuy kamina u be nan(a gaa ebi gi) Akika ma Litafi uyio nan de zankpe nan.

column2: Say: "Who can keep you safe by night and by day from (the Wrath of) (Allah) Most Gracious" Yet they turn away from the mention of their Lord.
column3: Ganmanan wun'e be ba wun'a ko dagan yegboro ko ma zunmau boa Litafi cincinci uyio dagan eba Etsu hikimao Etsu nan zandondo ejin yebo ya nan.

column2: Or have they gods that can guard them from Us They have no power to aid themselves nor can they be defended from Us.
column3: Egan dondo danbo nan a gan ya wyo na'a saide iri nanzhi a gan ya Tuci nanzhiy shi wyo dzo nan. Akika Tsoci wye Etsu gafara uyio u ma de azaba nan tan sarauyin nan.

column2: Nay We gave the good things of this life to these men and their fathers until the period grew long for them; See they not that We gradually reduce the land (in their control) from its outlying borders Is it then they who will win
column3: Da'aci gan ezhimi ndoci ga'a cin Alkuranuo a gan gan: kiy la aci kpe ayauzhi yea yin'o Ngba uga ye jin nan (Alkuranu ayi ezhimi ndoci Annabi ma yi Larabawa nan Gan gan: Alkuranu bawu uyio u ma yi cigbe ya za nanzhiy ga imani jin nan. Za nanzhiy ma jin imania nan tukpaazhiy a te eyeazhi maa na.

column2: Say "I do but warn you according to revelation": But the deaf will not hear the call (even) when they are warned!
column3: Akika yi la Litafi (Attaura ) ya (Annabi) Musa acia ce dozhi leba eti'u bo amm'a 'ka'ujin ebo nan egan (eti efo Alkiyamio) wun'a shidzoani naa daa aga hukunci ba tsakaniabo be dozhiy akika a' fe dan kelokezhin'o eti ubo.

column2: If but a breath of the Wrath of thy Lord do touch them they will then say "Woe to us! we did wrong indeed!"Zandondo nan ga jin wangi nan ebo tiubo za nan maga jin dede nan wun'a wu yan yau. Akika Soko jin azwalumi zandondoa.

We shall set up scales of justice for the Day of Judgment so that not a soul will be dealt with unjustly in the least and if there be (no more than) the weight of a mustard seed We will bring it (to account): and enough are We to take account.
column3: Ezhe keba yan kpikpe yan lokaci alkiyami Udan be Sokoe to yangici sun-sun nanzhie tinya dagan gberea bo nan to ewan nan ynzagie la nan (kpikpea dan be Sokoe) U maa ma gia sai de be kpikpeu yin. Efo nan aga yia nan (a gbin'a gan gan: Babo za nanzhi ye la pa Mi baci nan dan'o Acia gangan: "Yi de ta'mi'y" ade zando mini yibo naa ya eri wo naa.

column2: In the past We granted to Moses and Aaron the criterion (for judgment) and a Light and a Message for those who would do right-
column3: Yan nanzhi afe wun shidzo nan ci ga' gbin'a yeo atso ciga gaskiya ya ke ade bandoa gangwa loa nan.

column2: In the past We granted to Moses and Aaron the criterion (for judgment) and a Light and a Message for those who would do right-
column3: Yan nanzhi afe wun shidzo nan ci ga' gbin'a yeo atso ciga gaskiya ya ke ade bandoa gangwa loa nan.

column2: Those who fear their Lord in their most secret thoughts and who hold the Hour (of Judgment) in awe.
column3: Zawangi wun'e kpebo be biba aduwa alheri zhi yin'a ammaa eyan dede gaa tswan'u wun'ajin wun'e la kauna ba be Sokoe (wuncin ma gyea).

column2: And this is a blessed Message which We have sent down: will ye then reject it
column3: Wallahi Yi ga yegun yi laa yau degi wun'a fe lagwa zhe yangban gan: Kagbo mi ga ya mi nan nao ka alamari Alkiyami otso ma ude sauki (yandoa jin'a) kami ma gaa zheban da eba Tsoci mi bolobolo ga wun'a la ya mi yin'o. Wallahi Yia ya kafirizhi Labari etun nanzhi a lo nan Yima aya'a azaba fin dagan mini azaba nan lekpan nao.

column2: We bestowed aforetime on Abraham his rectitude of conduct and well were We acquainted with him.
column3: Yima ga niima la twarya ya zawangi win'e la zunma zheta uciga kansan pan ke etun Soko lugwa kami nan eyan dede gaa tswan'u nan u gaa fe za nae ba aduwa nan dokun nan.

column2: Behold! he said to his father and his people "What are these images to which ye are (so assiduously) devoted"
column3: Gan gan: Ngba wun'a yi dagan eba Soko bo (Alkuranu) fe beo gancin yecia kafirinci jin beu yin ngba ziy ga gbin gan za nan dan mini cice leba nan tsoa kpe ya nao

column2: They said "We found our fathers worshipping them."
column3: Bele yin Yi ga zankpe Yi laa wua dan mini yannazhi Yi jin nao to mini eti tacin'atso har sai u gaa tula yaa kede Soko ga yi gaskiyao nan. Asa u kunke ya Tsoci wyo yaa kede Etsu uyio naejin ri ta eti yandondo naa

column2: He said "Indeed ye have been in manifest error - ye and your fathers."
column3: Akika a fi mini kelo kezhin'o eti gun gun'a bo be Tsocia yin akika Sokoa yandondo makezhe (be kpikpeu yin).

column2: They said "Have you brought us the Truth or are you one of those who jest"
column3: Agan: "Gaskiya ga wyo ma labe ya yi-yio kashi wyode edzodzo dzo be yi yin

column2: He said "Nay your Lord is the Lord of the heavens and the earth He Who created them (from nothing): and I am a witness to this (Truth).
column3: Ugan: "A'a Tsociye de uga yi Tsoci yan sanmazhi to kinyin'o na jin alita'a na mima'afe ta eti wuncin'o dan mini erijincizhio.

column2: "And by Allah I have a plan for your idols - after ye go away and turn your backs"..
column3: Mima zhi kuti be Sokoe miajin yan be kutiezhi baaci na ye gaasa jin cia zunma zheta na.

column2: So he broke them to pieces (all) but the biggest of them that they might turn (and address themselves) to it.
column3: Ucia sa tukun-tukun sai de natso yi wanciko tso na (wyun'u lugwa) ko aa zhin bau be gbin'u gan.

column2: They said "Who has done this to our gods He must indeed be some man of impiety!"
column3: Agan: "Hakika zandondo naga jin'aninga be kuti yizhi na wyun'afe dan mini azwalumizhio.

column2: They said "We heard a youth talk of them: He is called Abraham."
column3: Agan: "Yiwo gbarufu ndoci danbo wyun'ajin ufe gia toko e yiu gan Ibrahimu.

column2: They said "Then bring him before the eyes of the people that they may bear witness."
column3: Agan: "To eda laube zandondo'u le wyun'u ye ebo ma aajin ri.

column2: They said "Art thou the one that did this with our gods O Abraham"
column3: Agan: "Ngba wyo gajin acinga be kuti yizhi yin'o Ibrahima

column2: He said: "Nay this was done by - this is their biggest one! ask them if they can speak intelligently!"
column3: Ugan: "A'a nunsa'a nana tsa jin acin beayin'o ye mae gbin'agan agae gan-gan na.

column2: So they turned to themselves and said "Surely ye are the ones in the wrong!"
column3: Aci dazhin cife tagwa tun dozhi acigan: "Hakika de ye tso tsa yi azwalumizhio.

column2: Then were they confounded with shame: (they said) "Thou knowest full well that these (idols) do not speak!"
column3: Acia etiazhi ya zhin kin acigan:"Amaa ngan wyotso kpe ke kuti nanazhie gan gan'a na.

column2: (Abraham) said "Do ye then worship besides Allah things that can neither be of any good to you nor do you harmUgan: "
column3: To gbani yeafe jin bauta ya yandoci najin Sokoa na nama jin ye anfani woa uma kangwa egun yaye woa na.

column2: "Fie upon you and upon the things that ye worship besides Allah! Have ye no sense"..
column3: Tir-jam be alamari yeyin to be yannazhi ye jin bauta ya ke Soko lugwa na. Ki'i jin ye cie lotun be hankali yin'a yin'o

column2: "Fie upon you and upon the things that ye worship besides Allah! Have ye no sense"..
column3: Tir-jam be alamari yeyin to be yannazhi ye jin bauta ya ke Soko lugwa na. Ki'i jin ye cie lotun be hankali yin'a yin'o

column2: They said "Burn him and protect your gods If ye do (anything at all)!"
column3: Agan:"Yi'u ce gun nao ye mae jin kutiezhi taimako ye ga'ajin jin wo na.

column2: We said "O Fire! be thou cool and (a means of) safety for Abraham!"
column3: Yici gan: "Ya wyoe ena afe yeko be aminci ta eti Ibrahimao.

column2: Then they sought a stratagem against him: but We made them the ones that lost most!
column3: Acia kpa sarauyin na'ajin tanadi dede beuyin na Yicia tso la'afe eza hasarazhi.

column2: But We delivered him and (his nephew) Lut (and directed them) to the land which We have blessed for the nations.
column3: Yiciuy gangwa to wyin to (Annabi) Lutu. Yicia kudaa kin nayi la albarka dan ya alittazhi kpaata na (kin yan Falastinu).

column2: And We bestowed on him Isaac and as an additional gift (a grandson) Jacob and We made righteous men of every one (of them).
column3: Yici twa'urya be Ishaqae to Ya'kubu nayi yagiu na. Kpata'ma Yia la'azhe za guru zhi.

column2: And We made them leaders guiding (men) by Our Command and We sent them inspiration to do good deeds to establish regular prayers and to practise regular charity; and they constantly served Us (and Us only).
column3: Yicia la fe edzoshicizhi nazhie wu za zhi ba be foro Yi yin na. Yima jin wahayi yaa gan afea lotun alheri zhi to salla kugikini to zakka wa amaafe zanazhie jin bauta yayi na.

column2: And We made them leaders guiding (men) by Our Command and We sent them inspiration to do good deeds to establish regular prayers and to practise regular charity; and they constantly served Us (and Us only).
column3: Yicia la fe edzoshicizhi nazhie wu za zhi ba be foro Yi yin na. Yima jin wahayi yaa gan afea lotun alheri zhi to salla kugikini to zakka wa amaafe zanazhie jin bauta yayi na.

column2: And to Lut too We gave Judgment and Knowledge and We saved him from the town which practised abominations: truly they were a people given to Evil a rebellious people.
column3: (Annabi) Lutu ma Yi yau hukunci be kpikpe Yi ciu wadzun dagan kin wuncin na jamaa yan'uzhi e jin yan dedezhi na. Hakika a zawuncinzhi aafe eza dede zhi fasikizhi.

column2: And We admitted him to Our Mercy: for he was one of the Righteous.
column3: Yici'u la'a gandan mini yegun Yibo; hakika wyun'a fedan mini za guru zhio.

column2: (Remember) Noah when he cried (to Us) aforetime: We listened to his (prayer) and delivered him and his family from great distress.
column3: (Wyo mao pa) kamina Nuhu fe yi Tsoci'u ye shidzo batsozhio na Yicia aduwa'u gwo Yiciu gangwa to iyaliuzhi dagan yangban-nyin na wancin nao.

column2: We helped him against people who rejected Our Signs: truly they were a people given to Evil: so We drowned them (in the Flood) all together.
column3: Yici jin'u taimako ta eti jama'a nazhia aya Yizhi yi ganmana na. Hakika eza dedezhi ayio Yicia jin hallaka fi eduo baenio.

column2: And remember David and Solomon when they gave judgment in the matter of the field into which the sheep of certain people had strayed by night: We did witness their judgment.
column3: Wyo mao pa ) kamina (Annabi) Dauda to Sulaimanu fe jin hukunci ndoci eti yangici latio na kamina dabba yan zandoci zhi da gia yangici lati be yeshi na. Hakika Yima fe jin ri yan iri hukunci na'afe jin na.

column2: To Solomon We inspired the (right) understanding of the matter: to each (of them) We gave Judgment and Knowledge; it was Our power that made the hills and the birds celebrate Our praises with David: it was We Who did (all these things).
column3: Yicia fahimta hukunci wuncin laa ya Sulaymanu; kpaata'a ma Yi yaa hukunci (annabci) be ilimi-y Yicia patizhi to elugizhi laajin foro ya Dawuda e jin tasbihu (lili Soko) ganni beu yin. Yi ma'afe zanazhi jin acin jin wo na.

column2: It was We Who taught him the making of coats of mail for your benefit to guard you from each other´s violence: will ye then be grateful
column3: Yici wu'u sana'a yan tufuwa ndoci na ga'afe yekan yaye dan lokaci ekun'o na.Ye gaafe zanazhie jin yebo na'a.

column2: (It was Our power that made) the violent (unruly) wind flow (tamely) for Solomon to his order to the land which We had blessed: for We do know all things.
column3: Sulaymanu ma Yia efe jin foro yau namae ti be kagboe na wun'ajin ufe bici be forouyin lo kin yan (Falastinu) na Yi la albarka dan na. Yima yibe kpikpe yandondoe.

column2: And of the evil ones were some who dived for him and did other work besides; and it was We Who guarded them.
column3: Ama de dan mini jannuzhio nazhie da kya dan mini nuwan'o (acie ku alu'ului) tinya yau na. Amae lotun ndocizhi zunma wuncin'o be (ke ebatuzhi na) Yima'afe za nazhie tswa'a na.

column2: And (remember) Job when He cried to his Lord "Truly distress has seized me but Thou art the Most Merciful of those that are merciful."
column3: To-Ayyuba kamina uyi Tsoci u ye na uci gan: "Hakika egun'a tso mi wyo ga mayi Etsu yegun kpaatao.

column2: And (remember) Job when He cried to his Lord "Truly distress has seized me but Thou art the Most Merciful of those that are merciful."
column3: To-Ayyuba kamina uyi Tsoci u ye na uci gan: "Hakika egun'a tso mi wyo ga mayi Etsu yegun kpaatao.

column2: So We listened to him: We removed the distress that was on him and We restored his people to him and doubled their number- as a Grace from Ourselves and a thing for commemoration for all who serve Us.
column3: To Yicia aduwa'u gwe Yicia egun na dan beuyin na la keyabo yau. Yici yau iyali woro dozhin (yan paayin) zhi be iri ndocizhi pama beayin be (ke yagizhi na) wuncin mayi yegun dagan eba Yibo umayi sinsantu ya zanazhie jin bauta ya Soko kpaata na.

column2: And (remember) Isma´il Idris and Zul-kifl all (men) of constancy and patience;
column3: To Isma'ila to Idreesu to Zul-kifli ndondoa wyun'afe dan mini zanazhie jin hakuri nao.

column2: We admitted them to Our mercy: for they were of the righteous ones.
column3: Yicia la gandan mini yegun Yibo. Hakika afe dan mini za guruzhio.

column2: And remember Zun-nun when he departed in wrath: He imagined that We had no power over him! But he cried through the deptHs of darkness "There is no god but thou: glory to thee: I was indeed wrong!"
column3: To Zan Nuni (Annabi Yunusa) kamina u wan zan eti ewunzheo na uci fe kpaye gan Yi yi alamari ku yau woa uci yi Soko ye dan mini bazhikozhio gan:"Ade Tsoci ndocia sai de wyoe (Soko) lili kpaata ma'ajin tabbata ya wyoe hakika mia fe dan mini azwalumizhio (be acin na mi jin nae).

column2: So We listened to him: and delivered him from distress: and thus do We deliver those who have faith.
column3: Yicia aduwa u gwo Yi ciu wadzun dagan yangban-nyi'o acinga gama Yi'ajin-yi a muminizhi dzun'o.

column2: And (remember) Zakariya when he cried to his Lord: "O my Lord! leave me not without offspring though thou art the best of inheritors."
column3: (Wyo mao pa ) Zakariyau kamina uyi Tsoci u ye ci gan;"Tsoci mi! Ga lumigwa gbangi (mide egia ma) wyo gama gan egun gicizhi kpaatao.

column2: So We listened to him: and We granted him Yahya: We cured his wife´s (Barrenness) for him. These (three) were ever quick in emulation in good works; they used to call on Us with love and reverence and humble themselves before Us.
column3: Yici gwo aduwau Yicia yinmin'u tadzu yau hakika aafe zanazhie dinye dan jin jin alherizhio na amaa'jin afe ba Yi yan be evunbae gannibe dansui amaafe zanazhie da ti cici ya Yi na.

column2: And (remember) her who guarded her chastity: We breathed into her of Our spirit and We made her and her son a sign for all peoples.
column3: To (yinzagi) naa tswitswa laadan kafa'ubo na Yici be efe (rayi) fiu dagan mini Ruhi Yibo na Yici ula'afe to egiu egwa-wu yan zankpe Soko ya alittazhi kpata.

column2: Verily this brotherhood of yours is a single brotherhood and I am your Lord and Cherisher: therefore serve Me (and no other).
column3: Hakika alumma ye nana alumma nini uyio Miga ma yi Tsoci yeyeo ebo acin'o e jin bauta ya Mi.

column2: But (later generations) cut off their affair (of unity) one from another: (yet) will they all return to Us.
column3: Gancin a cia alamarizhi sa kpere-kpere tsakaniabo be dozhi. Kpaata'ama eba Yi ga a kezhe zhin'o.

column2: Whoever works any act of righteousness and has faith- His endeavour will not be rejected: We shall record it in his favour.
column3: Zandondo naga lotun wangizhi na alaali umayi mumini na titayakpe ndondo danbo ya etun wyun'a hakika ma Yigau ka cici yau.

column2: But there is a ban on any population which We have destroyed: that they shall not return
column3: Haramu umayio ya alumma ndondo na Yi ga'ujin hallaka na na wyun'a kezhe dazhin (izhe) be nao.

column2: Until the Gog and Magog (people) are let through (their barrier) and they swiftly swarm from every hill.
column3: Har da kamina agaa eko ya Yajuju to Majuju nao a maa fe kpankpan zhin dagan pati ndondo.

column2: Then will the true promise draw nigh (of fulfilment): then behold! the eyes of the Unbelievers will fixedly stare in horror: "Ah! Woe to us! we were indeed heedless of this; nay we truly did wrong!"
column3: Alkawali yan gaskiya ma'atso ba gancin eye yan kafirizhi ci gaa gbagba acia fe gan gan:"Kasa yi re! Hakika yi yaafe dan mini eye yao ke nana lugwa a'a hakika yi deafe kafirizhi.

column2: Verily ye (unbelievers) and the (false) gods that ye worship besides Allah are (but) fuel for Hell! to it will ye (surely) come!(
column3: Acia gan'a gan) Hakika to ye to yannazhi ye jin bauta ya na kaaya yan jahannama ye yio ye maa kpankpan da tsun'u.

column2: If these had been gods they would not have got there! but each one will abide therein.
column3: Da'aci gan kuti nana zhi Tsoci ayio da aakpan da fi boa. Kpaataa ma bagabo afi tutun yin'o.

column2: There sobbing will be their lot nor will they there hear (aught else).
column3: Acia fe yi kabara ndoci fi miniubo miniubo ma aa wo bere yandondoa.

column2: Those for whom the good (record) from Us has gone before will be removed far therefrom.
column3: Hakika zanazhi bolobolo'a shidzo yaa dan nko Yibo na to zawuncinzhi agaa la kpe ya be (ena) wuncin-y.

column2: Not the slightest sound will they hear of Hell: what their souls desired in that will they dwell.
column3: Aa wo san-san-wun'a ama gaafe fi mini yannazhi yangban'azhi gae de shahawau na tutunyin.

column2: The Great Terror will bring them no grief: but the angels will meet them (with mutual greetings): "This is your Day- (the Day) that ye were promised."
column3: Edo wanciko tso wun'a toa yangban gwaa malaika (rahamazhi) ma'afe da gun'a kede: Yinna ga yi efo ye na Soko fe jin ye alkawali nao.
