column3: Kashi a cin le lo zhin'a lo eba yan nanzhi zhi yegboroa bo nan to nanzhi zhi zunma'abo nan nini sanmao to kin boa U ga ba Yi Yiga kin zhekpe fia ko ma Yia sanma kpan be kpe'a. Akika mini wuncin'o egwa wu yan zankpe Soko danbo ya wuzhi ndondo nan gae kezhe da ba Soko nan.

column2: We bestowed Grace aforetime on David from ourselves: "O ye Mountains! Sing ye back the Praises of Allah with him! and ye birds (also)! And We made the iron soft for him;-
column3: Akika yi a eyan wanciko la'a ya Dawuda dagan eba Yibo Ya ye patizhi! E-fe -- mi yan tasbihu misun Annabi daudao to elugizhiotso. Yi man kezhe'a yankpafe eyan didaci yau.

column2: (Commanding) "Make thou coast of mail balancing well the rings of chain armour and work ye righteousness; for be sure I see (clearly) all that ye do."
column3: (Y ma gan'u gan: "Fe jin ewo'kunzhi be yankpae wyo mao la twitwo-ola'o dan tswitsa'ubo. Ye mae fe lotun guruzhi akika Mi e cin'ye le be etun nanzhi ye lo nae.

column2: And to Solomon (We made) the Wind (obedient): Its early morning (stride) was a month´s (journey) and its evening (stride) was a month´s (journey); and We made a Font of molten brass to flow for him; and there were Jinns that worked in front of him by the leave of his Lord and if any of them turned aside from our command We made him taste of the Penalty of the Blazing Fire.
column3: Yi ma efe jin foro ya Sulaimanu ezan dau yan lazhin yi yan etswa nini ezanda'u yan lozun yi yan etswa nini Yi ma ke je eye nuwan yan (brass) azarfa be yau. Mini aljannuzhio ma ade nanzhi e lotun yau be izini yan Tsoci u yin nan ndondo nan ga gbotika ke umurni'u lugwa nan Yi a jin'u azaba be enan sa'iru'y.

column2: They worked for him as he desired (making) arches images basons as large as reservoirs and (cooking) cauldrons fixed (in their places): "Work ye sons of David with thanks! but few of My servants are grateful!"
column3: Ajin ajin yannazhi u ga de bukata anan yau ke eyan kunzhi nan be eyansa-ngizhi be to evo wancikozhi nanzhi yi ke ewan nan to dukun kozhi nanzhi a shi gi kinbo nan. Ya ye za mi Dawudazhi e fe lotun wuncin ga wugwa yebojin ya Soko. Za nanzhi ma ejin yebo mini wuzhi Mi zhionan za degi a yio.

column2: Then when We decreed (Solomon´s) death nothing showed them his death except a little worm of the earth which kept (slowly) gnawing away at his staff: so when he fell down the Jinns saw plainly that if they had known the unseen they would not have tarried in the humiliating Penalty (of their Task).
column3: Kaminan Yi'a ajali kpa ta etiubo nan a de yanan la wu'a ke ajali wun'a ajin'ani naa sai dai eka nan fe gi tsukun mulki'u nan. Kami nan u be gbin zhi kinbo nan wun'a tula ya jannuzhi ke a ga de kpikpe yan yan-naaso nan de a ga fe fi mini azaba yan zunyesun boa.

column2: There was for Saba aforetime a Sign in their home-land - two Gardens to the right and to the left. "Eat of the Sustenance (provided) by your Lord and be grateful to Him: a territory fair and happy and a Lord Oft-Forgiving!
column3: Akika egwa wu yan zankpe Soko danbo ya kabila yan saba'uzhi mini yan emiazhio (nan dan kin yan yamanu'o nan) U ga yi bata yan lambu guba dan egwa gwalo to egwa dan egwa gwapin'o. E fe gi mini arziki yan Tsoci'ebo ye ma'efe jin yebo e yau kin yan albarka uyio ganni be Tsoci nan yi Etsu gafara nan.

column2: There was for Saba aforetime a Sign in their home-land - two Gardens to the right and to the left. "Eat of the Sustenance (provided) by your Lord and be grateful to Him: a territory fair and happy and a Lord Oft-Forgiving!
column3: Akika egwa wu yan zankpe Soko danbo ya kabila yan saba'uzhi mini yan emiazhio (nan dan kin yan yamanu'o nan) U ga yi bata yan lambu guba dan egwa gwalo to egwa dan egwa gwapin'o. E fe gi mini arziki yan Tsoci'ebo ye ma'efe jin yebo e yau kin yan albarka uyio ganni be Tsoci nan yi Etsu gafara nan.

column2: But they turned away (from Allah) and We sent against them the Flood (released) from the dams and We converted their two garden (rows) into "gardens" producing bitter fruit and tamarisks and some few (stunted) Lote-trees.
column3: A cia zunma zheta foro Soko Y I ci da lenbu yan edu gwa be fia Yi cia gwasan la'adan bata guba wuncin zhio be lati guba ndociyi nanzhi sunsun'azhi yi lukuy to nan yi kakuy wun'eye ta gi'a nan be yandoci degi mini cigban sidruo (jin-jere kuruna gabaruwa).

column2: But they turned away (from Allah) and We sent against them the Flood (released) from the dams and We converted their two garden (rows) into "gardens" producing bitter fruit and tamarisks and some few (stunted) Lote-trees.
column3: A cia zunma zheta foro Soko Y I ci da lenbu yan edu gwa be fia Yi cia gwasan la'adan bata guba wuncin zhio be lati guba ndociyi nanzhi sunsun'azhi yi lukuy to nan yi kakuy wun'eye ta gi'a nan be yandoci degi mini cigban sidruo (jin-jere kuruna gabaruwa).

column2: That was the Requital We gave them because they ungratefully rejected Faith: and never do We give (such) requital except to such as are ungrateful rejecters.
column3: Nan-nan ga Yi ya' ga'a gba'o ebo kafirinci'a bo Yi mae ga zandondo gba be iri nan-nan yin'a sai de za nan ga'e cin mananbo be Sokoe nan.

column2: Between them and the Cities on which We had poured our blessings We had placed Cities in prominent positions and between them We had appointed stages of journey in due proportion: "Travel therein secure by night and by day."
column3: Yi cia alkarya ndoci nan a tula nan la adan tsakaniabo be alkarya nan Yi la albarka Yi dan nan Yi cia dalo-dazhin la'adan miniabo efe jin dalo-dazhin dan miniabo to yeshi to igidizhiy ganni be aminciy.

column2: But they said: "Our Lord! Place longer distances between our journey-stages": but they wronged themselves (therein). At length We made them as a tale (that is told) and We dispersed them all in scattered fragments. Verily in this are Signs for every (soul that is) patiently constant and grateful.
column3: A tso ci gan: Ya wyoe Tsoci yi! A ekpalo la'adan tsakani dalo-dazhin yi zhio a cia eti tacin'a jin gun Yi cia la azhe yangagi etan zhi Yi cia sa ya yan baeni. Akika mini wuncin'o egwa-wu yan zankpe Soko danbo ya zandondo nan gayi eza hakuri u mae jin yebo ya Soko nan.

column2: And on them did Satan prove true his idea and they followed him all but a party that believed.
column3: Akika ma Iblisu a guri'u she eti'abo a cia mi tu'u saide jama'a ndocizhi mini Muminizhio.

column2: And on them did Satan prove true his idea and they followed him all but a party that believed.
column3: Akika ma Iblisu a guri'u she eti'abo a cia mi tu'u saide jama'a ndocizhi mini Muminizhio.

column2: But he had no authority over them- except that We might test the man who believes in the Hereafter from him who is in doubt concerning it: and thy Lord doth watch over all things.
column3: (Iblisu ma) U de kagbo ndondo ta eti aboa (Yi de jin acin jin) ebo Yi de ba'y kpe akika yan za na'agaskiya ya be efo zobae nan tacin za nanzhi e jin kelo-kezhin beu yin nan. Akika Tsoci wyo ma Etsu uyio nan tswi-tswa yan ndondo dan gwa'u bo nan.

column2: Say: "Call upon other (gods) whom ye fancy besides Allah: They have no power- not the weight of an atom- in the heavens or on earth: No (sort of) share have they therein nor is any of them a helper to Allah.
column3: (Annabi) Gan gan: "E yi za nanzhi ye da gan-gan gan a gayi Tsoci yezhi baci Soko nan beyn a de mulki yandondoa kaaba gwargwado zarra mini sanmazhi to kin boa a ma pa be Sokoe eba mulkiazhi boa a made zandondo nan yi za taimako U mini'abo na'a.

column2: "No intercession can avail in His Presence except for those for whom He has granted permission. So far (is this the case) that when terror is removed from their hearts (at the Day of Judgment then) will they say ´what is it that your Lord commanded´ they will say ´That which is true and just; and He is the Most High Most Great´."
column3: Gwatan made anfani eba'u boa sai ya za nan u ga jin izini yan gwatan ya nan har sai Soko ga yannazhi fi yangban'azhio nan ku ke fili aci gan: Ngba kiy Tsoci ye gan'o Aci gan: Gaskiya ga'u tao. Akika Soko ga yi Etsu nan latu nao Etsu nan yi cinwan ci nan.

column2: Say: "Who gives you sustenance from the heavens and the earth" Say: "It is Allah; and certain it is that either we or ye are on right guidance or in manifest error!"
column3: Gan gan: Zae'yi za nan e ya ye arziki dagan sanmazhio to kinbo nao Gan gan: Soko. Akika ma ko yi ko ma ye ade nan ta eko gboro nan ko ma eti egbin nan'a tula nao.

column2: Say: "Ye shall not be questioned as to our sins nor shall we be questioned as to what ye do."
column3: Gan gan: "A ga gbin ye gan eti lefi nanzhi yi jin nan boa a maa gbin yi gan eti etun lefi nan ye ye lo nan boa.

column2: Say: "Our Lord will gather us together and will in the end decide the matter between us (and you) in truth and justice: and He is the one to decide the One Who knows all."
column3: Gan gan: Tsoci yi ga yi kuye kan baenio U ci ga hukunci jin tsakani yi bo be gaskiyae. Akika Soko gayi Etsu hukuncio Etsu kpikpe.

column2: Say: "Show me those whom ye have joined with Him as partners: by no means (can ye). Nay He is Allah the Exalted in Power the Wise."
column3: Gan gan: e la wu mi za nanzhi ye la ci'a fe za bacizhi ya Soko nan; E dzun gan wuncin'o akika Soko gbu'ugi ga yi Etsu Zankpeo Etsu hikima.

column2: We have not sent thee but as a universal (Messenger) to men giving them glad tidings and warning them (against sin) but most men understand not.
column3: Yi ma tun wyo tun'tun'a sai de lo eba zawangizhi kpata wyo mao feo jin'a bushara wyo mao feo jin'a gangba ammaade ekundondo yan zawangizhi a kpea.

column2: They say: "When will this promise (come to pass) if ye are telling the truth"
column3: A ma'ajin a fe gan gan: Foci ma yi efo alkawali yan alkiyamio wun'ayi za gaskiyazhi ye yio nao

column2: Say: "The appointment to you is for a Day which ye cannot put back for an hour nor put forward."
column3: Gan gan: Ngan ye yi be efo nan Soko la cici nan yea pata ke efo wuncin lugwa be gwargwado lokaci nini yin'a nan ye ma ga -- 'u gan'a nan.

column2: The Unbelievers say: "We shall neither believe in this scripture nor in (any) that (came) before it." Couldst thou but see when the wrong-doers will be made to stand before their Lord throwing back the word (of blame) on one another! Those who had been despised will say to the arrogant ones: "Had it not been for you we should certainly have been believers!"
column3: Kafirizhi ma gan: Yia ya gaskiya be ALKUR'ANU nan-nan yin'a yi ma'a ya be nanzhiy shi'udzo nan yan'a. Da aci gan wyo'ale azwalumizhi ye kaminan a gaa kuagi gbaro yegboro Tsociabo nan a cia fe gan dozhi gan dzakangi'azhiaafe gan be nunsa'azhi "Ka'ujin ebo ye boa da yi ga'fe Muminizhi.

column2: The arrogant ones will say to those who had been despised: "Was it we who kept you back from Guidance after it reached you Nay rather it was ye who transgressed.
column3: Nunsa'atsozhi cia gan be dzakangiazhi (talakazhi) Gan: "yi tsa kan ye eko gboro yn dao baci nan bawu dabe ba ye nao A'a ujin acin'a yetso deafe eza le fizhi.

column2: Those who had been despised will say to the arrogant ones: "Nay! it was a plot (of yours) by day and by night: Behold! Ye (constantly) ordered us to be ungrateful to Allah and to attribute equals to Him!" They will declare (their) repentance when they see the Penalty: We shall put yokes on the necks of the Unbelievers: It would only be a requital for their (ill) Deeds.
column3: Talakazhi cia gan be nunsazhiy: A'a ujin acin'a eyan dede nanzhi ye fe pa to yeshi to igidi nan kaminan ye fe jin yi umurni gan yi-jin kafirinci be Sokoe nan yi mayla yandocizhi'y oa'u baci nan. A cia egiti yan ro-- nkpe tula kaminan a le azaba ye nan. Yi cia kuruzhi ku fi koro kafirizhio. Akika ma egagba ndoci danbo nan a la ya za naa sai yan etun nanzhi a gae lo nan.

column2: Never did We send a warner to a population but the wealthy ones among them said: "We believe not in the (Message) with which ye have been sent."
column3: Yi ma la tun za tun lo alkarya le eti u dau na'a wun boa sai kafa deciazhi ga gan gan: Yi'a jin kafirinci be yan nanzhi a tun ye tun nae.

column2: They said: "We have more in wealth and in sons and we cannot be punished."
column3: A ci gan: Yi de ewozhi to egizhi nan dokun gan yan zandondo nan ebo acin'o aajin yi azaba'a.

column2: Say: "Verily my Lord enlarges and restricts the Provision to whom He pleases but most men understand not."
column3: Gan gan: Akika Tsoci mi wun'e la arziki ya za na ga bau nan U ma'e lau jin kengi'y ya za nan ga ba'u nan. Ammaade ekun dondo yan zawangizhi a kpea.

column2: It is not your wealth nor your sons that will bring you nearer to Us in degree: but only those who believe and work righteousness - these are the ones for whom there is a multiplied Reward for their deeds while secure they (reside) in the dwellings on high!
column3: Dukiya yezhi to egi yezhi'y a la ye de tsonba Soko woa ammade za nan ga imani jin nan u cie kezhe lo tun wangizhi nan egagba wangi nan dokun nan wun'ajin tabbata ya'a ebo etun wangi nan a lo nan a ma ga fe fi mini emikozhio ganni be aminci'y.

column2: Those who strive against Our Signs to frustrate them will be given over into Punishment.
column3: Za nanzhi ma e jin kokari eti yinyin yan aya Yizhio nan ebo a la egbakpan wun'a wu nan za wuncinzhi a gaa la da dzunfi azaba (nan tan nan).

column2: Say: "Verily my Lord enlarges and restricts the Sustenance to such of his servants as He pleases: and nothing do ye spend in the least (in His cause) but He replaces it: for He is the Best of those who grant Sustenance.
column3: Gan gan: Akika Tsoci mi wun'e la arziki nandokun nan ya za nan ga ba'u mini wuzhi'u zhio nan U ma'ajin wun'e la'u fe kengi'y Akika yandondo na ye ga wu nan Uga ndoci gba'u zunma Soko ga yi Etsu nan'e la arziki ya za nao.

column2: One Day He will gather them all together and say to the angels "Was it you that these men used to worship"
column3: Fo nan Soko gaa na'akin baeni'o nan ucia gan be Malaikazhi: Ngba ye ga za nananzhie jin bauta yao

column2: They will say "Glory to Thee! our (tie) is with Thee - as Protector - not with them. Nay but they worshipped the Jinns: most of them believed in them."
column3: Aci gan: Lili kpata jin tabbata ya wyoe wyo ga yi Ndakata yi yio u jin'a ya'a. U ma jin acin'a aljannuzhi tsaba a fe wun'o ekun dondoa ma a gaskiya ya bea yin.

column2: So on that Day no power shall they have over each other for profit or harm: and We shall say to the wrong-doers "Taste ye the Penalty of the Fire- the which ye were wont to deny!"
column3: (Soko ci a gan ya' gan): Yin'nan sashi yezhi a de mulki yan anfani ya sashi'a a ma kan gwa egun ya dozhi woa. Yi ma ga gan be azwalumizhiy gan: Efe fin azaba enan nan-tso ye fe yi gan ganmanan nan.

column2: When Our Clear Signs are rehearsed to them they say "This is only a man who wishes to hinder you from the (worship) which your fathers practised." And they say "This is only a falsehood invented!" and the Unbelievers say of the Truth when it comes to them "This is nothing but evident magic!"
column3: Kaminan a gaegba aya Yizhi ya be bayaniy-nan a'jin afe gan gan: zan-n'nan ufea sai dai eza bagi nan'e wa gan u ga ye gan be bauta jin ya yan nanzhi baba yezhi fe jin bauta ya nan. Aci ke gan: Nan'na u fea sai dai ganmanan nan'a tswa nan. Kafirizhi ma gan gan eti Alku'anu'o gan: Nan-nan de u fea sai dai eyan-ma nan'a tula nan.

column2: But We had not given them Books which they could study nor sent messengers to them before thee as Warners.
column3: Akika Yi la'a la litafizhi nanzhi a fe gba nan ya'a lea Yi ma laa tun za fi'a le nan ajin'a gangba naa.

column2: And their predecessors rejected (the Truth); these have not received a tenth of what We had granted to those: yet when they rejected My messengers how (terrible) was My rejection (of them)!
column3: Za nanzhi shi'adzo nan a (Annabiazhi) yi ganmanan zuncizhi Aman de tun nini guwo yan yannan Yi la ya al'uma yan Annabi zhi naa acia Tuci Mizhi yi ganmanan. Ngba ke azaba yiyi ta eti'abo nao

column2: Say: "I do admonish you on one point: that ye do stand up before Allah- (It may be) in pairs or (it may be) singly- and reflect (within yourselves): your Companion is not possessed: he is no less than a warner to you in face of a terrible Penalty."
column3: Gan gan: "Mi de jin ye wa'azi jin be eyan niniy Yea kuta ebo Soko zaguba-guba to zaeni-nni ye mae fe kpaye (eti alamari Soko). Akika batan yan ila undan be za ba ye yin'a U ma fea sai dai gangba jinci ya ye yan azaba titanci na dan yegboro nan.

column2: Say: "No reward do I ask of you: it is (all) in your interest: my reward is only due from Allah: And He is witness to all things."
column3: Gan gan: Yandondo nan mi ga gbin ye gan eti egagbao nan ye tso ga wun'o egagba yan mi dan be Sokoe Soko mae jin ri eti yandondo.

column2: Say: "Verily my Lord doth cast the (mantle of) Truth (over His servants)- He that has full knowledge of (all) that is hidden."
column3: Gan gan: Akika Tsoci mi wun'e la gaskiya la tu (ta eti ganmanao) Etsu uyio nan yi be kpikpe eyan swiswoci kpata nan.

column2: Say: "The Truth has arrived and Falsehood neither creates anything new nor restores anything."
column3: Gan gan: Akika gaskiya da beani ganmanan ma u jin yandondo woa ganmanna ma wun'a ye tula bea.(Wun'a kya daa taako-taako).

column2: Say: "If I am astray I only stray to the loss of my own soul: but if I receive guidance it is because of the inspiration of my Lord to me: it is He Who hears all things and is (ever) near."
column3: Gan gan: Akika mi gaa gbinka wuncin yi yan eti tacin mi mi ma gaa da gboro wuncin yi ebo wahayi nan Tsoci mie jin be ya mi nan. Akika Etsu nae wo gan nan uyio Etsu tsonba.

column2: If thou couldst but see when they will quake with terror; but then there will be no escape (for them) and they will be seized from a position (quite) near.
column3: Da aci gan wyo'a lea ye le kaminan edo gaa wan gi nan akika a'gan gwaa aci ga wan sun-gwa kpantsukuy dagan dan'nan nan tsoba nan.(U gayi kabariazhio).

column2: And they will say "We do believe (now) in the (Truth)"; but how could they receive (Faith) from a position (so far off-
column3: Aci gan: Yi yaa imani jin be Alkur'aniy ke ma a dada ci wo-kan yan imani dagan dan'nan nan a kpeya nao (u gayi izheo).

column2: Seeing that they did reject Faith (entirely) before and that they (continually) cast (slanders) on the unseen from a position far off
column3: A ma kafirinci jin beu yin shidzo a ci fe la gaskiya nan yi swiswoci nan ce ya dagan dan nan naa kpeya nao.

column2: And between them and their desires is placed a barrier as was done in the past with their partisans: for they were indeed in suspicious (disquieting) doubt.
column3: Aci ga yekan la'adan tsakaniabo be (imani) nan e jin shahawau nan kendoe a jinjin be eza iri'azhi nanzhi shidzo nae akika a fe fi mini shakkao nan e la'ajin kelo kezhin nan.

column2: Praise be to Allah Who created (out of nothing) the heavens and the earth Who made the angels messengers with wings- two or three or four (pairs): He adds to Creation as He pleases: for Allah has power over all things.
column3: Yebo kpata ajin tabbata ya Soko Etsu nan jin alitta sanmazhi to kin nan Etsu nan'a Malaikazhi fe Tucizhi nanzhiy yi be gwapazhiy nan. Ndoci'azhi de guba guba to guta-guta to guni-guni. U mae kezhe be yannan ga ba'u nan mini alita jin'o. Akika Soko Etsu nan de iko nan uyio ta eti yandondo.

column2: What Allah out of his Mercy doth bestow on mankind there is none can withhold: what He doth withhold there is none can grant apart from Him: and He is the Exalted in Power full of Wisdom.
column3: Eko ndondo nan Soko ga kpeya zawangizhi mini yegun'u bo nan a de za nan kan'uwo naa na ma u gaakan nan zandondo la'u ya za wo baci'u boa. (Akika Soko) Etsu zankpe uyio Egba uyio.

column2: O men! Call to mind the grace of Allah unto you! is there a creator other than Allah to give you sustenance from heaven or earth There is no god but He: how then are ye deluded away from the Truth
column3: Ya ye zawangizhi e fe pa ni'ima Soko nanzhiy ta eti yebo nan. Kashi ade halitta jinci ndoci baci Soko na eya ye arziki dagan sanmao to kinbo nan Akika a de yandoci nan'ajin bauta ya naa sai Soko. Kiy be la a cie la ye pan ya ke eko lugwao

column2: And if they reject thee so were messengers rejected before thee: to Allah back for decision all affairs.
column3: A ma ga wyo yi ganmanan zunci Akika acinga agan be Tuci nanzhiy shi wyo dzo nan yin'o. Alamari kpata ma a kezhe daa eba Soko.

column2: O men! Certainly the promise of Allah is true. Let not then this present life deceive you nor let the Chief Deceiver deceive you about Allah.
column3: Ya ye zawangizhi akika alkawali Soko gaskiya uyio ebo acin'o e ga lugwa edunfe izhe ta ye ma ye mae ga lugwa (shaitan) nan'e ta zazhi nan ta ye ma.

column2: Verily Satan is an enemy to you: so treat him as an enemy. He only invites his adherents that they may become Companions of the Blazing Fire.
column3: Akika shaitan makiri ye uyio ebo acin'o ye tso'u la makiri. Akika wun'e yi jama'a yin'uzhi yi ebo a lazhe egimi nanzhi.

column2: For those who reject Allah is a terrible Penalty: but for those who believe and work righteous deeds is Forgiveness and a magnificent Reward.
column3: Za nanzhia jin kafirinci nan azaba nan tan saruyin nan a jin tabbata ya'a za nanzhi ma'a'imani jin nan acie lotun wangizhi nan gafara to lada nan wancin nan ajin tabbata yaa

column2: Is he then to whom the evil of his conduct is made alluring so that he looks upon it as good (equal to one who is rightly guided) For Allah leaves to stray whom He wills and guides whom He wills. So let not thy soul go out in (vainly) sighing after them: for Allah knows well all that they do!
column3: Ngba za nan'a etun dede'u la'apa nin fiu nan wuntso cie le'u ye wangi nan (u gaa zhe nini be za gurui) Akika Soko egbin za nan ga bau nan u mae la za nan ga ba'u nan ke eko ebo acin'o ga wu rayi wye be yangban yin etiabo ma. Akika Soko yi be kpikpe yan etun nanzhi e lo nan.

column2: It is Allah Who sends forth the Winds so that they raise up the Clouds and We drive them to a land that is dead and revive the earth therewith after its death: even so (will be) the Resurrection!
column3: Soko gae tun efezhi tun'o u cia jin u la sanma cie shio gancin Yi cie da'ugwalo ezhi nan yi tsutsuci nan Yi cie la kin dan rayi baci nan u ga tsu nan. Acinga ga a nan ekunzhi kin kabaria bo.

column2: If any do seek for glory and power- to Allah belong all glory and power. To Him mount up (all) Words of Purity: It is He Who exalts each Deed of Righteousness. Those that lay Plots of Evil- for them is a Penalty terrible; and the plotting of such will be void (of result).
column3: Zandondo nan gae wa cin wan nan akika cinwan kpata egwa Soko bo u fio. Egan wangizhi mae laagun da eba'u U mae la etun wangizhi laatu za nanazhiy mae jin tanadi yan etun dedezhi nan azaba nan tan nan a jin tabbata ya'a tanadiazhi kpata ma u ga jin lalace.

column2: And Allah did create you from dust; then from a sperm-drop; then He made you in pairs. And no female conceives or lays down (her load) but with His knowledge. Nor is a man long-lived granted length of days nor is a part cut off from his life but is in a Decree (ordained). All this is easy to Allah.
column3: Soko ga jin halitta ye dagan jikannan bo gancin dagan maniy bo Ucia ye la fe bagi be ynzagiy. Ynzagi ndondo a la ewan'a U ma magia sai be kpikpe'u yin. A ma de za nan a ya rayi kpalo na'a ama de za nan a ga rayi ke tukun na'a sai de wun'ayi kikaci dan litafio. Akika wuncin yannan de sauki nan uyi ya Soko.

column2: Nor are the two bodies of flowing water alike- the one palatable sweet and pleasant to drink and the other salt and bitter. Yet from each (kind of water) do ye eat flesh fresh and tender and ye extract ornaments to wear; and thou seest the ships therein that plough the waves that ye may seek (thus) of the Bounty of Allah that ye may be grateful.
column3: Edu-nuwan guba a jin ninia; nana nuwan'u man sarauyin u ma fan'y fin nanan ma yi esan-esan luku lukuy. Mini ndondoabo ma ye de nakan nan da nan gi bo ye mae kezhe wa eyan ninpazhi tinya bo nanzhi ye de fan nan ye mae le eya nuwanzhi ye nanzhie da edu wuncinzhi nan ebo ye wa bibe yan arziki Soko ebo ma ye fe jin yebo'e (ya-U).

column2: He merges Night into Day and he merges Day into Night and he has subjected the sun and the moon (to his Law): each one runs its course for a term appointed. Such is Allah your Lord: to Him belongs all Dominion. And those whom ye invoke besides Him have not the least power.
column3: Wun'e la yeshi a lo dan mini batin'o U mae la batin a lo dan mini yeshio. U ma igidi to etswa fozo ndondo mae dazan lo iyaka nan yi bibaci nan. Etsu nan'ejin nnan nan u gayi Soko nan yi Tsoci ye nao. Soko ga wun mulkio za nanzhi ye jin bauta ya baciu bo nan a de mulki yan gwargwado sun-sun dobina'a.

column2: If ye invoke them they will not listen to your call and if they were to listen they cannot answer your (prayer). On the Day of Judgment they will reject your "Partnership". and none (O man!) can tell thee (the Truth) like the One Who is acquainted with all things.
column3: Ka ye ga'e yia e wo yiyi yezhia ka a ma ga wo a ya ye ezhe woa efo alkiyami ma a ga egwazhi wa be wiwo nan ye fe wo'a nan. A ma de za nan a ya wyo labari dozhin Etsu kpikpe naa.

column2: O ye men! It is ye that have need of Allah: but Allah is the One Free of all wants worthy of all praise.
column3: Ya ye zawangizhi ye ga yi talakazhi lo eba Soko Soko ga ma yi Etsu ba--  Etsu nan zandondo e jin yebo ya nao.

column2: If He so pleased He could blot you out and bring in a New Creation.
column3: U ga ba'u u gae tanfi baenio u cia kezhe jin halitta worozhi be.

column2: Nor is that (at all) difficult for Allah.
column3: Wuncin ma jin eyan zwizwoci eba Soko boa.

column2: Nor can a bearer of burdens bear another´s burdens if one heavily laden should call another to (bear) his load. Not the least portion of it can be carried (by the other). Even though he be nearly related. Thou canst but admonish such as fear their Lord unseen and establish regular Prayer. And whoever purifies himself does so for the benefit of his own soul; and the destination (of all) is to Allah.
column3: Zando ma'a la kara lefi yan zandocia. Za nan ma kara zunubi'uzhi ga lukpin nan kau ga yi za gan a bau la re a bau yando la rea ka uga yi yegi nan tsoba nan. Wyo deo feo jin gangba'o ya za nanzhi gae sundan Tsocia swiswoci nan a ma kezhea Sallah kugikini nan.Zaeni ndondo nan ga tadzu ke shikan kafirinci lugwa nan wuncin yi ebo ti tacin'u bo eba Soko tsa yia kezhe lo kpatao.

column2: The blind and the seeing are not alike;
column3: Yebonci be za nan e le ba ye nan a jin ye nia.Surah 35:20   Nor are the depths of Darkness and the Light;Acinga bazhikozhi be haske a jin ye nia.

column2: Nor are the (chilly) shade and the (genial) heat of the sun:
column3: Ba yeko be ba yi pae a jin ye nia.

column2: Nor are alike those that are living and those that are dead. Allah can make any that He wills to hear; but thou canst not make those to hear who are (buried) in graves.
column3: Acinga za nanzhi yi be rayi nan be za nanzhi'a tsu nan a jin ye nia. Akika Sokoe la gan-wo ya za nan ga ba'u nan. Wyo ma wyoa la za nanzhi fi kabario nan wo gan woa.

column2: Thou art no other than a warner.
column3: Wyo de fea sai dai gangba jinci.

column2: Verily We have sent thee in truth as a bearer of glad tidings and as a warner: and there never was a people without a warner having lived among them (in the past).
column3: Akika Yi tun wyo tun-tun ganni be gaskiyae ebo wyo yaa labari yangbanfa wyo ma'o na'a wun akika mini al'umma ndondo eza danbo nan'e na'a wun nan.

column2: And if they reject thee so did their predecessors to whom came their messengers with Clear Signs Books of dark prophecies and the Book of Enlightenment.
column3: A ma ga egan wyo yi ganmana za nanzhi shiadzo nan atso'a egan Tuciazhi yi ganmanan kaminan Tuciazhi be yaa be bayanizhi be hujja yan takadazhi be Litafi nan yi be haske nan.

column2: In the end did I punish those who rejected Faith: and how (terrible) was My rejection (of them)!
column3: Gancin Mi cia za nanzhi ajin kafirinci nan wan ngba ke nangban yan etan winwan yan Soko yi nao

column2: Seest thou not that Allah sends down rain from the sky With it We then bring out produce of various colours. And in the mountains are tracts white and red of various shades of colour and black intense in hue.
column3: Ye le yea kendoe Sokoe du ele be dagan sanmao na'a Yi cia yangici sun-sunzhi la'atinya be ele iri yan sun-sunzhi ma yi kakayin. U ma ke jin dan mini patizhio ekohi nanzhiy yi bokun to dzuruzhiy nan atso ma yi iri kakayin ganni be ndocizhi nanzhi shizhiko sarauyin nan.

column2: And so amongst men and crawling creatures and cattle are they of various colours. Those truly fear Allah among His Servants who have knowledge: for Allah is Exalted in Might Oft-Forgiving.
column3: To mini yan zawangizhio to dabbazhio to dabba yan emanwozhi atsozhi yi iri kakaayin acinga ayi baeni bo. Akika Manzhi gbaugi gae sundan Soko mini wuzhi'uzhi bo. Akika Soko Etsu zankpe uyio Etsu gafara.

column2: Those who rehearse the Book of Allah establish regular Prayer and spend (in Charity) out of what We have provided for them secretly and openly hope for a commerce that will never fail:
column3: Akika za nanzhi egba litafi Soko nan ama sallah kugikini nan a mae wu dukiyazhi nan Yi la yaa nan fi eko wangizhio to swiswoci to gangbao nan akika za wuncinzhi e cewo nan a zunyaanan.

column2: For He will pay them their meed nay He will give them (even) more out of His Bounty: for He is Oft-Forgiving Most Ready to appreciate (service).
column3: Ebo acin'o Soko ga lada'zhi shekpan yaa u ma'a kezhe bea mini falala'uzhio. Akika Soko Etsu gafara uyio Etsu yebo jin.

column2: That which We have revealed to thee of the Book is the Truth- confirming what was (revealed) before it: for Allah is assuredly- with respect to His Servants - well acquainted and Fully Observant.
column3: Litafi nan tso Yi jin wahayi u be ya wyo nan wun ga yi gaskiya'o U maa gaskiya ya be nanzhi be shi'udzo nan. Akika Soko yi be kpikpe u mae le yannan wuzhi'uzhi dan'yn-ninbo nan ye.

column2: Then We have given the Book for inheritance to such of Our Servants as We have chosen: but there are among them some who wrong their own souls; some who follow a middle course; and some who are by Allah´s leave foremost in good deeds; that is the highest Grace.
column3: Ganci yi cia Litafi laa gi gun ya eza tsitsacizhi mini wuzhi yi zhio ade miniabo nan'ejin ti tacin'u gun nan ama de nanzhi yi eza tacingizhi nan ama de nanzhi a shidzo be etu alhairizhi be yarda Sokoe nan. Wuncin ga yi daraja nantso wancin nao.

column2: Gardens of Eternity will they enter: therein will they be adorned with bracelets of gold and pearls; and their garments there will be of silk.
column3: Wato aljannazhi nan aga jin dawwama fi nan aga ganfi bo a ci ga pa nin fi bo be gadozhi nan'a jin be zinariyae to aluluyinan tufuwazhi ma mini aljannao u gayi ede yan alharirio (siliki).

column2: And they will say: "Praise be to Allah Who has removed from us (all) sorrow: for our Lord is indeed Oft-Forgiving Ready to appreciate (service):
column3: Aci gan: Yebo kpata ajin tabbata ya Soko nan'a yangban-yin lakeyabo ya yi nan. Akika Tsoci yi Etsu gafara uyio Etsu yebo jin.

column2: "Who has out of His Bounty settled us in a Home that will last: no toil nor sense of weariness shall touch us therein."
column3: Etsu nan'a yi cin fi emi yan danbo dan'o mini falala'u bo nan yia le wahala ndondo ye mini'u boa yi ma'awo ebo ndondo mini'u boa.

column2: But those who reject (Allah) - for them will be the Fire of Hell: No term shall be determined for them so they should die nor shall its Penalty be lightened for them. Thus do We reward every ungrateful one!
column3: Za nanzhiy maa a jin kafirinci be Sokoe nan egagba yan enan jahannama wun'ajin tabbata ya'a a ga -- rayi beayin acia tsu'a  a ma'a jin sauki yan azaba ya'a. Acinga ga yi e ga kafiri ndondo gba'o.

column2: Therein will they cry aloud (for assistance): "Our Lord! Bring us out: we shall work righteousness not the (deeds) we used to do!" - "Did We not give you long enough life so that he that would should receive admonition and (moreover) the warner came to you. So taste ye (the fruits of your deeds): for the wrong-doers there is no helper."
column3: A ma fe yi kabara fi mini'u bo aafe gan gan: Ya wyo Tsoci yi! A yi ku tinya Yi yaada lotun guru nantso jin iri nanzhi yi fe jin le'a nan. (Aci ga ya ezhe gan) A sa Yi ya ye rayi kpalo'a nan a kunn nan za nan ga'santu mini'ebo na ga santu na'a Gangba jinci mabe eba ye. E fe fin azaba azwalumizhi a de zandondo nan ajin'a taimako naa.

column2: Verily Allah knows (all) the hidden things of the heavens and the earth: verily He has full knowledge of all that is in (men´s) hearts.
column3: Akika Soko yi be kpikpe yan yannanzhi swo fi sanmazhio to kin bo nan.Akika Soko yi be kpikpe yan yannanzhi swo fi yangbanzhio nan.

column2: He it is That has made you inheritors in the earth: if then any do reject (Allah) their rejection (works) against themselves: their rejection but adds to the odium for the Unbelievers in the sight of their Lord: their rejection but adds to (their own) undoing.
column3: Soko ga la ye cia fe halifazhi kpe kinbo. Zaeni ndondo nan ga jin kafirinci nan egagba yan kafirinci'a wu'yan yau. Kafirinci yan kafirizhi man wun'a be'a yandondo eba Tsociaboa sai dai hallaka kafirinci yan kafirizhia bea yandondoa sai dai hasara.

column2: Say: "Have ye seen (these) ´Partners´ of yours whom ye call upon besides Allah Show Me what it is they have created in the (wide) earth. Or have they a share in the heavens Or have We given them a Book from which they (can derive) clear (evidence)- Nay the wrong-doers promise each other nothing but delusions.
column3: Gan gan: Ye le ye'a za nanzhi ye la a pa mi baci nan ye cie jin bauta ya;a ke Soko lugwa nan e la'wu Mi yin kiy zhiy a jin halittau kpe eti kinbo kashi a pama ganni be Sokoe eba jin-jin yan sanmao kashi yi la Litafi ndoci la ya'a kayin nantso a fe hujja ya'a nan U jin acin'a akika azwalumizhi de a de yannanzhi e la jin dozhi alkawali na'a sai dai eta.

column2: It is Allah Who sustains the heavens and the earth lest they cease (to function): and if they should fail there is none - not one - can sustain them thereafter: Verily He is Most Forbearing Oft-Forgiving.
column3: Akika Soko ga la egwa sun sanmazhi to kin aci du'a yin'o akika a ma ga du-du zaeni ndondo la egwa sun'u wo baci Soko boa. Akika Soko Etsu hakuri uyio Etsu gaafara uyio.

column2: They swore their strongest oaths by Allah that if a warner came to them they would follow his guidance better than any (other) of the Peoples: But when a warner came to them it has only increased their flight (from righteousness)-
column3: A ma zhi kuti be Sokoe iyaka yan kuti zhi'a zhi gan: Akika gangba jinci ga be ya'a a gaafe dan mini aluma nanzhi a gwo bawu gan zazhi nan kaminan gangba jinci be be yaanan u bea yandondoa sai de kpikpe-yai be bawu'y.

column2: On account of their arrogance in the land and their plotting of Evil but the plotting of Evil will hem in only the authors thereof. Now are they but looking for the way the ancients were dealt with But no change wilt thou find in Allah´s way (of dealing): no turning off wilt thou find in Allah´s way (of dealing).
column3: Ebo eti kagbo ta eti kinbo be makirinci dede U mae cin ta eti zando boa sai eti za nan'e jin'u nan. Eza nan-nanzhiy a'tu yandondo ye'a sai de ekpa yan egagba iri yan za mafarizhi. Wyo ma'atsun egbazhe dan ekpa Soko boa wyo m'atsun egwa-san dan mini ekpa Soko boa.

column2: Do they not travel through the earth and see what was the End of those before them- though they were superior to them in strength Nor is Allah to be frustrated by anything whatever in the heavens or on earth: for He is All-Knowing. All-Powerful.
column3: Kashi! E za-za kpe eti kinboa acia cin'ale a lo kendoe zoba yan zanazhi shiadzo nan yi-yi na'a a maafe gan a gboka gan'a. yandondo ma gan Soko gwaa dan mini sanmazhio ko kin boa. Akika Soko Etsu kpikpe uyio Etsu iko.

column2: If Allah were to punish men according to what they deserve. He would not leave on the back of the (earth) a single living creature: but He gives them respite for a stated Term: when their Term expires verily Allah has in His sight all His Servants.
column3: Da agan Soko e din-ye-din wan zazhi be lefi'azhi da a de rayi ndondo ke ta eti kin boa amaade wyun'e pata ya'a da lokaci nan yi be iyakae nan. Kaminan iyakazhi gaatun nan akika Soko Etsu uyio nan'e cin wuzhi'uzhi le nan.

column2: Ya Sin
column3: YASIN (Bayanizhi shidzo eti'u bo'ani)

column2: By the Qur´an full of Wisdom
column3: Mi'e zhi kuti be Alkuranuy nan'ashe be hikimae nan

column2: Thou art indeed one of the messengers
column3: Akika Wyoe (Muhammadu) wyo dan mini TucizhioSurah 36:4  On a Straight WayWyo ta eti ekpa nantso yi gboro nanSurah 36:5  It is a Revelation sent down by (Him) the Exalted in Might Most Merciful(Alkur'anu) ma u cin cin be dagan eba Soko nan yi Etsu zankpe nan Etsu yegun

column2: In order that thou mayest admonish a people whose fathers had received no admonition and who therefore remain heedless (of the Signs of Allah)
column3: Ebo wyo jin gangba'o ya jama'a nanzhi a jin gangba ya yanmanci'azhi'a nan a cia fe dan eyeyaona

column2: The Word is proved true against the greater part of them: for they do not believe
column3: Akika hukunci Soko (azaba) a jin tabbata eti kundondoa bo ebo nan ya gaskiya'a na

column2: We have put yokes round their necks right up to their chins so that their heads are forced up (and they cannot see)
column3: Akika Yi'a kuruzhi ku fia kpatsun'azhio har da da'a wan nungbeazhi ebo acin'o eti'azhi a kan ta fitio

column2: And We have put a bar in front of them and a bar behind them and further We have covered them up; so that they cannot see
column3: Yi cia yekan la'a dan yegboro'a bo yekan ma'dan to zunma'abo Yi cia eyan la a'rukpe'a aci le ba ye bea

column2: The same is it to them whether thou admonish them or thou do not admonish them: they will not believe
column3: Yeni ma'u yi eba'abo ko wyo jin'a gangba ko ma wyo ga jin'a ma ajin za nanzhi a ya gaskiya na'a

column2: Thou canst but admonish such a one as follows the Message and fears the (Lord) Most Gracious unseen: give such a one therefore good tidings of Forgiveness and a Reward most generous
column3: Akika wyoe jin gangba jin ya za nan gae la mitu foro Alkur'ani nan u mae kezhe sundan Soko swiswociy nan (Annabi) ya'u labari yangban fa be gafara yan Sokoe to lada nan wancin nan

column2: Verily We shall give life to the dead and We record that which they send before and that which they leave behind and of all things have We taken account in a clear Book (of evidence)
column3: Akika Yi gaela rayi dan eyan tsutsucizhio Yi ma ga etun nan zhi a la shidzo nan ka to ekpa nanzhiy a da nan Yandondo ma Yi'u jin lisafi dan mini litafi nan wancin uma yi gbangba na

column2: Set forth to them by way of a parable the (story of) the Companions of the City Behold! there came messengers to it
column3: Wyo mao la misali'o wu'a yan jama'a yan alkarya ndoci ka mi nan Tucizhi be ya'a na

column2: When We (first) sent to them two messengers they rejected them: But We strengthened them with a third: they said Truly we have been sent on a mission to you
column3: Ka mi nan Yi tun Tuci guba fi'a nan a cia egan'azhi yi gasmanan Yi ci'a be kagbo be za taci'y a ci gan; Akika yi de Tucizhi yiyi be ebayeyeo

column2: The (people) said: Ye are only men like ourselves; and (Allah) Most Gracious sends no sort of revelation: ye do nothing but lie
column3: A ci gan: ye yi za'ndo'a sai dai zawangi dozhin yi  Soko (ALRAHMANU) ma cin yan'ndondo be'a ye de ganmanan tsaba u ga ye zun'o

column2: They said: Our Lord doth know that we have been sent on a mission to you:
column3: A ci gan: Tsociyi u yi be kpikpe ke de Tucizhi yi'yi be eba ye ye'o nao

column2: And our duty is only to proclaim the clear Message
column3: Etunndo ma ta eti yi bo'a sai dai yanwu nan yi be bayani'y nan

column2: The (people) said: for us we augur an evil omen from you: if ye desist not we will certainly stone you And a grievous punishment indeed will be inflicted on you by us
column3: A ci gan: Yi ye cin'ye le eza de dezhi kagan ma ye lugwa'a yi gae ce yan ye ma ga'gun be azaba nan tannan dagan eba yi bo

column2: They said: Your evil omens are with yourselves: (deem ye this an evil omen) If ye are admonished Nay but ye are a people transgressing all bounds!
column3: A ci gan: cincinle yan eyan dedeyezhi u dan ganni be ye tsoe kashi ebo tukpa nan a paye nan (u ga la ye ci gan acin'o) A'a ye de fe'a saidaiza nanzhi'e nyin yanzhi nan

column2: Then there came running from the farthest part of the City a man saying O my people! Obey the messengers:
column3: Eza bagi ndoci ci be dagan efu nanlokpa gan mini ezhio nao u fe dinye u ci gan: Ya ye jamaazhi ya emi tu Tucizhi

column2: Obey those who ask no reward of you (for themselves) and who have themselves received Guidance
column3: Yea emi tu za nazhi e gbin ye gan yan lada etun'azhi a nana ma kezhe yi eza eko gboro nan (eza bawuzhi nan)

column2: It would not be reasonable in me if I did not serve Him Who created me and to Whom ye shall (all) be brought back
column3: Kiyma a kan mi cia jin bawta ya Etsu nanjin alita mi yin'a naa yin'o ezhekeba ye kpata ma u dan eba u bo

column2: Shall I take (other) gods besides Him If (Allah) Most Gracious should intend some adversity for me of no use whatever will be their intercession for me nor can they deliver me
column3: Ngba mi ga za'ndoci baci Soko la gan wyun gayi ndakatao Ngan Soko (ALRAHMANU) wun'a kpa mimacinle ndoci be mi yin gwatan yan zandodo'a wun'a jin mi amfania a ma bo mi yawo'a

column2: I would indeed if I were to do so be in manifest Error
column3: Akika mi ga jin acin mi ga'fe dan mini egbin'o nantso a tu la na

column2: For me I have faith in the Lord of you (all): listen then to me!
column3: Akika mi'a imanijin ganni be Tsoci ye yin ye mae laefe erie ya mi

column2: It was said: Enter thou the Garden He said: Ah me! Would that my People knew (what I know)!
column3: Aci gan'u gan: A gandan Aljannao U gan: kasa! da'aci gan jamaa yan mizhi de kpikpe (yan alhairi na Soko jin ya mi nan)

column2: For that my Lord has granted me Forgiveness and has enrolled me among those held in honour!
column3: To fifa nan u fa be mi yin nae U ci kezhea mi la'adan ezacinwancizhio

column2: And We sent not down against his People after him any hosts from heaven nor was it needful for Us so to do
column3: Yi ma cin ekungunci ndondo be ya jamaa yan'u zhi zunma'u boa Yi ma cin be le'a

column2: It was no more than a single mighty Blast and behold! they were (like ashes) quenched and silent
column3: Alamaria u fe'a sai dai kabara nini kpata ci'a fe eza tsutsucizhi

column2: Ah! Alas for (My) Servants! There comes not a messenger to them but they mock him!
column3: Egiti yan robonkpe wun'ajin tabbata ta eti wuzhizhio kamindondo nan tuci gabe ya'anan aa fe za nazhi e la'u mi nan

column2: See they not how many generations before them we destroyed Not to them will they return:
column3: Kashi a le ba yele'a ekun dondo za nanzhi Yi jin'a hallaka shi'a dzo mini alummazhio na akika Za wuncinzhi a kezhe zhin eba'a be'a

column2: But each one of them all  will be brought before Us (for judgment)
column3: Akika ma kpata a gaa ku ye kanbe zhi yegboro Yi bo

column2: A Sign for them is the earth that is dead: We do give it life and produce grain therefrom of which ye do eat
column3: U ma dan mini egwa wu yan zankpe Soko ya'a Kin na'a tsu nan yi'u dan rayi yi cia yangici sunsunzhi la'atin yardagan mini'u bo U cia fe yangici nanzhi e gi nan

column2: And We produce therein orchard with datepalms and vines and We cause springs to gush forth therein:
column3: Yi cikezhea lati yan dobinazhi jin dan nin'yin'u bo to yangici inabizhi Yi ci kezhea eye nuwanzhi la'atinya fi mini'u bo

column2: That they may enjoy the fruits of this (artistry): It was not their hands that made this: will they not then give thanks
column3: Ebo a fea de'agi dagan yangici sunsun'uzhio to nazhi a tso ga la egwazhi ci lo'tun'u nan Ngba za'nnazhi'a jin yebo ya Soko'a

column2: Glory to Allah Who created in pairs all things that the earth produces as well as their own (human) kind and (other) things of which they have no knowledge
column3: Lili kpata ajin tabbata ya Soko Etsu na'a alittazhi kpata jin eba be yiwo'e nan Dagan mini yannanzhi yin tinya kinbo na to mini 'atso (Zawangizhio) to yannazhi a de kpikpe wun'a nan

column2: And a Sign for them is the Night: We withdraw therefrom the Day and behold they are plunged in darkness;
column3: U ma dan mini egwa wu yan zankpe Soko yeshi na Yi'a jin yi wa ebatin tin'ya dagan mini'u bo na alittazhi ci gaa fe dan mini bazhiko

column2: And the sun runs his course for a period determined for him: that is the decree of (Him) the Exalted in Might the AllKnowing
column3: To igidi'otso wun'ajin u fe bi ci da iyaka yan ecinba'u Nannan shiri u yio yan Soko na yi Etsu zankpe nan an yi Etsu kpikpe nan

column2: And the Moon We have measured for her mansions (to traverse) till she returns like the old (and withered) lower part of a datestalk
column3: To etswa'o tso yi'a ecinbazhi tswa cigban dobina gbako na

column2: It is not permitted to the Sun to catch up the Moon nor can the Night outstrip the Day: Each (just) swims along in (its own) orbit (according to Law)
column3: Wun'a ye jin ya igidi nan wun'a tso etswa na'a yeshi maashi batin dzo'a ndondo'a ma gun mini falakio a cie je za

column2: And a Sign for them is that We bore their race (through the Flood) in the loaded Ark;
column3: U ma dan mini egwa wu yan zankpe Soko ya'a yi'a zuriya'azhi ku fi mini eya'o nan yi shisheci nan

column2: And We have created for them similar (vessels) on which they ride
column3: Yi ma kejin in'u zhi ya'a nan a fe de tu nan

column2: If it were Our Will We could drown them: then would there be no helper (to hear their cry) nor could they be delivered
column3: U ma ga ba yi yi gaajin hallaka fi mini edwo a ma'a de za nan'ajin'a taimako na'a a ma ade zanan'a wo'a tinya na'a

column2: Except by way of Mercy from Us and by way of (world) convenience (to serve them) for a time
column3: Sai de yegan dagan eba yi bo be emawo yan etapa daaeka ndoci

column2: When they are told Fear ye that which is before you and that which will be after you in order that ye may receive Mercy (they turn back)
column3: A ma ga gan ya'gan: e sundan yan alamari na ci ye gboro'e bo na to nan tso dan zunmae bo nan be'acin ma Soko'a gun'e ye

column2: Not a Sign comes to them from among the Signs of their Lord but they turn away therefrom
column3: A ya ndondo na ga be ya' dangan mini aya yan Soko zhio na a'jin a zunma zhe ta

column1: Surah 36:46          Not a Sign comes to them from among the Signs of their Lord but they turn away therefrom
column2: A ya ndondo na ga be ya' dangan mini aya yan Soko zhio na a'jin a zunma zhe ta

And when they are told Spend ye of (the bounties) with which Allah has provided you the Unbelievers say to those who believe: Shall we then feed those whom if Allah had so willed He would have fed (Himself) Ye are in nothing but manifest error
column3: A ma ga gan yaagan: efe wu dukiya yezhi mini nanzhi Soko la arziki'u ya ye nan (fi eko guru'o) Za nanzhi ajin kafirinci nan'a gan be za tsaabe la yangici ya za nan u ga be Soko gan wun'a ya'ugi u gaaya'u gi nao Akika (eza iri nazhi) a fe'a sai de dan mini egbin nan'a tulanao

column2: Further they say When will this promise (come to pass) if what ye say is true
column3: A ma'jin a fe gan gan: Fo ci alkawali (yan alkiyami) a yio wun'ayi gaskiya tsa ye tao nao

column2: They will not (have to) wait for aught but a single Blast: it will seize them while they are yet disputing among themselves!
column3: Yando danbo nan e tu ye na'a sai de kabara ninikete Nan a dzun dzun fia lokaci nan mini ekoce yan eyan wa yan izeo nao

column2: No (chance) will they then have by will to dispose (of their affairs) nor to return to their own people!Kanga a'de iko yan wasiyya jin'a a ma'ade ezhe ke lo eba iyaliazhi bea
The trumpet shall be sounded when behold! from the sepulchres (men) will rush forth to their Lord!
column3: Aci ga kafo be gancin a cia fe gu tinya dagan kabarizhio a cia fe lo eba Tsocia

column2: They will say: Ah! Woe unto us! Who hath raised us up from our beds of repose (A voice will say:) This is what (Allah) Most Gracious had promised And true was the word of the messengers!
column3: A cia gan gan: Kasaayi re! zae yi za na nanyikin dagan elele ba yi bo nao (A cia ya'ezhe gan: Ngan nannan ga yi yannan Soko Etsu yegun fe la jin yi alkawali nao Tucizhi ma a gaskiya ta

column2: It will be no more than a single Blast when lo! they will all be brought up before Us!
column3: Akika alamari nannan ufe'a sai de kabara nini ke gancin kpata ci gaa gun yekan zhi yagboro Yi bo

column2: Then on that Day not a soul will be wronged in the least and ye shall but be repaid the meeds of your past Deeds
column3: Yinnan nnan aajin rayi ndondo egun ndondoa a maa ga'e gbaa sai de be iri etun nanzhi ye fe lo (izheo)nan

column2: Verily the Companions of the Garden shall that Day have joy in all that they do;
column3: Akika za mi Aljannazhi yinnan afedan mini shagalio a maa fe wo man

column2: They and their associates will be in groves of (cool) shade reclining on Thrones (of dignity);
column3: To a to yinmiazhi a gaakpetso ta eti gadokozhio fi mini wuru aljannazhio

column2: (Every) fruit (enjoyment) will be there for them; they shall have whatever they call for;
column3: A ma yi be yangici marimarizhi fi nini yan'u bo a ma yibe yan dondo nan a gae wa nan

column2: Peace!  a word (of salutation) from a Lord Most Merciful!
column3: Emisa yan aminci ugaafe egan na afe be ya' dagan eba Tsoci nan yi Etsu yegun nan'

column2: And O ye in sin! Get ye apart this Day!
column3: Ye mae la'ekpe kayin yin'na ya ye lefi jinci zhi

column2: Did I not enjoin on you O ye Children of Adam that ye should not worship Satan; for that he was to you an enemy avowed
column3: A sa mi jin ye gangbaa ya ye egi Adamazhi kede ye ga jin bauta ya shaitan ma'a Akika makiu ye u yio yan gbangba

column2: And that ye should worship Me (for that) this was the Straight Way
column3: Ye mae fe jin bautae ya Mi nannan ga yi ekpa nantso yi gboro nao

column2: But he did lead astray a great multitude of you Did ye not then understand
column3: Akika ma shaitan wun'a jama'a nanzhi dokun nan gbin kiy la ye ci gaa fe eza ankalizhia yin'o

column2: This is the Hell of which ye were (repeatedly) warned!
column3: Nannan ga yi enan jahannama nan tso ajin ye alkawali nao

column2: Embrace ye the (fire) this Day for that ye (persistently) rejected (Truth)
column3: Ye'a gan fi bo yinnannnan ebo etun kafirinci nanzhiy ye lo naa

column2: That Day shall We set a seal on their mouths But their hands will speak to us and their feet bear witness to all that they did
column3: Yinnannnan Yi ga misun'azhi te egwaazhi cia gangan be Yi yin bicia zhi ma'ajin ri etun nanzhi a fe lo nan

column2: If it had been our Will We could surely have blotted out their eyes; then should they have run about groping for the Path but how could they have seen
column3: U ma ga ba Yi Yiga eyeazhi fin ya a cia fe sanganna be eciy ta eti kpandara swiratio ke'a dada ci le ba ye nao

column2: And if it had been Our Will We could have transformed them (to remain) in their places; then should they have been unable to move about nor could they have returned (after error)
column3: U ga ba Yi Yi ga'fin ya ba nanzhi a kpe nao acia de ba lo yegboroa amaa zhin zunma woa

column2: If We grant long life to any We cause him to be reversed in nature: Will they not then understand
column3: Za nan ma yi ga yau rayi kpalo nan yi ga halittau zhegba daake yan dzakanbo nan kashi a de ankali dea

column2: We have not instructed the (Prophet) in Poetry nor is it meet for him: this is no less than a Message and a Qur´an making things clear:
column3: Yi ma la eniko wu Annabi Muhammadua U ma  yin ya wun'a yan nan ube beyin nan U fea sai de sinsantu ganni be Alkur'anu nan'a tula nan

column2: That it may give admonition to any (who are) alive and that the charge may be proved against those who reject (Truth)
column3: Ebo ujin gangba'u ya za nan ga yi be rayiy nan ( uga yi Muminio) azaba ma gajin tabbata ta eti kafirizhio

column2: See they not that it is We Who have created for them  among the things which Our hands have fashioned  cattle which are under their dominion
column3: Kashi! A le ye kendoe Yi jin halitta yan dabba emawozhi jin ya'a be egwa Yi yin na'a Acia fe yan nanzhi e jin mulkia na'a

column2: See they not that it is We Who have created for them  among the things which Our hands have fashioned  cattle which are under their dominion
column3: Kashi! A le ye kendoe Yi jin halitta yan dabba emawozhi jin ya'a be egwa Yi yin na'a Acia fe yan nanzhi e jin mulkia na'a

column2: And that We have subjected them to their (use) of them some do carry them and some they eat:
column3: Yi cia jin foro ya'a ebo anfani'abo) acie de yan'a tu za a mae kezhe de gigi dagan mini'ubo

column2: And they have (other) profits from them (besides) and they get (milk) to drink Will they not then be grateful
column3: A mae de eyan anfani mini'abo to eyan finfincizhi Ngba aajin yebo ya sokoa

column2: And they have (other) profits from them (besides) and they get (milk) to drink Will they not then be grateful
column3: A mae de eyan anfani mini'abo to eyan finfincizhi Ngba aajin yebo ya sokoa

column2: Yet they take (for worship) gods other than Allah (hoping) that they might be helped!
column3: Acie da wun kuti ndocizhi ke Soko lugwa ebo kutizhia jin'a taimako

column2: They have not the power to help them: but they will be brought up (before Our Judgmentseat) as a troop (to be condemned)
column3: Kutizhi ma jin'a taimako ndondo woa atso kafirizhi tsa yi kagbo nan zhie tswa kutizhi nao

column2: Let not their speech then grieve thee Verily We know what they hide as well as what they disclose
column3: Ga lugwa egan'azhi yin wyo yangban ma akika Yi de kpikpe yan nanzhie so nan to nanzhi a la tula nan

column2: Doth not man see that it is We Who created him from sperm yet behold! he (stands forth) as an open adversary!
column3: Zawangi leye lea ke de Yi ga jin halittau dagan maniy bo naa U ci kezhe be'azhe za nan'e sun'wun cie gbomi be alamari Sokoe nan

column2: And he makes comparisons for Us and forgets his own (origin and) Creation: He says Who can give life to (dry) bones and decomposed ones (at that)
column3: Har u gan win'e la egan wu yi be misali jin'y ucia to kendoe Soko jin halittau jin nan batan Uci gan: Ngba ziy dan tsukun rayi wo beo kaminan u ga ban cia gi ya zo nao

column2: Say He will give them life Who created them for the first time! for He is Wellversed in every kind of creation!
column3: Gan gan: Etsu wuncin nan la rayi yau cabae nan u dan'u rayi wo be Akika Etsu uyio nan de kpikpe yan jinjin halitta irindondo nan

column2: The same Who produces for you fire out of the green tree when behold! ye kindle therewith (your own fires)!
column3: Etsu na'a enan jin ya ye dagan mini cigban funfuruo nan ye cie de enan gun be'u yinna

column2: Is not He Who created the heavens and the earth able to create the like thereof  Yea indeed! for He is the Creator Supreme of skill and knowledge (infinite)!
column3: Ngba Etsu nanjin halitta sanmazhi to kin nan u de kagbo nan uga' jin iriu wo be na'a Akika Soko gayi Etsu nan ejin halitta kpata nao Etsu kpikpe ma uyio

column2: Is not He Who created the heavens and the earth able to create the like thereof  Yea indeed! for He is the Creator Supreme of skill and knowledge (infinite)!
column3: Ngba Etsu nanjin halitta sanmazhi to kin nan u de kagbo nan uga' jin iriu wo be na'a Akika Soko gayi Etsu nan ejin halitta kpata nao Etsu kpikpe ma uyio

column2: Verily when He intends a thing His Command is be and it is!
column3: Akika ma alamari Soko kandondo nan eyan ga bau yin jin nan wun'ajin u gan'u gan: a fe uci ga fe (kendoe ugae bau nan)

column2: Sad: By the Qur´an Full of Admonition: (This is the Truth).SWAD.
column3: (Soko gan): Mi zhikuti be Alkur'anuy nan yi eyan cinwanci nan.

column2: But the Unbelievers (are steeped) in self-glory and Separatism.
column3: Akika za nanzhi a jin kafirinci nan aafe dan mini eti kagbo be emigboe.

column2: How many generations before them did We destroy In the end they cried (for mercy)- when there was no longer time for being saved!
column3: Al'ummazhi nanzhiy dokun nan Yiajin hallaka shiadzo bedzo a ci wa egwa gan lokaci nan egwagan wa wun'a jin'a anfania nan.

column2: So they wonder that a Warner has come to them from among themselves! and the Unbelievers say "This is a sorcerer telling lies!
column3: Acia jin mamaki nan gangba jinci fe be yaa dagan mini atso nan kafirizhi ci gan: Za nnan de eyan manci uyio u ma yi ganmanan zunci.

column2: So they wonder that a Warner has come to them from among themselves! and the Unbelievers say "This is a sorcerer telling lies!
column3: Acia jin mamaki nan gangba jinci fe be yaa dagan mini atso nan kafirizhi ci gan: Za nnan de eyan manci uyio u ma yi ganmanan zunci.

column2: "Has he made the gods (all) into one Allah Truly this is a wonderful thing!"
column3: Ke-a ta ta uci ga Sokozhi laazhe Soko nini nao Akika nanan eyan mamaki uyio.

column2: "Has he made the gods (all) into one Allah Truly this is a wonderful thing!"
column3: Ke-a ta ta uci ga Sokozhi laazhe Soko nini nao Akika nanan eyan mamaki uyio.

column2: And the leader among them go away (impatiently) (saying) "Walk ye away and remain constant to your gods! For this is truly a thing designed (against you)!
column3: Nunsa yan kinzhi cia nankin a ci fe gan gan: e fe lo yan'e ye mae la hakuri e jin ta eti bauta kutiezhio. Akika nanan shiri uyio nan a kpa nan. (a kpkpa gan a la yi yaagan be kuti yizhiy).

column2: "We never heard (the like) of this among the people of these latter days: this is nothing but a made-up tale!"
column3: Yi laawo iri nnan le'a dan mini adini nanzhiy shidzo nanboa nanan tsoma u iy yandondoa sai de ganmanan nan atswa nan.

column2: "What! has the Message been sent to him - (Of all persons) among us"...but they are in doubt concerning My (Own) Message! Nay they have not yet tasted My Punishment!
column3: Ngba tacin yi nanzhiy zhi daanan ga bo a cin Alkur'anu be ya wun'o A'a ade jin kelo kezhin jin eti Alkur'anuo. Wuncin ma yi ebo nan ala fin azaba Mi yin'a nao

column2: Or have they the treasures of the mercy of thy Lord- the Exalted in Power the Grantor of Bounties without measure
column3: Kashi eba a ga bo edzunbako yan arziki yan yegun Tsoci wye nan yi Etsu zankpe Etsu rytwa nan dan'o

column2: Or have they the dominion of the heavens and the earth and all between If so let them mount up with the ropes and means (to reach that end)!
column3: Kashi a ga wun mulki yan sanmazhio to kin to yan nanzhi fi tacin'abo nao Wun'ayi acin'o a fea gun'akpe ekpzhio (yandondo nan agae wa nan u ciu lau ye'u de).

column2: But there - will be put to flight even a host of confederates.
column3: Akika a de jamaa eti kperezhi nan zhiy shidzo nan kpata ma Soko a tan fi.

column2: Before them (were many who) rejected messengers- the people of Noah and ´Ad and Pharaoh the Lord of Stakes
column3: Jamaa yan Nuhu zhi u'uyi ganmanan shidzo be dzo to Aduzhi to Firauna nan yi be kangarizhiy nan.

column2: And Thamud and the people of Lut and the Companions of the Wood; - such were the Confederates.
column3: To samuduzhi to jamaa yan Lutu to jamaa yan Aikatazhi (a ga yi jamaa yan Annabi Shuaibuo) a gayi jama'a wuncinzhi nanzhiy Ye gan gan'a nao.

column2: Not one (of them) but rejected the messengers but My punishment came justly and inevitably (on them).
column3: Ndondoa a Tucizhi yi ganmanan azaba cia jin tabbata ta eti'abo.

column2: These (today) only wait for a single mighty Blast which (when it comes) will brook no delay.
column3: Zan nanazhiy ma ade yannan e tuye naa sai de kabara nini kete nan ndoci dan yegboro u boa nan.

column2: They say: "Our Lord! hasten to us our sentence (even) before the Day of Account!"
column3: Aci gan: Tsoci yi a rabo yan azaba yi laa ya yi vaa" yin tun kafi efo egagbae nan.

column2: Have patience at what they say and remember our servant David the man of strength: for he ever turned (to Allah).
column3: A hakuri eti iri egan nanzhiye e gan nan Wyo mao pa wuzhi yi Dawuda nan gboka nan akika eza uyio na ezhe keba alamari u kpata wun"a ku ya Soko nan.

column2: It was We that made the hills declare in unison with him Our Praises at eventide and at break of day
column3: Akika Yia patizhi jin foro yau aajin afe -- mi tasbihi jin ya Soko to yeshi to Lazhin.

column2: And the birds gathered (in assemblies): all with him did turn (to Allah).
column3: To elugizhi nanzhi a kuyekan nan kpata ma afe e"la mi tu forouzhi.

column2: We strengthened his kingdom and gave him wisdom and sound judgment in speech and decision.
column3: Yi ma"amulkiu gboka yi ma twaurya be hikimae ganni be kpikpe yan hukunci bae. (tsakani za nazhi gae sunwun nan).

column2: Has the Story of the Disputants reached thee Behold they climbed over the wall of the private chamber;
column3: Ngba labari yan za nazhiy sunwun-na be eba wyo ya"ani Ka mi na a gun lo masallacinan.

column2: When they entered the presence of David and he was terrified of them they said: "Fear not: we are two disputants one of whom has wronged the other: Decide now between us with truth and treat us not with injustice but guide us to the even Path..
column3: Kami na a gandan eba Dawuda"o na dansun"a cia wan"u aci gan: "Ga sundan ma yiza guba nanan yie sunwun-sun zaeni"a za ba ci jin gun ebo acin"o a hukunci ba tsakani yibo be gaskiyae Wyo tso mao ga jin zwalunci ma mao wu yi ba yan eko gboro.

column2: "This man is my brother: He has nine and ninety ewes and I have (but) one: Yet he says ´commit her to my care´ and is (moreover) harsh to me in speech."
column3: Akika za nnan yegi mi yio u yi be nangizhi har shitsun din nini mima de nangi ninikete uci gan:"U"u la ya mi-nkpa u ma' mi kutso be egan wuncin'y.

column2: (David) said: "He has undoubtedly wronged thee in demanding thy (single) ewe to be added to his (flock of) ewes: truly many are the partners (in business) who wrong each other: Not so do those who believe and work deeds of righteousness and how few are they"...and David gathered that We had tried him: he asked forgiveness of his Lord fell down bowing (in prostration) and turned (to Allah in repentance).
column3: (Dawuda) ci gan: "Akika wun"a wun"a wyo jin gun na u gan wyo la nangi wyo yo be yan wun zhi na akika ekun dondo yan za nan zhie la dukiyazhi keba (eti wo ce'o nan) e jin dozhi zwalunci jin sai de za nanzhiy ga imani jin acie lo'tun guru na eza degi ma u ga iri za wuncinzhi yio. Kanga gancin Dawuda otso akpe ke yi'u ma cin le nan u ci wa gafara yan Tsoci'u u ci nikin cici u ci fe jin ruku u cia alamariuzhi kpata laaya Soko.

column2: So We forgave him this (lapse): he enjoyed indeed a Near Approach to Us and a beautiful place of (Final) Return.
column3: Yi cia fa be'u yin be wun cin'y. Akika ma u de tsonba Yi u ma de ezhe keba wangi.

column2: O David! We did indeed make thee a vicegerent on earth: so judge thou between men in truth (and justice): Nor follow thou the lusts (of thy heart) for they will mislead thee from the Path of Allah: for those who wander astray from the Path of Allah is a Penalty Grievous for that they forget the Day of Account.
column3: Ya wyoe Dawuda akika Yia wyo la'afe halifa ta eti kin bo acin'o fe jin hukunci tsakani zazhio be gaskiyae ga kara la'mi tu etun yangban ma kacin'a uga wyo gbin ke eko Soko lugwa nan egagba yan azaba na gboka na ga ajin tabbata yaa ebo efo egagba nan a batan nan.

column2: Not without purpose did We create heaven and earth and all between! that were the thought of Unbelievers! but woe to the Unbelievers because of the Fire (of Hell)!
column3: Yi ma jin sanma to kin to kin to yan nanzhi fi tacin'abo nan eti kpere'a wuncin ga yi yekpa yan kafirinzhio azaba yan enan wun'aji tabbata ya kafirizhi.

column2: Shall We treat those who believe and work deeds of righteousness the same as those who do mischief on earth Shall We treat those who guard against evil the same as those who turn aside from the right
column3: Kashi Yi ga za nanzhi a imani jin acie lotun nan laazhe kpe eti kinbo nan Kashi yi ga za na zhie tswa Soko nan laazhe ye ni be eza banzazhiy

column2: (Here is) a Book which We have sent down unto thee full of blessings that they may mediate on its Signs and that men of understanding may receive admonition.
column3: Litafi u yio na yi be albarkae nan Yi cin'u cin be ya wye ebo a fea kpaye eti a yauzhio u ma'u laufe sinsantun u ya zanazhi yi be hankaliy nan.

column2: To David We gave Solomon (for a son)- How excellent in Our service! Ever did he turn (to Us)!
column3: Yi ma la ryatwa yan (egi) Sulaimanu ya Dawuda. Madalla be wuzhi nanae lo eba Sokonan.

column2: Behold there were brought before him at eventide coursers of the highest breeding and swift of foot;
column3: Ka-mi na a ta dabbazhi zhi safuo ya'u aci gi gbaro be lozun'y nan.

column2: And he said "Truly do I love the love of good with a view to the glory of my Lord"- until (the sun) was hidden in the veil (of night):
column3: U ci gan: Akika mi wa gan min lo etun alheri ndoci u cia tamba ce ta mi ke sallah (Laasar) lugwa har sai nan igidia swo dan yekan'ubo nan.

column2: "Bring them back to me." then began he to pass his hand over (their) legs and their necks.
column3: (Uci gan) E kuazhin be tsun mi u ci fe kaa yan (be ebiy) biciazhio to koroazhio.

column2: And We did try Solomon: We placed on his throne a body (without life); but he did turn (to Us in true devotion):
column3: Akika Yia Sulaimanu mancin le Yi cia nankan kpace ndoci (yan eza tsutsuci) ceta eti esa'ubo Uci kezhe da ba Soko be jin-jin ibadae.

column2: He said "O my Lord! Forgive me and grant me a kingdom which (it may be) suits not another after me: for Thou art the Grantor of Bounties (without measure).
column3: U ci gan: "Tsoci fa be mi yin Wyo mao twami rya be mulki nan Zandondo'ade iri'u zunma mi boa nan. Akika Wyo ga yi Etsu ryatwao.

column2: Then We subjected the wind to his power to flow gently to his order Whithersoever he willed-
column3: Yi cia efe jin foro ya'u u cie dazan be umurni'u yin karayin lo bandondo nan uga eye wu nan.

column2: As also the evil ones (including) every kind of builder and diver-
column3: To shaitanzhi nanzhie tu eba iri ndondo nan zhi e gbin nuwan nan.

column2: As also others bound together in fetters.
column3: To ndocizhi a pa fi mini kuruzhio.

column2: "Such are Our Bounties: whether thou bestow them (on others) or withhold them no account will be asked."
column3: Nan na kpata eryatwa yi uyio nan de lisafia nan. Wun'a bao wyo tso la twarya ko ma wyo a yan'o sun gwa.

column2: And he enjoyed indeed a Near Approach to Us and a beautiful Place of (Final) Return.Akika ma u de tsonba yi ganni be ezhe keba wangiy.
Commemorate Our Servant Job. Behold he cried to his Lord: "The Evil One has afflicted me with distress and suffering!"
column3: Wyo mao pa wuzhi yi Ayuba Kami na u fe yi Tsoci'u ye nan u ci gan: A kika shaitan yan'a egwa la two mi gan ni be etan'e.

column2: (The command was given:) "Strike with thy foot: here is (water) wherein to wash cool and refreshing and (water) to drink."
column3: (Aci gan'u gan): A kin gba be bici o yin Nuwan yeko nan ga tin-ya bo nan u'u fu wyo mao fe o fin'u.

column2: And We gave him (back) his people and doubled their number- as a Grace from Ourselves and a thing for commemoration for all who have Understanding.
column3: Yici twa'urya be iyaliuzhiy be ndocizhi ganni be'a yin. Yegun u yio dagan eba Yi bo u ma yi sinsan tu ya za nanzhiy ga de han-kali nan.

column2: "And take in thy hand a little grass and strike therewith: and break not (thy oath)." Truly We found him full of patience and constancy. How excellent in Our service! ever did he turn (to Us)!
column3: A tsukun gwalagi (nan yi be gwalagi shitsun'y nan) la sungwa wyo cio lao din (iyali wye ebo wyo-bea Kuti nan wyozhi nan nyin ya ma). Akika Yi tsun (Ayuba) tsun eza hakuri. Madalla be wuzhi nan nae akika eza uyio nae dokun be ezheke lo eba Soko nan.

column2: And commemorate Our Servants Abraham Isaac and Jacob possessors of Power and Vision.
column3: Wyo ma o pa wuzhi Yi Ibrahima to Ishaka to Yakubu. Za nanzhiy gboka nan a yio a ma yi eza hankalizhi.

column2: Verily We did choose them for a special (purpose)- proclaiming the Message of the Hereafter.
column3: Akika Yia tadzu be edzuta yan pipa yan efo zobae.

column2: They were in Our sight truly of the company of the Elect and the Good.
column3: Akika ma eba yi bo a dan mini eza tsitsaci zhio a ma yi eza alhairi zhi.

column2: And commemorate Isma´il Elisha and Zul-Kifl: Each of them was of the Company of the Good.
column3: Wyo mao kezheo pa Ismaila to Alyasa'u to Zulkiflu kpataa dan mini eza alhairi zhio.

column2: This is a Message (of admonition): and verily for the righteous is a beautiful Place of (Final) Return-
column3: Nan na yetun wangizhi a yio akika ma za nazhie tswa Soko nan a yi be zoba wangiy.

column2: Gardens of Eternity whose doors will (ever) be open to them;
column3: U ga yi Aljannazhi nan a fi tutunyin nan ekozhi kpata ma yi kpikpeci ebo a bo.

column2: Therein will they recline (at ease): Therein can they call (at pleasure) for fruit in abundance and (delicious) drink;
column3: A ga'kpetso fi nin yan'u bo a cia fe gan gan: a la yangici mari-marizhi a be'a ya a to yan nazhi a fin nan.

column2: And beside them will be chaste women restraining their glances (companions) of equal age.
column3: A ma yi be ynzagi yezun nnizhiy nanzhie tswa ba cin le azhi ya ebaazhii kawanyin nan.

column2: Such is the Promise made to you for the Day of Account!
column3: Nan nan u ga yi yanna zhi a jin alkawali nao ebo efo ega gbao.

column2: Truly such will be Our Bounty (to you); it will never fail;-
column3: Akika nan nan arziki Yi uyio nan ma azoa nan.

column2: Yea such! but - for the wrong-doers will be an evil place of (Final) Return!-
column3: Nan nan (Yan egi mi aljannazhi dan'o nan) Akika ma za nanzhie gbin iyaka Soko tu nan zoba dede ga ajin tabbata yaa.

column2: Hell!- they will burn therein - an evil bed (indeed to lie on)!-
column3: Enan yan jahannama nan a gan dan'u nan akika yantaci za nan nanzhi a bi ye.

column2: Yea such! - then shall they taste it- a boiling fluid and a fluid dark murky intensely cold!-
column3: Nan nan egagba uyio a fe'a fin nuwan yipa ganni be nuwan yan etin zhiy.

column2: And other Penalties of a similar kind to match them!
column3: To ndoci nan beu nan yi dozhin'n a ma yi iri iri.

column2: Here is a troop rushing headlong with you! No welcome for them! truly they shall burn in the Fire!
column3: (Acia gan'a gan): Nan nanzhi'otso jamaazhi a yio nanzhi'afin enao ganni be yeyin nan. (Kafiri kozhi cia gan gan): Yi fa yangban be bibea yin'a akika kpata enan bo a gan fio.

column2: (The followers shall cry to the misleaders:) "Nay ye (too)! No welcome for you! It is ye who have brought this upon us! Now evil is (this) place to stay in!"
column3: (Kafiri wawagizhi otso cia gan gan): A'a to yetso Yi fa yangban be ye yin'a ngan ye ga tswa ekpa yan zoba dede nan nan ya yi yio akika dannan nan nan wun'a bi ye.

column2: They will say: "Our Lord! whoever brought this upon us- Add to him a double Penalty in the Fire!"
column3: Acia gan gan: Tsoci yi Zandondo nan ga degwa dan egagba dede nan-nao nan be'u azaba sarauyin dan mini enao.

column2: And they will say: "What has happened to us that we see not men whom we used to number among the bad ones
column3: Aci ke gan: kiy la yi ci laa le bagi ndocizhi ye'a yin'o Ebo nan kami na yidan izheo nan yi fe leaye le ke eza dedezhi nan.

column2: "Did we treat them (as such) in ridicule or have (our) eyes failed to perceive them"
column3: Kashi yi fe laami laa Kashi eye yizhi tsa pan yao yi ci lea yea yin'o

column2: Truly that is just and fitting- the mutual recriminations of the People of the Fire!
column3: Akika ewun-sun nan nan tsakani egi'mi nanzhio gaskiya uyio.

column2: Say: "Truly am I a Warner: no god is there but the one Allah Supreme and Irresistible-
column3: Gan gan: Mi de gangba jinci mi mi yio yandondo ma danbo na'ajin bauta ya be gaskiyae naa sai Soko nini ke te nan kagbo'u ta eti alittazhi kpatao nan.

column2: "The Lord of the heavens and the earth and all between- Exalted in Might able to enforce His Will forgiving again and again."
column3: Etsu nan'e kpa sanmazhi nan to kin to yan nanzhi fi taacin'a bo nan. Etsu zankpe uyio Etsu ga'fara.

column2: Say: "That is a Message Supreme (above all)-
column3: Gan gan: Wuncin labari uyio nan wancin nan.

column2:
From which ye do turn away!,Ye ma zunma zhe tau yecia pan ke'u lugwa.
Surah 38:69  ,      No knowledge have I of the Chiefs on high when they discuss (matters) among themselves.
column3: Mide kpikpe ndondo eti malaika wancikozhi boa kami nan e gan gan elo bezhin (be Tsociy naa).

column2: ´Only this has been revealed to me: that I am to give warning plainly and publicly."
column3: Umajin wahayi ndoci e jin be ya mi yin'a sai de mi de yi za naejin gangba na'atula nan.

column2: Behold thy Lord said to the angels: "
column3: I am about to create man from clay:Kami nan Tsoci wye gan be malaikazhiy gan: "Akika Mie wa gan miajin alitta yan zawangi be egun'y.

column2: "When I have fashioned him (in due proportion) and breathed into him of My spirit fall ye down in obeisance unto him."
column3: Kami nan Mi ga'u jin gunmi nan Micia efe yan ruhi Mi be fiu nan kpatae yaa ya zhi kinbo ye jin sujadae yau.

column2: So the angels prostrated themselves all of them together:
column3: Malaikazhi kpata cida' sujada ya'u.

column2: Not so Iblis: he was haughty and became one of those who reject Faith.
column3: Sai de Iblisu nan'a gbotika nan ucia fe dan mini kafiri zhio.

column2: (Allah) said: "O Iblis! What prevents thee from prostrating thyself to one whom I have created with my hands Art thou haughty Or art thou one of the high (and mighty) ones"
column3: (Soko) cigan: Kiy kan wye sujada jin ya alitta nan Mi jin be egwa Mi yin nao Wyo gbotika gbo kashi wyo'a fe dan mini za nanzhie wo tia san nao

column2: (Iblis) said: "I am better than he: thou createdst me from fire and him thou createdst from clay."
column3: Uci gan: Ngan mi gan'u ebo nan ena wyo'ajin mi yin'o egun ma wyo'a jin wun yin'o.

column2: (Allah) said: "Then get thee out from here: for thou art rejected accursed.
column3: (Soko) cigan: a'dzun tinya dagan mini Aljannao akika wyo'a fe eza cice yaci.

column2: "And My curse shall be on thee till the Day of Judgment."
column3: La'ana Mi ma ta eti'obo har da fo nan aga alkiyami nan-na.

column2: (Iblis) said: "O my Lord! Give me then respite till the Day the (dead) are raised."Uci gan: Tsoci pata ya mi har da fo nan agaa na'akin nan.
(Allah) said: "Respite then is granted thee-
column3: (Soko) ci gan: Akika wyo dan mini za nan mia pata ya nan.

column2: "Till the Day of the Time Appointed."
column3: Har da efo yan lokaci nan yi be iyakae nan.

column2: "Till the Day of the Time Appointed."
column3: Har da efo yan lokaci nan yi be iyakae nan.

column2: (Iblis) said: "Then by Thy power I will put them all in the wrong-
column3: Uci gan: Mi zhi kuti be zankpe'o yin akika mi ga'a gbin bae nio.

column2: "Except Thy Servants amongst them sincere and purified (by Thy Grace)."
column3: Sai de wuzhi wyozhi nanzhiy wyo ga yangban'azhi tadzu nan.

column2: (Allah) said: "Then it is just and fitting- and I say what is just and fitting-
column3: (Soko gan: Akika yan gaskiya be gaskiya tsabae u ga Mie gan ya ye yeo.

column2: "That I will certainly fill Hell with thee and those that follow thee- every one."
column3: WALLAHI Mi ga jahannama she pin yin be wyo yin to za nanzhi ga emi tu'o nan-baenio).

column2: Say: "No reward do I ask of you for this (Qur´an) nor am I a pretender.mGan ya'gan: Mi wa lada ndondo be ye yin'a eti etun nan mie lo nan boa mi ma la kpaka ndondo ta ye ye'a.
"This is no less than a Message to (all) the Worlds.
column3: Wun de fea sai sinsantu ya alitazhi kpaata.

column2: "This is no less than a Message to (all) the Worlds.
column3: Wun de fea sai sinsantu ya alitazhi kpaata.

column2: "And ye shall certainly know the truth of it (all) after a while."
column3: WALLAHI Ma yea be kpe gaskiya laabari nae yae na zunma lokaci ndocio.

column2: The revelation of this Book is from Allah the Exalted in Power full of Wisdom.
column3: Cin cin yan Litafi nnan dagan eba Soko bo nan yi Etsu zankpe nan u ma yi Etsu hikima nan.

column2: Verily it is We Who have revealed the Book to thee in Truth: so serve Allah offering Him sincere devotion.
column3: Akika Yi cin Litafi cin be ya wye be gaskiyae ebo acin'o fe jin bauta ya Soko wyo mao la adinio tadzuo ya'u.

column2: Is it not to Allah that sincere devotion is due But those who take for protectors other than Allah (say): "We only serve them in order that they may bring us nearer to Allah." Truly Allah will judge between them in that wherein they differ. But Allah guides not such as are false and ungrateful.
column3: Akika adini natso ga tadzu nan u ga yi yan Soko' za nanzhiy ma a gwasun kuti ndocizhi ke Soko lugwa nan a'jin afe gan gan: Yi yejin bauta jin ya' kutizhi ebo a la yi' yaa tsoaba Soko. Akika Soko ga hukunci ba tsakaniabo eti yannazhi e la ce dozhi leba eti ubo nan. Akika Sokoe la kafiri ndondo nan yi ganmanan zunci nan ke ekoa.

column2: Had Allah wished to take to Himself a son He could have chosen whom He pleased out of those whom He doth create: but Glory be to Him! (He is above such things.) He is Allah the One the Irresistible.
column3: Wun'aba Soko ba gan wun'a de'gi da' wun'a tsa za nan ga bau nan mini alittauzhio. Lili kpata ajin tabbata yau akika wun ga yi Soko Etsu nini kete nan a ce alittazhi kpata kagbo nan.

column2: He created the heavens and the earth in true (proportions): He makes the Night overlap the Day and the Day overlap the Night: He has subjected the sun and the moon (to His law): Each one follows a course for a time appointed. Is not He the Exalted in Power - He Who forgives again and again
column3: Wun'a alitta yan sanmazhi to kin jin be gaskiyae wyun'e la yeshi fan a la kpe igidi umae la igidi fan kpe yeshio. Uma' igidi to etswa jin foro (ya ye) ndondoa e'da zan har da iyaka ndoci nan a ba ya'u nan. Akika Soko Etsu zankpe uyio Etsu gafara.

column2: He created you (all) from a single person: then created of like nature his mate; and he sent down for you eight head of cattle in pairs: He makes you in the wombs of your mothers in stages one after another in three veils of darkness. such is Allah your Lord and Cherisher: to Him belongs (all) dominion. There is no god but He: then how are ye turned away (from your true Centre)
column3: Wun'a alitta ye jin dagan rayi ninio (uga yi Annabi Adamuo) Uci kezhea yinmi'u jin dagan mini'u bo u ma kezhe jin alitta ya ye mini dabba ni'imazhio har iri gutwota. U cia alitta ye jin shiri dan mini Gbako nnan yezhio. Alitta yezhi ma yi ekpo ekpo dan mini bazhiko gutao. Soko ye ga dan'o nao wun ga yi Tsoci ye yeo wun'ga wun mulki kpatao a de Etsu ndoci'a sai win'y. Kiy be la acie la ye pan ke eko lugwao

column2: If ye reject (Allah) Truly Allah hath no need of you; but He liketh not ingratitude from His servants: if ye are grateful He is pleased with you. No bearer of burdens can bear the burden of another.
