column2: By the Book that makes things clear-
column3: Mie zhi kuti be (Alkuranuy) Litafi nan yi be bayanizhiy naa tula nan.

column2: We have made it a Qur´an in Arabic that ye may be able to understand (and learn wisdom).
column3: Akika Yi'u la afe Alkuranu be zhimi larubawazhiy ebo ye la'efe eza ankalizhi.

column2: We have made it a Qur´an in Arabic that ye may be able to understand (and learn wisdom).
column3: Akika Yi'u la afe Alkuranu be zhimi larubawazhiy ebo ye la'efe eza ankalizhi.

column2: And verily it is in the Mother of the Book in Our Presence high (in dignity) full of wisdom.
column3: Akika Alkuranu dan mini Nna yan Litafizhio (lauhul-Mahfuz) eba Yi bo ma Alkuranu litafi na latu nan uyio naa she be hikimae nan.

column2: Shall We then take away the Message from you and repel (you) for that ye are a people transgressing beyond bounds
column3: Kashiy Yi ga cin cin be yan sinsantu lugwaa baenio ebo nan ye yeafe za nanzhie nyin yan kpe kin bo nan

column2: But how many were the prophets We sent amongst the peoples of old
column3: Eka nan dokun nan Yi tun Annabi fi jamaa yan mafarizhi.

column2: And never came there a prophet to them but they mocked him.
column3: A ma de Annabi ndondo nan be ya'a na'a sai de 'afe la'u mi.

column2: So We destroyed (them)- stronger in power than these;- and (thus) has passed on the Parable of the peoples of old.
column3: Yimaa za nazhiy gboka gan'a nan jin hallaka iri az'aba nan tswan za mafarizhi na cia da eti atso gwo gan.

column2: If thou wert to question them ´Who created the heavens and the earth´ They would be sure to reply ´they were created by (Him) the Exalted in Power Full of Knowledge´;-
column3: Wallahi wyo ga gbin'a gan gan: Ziy jin alitta sanmazhi to kin yin'o Akika a'yazhe gan Soko Etsu zankpe Etsu kpikpe ga jin alittaao.

column2: (Yea the same that) has made for you the earth (like a carpet) spread out and has made for you roads (and channels) therein in order that ye may find guidance (on the way);
column3: Etsu naa kin ta cici ya ye parae nan U cia ekozhi sa fi bo ya ye nan. Ebo ye debae laede bawu nan.

column2: That sends down (from time to time) rain from the sky in due measure;- and We raise to life therewith a land that is dead; even so will ye be raised (from the dead);-
column3: Etsu nae du ele zhin dagan sanmao be tsunwan'e nan Yicia ezhi tsutsucizhi dan rayi be'u yin. A cin ga ga a ku ye tso tinya dagan kabariezhi bo.

column2: That has created pairs in all things and has made for you ships and cattle on which ye ride
column3: Etsu nan jin alitta eba be yiwozhiy kpata nan U ci kezhe jin eya nuwanzhi nan yeade ganfi nan to dabbazhiy nanzhiy yede tu nan.

column2: In order that ye may sit firm and square on their backs and when so seated ye may celebrate the (kind) favour of your Lord and say "Glory to Him Who has subjected these to our (use) for we could never have accomplished this (by ourselves)
column3: Ebo ye debae lae fedun'ekpe zunmaabo yemae fe pa niimayan Tsoci yezhi kami nan ye gaa fe dun ta etiabo nan ye mae gan gan:Lili kpata ajin tabbata ya Etsu naa (e yan tuci) nan nan jin foro ya yi nan akika yi de kagbo ndondo ta eti ezan daa bo'a.

column2: "And to our Lord surely must we turn back!"Akika kpata yi ma eba Tsoci yi ga yia kezhe lo.
Yet they attribute to some of His servants a share with Him (in his godhead)! truly is man a blasphemous ingrate avowed!
column3: Acia za ndoci tsa ya'u mini wuzhi'u zhio (ke wun ga yi egi wun'o nan) akika zawangi eza uyio nae cin manan bo be Sokoenan manan cin'bo naa tula nan.

column2: What! has He taken daughters out of what He himself creates and granted to you sons for choice
column3: Ngba wun'a egi ynzagizhi tsa mini alittauzhio U cia ye tsa be egi bagizhiy

column2: When news is brought to one of them of (the birth of) what he sets up as a likeness to (Allah) Most Gracious his face darkens and he is filled with inward grief!
column3: A ma ga ya zaeni miniabo labari yangban fa be egi ynzagiy nan'e da gan gan: Soko Al-Rahmanu tsa gan. Na fuska u ga'shi zhiko yangban'u ci ga'nyin.

column2: Is then one brought up among trinkets and unable to give a clear account in a dispute (to be associated with Allah)
column3: Ngba' (ye ga dangi tsa ya Soko). Be za nae sa sa dan mini ninpao nan za nan man ka wun'abe ewun sunzhi wun'a kpe gan ri woa nan

column2: And they make into females angels who themselves serve Allah. Did they witness their creation Their evidence will be recorded and they will be called to account!
column3: Acia Malaikazhi nazhiy yi wuzhi Soko na la ynzagizhi. Beke a jin ri jinka mi nan a jin alittaa nan A kika a ga eri azhi ka a-maa gbin'a gan (efo Alkiyamiy).

column2: ("Ah!") they say "If it had been the will of (Allah) Most Gracious we should not have worshipped such (deities)!" Of that they have no knowledge! they do nothing but lie!
column3: Aci gan: Wun'a ba Soko Al-Rahmanu ba ngan yi yaajin bauta ya (Malaikazhia). Ade kpikpe ndoci eti wuncin boa akika a de'tswa ganmana tswa kawanyin.

column2: What! have We given them a Book before this to which they are holding fast
column3: Kashiy Yi la Litafi ndoci laa ya'a shi Alkuranu dzo Wuncin ci la a egwa sun'u gbanyin.

column2: Nay! they say: "We found our fathers following a certain religion and we do guide ourselves by their footsteps."
column3: Ade gan: Akika yi tsun yanmanci yizhi kpe eti izhe le iri ndocio etaazhi ga ma yi ga emi tuo.

column2: Just in the same way whenever We sent a Warner before thee to any people the wealthy ones among them said: "We found our fathers following a certain religion and we will certainly follow in their footsteps."
column3: Acinga ga u ma yio Yi laa tun gangba jin ci tun dan ezhi ndocio shi wyo dzo lea sai de bagwo deciazhi a'gan gan: Yi de tsun yanmanci yizhi tsun ta eti eko izhe le ndocio Yi ma etaazhi ga ga emi tuo.

column2: He said: "What! Even if I brought you better guidance than that which ye found your fathers following" They said: "For us we deny that ye (prophets) are sent (on a mission at all)."
column3: Gan gan: Asa bawu nan mi la be nan U gye gan natso ye tsun yanmanci yezhi kpe tiubo naa A gan: Yi de ajin kafirinci be yan nan a tun yetun nae.

column2: So We exacted retribution from them: now see what was the end of those who rejected (Truth)!
column3: Yicia wo gbata. Cin kendoe zoba yan ganmanan zuncizhiy nan le.

column2: Behold! Abraham said to his father and his people: "I do indeed clear myself of what ye worship
column3: :Kami na (Annabi Ibrahima gan be Babau yin to Jamaa yan'u zhi nan.jin bauta yanan.

column2: "(I worship) only Him Who made me and He will certainly guide me."
column3: Sai de za nan jin alitta mi nan akika Wun ga wu mi bao.

column2: And he left it as a Word to endure among those who came after him that they may turn back (to Allah).
column3: Uci'u fe egan wanciko naa dan'ubo fe lo mini zuriya'u zhio na ebo zawangizhi a daazhin eko (yan gaskiya).

column2: Yea I have given the good things of this life to these (men) and their fathers until the Truth has come to them and a messenger making things clear.
column3: A'a Mi dea za nananzhiy to yanmanciazhi ya fi izheo fe wo ma har be lokaci nan gaskiya (Alkuranu) be yaa nan ganni be Tuciy naa tula nan.

column2: But when the Truth came to them they said: "This is sorcery and we do reject it."
column3: Kamina gaskiya (Alkuranu) be yaa nan a gan: nan nan eyan ma uyio yima'a kafirinci jin beu yin.

column2: Also they say: "Why is not this Qur´an sent down to some leading man in either of the two (chief) cities"
column3: A ci gan: Kiy la aci cin Alkuranu nan nan be ya bagi ko ndoci mini Alkarya guba nazhiy wancin nan boa yin'o

column2: Is it they who would portion out the Mercy of thy Lord It is We Who portion out between them their livelihood in the life of this world: and We raise some of them above others in ranks so that some may command work from others. But the Mercy of thy Lord is better than the (wealth) which they amass.
column3: Kashi a gae gan eryatwa yan Tsoci wyo yo Ngan Yi gae gan Arzikiazhi ya' izhe bo Yi maa daraja yan sashiazhi la'ata eti yan sashio ebo adeba la dozhi etun yegun yan Tsoci wyo ma ude alheri gan (eyan izhe) nanzhiy e ku ye kan nan.

column2: And were it not that (all) men might become of one (evil) way of life We would provide for everyone that blasphemes against (Allah) Most Gracious silver roofs for their houses and (silver) stair-ways on which to go up
column3: Ka'Ujin ebo nan zawangizhi a bea zhe'a yan ni na boa (eba fitina eyande izheo naa) da yi ga katanti yan emi kafirizhi laafe azurfa to ekpa nanzhiy a fe da lo (kata) fiti nan.

column2: And (silver) doors to their houses and thrones (of silver) on which they could recline
column3: Yi maa kezhea kpako yan emiazhi to gado'azhi (jin be azurfae) nan a fe de kpetso ta nan.

column2: And also adornments of gold. But all this were nothing but conveniences of the present life: The Hereafter in the sight of thy Lord is for the Righteous.
column3: To kaya ninpazhi kpata wuncinzhi ma eyan emawo izhe ayio akika ma emi yan zoba wangi wun'ajin tabbata ya za nanzhie tswa Soko nan.

column2: If anyone withdraws himself from remembrance of (Allah) Most Gracious We appoint for him an evil one to be an intimate companion to him.
column3: Zandondo nan gae le izhe ke pipa Soko lugwa nan Yi ga shaitan laa pa ma beu yin Uci gaazhe eya manciu.

column2: Such (evil ones) really hinder them from the Path but they think that they are being guided aright!Akika ma shaitanzhi ga'a kan eko guruzhi yinda acia fe le ye ke eko bawu bo a kpeo nan.
At length when (such a one) comes to Us he says (to his evil companion): "Would that between me and thee were the distance of East and West!" Ah! evil is the companion (indeed)!
column3: Har da lokaci nan zaguba'aba a be be eba Yi nan za wuncin cia gan gan: Kasa re da' aci gan kpikpe-ya dan tsakanimi bo be wyo yin ke tsakani eyi lazhin be eyilozun'y nan (wun'a ba mi gan) akika eya dede wyo yio.

column2: At length when (such a one) comes to Us he says (to his evil companion): "Would that between me and thee were the distance of East and West!" Ah! evil is the companion (indeed)!
column3: Har da lokaci nan zaguba'aba a be be eba Yi nan za wuncin cia gan gan: Kasa re da' aci gan kpikpe-ya dan tsakanimi bo be wyo yin ke tsakani eyi lazhin be eyilozun'y nan (wun'a ba mi gan) akika eya dede wyo yio.

column2: When ye have done wrong it will avail you nothing that Day that ye shall be partners in Punishment!
column3: (Uzuri nan nan) wun'a jin ye anfani yinnaa ebo nan ye yea eti tacin yezhi jin zwalunci (dagan izhe boa ni). Akika azaba gabo yea fi gannio.

column2: Canst thou then make the deaf to hear or give direction to the blind or to such as (wander) in manifest error
column3: Ngba wyo la tukpa tenci wo gan wo Kashi wyo la ye bonci leba ye wo To za nan gaafe dan mini egbin nan a tula nan (ngba wyo la'u ke eko wo)

column2: Even if We take thee away We shall be sure to exact retribution from them
column3: Uma ga bea fe gan Yia rayi wye gwo akika Yigaa wogbata.

column2: Even if We take thee away We shall be sure to exact retribution from them
column3: Uma ga bea fe gan Yia rayi wye gwo akika Yigaa wogbata.

column2: Or We shall show thee that (accomplished) which We have promised them: for verily We shall prevail over them.
column3: Ko ma Yi ga (azaba) nan Yie jin'a alkawali nan laa wu wye akika yi de kagbo eti yandondo.

column2: So hold thou fast to the Revelation sent down to thee; verily thou art on a Straight Way.
column3: A gwa sun wahyi nantso Yi la ya wyo nan akika wyo ta eti eko gboro.

column2: The (Qur´an) is indeed the message for thee and for thy people; and soon shall ye (all) be brought to account.Akika ma (Alkuranu) cinwan uyio ya wye to jamaa yan wyo zhi bele yin ma a gbin'e gan (eti tswitswa yan hakkiuzhio).
And question thou our messengers whom We sent before thee; did We appoint any deities other than (Allah) Most Gracious to be worshipped
column3: Wyo mao gbin Tuci nanzhi Yi tun-tun shi wyodzo nan gan ngba Yila Tsoci ndoci cici nan alittazhi a jin bauta ya baci Soko ALRAHMANUO nan

column2: We did send Moses aforetime with Our Signs to Pharaoh and his Chiefs: He said "I am a messenger of the Lord of the Worlds."
column3: Akika Yi tun Musa tun be aya Yizhi lo eba Fir'auna be jamaa yan'u zhiy Uci gan: Akika mi Tuci mi yio dagan eba Tsoci nae kpa alittazhi kpata nao.

column2: We did send Moses aforetime with Our Signs to Pharaoh and his Chiefs: He said "I am a messenger of the Lord of the Worlds."
column3: Akika Yi tun Musa tun be aya Yizhi lo eba Fir'auna be jamaa yan'u zhiy Uci gan: Akika mi Tuci mi yio dagan eba Tsoci nae kpa alittazhi kpata nao.

column2: We showed them Sign after Sign each greater than its fellow and We seized them with Punishment in order that they might turn (to Us).
column3: Yi mae la aya wu'aa sai de nan ga lekpan gan yan payin nan. Yi cia wan be azabae ebo a debaa dazhin eko.

column2: And they said "O thou sorcerer! Invoke thy Lord for us according to His covenant with thee; for we shall truly accept guidance."
column3: Aci gan: Ya wye eyan manci ba aduwa be Tsoci wyo yin U to bo wahyi nan ujin ya wye nao(ula azaba u'la'u keu'ya bo'u ya yi) akika yi ga'ke eko.

column2: But when We removed the Penalty from them behold they broke their word.
column3: Kamina Yi bea azaba la ke yabo ya'a nan afe'lo alkawali ya.

column2: And Pharaoh proclaimed among his people saying: "O my people! Does not the dominion of Egypt belong to me (witness) these streams flowing underneath my (palace) What! see ye not then
column3: Fir'auna ci ya 'mi dan tacin jamaa yan'uzhio u gan: Ya ye jama'a yan mizhi ngba ujni mi ga wun mulki yan Misra'a to edu nanzhie je dan tako mi bo naa. Kashi ye leba ye lea

column2: "Am I not better than this (Moses) who is a contemptible wretch and can scarcely express himself clearly
column3: Kashi mi gye gan eza gba gbangi nan na'a zanan kaa bayani u jin woa naa

column2: "Then why are not gold bracelets bestowed on him or (why) come (not) with him angels accompanying him in procession"
column3: Ki'iyla aci cin dukiya yan zinariyazhi ya wun'a yin'o Ki'y ma la malaikazhi la mi tu'u zunma boa yin'o

column2: Thus did he make fools of his people and they obeyed him: truly were they a people rebellious (against Allah).
column3: Uci dzo dzo be ankali yan jama'a yan'uzhi a tso cia mi tu'u akika a fe jamaa nanzhiy a tula be lefi Sokoe nan.

column2: When at length they provoked Us We exacted retribution from them and We drowned them all.
column3: Lokaci nan abea yi ku tso nan Yicia wan be azabae Yicia jin hallaka fi nuwan'o bae nio.Surah 43:56   And We made them (a people) of the Past and an Example to later ages.Yi cia la fe etanzhi nanzhia shidzo nan a mafe misali ya eza zunmazhi.

column2: When (Jesus) the son of Mary is held up as an example behold thy people raise a clamour thereat (in ridicule)!
column3: Kami nan ajin misali ya'be (Isae) egi Maryamae nan Kanga jam'a yan wyozhi cia pan ya ke eko lugwa.

column2: And they say "Are our gods best or he" This they set forth to thee only by way of disputation: yea they are a contentious people.
column3: Aci gan: Ngba kuti yizhi tsa gan'o kashi (Isa) E ' la misali la be ebo emigbo akika jamaazhi ayio nanzhiy ye bo ewu-sun nan.

column2: He was no more than a servant: We granted Our favour to him and We made him an example to the Children of Israel.
column3: Isa de U fea sai de wuzhi nan yi twarya ni'ima ya nan Yiciu la'a fe misali ya Banu Israilazhi.

column2: And if it were Our Will We could make angels from amongst you succeeding each other on the earth.
column3: U ma ga bayi ba da' yi ga Malaikazhi la'a san ye gwa aci ga she bandondo mini kin bo.

column2: And if it were Our Will We could make angels from amongst you succeeding each other on the earth.
column3: U ma ga bayi ba da' yi ga Malaikazhi la'a san ye gwa aci ga she bandondo mini kin bo.Surah 43:61         And (Jesus) shall be a Sign (for the coming of) the Hour (of Judgment): therefore have no doubt about the (Hour) but follow ye Me: this is a Straight Way.Akika ma alama uyio yan tsonba alkiyami ega jin kelo kezhin ma ye'a emi tu mi nan nan ga yi eko nantso yi gboro nao.

column2: Let not the Evil One hinder you: for he is to you an enemy avowed.
column3: Ye mae ga lugwa shaitan tso tangi ya ye ma akika makiri ye uyio yan gbangba.

column2: When Jesus came with Clear Signs he said: "Now have I come to you with Wisdom and in order to make clear to you some of the (points) on which ye dispute: therefore fear Allah and obey me.
column3: Kaminan Isa be beya be bayanizhiy nan U gan: Akika mi be ya ye be hikimae ebo ma min jin bayanin ya ye eti yan nanzhiy ye ce dozhi leba etiubo nan. Ye de sundan Soko ye mae la' mie tu mi.

column2: "For Allah He is my Lord and your Lord: so worship ye Him: this is a Straight Way."
column3: Akika Soko ga yi Tsoci mi yin'o to yan yetso ejin bauta ya'u nan nan ga yi eko nantso yi gboro nao.

column2: But sects from among themselves fell into disagreement: then woe to the wrong-doers from the Penalty of a Grievous Day!
column3: Enan ena'azhi cia ce leba be dozhi akika azaba robonkpe wun'ajin tabbat ya azwamizhi yan azaba yan fo wuncin nan yi titanci nan.

column2: Do they only wait for the Hour - that it should come on them all of a sudden while they perceive not
column3: Kashi a zhi bo zhi e tuye nan alkiyamia be dzun fia kamina a kpa yetua nan

column2: Friends on that day will be foes one to another- except the Righteous.
column3: Ekun dondo masoyizhi fo wuncin agaazhe makiri dozhi sai de masoyi nan zhie tswa Soko nan.

column2: My devotees! no fear shall be on you that Day nor shall ye grieve-
column3: Ya ye wuzhi Mizhi dansun ndondo danbo ya ye yinna'a ye maa le yangban yin ye'a.

column2: (Being) those who have believed in Our Signs and bowed (their wills to Ours) in Islam.(A ga yi) za nanzhia imani jin be aya Yizhi nao acia fe Musulumi wangi nao.
Enter ye the Garden ye and your wives in (beauty and) rejoicing.
column3: (A' gan ya' foga gan): E gandan Aljannao to ye to yinmie zhi akika a ga ye fa yangban yin'nan.

column2: To them will be passed round dishes and goblets of gold: there will be there all that the souls could desire all that their ayes could delight in: and ye shall abide therein (for eye).
column3: A' fe maa kezhe be evozhi na'ajin be zinariy nan to kopuzhi yandondo na ma rayie wa nan fi bo to yannan eye ga leye wun'a wo ma nan. Ye maa fi mini'ubo fi tutun yin.

column2: Such will be the Garden of which ye are made heirs for your (good) deeds (in life).
column3: Aljanna wuncin a gi'u gun gi ya ye ebo iri etun wangizhi nanzhi ye fe lo nao.

column2: Such will be the Garden of which ye are made heirs for your (good) deeds (in life).
column3: Aljanna wuncin a gi'u gun gi ya ye ebo iri etun wangizhi nanzhi ye fe lo nao.

column2: Ye shall have therein abundance of fruit from which ye shall have satisfaction.
column3: Yangici mari-marizhi fi bo ya ye dokun nanzhiy yea fe gi nan.

column2: The sinners will be in the Punishment of Hell to dwell therein (for aye):
column3: Akika le fi jinci zhi a fi mini azaba jahannamao tutun yin.

column2: Nowise will the (Punishment) be lightened for them and in despair will they be there overwhelmed.
column3: A'to gban ya (yan azaba'a) a maa kara dzun tinya boa.

column2: Nowise shall We be unjust to them: but it is they who have been unjust themselves.
column3: Yi man jin'a zwaluncia akika atso tsa yi za nanzhiy jin eti tacin'a zwalunci nao.

column2: They will cry: "O Malik! would that thy Lord put an end to us!" He will say "Nay but ye shall abide!"
column3: Acia yi kabara gan: Gan ya Tsoci wye u la yi yiu wu gancin Ucia gan'a gan: Akika ye ba ga bo yea fi tutun yin'o.

column2: Verily We have brought the Truth to you: but most of you have a hatred for Truth.
column3: Akika Yi be ya ye be gaskiyae (Kami nan ye fi izheo nan) ammade ekun dondo ye zhi ye na gaskiya vo.

column1: Surah 43:79    What! have they settled some plan (among themselves) But it is We Who settle things.
column2: Kashi a yi be shiri y
column3: an makirinci ndociy yi Akika ka yitso ma yi be shiriy.

column2: Or do they think that We hear not their secrets and their private counsels Indeed (We do) and Our messengers are by them to record.
column3: Kashi a fe kpaye kpa gan yi wo asiri nanzhiy afe pa naa to egan swiswoci nanzhi afe gan naa Ujin acin'a ngan Tuci Yizhi (Malaikazhi) danbo nanzhie ka etun nanzhiy lo kpata nan.

column2: Say: "If (Allah) Most Gracious had a son I would be the first to worship."
column3: Gan gan: Da'acigan Soko ALRAHMANU wun'a de egi de akika mi ga yi za mafari yan za nanzhie jin bauta yau nao.

column2: Glory to the Lord of the heavens and the earth the Lord of the Throne (of Authority)! (He is free) from the things they attribute (to him)!
column3: Lili kpata ajin tabbata ya Etsu nae kpa sanmazhi to kin nan Etsu yan Alarashi akika wun'a li ke yannanzhiy e la jiu ye nan lugwa.

column2: So leave them to babble and play (with vanities) until they meet that Day of theirs which they have been promised.
column3: A'lugwa'a a fea dzo bazhia za a maa fea dzodzo a za har da lokaci nan a be gun be efo nan Soko ajin'a alkawali nae.

column2: It is He Who is Allah in heaven and Allah on earth; and He is full of Wisdom and Knowledge.
column3: Wun ga yi Soko dan mini sanmazhi bo Wunga ma yi Soko dan kin bo Etsu hikima uyio Etsu kpikpe uyio.

column2: And blessed is He to Whom belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth and all between them: with Him is the Knowledge of the Hour (of Judgment): and to Him shall ye be brought back.
column3: Elatu wun'ajin tabbata ya Etsu nan wun mulki yan sanmazhi to kin nan to yannazhi fi tsakaniabo nan. Kpikpe yan alkiyami mabeu yin Udan'o kpatae ma eba'u ga ye'a kezhe lo.

column2: And those whom they invoke besides Allah have no power of intercession;- only he who bears witness to the Truth and they know (him).
column3: Za nan zhiymae jin bauta ya baci'u bo nan a de mulki yan egwa tan zandondoa sai de za nanzhi ga jin ri be (adini) gaskiyae nan a ma yi be kpikpe nan.

column2: If thou ask them who created them they will certainly say Allah: How then are they deluded away (from the Truth)
column3: Wallahi wyo ma ga gbin'agan gan: Ngba ziy jin alitta ye yeo A' gan gan: Soko to beibo e kan (yangban zhi) lo beo

column2: (Allah has knowledge) of the (Prophet´s) cry "O my Lord! Truly these are people who will not believe!"
column3: Ucia gan gan: Ya wye Tsoci akika za nan nan zhiy jama'azhi ayio nanzhi jin imania nan.

column2: (Allah has knowledge) of the (Prophet´s) cry "O my Lord! Truly these are people who will not believe!"
column3: Ucia gan gan: Ya wye Tsoci akika za nan nan zhiy jama'azhi ayio nanzhi jin imania nan.

column2: But turn away from them and say "Peace!" But soon shall they know!
column3: To a dzun gan'abo wyo mao gan gan: Midea hakkin cin etiebo ani. Bele yin man a'be de kpikpe.

column2: Ha-Mim.
column3: HEU MIM.

column2: By the Book that makes things clear;-
column3: Sokoe zhi kuti be Alkuranuy Litafi naa tula nan.

column2: We sent it down during a Blessed Night: for We (ever) wish to warn (against Evil).
column3: Akika Yi cin'u cin be dan mini yeshi yan albarkao. Akika Yi yia fe za nanzhie jin gangba nan.

column2: In the (Night) is made distinct every affair of wisdom
column3: Miniubo gabo e kpe alamariko ndondo yeo.

column2: By command from Our Presence. For We (ever) send (revelations)
column3: Alamari uyio dagan eba Yibo akika Yi Yia fe za nanzhie tun Tucizhi tun nan.

column2: As Mercy from thy Lord: for He hears and knows (all things);
column3: Yegun ma uyio dagan eba Tsoci wyo bo Etsu uyio nae wo gan nan Etsu nan yi be kpikpe nan.

column2: The Lord of the heavens and the earth and all between them if ye (but) have an assured faith.
column3: Wun ga yi Etsu nae kpa sanmazhi to kin to yan nanzhi fi tsakaniabo nao wun'a yi eza gaskiyazhi ye yio nan.

column2: There is no god but He: It is He Who gives life and gives death- The Lord and Cherisher to you and your earliest ancestors.
column3: Ade yandoci nan ajin bauta ya naa sai wun'y wun gae dan yan rayio wun ga mae wu rayio. Wun ga yi Tsoci ye yeo to yan yanmanci yezhi nanzhiy shidzo nao.

column2: Yet they play about in doubt.
column3: Akika a dea fe dan mini kelo kezhin'o acie dzodzo.Surah 44:10     Then watch thou for the Day that the sky will bring forth a kind of smoke (or mist) plainly visibleFe tuye yan efo nan sanmaa fe'la enanwuzhi tinya nan enanwu naa tula nan.

column2: Enveloping the people: this will be a Penalty Grievous.
column3: Uci ga' rukpe zawangi zhi nan nan ga yi efo azaba nan tan nao.

column2: (They will say:) "Our Lord! remove the Penalty from us for we do really believe!"
column3: Ya' wye Tsoci yi a azaba la ke ya bo ya yi akika yi ga afe Muminizhi.

column2: How shall the message be (effectual) for them seeing that an Messenger explaining things clearly has (already) come to them-
column3: Biybo anfani yan sinsantu dan ya'ao (alkiyami bo) Ala'li ma Tucizhi be ya' izheo be bayanizhi ( a ma ya gaskiya'a).

column2: Yet they turn away from him and say: "Tutored (by others) a man possessed!"Ade'a zunma zhetau aci gan egi makanta uyio Uma ke yi ilanduci.
We shall indeed remove the Penalty for a while (but) truly ye will revert (to your ways).
column3: Akika Yia jin sauki azaba yaa degi akika ye yea kezhe da eko yan etun dedezhi be.

column2: We shall indeed remove the Penalty for a while (but) truly ye will revert (to your ways).
column3: Akika Yia jin sauki azaba yaa degi akika ye yea kezhe da eko yan etun dedezhi be.

column2: One day We shall seize you with a mighty onslaught: We will indeed (then) exact Retribution!
column3: Fo nan Yi ga' wan zazhi kpantsukuy nan akika fo wuncin Yi ga kafirizhi jin azaba.

column2: Saying: "Restore to me the Servants of Allah: I am to you an messenger worthy of all trust;
column3: Uci gan: Ye'a wuzhi Soko zhi ku be ya mi akika Tuci mi yio ya ye na ma yi eza amana nan.

column2: "And be not arrogant as against Allah: for I come to you with authority manifest.
column3: Ye mae ga la'ti dan fin'o ya Soko ma akika mia be ya ye be hujjazhiy nanzhia tula nan.

column2: "For me I have sought safety with my Lord and your Lord against your injuring me.
column3: Mi mae ba etswa be Tsoci mi yin to yan ye ebo eyan na ye'abe ce mi nan.

column2: (But they were aggressive:) then he cried to his Lord: "These are indeed a people given to sin."
column3: Uci ba aduwalo eba Tsociu gan: Akika za nan nazhiy eza lefizhi ayio.

column2: "If ye believe me not at least keep yourselves away from me."
column3: Kagan ye ma'a ya gaskiya be mi yin'a to yea dzun gan mi bo.

column2: (But they were aggressive:) then he cried to his Lord: "These are indeed a people given to sin."
column3: Uci ba aduwalo eba Tsociu gan: Akika za nan nazhiy eza lefizhi ayio.

column2: (The reply came:) "March forth with My Servants by night: for ye are sure to be pursued.
column3: Soko ci gan'u gan: A' ezan la tinya to wye to wuzhi mizhi be yshiy akika (za dede nan nan zhiy) aga emi tu ye ye mae la edue lugwa eti kendoe uyi nan akika jamaa yan kafirizhi eza hallakazhi ayio.

column2: "And leave the sea as a furrow (divided): for they are a host (destined) to be drowned."
column3: Ye mae la edue lugwa eti kendoe uyi nan akika jamaa yan kafirizhi eza hallakazhi ayio.

column2: How many were the gardens and springs they left behind
column3: Ekun dondoa cia tinya a latiazhi to -- ga'a zhi lugwa.

column2: And corn-fields and noble buildings
column3: To yan nanzhi a dzo kpata nan to emi ko nanzhi a tu nan.

column2: And wealth (and conveniences of life) wherein they had taken such delight!
column3: To eyan emawoazhi nanzhiy afe wo ma fi nan.

column2: Thus (was their end)! And We made other people inherit (those things)!
column3: Acinga ga u yio Yi cia laa gi gun ya zandocizhi ka'yin.

column2: And neither heaven nor earth shed a tear over them: nor were they given a respite (again).
column3: To sanma to kin ma a tigi ya hallaka'a  a ma fe za nanzhiy a tuye gan ko a jin tuba naa.

column2: We did deliver aforetime the Children of Israel from humiliating Punishment
column3: Akika yi ya Banu Israilazhi wadzun dagan azaba yan zunye sun'o.

column2: Inflicted by Pharaoh for he was arrogant (even) among inordinate transgressors.
column3: Dagan egun Fir'aunao akika eza uyio nae la ti dan fin'o nan u ma yi za nae nyin yan ta eti kin bo nan.

column2: And We chose them aforetime above the nations knowingly
column3: Akika yi ga tsa' be kpikpe Yi yin ta eti alittazhi kpatao.

column2: And granted them Signs in which there was a manifest trial
column3: Yima la ayazhi be yaa nanzhi miniabo mima cinlezhi fi bo nan.

column2: As to these (Quraish) they say forsooth:
column3: Akika za nannazhiy ajin afe da egan gan gan:

column2: "There is nothing beyond our first death and we shall not be raised again.
column3: Yandondo danboa tsutsu de zunni uyio a maa ku yi yekan alkiyami boa.

column2: "Then bring (back) our forefathers if what ye say is true!"
column3: Wun'ayi gaskiya ga yetao eku yamanci yizhi tinya dagan kabariazhio (yi le ye).

column2: What! Are they better than the people of Tubba and those who were before them We destroyed them because they were guilty of sin.
column3: Ngba a ga yi eza alherio kashi jamaa yan Tubbauzhi To zananzhi shiadzo kpata nan Yia jin hallaka. Akika aafe lefi jin ci zhi.

column2: We created not the heavens the earth and all between them merely in (idle) sport:
column3: Yi ma jin sanmazhi to kin to yan nanzhi fi tsakaniabo nan ebo edzo boa.

column2: We created them not except for just ends: but most of them do not understand.
column3: Yi jin'a jin'a sai de ebo Yi tso gaskiya amma'de ekun dondo zawangizhi a kpea.

column2: Verily the Day of sorting out is the time appointed for all of them-
column3: Akika efo hukunci ba uga yi lokacia baeni bo.

column2: The Day when no protector can avail his client in aught and no help can they receive
column3: Efo nan eya wun'a kunke be yandondoe ya eya wun'a nan ama'a jin dozhi taimako woa.

column2: Except such as receive Allah´s Mercy: for He is Exalted in Might Most Merciful.
column3: sai de zana Sokoa gun yeu nan akika Etsu zankpe uyio Etsu yegun uyio.

column2: Verily the tree of Zaqqum
column3: Akika cigban yan zakkumu.

column2: Will be the food of the Sinful-
column3: Yangici lefi jincizhi uyio.

column2: Like molten brass; it will boil in their insides.
column3: Uyi ke yankpa zunzunci nan wun'a fe gbin fe sa fi gbakozhio.Surah 44:46 Like the boiling of scalding water.Ke si sa yan nuwan yipa nan.

column2: (A voice will cry: "Seize ye him and drag him into the midst of the Blazing Fire!
column3: Yea egwa sun'u kpantsukuy ye mae gba'u yecie la wun'e ce dan tacin enan yan jahimuo.

column2: "Then pour over his head the Penalty of Boiling Water
column3: Gancin ye cie da nuwan yipa yan azaba gwae be kpea etiazhio.Surah 44:49    "Taste thou (this)! Truly wast thou mighty full of honour!Fe fin azaba ngan wyo gan wyo ga yi za wanciko naa zankpe nao

column2: "Truly this is what ye used to doubt!"
column3: Nan nan ga yi yan nan ye fe jin kelo kezhin be yin nao.

column2: As to the Righteous (they will be) in a position of Security
column3: Akika Muminizhi a fi mini emi yan amincio.

column2: Among Gardens and Springs;
column3: Mini Aljannazhio nan zhiy nuwanzhie je fi ta'koabo nan.

column2: Dressed in fine silk and in rich brocade they will face each other;
column3: Aci ga ewo yan silikizhi fan acia fe ban nan aciga fe dun a eye zhe wu dozhi.

column2: So; and We shall join them to fair women with beautiful big and lustrous eyes.
column3: Acinga gao Yici jin yawozhi yaa be ynzagi Aljannazhiy nanzhi eye kosun'azhie bannan nan.

column2: There can they call for every kind of fruit in peace and security;
column3: Acia fe wa gigi yan yangici mari-marizhi a ma' fi bo be aminciy.

column2: Nor will they there taste Death except the first death; and He will preserve them from the Penalty of the Blazing Fire
column3: -A'kara le tsu tsu ye bea baci yan mafari boa. Soko ma gaa tswa be azaba yan enan jahimuy.

column2: As a Bounty from thy Lord! that will be the supreme achievement!
column3: Nan nan daraja uyio dagan eba Tsoci wyo bo wuncin ga ma yi rabo nan wancin nao.

column2: Verily We have made this (Qur´an) easy in thy tongue in order that they may give heed.
column3: Akika yi ga (Alkuranu) fan be gintara wyo yin ebo adeba a la san'a tu.

column2: So wait thou and watch; for they (too) are waiting.
column3: Fe tu hallaka'ye akika (kafirizhio tso) a dan yetu yan hallaka wyo bo

column2: Ha-Mim.
column3: HEU MIM

column2: The revelation of the Book is from Allah the Exalted in Power Full of Wisdom.
column3: Cin cin yan Litafi nan nan dagan eba Soko bo u fe beo Etsu zankpe Etsu hikima.

column2: Verily in the heavens and the earth are Signs for those who believe.
column3: Akika mini sanmazhio to kin ayazhi danbo ya Muminizhi.

column2: And in the creation of yourselves and the fact that animals are scattered (through the earth) are Signs for those of assured Faith.
column3: To mini alitta ye zhio to mini dabba nanzhiy ga kpe kinbo nan ayazhi danbo ya jamaa nanzhia gaskiya ya nan.

column2: And in the alternation of Night and Day and the fact that Allah sends down Sustenance from the sky and revives therewith the earth after its death and in the change of the winds- are Signs for those that are wise.
column3: To egwasan yan yeshi be batin'y to arziki nanzhiy Soko cin beyn dagan sanmao nan Ucia kin tsutsuci dan rayi nan to mini efe nae ti ucie je za nan kpata ayazhi danbo ya jama'a nanzhi ga yi be ankaliy nan.

column2: Such are the Signs of Allah which We rehearse to thee in Truth; then in what exposition will they believe after (rejecting) Allah and His Signs
column3: Wuncinzhi kpata ayazhi ayio yan Soko Yi mae gba'agba ya wye be gaskiyae. Ngba zunma yan Soko be ayauzhiy (ka gan ye ya gaskiya be'a yin'a) egan kici a ya gaskiya be yin beo

column2: Woe to each sinful dealer in Falsehoods:
column3: Azaba yan robonkpe wun'ajin tabbata ya zaeni ndondo na gae zun ganmanan tsuru nan u ma yi lefi jinci nan.

column2: He hears the Signs of Allah rehearsed to him yet is obstinate and lofty as if he had not heard them: then announce to him a Penalty Grievous!
column3: Wun'e wo nae gba aya Soko zhi ya'u nan gancin uci ga' tu-ta eti etikagbo ufe jin bojin ke zanae wo gan'a nan e yau labari be azabae nan yi tintanci nan.

column2: And when he learns something of Our Signs he takes them in jest: for such there will be a humiliating Penalty.
column3: Uma ga kpikpe ndoci de dagan mini aya Yizhio' wun'u la eyan edzo akika zawuncinzhi azaba yan zunyesun u ga'jin tabbata ya'a.

column2: In front of them is Hell: and of no profit to them is anything they may have earned nor any protectors they may have taken to themselves besides Allah: for them is a tremendous Penalty.
column3: Enan yan jahannama danbo e ka'a yan nanzhiy ma a de kuyekan izheo nan wun'a kunke yaa eko ndondo boa to zandocizhi nanzhiy a la egwasun ke ndakatazhi nan( a' kunke ya' eko ndondo boa) azaba na ma wancin nan wun'ajin tabbata ya'a.

column2: This is (true) Guidance and for those who reject the Signs of their Lord is a grievous Penalty of abomination.
column3: (Alkuranu) Nan nan bawu uyio za nanzhiy ma ajin kafirinci be aya Tsocia zhiy nan azaba nan de nangban uma tan nan wun'ajin tabbata yaa.

column2: It is Allah Who has subjected the sea to you that ships may sail through it by His command that ye may seek of his Bounty and that ye may be grateful.
column3: Soko ga yi Etsu nan jin eduzhi foro ya yeo nao ebo eya nuwanzhi a fea dazan'ata etiubo be kagbo yan Sokoe ebo ma ye fe wa arziki yan Sokoe za be wuncin'y ma ye lae fe za nanzhie jin yebo ya Soko nan.

column2: It is Allah Who has subjected the sea to you that ships may sail through it by His command that ye may seek of his Bounty and that ye may be grateful.
column3: Soko ga yi Etsu nan jin eduzhi foro ya yeo nao ebo eya nuwanzhi a fea dazan'ata etiubo be kagbo yan Sokoe ebo ma ye fe wa arziki yan Sokoe za be wuncin'y ma ye lae fe za nanzhie jin yebo ya Soko nan.

column2: And He has subjected to you as from Him all that is in the heavens and on earth: Behold in that are Signs indeed for those who reflect.
column3: U ma'a yannanzhiy fi sanmazhio nan to nan zhiy fi kinbo nan jin foro ya ye baenio dagan nko u bo akika mini wuncinzhio a'yazhi danbo ya za nanzhiy gae kpaye nan.

column2: Tell those who believe to forgive those who do not look forward to the Days of Allah: It is for Him to recompense (for good or ill) each People according to what they have earned.
column3: Gan ya za nanzhia imani jin nan gan a'fa be za nanzhiy e jin kauna yan egagba wangi dan efo yan Soko (zhi) boa nan. Ebo nan Soko ga zawangizhi wo gbata be iri etun nanzhiy a ga lo nan.

column2: If any one does a righteous deed it ensures to the benefit of his own soul; if he does evil it works against (his own soul). In the end will ye (all) be brought back to your Lord.
column3: Za nan ga lo etun wangi nan ebo tiu bo za na ma ga lo 'tun dede nan wuntso ga wun'a wu yan yao gancin eba Tsoci ye ga yea kezhe lo.

column2: We did aforetime grant to the Children of Israel the Book the Power of Command and Prophethood; We gave them for Sustenance things good and pure; and We favoured them above the nations.
column3: Akika Yi ya Litafi to hukunci to Annabci la'a ya Banu Israilazhi Yi ma yaa arziki wangizhi Yi maa ya daraja ta eti alittazhio.

column2: And We granted them Clear Signs in affairs (of Religion): it was only after knowledge had been granted to them that they fell into schisms through insolent envy among themselves. Verily thy Lord will judge between them on the Day of Judgment as to those matters in which they set up differences.
column3: Yi ma la hujjazhi be ya'a nanzhia tula nan eti alamari adinio. Ama ce dozhi leba'a sai de baci nan kpikpe da be ya'a nan ebo nanvo (hassada) nan dan tsakaniabo be dozhiy nan. Akika Tsoci wye ga hukunci ba tsakaniabo efo alkiyamiy eti yan nanzhie la ce le ba be dozhiy nan.

column2: Then We put thee on the (right) Way of Religion: so follow thou that (Way) and follow not the desires of those who know not.
column3: Gancin Yicia wyo la'a ta eti ekp yan sharia yan alamari adinio ebo acin'o a'mi tu'u wyo mao ga la mi tu etun yangban yan za nanzhi de kpikpea na ma.

column2: They will be of no use to thee in the sight of Allah: it is only Wrong-doers (that stand as) protectors one to another: but Allah is the Protector of the Righteous.
column3: Akika a kunke ya wye wo be yandondoe naa be dagan eba Soko naa akika ma azwalumizhi masoyizhi ayi be dozhi yin'o Soko ga ma yi Ndakata yan za nanzhie sundan'u nao.

column2: These are clear evidences to men and a Guidance and Mercy to those of assured Faith.
column3: Alkur'anu nan nan hujjazhi uyi ya zawangizhio ganni be bawu'y be yegun'y ya jama'a nanzhia gaskiya ya nao.

column2: What! Do those who seek after evil ways think that We shall hold them equal with those who believe and do righteous deeds- that equal will be their life and their death Ill is the judgment that they make.
column3: Kashi za nanzhie lo tun dede nan e kpayekpa gan Yi la'a ya afe yeni be za nanzhia imani jin amae lo tun guru nan a laazhe yeni to eba edunfe izheo be eba ajaliy (Wun'ayi acinga ga e kpa yeo) akika hukunci wuncin wun'a biye.

column2: Allah created the heavens and the earth for just ends and in order that each soul may find the recompense of what it has earned and none of them be wronged.
column3: Soko ma alitta yan sanmazhi to kin jin be gaskiyae. Ebo ma a'ga zandondo gba be iri etun nan u ga lo nae ama'a jin'a zwaluncia.

column2: Then seest thou such a one as takes as his god his own vain desire Allah has knowing (him as such) left him astray and sealed his hearing and his heart (and understanding) and put a cover on his sight. Who then will guide him after Allah (has withdrawn Guidance) Will ye not then receive admonition
column3: Ngba wyo le za naa etun yangban'u la tsociunan yea Soko ciu gbin eti kpikpeo U ciu tukpa to yangban'ute Ucia kpere la'a kpe'u ba ye leu bo. Ngba ziy'a wu za nan nan ba wo baci Soko bo Kashi ye kpa ye kpaa

column2: And they say: "What is there but our life in this world We shall die and we live and nothing but time can destroy us." But of that they have no knowledge: they merely conjecture:
column3: Aci gan: yandondo danboa izhe le tsa'u yio yi gaatsu yi ma gaa ye rayi de yandondo ma'ajin-yi hallaka sai de za'mam. Ade kpikpe yan akika eti wuncin boa ama de yan nan e jin na'a sai de zato.

column2: And when Our Clear Signs are rehearsed to them their argument is nothing but this: They say "Bring (back) our forefathers if what ye say is true!"
column3: Kamina ma a gae gba aya yi zhi yaa be bayaniy nan e de hujja ndondoa sai de a gan gan: E la yanmanci yizhi nanzhia tsuani na be yi le'a ye wun'ayi gaskiya ye tao nan.

column2: Say: "It is Allah Who gives you life then gives you death; then He will gather you together for the Day of Judgment about which there is no doubt": But most men do not understand.
column3: Gan gan: Soko gae dan rayi umaa kezhe a ye wu gancin uci gae ku yekan efo alkiyamiy kelo kezhin ndondo danboa amma'de ekun dondo zawangizhi akpea.

column2: To Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth and the Day that the Hour of Judgment is established- that Day will the dealers in Falsehood perish!
column3: Akika Soko ga wun mulki yan sanmazhi to kin bo efo nan alkiyami gaa nan nan fo wuncin ganmana zuncizhi ga'ajin asara.

column2: And thou wilt see every sect bowing the knee: Every sect will be called to its Record: "This Day shall ye be recompensed for all that ye did!
column3: Wyo ma'ale al'umma ndondo ye ci kurao (ta eti vokpaa bo). Acia yi alumma ndondo lo eba Litafiu. Yinnan'nnan aa'ga ye gba yan etun nanzhiy ye fe lo (izheo) nan.

column2: "This Our Record speaks about you with truth: For We were wont to put on Record all that ye did."
column3: Nan nan Litafi Yi uyio wun'e gan gan eti yebo be gaskiyae akika Yi yaafe yi fe ka etun nanzhiy ye fe lo nan.

column2: Then as to those who believed and did righteous deeds their Lord will admit them to His Mercy that will be the achievement for all to see.
column3: Ammade za nanzhi ga imani jin acie lo tun wangizhi nan Tsoci'a gaala gandan mini yegun'u bo wuncin ga yi rabo nan latu nao.

column2: But as to those who rejected Allah (to them will be said): "Were not Our Signs rehearsed to you But ye were arrogant and were a people given to sin!
column3: Za nanzhiy ma ajin kafirinci nan (a gan'a gan:) Asa afe gba aya Mizhi ya ye yea Ye cia gbotika ye cia fe za nanzhie jin lefi (kpe kinbo) nan.

column2: "And when it was said that the promise of Allah was true and that the Hour- there was no doubt about its (coming) ye used to say ´We know not what is the hour: we only think it is an idea and we have no firm assurance.´"
column3: A ma ga gan'a gan: Akika alkawali yan Soko gaskiya uyio alkiyami ma kelo kezhin ndondo danboa Ye gan: Yi kpe yan naotso e ye alkiyami naa yi de ejin zatto jin kawanyin yi ya gaskiya beu yin'a.

column2: Then will appear to them the evil (fruits) of what they did and they will be completely encircled by that which they used to mock at!
column3: Egagba yan etun dede nanzhiy a lo nan cia tula ya'a yannan a fe la a lami nan cia jin tabbata ta etiabo.

column2: It will also be said: "This Day We will forget you as ye forgot the meeting of this Day of yours! and your abode is the Fire and no helpers have ye!
column3: Aci a gan'a gan: Yinnan nan nan Yi ga ye batan kendoe ye tsoa efo gun-gun yan ye be efo alkiyami nan batan nan ezhe kebae ma u ga yi enao ye maade za nanzhia jin'e taimako na'a.

column2: "This because ye used to take the Signs of Allah in jest and the life of the world deceived you:" (From) that Day therefore they shall not be taken out thence nor shall they be received into Grace.
column3: Wuncin mayi ebo nan ye yaa aya Soko zhi la edzo nan edunfe yan izhe cia ye ta yinnannnan a kua tinya enan boa amma lugwa ade uzuri ndondo ta'a.

column2: Then Praise be to Allah Lord of the heavens and Lord of the earth- Lord and Cherisher of all the Worlds!
column3: Yebo kpata ajin tabbata ya Soko Etsu nan yi Tsoci yan sanmazhi to kin nan Etsu nae kpa alittazhi kpata nan.

column2: To Him be glory throughout the heavens and the earth: and He is Exalted in Power Full of Wisdom!
column3: Elatu be kagbo yan baeni maajin tabbata ya Soko dan sanmanzhio to kin bo. Soko ga ma yi etsu zankpeo Etsu nan yi Etsu hikima nan.

column2: Ha-Mim.
column3: Heu-Meem. Harafi guba nna zhi baki zhi ayio yan zhimi larabci. Sisantu ayio ya zaeni ndondo na gae jin kelo-kezhin dan gaskiya bo yan Alkur'anu'o na. Baki iri nna zhi gaala fin dozhi ci jin ALKUR'ANUO alitta sama to kin ma a ga gun'yekan a la sura ko aya nini dozhin yan Alkur'anu bewoa.

column2: The Revelation of the Book is from Allah the Exalted in Power Full of Wisdom.
column3: Litafi nan nan (ALKURANU) e yan cin-cin ci uyio dagan eba Soko na yi ALLAHU nan. Etsu na de zankpe ta eti zandondo nan. Etsu nan yi Egba dan jin jin yandondo nan.

column2: We created not the heavens and the earth and all between them but for just ends and for a Term Appointed: But those who reject Faith turn away from that whereof they are warned.
column3: Yi (Soko) jin alitta sanmazhi to kin to yannazhi fi tacin'azhio nan jin'a sai dai ebo alittazhi a twso gaskiya(yan bauta jin ya Soko gbu'u gi) Yandondo ma yi be iyaka'u yin akika za nanzhi a cin manan bo be Sokoe nan ajin a fe bici ewun-nan yan gaskiya.

column2: Say: "Do ye see what it is ye invoke besides Allah Show me what it is they have created on earth or have they a share in the heavens bring me a book (revealed) before this or any remnant of knowledge (ye may have) if ye are telling the truth!
column3: (Annabi) Gan ya'a gan: Ye la hankali tu yannazhi Ye jin bauta ya ke Soko lugwa naa Yanna a ga kunke be jin jin'u yin dan kinbo na e la wu Min'le ye. Kashi a pama pa be Sokoe eba jin jin be mulki samazhiy E la Litafi ndoci be na tswo ye le ye gan wun'a shi Alkuranu dzo nae ko ma kpikpe yan gaskiya ndoci na ye gae pe tu nan wun'a yi eza gaskiya zhi ye yio nan.

column2: And who is more astray than one who invokes besides Allah such as will not answer him to the Day of Judgment and who (in fact) are unconscious of their call (to them)
column3: Ziy ga fe eza gbingbinci nan a gan za na e jin bawta ya yan ndoci ko za ndoci ke Soko lugwa nao Za wuncin zhi ma a she guri u Ya u wo'a har da fo nan a jin kiyama na'a. Za wuncin zhi ma eye yaci zhi a yio a kpe o tswo gan ejin bawta ya aa.

column2: And when mankind are gathered together (at the Resurrection) they will be hostile to them and reject their worship (altogether)!
column3: Fo na Soko ga alittazhi ku ye kan kpata nan za na zhi ye jin bawta ya izhe o nan ga zhe makiri yezhi a ma ga egwa'zhi wa gan u jin a tun'ye yin jin'a.Surah 46:7             When Our Clear Signs are rehearsed to them the Unbelievers say of the Truth when it comes to them: "This is evident sorcery!"Ka mi nan a gae gba aya yan Yi zhi (AKURANU) ya'a gan ni be bayani yan gaskiya zhi'inan Za nan zhi a cin mana bo Sokoe na a jin a fe gan gan dede eti gaskiya nan be yaa naa. A " jin a gan gan : "Alkuranu nanan eyanma tsa u yio.

column2: Or do they say "He has forged it" Say: "Had I forged it then can ye obtain no single (blessing) for me from Allah. He knows best of that whereof ye talk (so glibly)! Enough is He for a witness between me and you! And he is Oft-Forgiving Most Merciful."
column3: Kashi (za nan zhi e cin mana bo be Sokoe na) e gan gan:"gan Annabi o tswa ga tswa ALKURANU be ti U yin'o Gan ya'gan:Wun'a yi gan mi tswa'u tswa (ebo yan ndoci o) Ki'I ye a kan gwa'u ya mi wo eba Soko bo Amma'de Soko tswa ga yi Eri naa kunke ya mi tsakani mi bo be ye yin' nao. U ga ma yi Etsu gaafarao. U ga ma yi Etsu yegun-o.

column2: Say: "I am no bringer of new-fangled doctrine among the messengers nor do I know what will be done with me or with you. I follow but that which is revealed to me by inspiration; I am but a Warner open and clear."
column3: Gan (ya'a) gan:Mi jin eza woro mini Tuci zhi bo'a (Tuci Soko zhi be shi mi dzo be iri nan na'e)Mi ma kpe iri hukunci (swiswoci ndoci) nan Soko a be eti Mi tswa to ye tswo naa. Mi ma'e la mi tu yan ndondo'a sai na Soko ga jin wahayin be ya Mi nan. Mi ma yi yan'do'a sai dai Tuci Soko na e jinye gangba eti azaba Soko be bayani nan zhi tu la nan.

column2: Say: "See ye If (this teaching) be from Allah and ye reject it and a witness from among the Children of Israel testifies to its similarity (with earlier scripture) and has believed while ye are arrogant (how unjust ye are!) truly Allah guides not a people unjust."
column3: (Annabi) Gan gan:Ngba U ga be'a tu la gan ALKURANU nan nan eba Soko bo u fe be'o ye ma fe ma fe za nan zhi a jin kafirinci be'u yin na (ki'abe yi e gagba ye efo Alkiyami yin o) Al'hali ma eza wanciko mini ye tswo wun'a eri jin'a ni ke gaskiyau yio nan. Za wuncin maa imani jin be bawu Soko'e Ye ci'a fe za nan zhi e la ti dan fin'o nan. Akika Soko e la jamaa yan azwalumizhi ke ekwo wangi'a.

column2: The Unbelievers say of those who believe: "If (this Message) were a good thing (such men) would not have gone to it first before us!" And seeing that they guide not themselves thereby they will say "this is an (old) falsehood!"
column3: Za nan zhi a jin kafirinci be Soko e nan e gan ya za na zhi a imani jin nan gan: Adini Musulunci wun'a yi alheri u yio wun'a jin eza dozhin Sahabi Annabi zhi tsa a shi'yi dzo lo bo'a. Da gan nan a gwo'u ebo u laufe bawu'u yaa na acia jin afe gan gan: A LKURANU nan nan ganmana u yio na'a jin fo nan.

column2: And before this was the Book of Moses as a guide and a mercy: And this Book confirms (it) in the Arabic tongue; to admonish the unjust and as Glad Tidings to those who do right.
column3: Shidzo be dzo kafi ALKURANU nan Litafi na a cin be ya (Annabi) Musa nan dan bo. Wun ga fe shi'a dzo. U ma'afe yegan (ya za nan zhi a imani jin be'u yin nan). Litafi nan nan (cinwan ci u yio) Wun e wu gwa gaskiya (iri yan litafi Annabi Musa) A ma cin'u cin be zhi mi Larabci ebo u la'u fe gangba'u ya za na U ma'u la'u fe labari yangbanfa ya za nan zhie lo tun wangi zhi nan.

column2: Verily those who say "Our Lord is Allah" and remain firm (on that Path)- on them shall be no fear nor shall they grieve.
column3: Akika za nan zhi'a gan tinya misun'abo gan: Soko ga yi Tsoci yi yio nan a ci ke zhe a ku gikinni nan za wuncin zhi a'le eyan dan sun ndondo ye'a (eba ajalio to kabario to efo kiyama yin'a) a ma yin yangban (ya yan nan zhi a lu gwa fi izheo na'a.) (ebo nan yan nan zhi gan wun cin zhi na u ga Soko a la ga'a o.

column2: Such shall be Companions of the Gardens dwelling therein (for aye): a recompense for their (good) deeds.
column3: Za wuncin zhi a ga yi za mi za mi aljanna zhio a ma fi bo fi tutun yin.Wuncin ma egagba u yio ebo etun nan zhi a fe lo wangi wangi zhi nan.

column2: We have enjoined on man kindness to his parents: In pain did his mother bear him and in pain did she give him birth. The carrying of the (child) to his weaning is (a period of) thirty months. At length when he reaches the age of full strength and attains forty years he says "O my Lord! Grant me that I may be grateful for Thy favour which Thou has bestowed upon me and upon both my parents and that I may work righteousness such as Thou mayest approve; and be gracious to me in my issue. Truly have I turned to Thee and truly do I bow (to Thee) in Islam."
column3: Yi jin zawangi gangba gan: wun'utswa yan manci'u zhi guba'ba U ma'u do kun be jin jin yan bolobolo gan ni be a yin. Ebo nan Nna'U la'u gun ewan'u bo be wahalae U ci ke zhe'u man ganni be wahalae. To ewan to kpikpa nan Nna'u kpa U-nan U yi etswa gbanwo. Her da lokaci nan U ga zhe gbarufu nan har da lokaci nan u ga gun gi ya shi-ba na U gan: Tsoci jin mi foro ebo mi'nlan fe za na e jin yebo yan manan manan na zhi wyo jin ya minan to nan zhi wyo jin ya yanmanci Mi zhi nan Mi ma n lanfe za na e lo tun wangi zhi nazhiwyoa jin yeda be yin na. Wyo ma'ojin bolo ya mi mini zuriya mi zhio. Akika Mi a tubajin mi ma'a fe dan mini za na zhi e ta kpatsun -- foro wyo nao.

column2: Such are they from whom We shall accept the best of their deeds and pass by their ill deeds: (They shall be) among the Companions of the Garden: a promise! of truth which was made to them (in this life).
column3: Za wuncin zhi (nan zhi be siffa wangi nna zhi nan) Yi'a gwo etan wangi nan zhi a ga lo nan. Yi ma'fa be etun dede'a zhi a fi mini egi aljanna zhio wuncin ga yi alkawali gaskiya nan yi jin'a na-o.

column2: But (there is one) who says to his parents "Fie on you! Do ye hold out the promise to me that I shall be raised up even though generations have passed before me (without rising again)" And they two seek Allah´s aid (and rebuke the son): "Woe to thee! Have faith! for the promise of Allah is true." But he says "This is nothing but tales of the ancients!"
column3: Be za na-e ce gan da ba yanmanci'u zhi guba ba nan. (Ka mi na a ga e nan'u wun eti efo kiyama o nan) Ye li mi dan li gan mi ga tinya kabario ala'ali ma eza zhi shi mi dzo lo kabari sarawyin a ma tinya'a. Yanmanci'u zhi ci e wa taimako ya'u be Soko-e alla'wa be o yin a gaskiya ya be Sokoe akika alkawali Soko gaskiya u yio. Wyin egi cie gan gan: egan nnazhi kpata ecin'u yio yan za mafari zhi.

column2: Such are they against whom is proved the sentence among the previous generations of Jinns and men that have passed away; for they will be (utterly) lost.
column3: Egi iri wuncin zhi azaba yan Soko wun'a jin tabbata ta etia bo mini al'umma nan zhi shidzo mini aljani zhio to zawangi zhio nan. Akika a fe za nan zhi a jin asara nan.

column2: And to all are (assigned) degrees according to the deeds which they (have done) and in order that (Allah) may recompense their deeds and no injustice be done to them.
column3: Zandondo ma yi be kingi ba'uyin gwargwado etun na za ndondo lo na Soko ma ga ega gba yan etun zandondo la a ya'u ama'a jin a zwalunci a.

column2: And on the Day that the Unbelievers will be placed before the Fire (It will be said to them): "Ye received your good things in the life of the world and ye took your pleasure out of them: but today shall ye be recompensed with a Penalty of humiliation: for that ye were arrogant on earth without just cause and that ye (ever) transgressed."
column3: Efo nan a' da kafirizhi gwa be zhi ita enan'o nan (malaika nanzhi e pa enan na cia gan'a gan) ye a manan-manan yezhi gi zo kpata mini edun fe izheo yinnan a' ga ye gba ga be azaba yan zunyesun'y-ebo eti nazhi ye fe la dan fin'o yan ganmanan na be etun lemba Soko nazhi ye lo nan.

column2: Mention (Hud) one of ´Ad´s (own) brethren: Behold he warned his people about the winding Sand-tracts: but there have been warners before him and after him: "Worship ye none other than Allah: Truly I fear for you the Penalty of a Mighty Day."
column3: wyo mao pa labari yan yegi (jama'a) yan Aduzhi (Annabi Hud A.S) ka mi nan u fe jin jama'a yan'uzhi gangba kin yan Ahkafu o nan akika ma gan gba iri uzhi ma -- gan yegboro to zunma batsozhio ke de ye ga jin bawta ya yandondo ma sai Soko (ALLAHU) akika mi e sundan ya ye yan azaba na'a tswan ye efo nan wancin nae (Efo alkiyami).

column2: They said: "Hast thou come in order to turn us aside from our gods Then bring upon us the (calamity) with which thou dost threaten us if thou art telling the truth"
column3: Aci gan: wyoe be eba yi be ebo wyoola yi ye o pan'o ya ke tsoci yizhi lugwa La (Azaba) nanzhi wye laa li yi dan nanbe'yn wun' ayi mini eza gaskiyazhi bo wyo dan'o nan.

column2: He said: "The Knowledge (of when it will come) is only with Allah: I proclaim to you the mission on which I have been sent: But I see that ye are a people in ignorance!"..
column3: Uci gan: Akika kpikpe be Soko yin'u dan'o mi ma'e wuyan wu ya ye yan yan nan atun mi tun be yin nan yan nan atun mi tun be yin nan amaa-de mi e le ye ye eza ti zhikozhi ye yio (nazhi e wa gaskiyaa nan.

column2: Then when they saw the (Penalty in the shape of) a cloud traversing the sky coming to meet their valleys they said "This cloud will give us rain!" "Nay it is the (Calamity) ye were asking to be hastened!- A wind wherein is a Grievous Penalty!
column3: Kami nan ale samashi ye cie zhe gwa be ezaiazhi na agan: sanmashi nan nan adule ya yi. A'a ujin 'acin'a yan nan yetso fe din ye gan ebe nan yio efeko ndoci uyio naazaba nana tan saranyin nan dan nin yin'u bo nan.

column2: "Everything will it destroy by the command of its Lord!" Then by the morning they - nothing was to be seen but (the ruins of) their houses! thus do We recompense those given to sin!
column3: Yandondo nan uga gun be yin nan sai uga' u jin hallaka be izini yan Tsoci u yin acia tin ba a le yandondo ye ke baa sai de emi binbanci'azhi. Acinga ga yie wo lefi jincizhi gbatao..

column2: And We had firmly established them in a (prosperity and) power which We have not given to you (ye Quraish!) and We had endowed them with (faculties of) hearing seeing heart and intellect: but of no profit to them were their (faculties of) hearing sight and heart and intellect when they went on rejecting the Signs of Allah; and they were (completely) encircled by that which they used to mock at!
column3: Akika yi yaa kinigiba iri nantso yi la ya ye yea nan yi ci kezhea gan; wo be eyan ba cin'le to yangbanzhi la'a yaa ammaa egan'wo'azhi to ba'cin leazhi toyangbanzhi a zhi ujin'a anfani ndondoa ebo nan a fe gbomi be aya Soko zhi; yannanzhiy ma afe laa la'mi na da jin tabbata ta etibo.

column2: We destroyed aforetime populations round about you; and We have shown the Signs in various ways that they may turn (to Us).
column3: Akika yi ya alkarya nazhiy ma-ye gwaba najin hallaka yi ma la hujja nanzhiy tula nabe yaa ebo a de ba'a kan'a zhin.

column2: Why then was no help forthcoming to them from those whom they worshipped as gods besides Allah as a means of access (to Allah) Nay they left them in the lurch: but that was their falsehood and their invention.
column3: Kiy la za nan zhiy a la gwasun cigan aga yi tsoci yan tsonba'zhi ba'ci Soko nan kiy la aci jin'a taimakoa yin'o Ngan a atsozhi u yio be egan wawagi nanazhi atsoe tswa nan.

column2: Behold We turned towards thee a company of Jinns (quietly) listening to the Qur´an: when they stood in the presence thereof they said "Listen in silence!" When the (reading) was finished they returned to their people to warn (them of their sins).
column3: Wyo mao pa kami nan yi kan ankali jama'a yan jannu ndocishi zhin eba wyo nan aci fe shi tukpa ya gbigba Alkuranu kami nan atun eba wyo nan aci gan: zandondo u sun sun kami nan a sa jin nan aci kezhe daa eba jama'a yan'azhi da jin'a gangba.

column2: They said "O our people! We have heard a Book revealed after Moses confirming what came before it: it guides (men) to the Truth and to a Straight Path.
column3: Aci gan: ya ye jama'a yan yizhi akika yi shi yukpa wo litafi ndoci acin'u cin be zunma yanMusao u mae gbo egan yan mafarizhi ka wun'e wu-balo eko gaskiya umae wu ba lo ekpa nan tsoyi gboro nan.

column2: "O our people hearken to the one who invites (you) to Allah and believe in him: He will forgive you your faults and deliver you from a Penalty Grievous.
column3: Yaye jama'a yan yizhi e ye yi yi yan za nae yi zazhi zhin eba Soko na ye mae ya'u gaskiya wun'a fa be ndoci yan zunubi yezhiy uma gae ta tu ke azaba tin tanci lugwa.

column2: "If any does not hearken to the one who invites (us) to Allah he cannot frustrate (Allah´s Plan) on earth and no protectors can he have besides Allah: such men (wander) in manifest error."
column3: Soko gwa ta eti kin nan nan boa. U ma de ndakata ndoci zunma Soko boa. Akika za wuncizhi a fe mini egbin naa tula nao.

column2: See they not that Allah Who created the heavens and the earth and never wearied with their creation is able to give life to the dead Yea verily He has power over all things.
column3: Kashiy a leye lea ke de Soko nan jin alitta yan sanmazhi to kin nan u wo ebo ndondo eba jin jin'aboa yin'a asa Soko wuncin gboka nan wun'a dan eyan tsu tsucizhi rayi wo na'a A'a akika Etsu u yio nan gboka dan jin jin yandondo nan.

column2: And on the Day that the Unbelievers will be placed before the Fire (they will be asked) "Is this not the Truth" they will say "Yea by our Lord!" (One will say:) "Then taste ye the Penalty for that ye were wont to deny (Truth)!"
column3: Efo nan a gaa da kafirizhi gwa da kpe enao na acia gan'a gan: asa nan nan ujin gaskiyaa Acia gan gan: Acingao e;yi zhi kuki be tsoci yi yin gaskiya ga'uyio. U ci gan: Efe fin azaba ebo etun kafirinci na ye fe lo na.

column2: Therefore patiently persevere as did (all) messengers of inflexible purpose; and be in no haste about the (Unbelievers). On the Day that they see the (Punishment) promised them (it will be) as if they had not tarried more than an hour in a single day. (Thine but) to proclaim the Message: but shall any be destroyed except those who transgress
column3: A ankuri jin kendoe Annabi nanzhiy niyyan'azhi gboka nan jin ankuri nan wyo mao ga din'ye yaa ma fo'ndondo na aga alkiyamina Sokoe lajin'a alkawali le ye na atsoa yegan ko afe-dun izhe'a sai de yan lokaci nini kawanyina. Eyan wu tsa yi (etun wye) yio. Amaajin zandondo hallaka'a sai de fasikizhi (za nanzhie la lefi Soko tula nan).

column2: Those who reject Allah and hinder (men) from the Path of Allah- their deeds will Allah render astray (from their mark).
column3: Za nanzhi a jin kafirinci nan acie kan zazhi eko Soko yn da nan. Etun'azhi kpata a nyin ya.

column2: But those who believe and work deeds of righteousness and believe in the (Revelation) sent down to Muhammad - for it is the Truth from their Lord- He will remove from them their ills and improve their condition.
column3: Za nanzhiy ma a imani jin acie lo tun wangizhi nan a ma imani jin be yan nan acin be ya (Annabi) muhammadu nan kede u ga yi gaskiya nan fe be dagan nko yan tsocia bo na'o na Soko ga etun dede azhi fin ya yaa u ma ga alamariazhi tadzu

column2: But those who believe and work deeds of righteousness and believe in the (Revelation) sent down to Muhammad - for it is the Truth from their Lord- He will remove from them their ills and improve their condition.
column3: Za nanzhiy ma a imani jin acie lo tun wangizhi nan a ma imani jin be yan nan acin be ya (Annabi) muhammadu nan kede u ga yi gaskiya nan fe be dagan nko yan tsocia bo na'o na Soko ga etun dede azhi fin ya yaa u ma ga alamariazhi tadzu.

column2: This because those who reject Allah follow vanities while those who believe follow the Truth from their Lord: Thus does Allah set forth for men their lessons by similitudes.
column3: Wuncin ma yi ebo nan kafirizhi a mi-tu eko yan egbin nan muminizhi ma a mi tu gaskiya nan fe be dagan nko yan Tsocia bo nan. Acin ga ga Sokoe la misalizhi wu zawangizhio.

column2: Therefore when ye meet the Unbelievers (in fight) smite at their necks; At length when ye have thoroughly subdued them bind a bond firmly (on them): thereafter (is the time for) either generosity or ransom: Until the war lays down its burdens. Thus (are ye commanded): but if it had been Allah´s Will He could certainly have exacted retribution from them (Himself); but (He lets you fight) in order to test you some with others. But those who are slain in the Way of Allah- He will never let their deeds be lost.
column3: Kamina nan ye ga gun be kafirizhiy (ekun dao nan) e wu'a koro'o har sai ye gade zankpe ta etia bo yecie la'aedan kangi be kagboe. Baci acin'o wun'a ba ye yea ya a fea lo koma a tso a la eti tacin'a'a sa har da lokaci nan nangban yan ekun ga cin-ta nan. Acinga ga'u yio wun'aba Soko ba aga zan kafirizhi kpe (uma'ajin be ekun yin'a) Ama'a de Soko jin'u jin aninga ebo u ma ye ye'u cin'u le be dozhi. Akika za nanzhi a ga'awu fi eko Soko nan etun'azhi a ta yakpea.

column2: Soon will He guide them and improve their condition
column3: Bele yin Soko ga'ajin shiri u ma ga alamariazhi tadzu.

column2: And admit them to the Garden which He has announced for them.
column3: Uma gaa la'a gandan Aljannanao nan ufe ya'a labari u nan.

column2: O ye who believe! If ye will aid (the cause of) Allah He will aid you and plant your feet firmly.
column3: Ya ye nazhi'a imani jin nan ye ga jin Soko taimako wun'tso'a jin'e taimako ga uma ga kinigi yezhigboka.

column2: But those who reject (Allah)- for them is destruction and (Allah) will render their deeds astray (from their mark).
column3: Zanazhiy ma'ajin kafirinci nan hallaka ga'ajin tabbata ya'a etun'azhi ma ga' nyin ya.

column2: That is because they hate the Revelation of Allah; so He has made their deeds fruitless.
column3: Wunci ma yi ebo na a navo nan a la'mi tu na Soko cin'be yn nan Soko cia etun'azhi nyin ya.

column2: Do they not travel through the earth and see what was the End of those before them (who did evil) Allah brought utter destruction on them and similar (fates await) those who reject Allah.
column3: Kashiy a za az kpe eti kinboa acia le kendoe zoba yan za nazhiy shiadzo na' yi yi na'a Ngan Soko 'ajin hallaka to iri wuncin ma ga'ajin tabbata ya kafirizhi.

column2: That is because Allah is the Protector of those who believe but those who reject Allah have no protector.
column3: Wuncin ma yi  ebo nan Soko ga yi Ndakata yan minizhio nao akika ma kafirizhi de ndakata'a.

column2: Verily Allah will admit those who believe and do righteous deeds to Gardens beneath which rivers flow; while those who reject Allah will enjoy (this world) and eat as cattle eat; and the Fire will be their abode.
column3: Akika Soko ga za nanzhiy ga jin imani a cie lo tun wngi zhi nan la gan dan Aljannao nan nuwan zhie je fi tako shin'u zhio nan. Kafirizhi ma e wo ma izhe za amae gi yan'za kendoe dabbazhie gi yanzhi za na akika enan ga yi ezhe kebao.

column2: And how many cities with more power than thy city which has driven thee out have We destroyed (for their sins) and there was none to aid them.
column3: Alkaryazhi danbo dokun nanzhiy gboka gan za alkarya wyozhi nan zhiy nyan'wyo tin ya nan kpata yi ajin hallaka a made zandondo jin'a taimakoa.

column2: Is then one who is on a clear (Path) from his Lord no better than one to whom the evil of his conduct seems pleasing and such as follow their own lustsNgba za nae le izhe eti hujja nan fe be nko yan tsoci ubo nan ga'zhe yeni beza nan etun dedeuzhi a sa fiu acie le izhe eti etun yangban'o nan

(Here is) a Parable of the Garden which the righteous are promised: in it are rivers of water incorruptible; rivers of milk of which the taste never changes; rivers of wine a joy to those who drink; and rivers of honey pure and clear. In it there are for them all kinds of fruits; and Grace from their Lord. (Can those in such Bliss) be compared to such as shall dwell for ever in the Fire and be given to drink boiling water so that it cuts up their bowels (to pieces)
column3: Kwatankoci yan kendoe Aljanna nan Soko ajin muminizhi alkawali na uyi nan minin bo eduzhi danbo yan nuwan nan jin vunvuci'a nan. To eduzhi danbo yan nuwan (nono) nan eman'u wun'e zhegba'a nan to eduzhidanbo yan efu nan yi lilici nan ama ke yibe yangici sun sun iri ndondoe fi bo ganni. be gaafarae dagan eba tsociabo Ngba aga za na zhi fi mini ni'ma nanao tutun na laasan tatu be za nan gun mini enao tutun yin nan Ganci acie ya nuwan yipa fin nae dza edin'azhi ya nan.

column2: And among them are men who listen to thee but in the end when they go out from thee they say to those who have received Knowledge "What is it he said just then" Such are men whose hearts Allah has sealed and who follow their own lusts.
column3: Ama de dan miniabo nanzhiy ajin ashi tukpa ya wy nan kami nan a ga tin ya dagan eba wyo bo nan a fe gan be gan be za nan zhiy yi be ilimiy nan gan: Ngba ki'ufe gan mangio Za wuncinzhi ga Soko te yangban'ao acia-mitu etun yangban'azhi.

column2: But to those who receive Guidance He increases the (light of) Guidance and bestows on them their Piety and Restraint (from evil).
column3: Za nazhiy ma ga'ajin shiri nan; Soko ' abea shiri U maa Twarya be dansun' uyio dan yang Ban'abo.

column2: Do they then only wait for the Hour- that it should come on them of a sudden But already have come some tokens thereof and when it (actually) is on them how can they benefit then by their admonition
column3: Kashiy e' tu yetu gan alkiyami ubeu dzun u fia Akika alamauzhi da bea ni. Ke a be jin jin nao kami nan Yan nae la jin gangbanan ga bea tula ya'a nao

column2: Know therefore that there is no god but Allah and ask forgiveness for thy fault and for the men and women who believe: for Allah knows how ye move about and how ye dwell in your homes.
column3: wyo yo kpeo wo ke de akika adeyandondo nan gwo yin a jin bauta ya naa sai de Soko na wyo mao wa gafarao ya zunubi wyizhi to Mumini ba. Gizhi to mumini ynzagizhi akika Soko de kpikpi yan ba nan zhi ye iwo nan U ma de kpikpi yan ezhe kebaezhi.

column2: Those who believe say "Why is not a sura sent down (for us)" But when a sura of basic or categorical meaning is revealed and fighting is mentioned therein thou wilt see those in whose hearts is a disease looking at thee with a look of one in swoon at the approach of death. But more fitting for them-
column3: Za nanzhi'a imani jin nan e gan gan: kiY la aci cin sura (Woro) bea yin'o Kami nan a ga be cin Sura yan hukunci ndoci be yaa aci tun ekun ye danminiiubo nan Wyo'a le Munafikizhi ye a fe cin wyo le ke za nan nangban yan ajali a rukpeu nan robonkpe wun'ajin tabbata ya'a.

column2: Were it to obey and say what is just and when a matter is resolved on it were best for them if they were true to Allah.
column3: Emi latu foro be egan wangi gan'e (u ga gye gan'o). Kaminan ala'mari gaa gbo ucia tula (Ke ekun gun ga gan'o) nan a ga Soko ya gaskiya ya (a cia tin ya) da wuncin'ade alheri ya'gan.

column2: Then is it to be expected of you if ye were put in authority that ye will do mischief in the land and break your ties of kith and kin
column3: Akika kyengi u yio yega bea zunma zheta (yeci da gun kun'a) ye'a bea fe za nanzhie nyin yan kpe eti kinbo nan ye ci ga'afe za nan zhie sa dangi bo ya na.

column2: Such are the men whom Allah has cursed for He has made them deaf and blinded their sight.
column3: Za wuncinzhi ga Soko bu kuti kpeo u cia te tukpa Ucia eyeazhi nan (e le gaskiya ye bea sai ganmanan).

column2: Do they not then earnestly seek to understand the Qur´an or are their hearts locked up by them
column3: Kashiy e kpa ye kpa nan shidunan eti Alkuranu boa Kashiy a giyekozhi la'atsu'a yangbanzhi tsu

column2: Those who turn back as apostates after Guidance was clearly shown to them- the Evil One has instigated them and busied them up with false hopes.
column3: Akika za nazhi a zunma laa ya a adini nan(acia jin ridda) baci nan bayani yan bawu a tula ya'ani nan akika Sheitan ga pa (kafirinci) nin fi ao wunga ma gan gan fia eti bo.

column2: Those who turn back as apostates after Guidance was clearly shown to them- the Evil One has instigated them and busied them up with false hopes.
column3: Akika za nazhi a zunma laa ya a adini nan(acia jin ridda) baci nan bayani yan bawu a tula ya'ani nan akika Sheitan ga pa (kafirinci) nin fi ao wunga ma gan gan fia eti bo.

column2: This because they said to those who hate what Allah has revealed "We will obey you in part of (this) matter"; but Allah knows their (inner) secrets.
column3: Wuncin mayi ebo nan a gan be za nazhie na hukunci nan Soko cinzhiyn vo nan gan: Yi ga mi tu ye dan mini alamari ndocizhio. Akika Soko de kpikpe yannazhiy e swo nan.

column2: This because they said to those who hate what Allah has revealed "We will obey you in part of (this) matter"; but Allah knows their (inner) secrets.
column3: Wuncin mayi ebo nan a gan be za nazhie na hukunci nan Soko cinzhiyn vo nan gan: Yi ga mi tu ye dan mini alamari ndocizhio. Akika Soko de kpikpe yannazhiy e swo nan.

column2: But how (will it be) when the angels take their souls at death and smite their faces and their backs
column3: Gancin Ke'a da da nao kami nan Malaikazhi gae gwo rayi be'a yin acie wu'a fuskazhio to zunmazhio nao

column2: This because they followed that which called forth the Wrath of Allah and they hated Allah´s good pleasure; so He made their deeds of no effect.
column3: Wuncin ma yi ebo nan a emi laatu yan nan Soko wa'a nan acia nanvo la'a dan yedajin'u bo nan U cia etun'zhi gbin ya.

column2: Or do those in whose hearts is a disease think that Allah will not bring to light all their rancour
column3: Kashiy za nan zhiy yi be batan yan yangban'e'na'e kpa ye kpa gan eyan dede nazhiy a swo fi yangban'o nan Soko a kua tin ya woa

column2: Had We so wiled We could have shown them up to thee and thou shouldst have known them by their marks: but surely thou wilt know them by the tone of their speech! And Allah knows all that ye do.U ga ba Yi ba da yi ga 'la wu wye akika ma wyo gaa kpeye be alamaazhiy wyo ma'a kezhe kpea ye eba egan kogiazhio. Akika Soko de kpikpe yan etun nazhi ye lo nan.

And We shall try you until We test those among you who strive their utmost and persevere in patience; and We shall try your reported (mettle).Wallahi Yi gae mancin le har sai za nazhi gae jin jihadi ebo Soko nan ga tula minie bo to za nazhie jin ankuri nan yi ma ga labariezhi mancin le.

Those who reject Allah hinder (men) from the Path of Allah and resist the Messenger after Guidance has been clearly shown to them will not injure Allah in the least but He will make their deeds of no effect.
column3: Akika za nazhie jin kafirci acie kan zawangizhi eko Soko yn da nan ama kezhea le tuci ba baci nan bayani yan bawu a tula ya aa ni na a la egun ndondotso Soko woa Soko ma ga'a etunzhi nyi ya.

column2: O ye who believe! Obey Allah and obey the messenger and make not vain your deeds!
column3: Ya ye nazhia imani jin nan! Yea mi tu Soko ye mae la mie tu tuci ye mae ga nyin etun'ezhi ya ma.

column2: Those who reject Allah and hinder (men) from the Path of Allah then die rejecting Allah- Allah will not forgive them.
column3: Akika za nazhia jin kafirinci acie kan zawangizhi eko yan Soko yn da nan gancin acia tsu eti kafirincio nan Soko fa bea yin'a.

column2: Be not weary and faint-hearted crying for peace when ye should be uppermost: for Allah is with you and will never put you in loss for your (good) deeds.
column3: Ega to gbogun ma Ye mae ga tan'a gwa fe wa gyra bea yin ma. Akika yega ta eti abo Soko ma dan be ye yin U maa ta etun yezhi ya kpea.

column2: The life of this world is but play and amusement: and if ye believe and guard against Evil He will grant you your recompense and will not ask you (to give up) your possessions.
column3: Akika rayuwa izhe edzo u yio be Shagalae Ye ma ga imani jin ye cie sundan Soko U ma'a gbin yegan yan dukiya yezhia.

column2: If He were to ask you for all of them and press you ye would covetously withhold and He would bring out all your ill-feeling.
column3: Uga gbin ye gan yan dukiya yezhi ye gau le ye eba yiba nan yemaafe tan yanbo U ma ga eyan dede nazhiy ye pa fi yangban'o nan ku ke fi-li.

column2: Behold ye are those invited to spend (of your substance) in the Way of Allah: But among you are some that are niggardly. But any who are niggardly are so at the expense of their own souls. But Allah is free of all wants and it is ye that are needy. If ye turn back (from the Path) He will substitute in your stead another people; then they would not be like you!
column3: Ye dan nan ye ga e yi gan ye be wu dukiyayezhie fi eko Soko bo mini ebo ade nazhie tan'yanbo na akika zaeni ndondo na ga tan yanbo nan eti tacin'u gau tan be yin'o Soko Etsu kunkunke u yio yetso tsa yi talakazhio. Ye ma ga zunma zheta U gae sangwa be zandocizhiy amaafe (yanbotanci) dozhin'e zhia.

column2: Verily We have granted thee a manifest Victory:
column3: Akika yi ga kpe eko (alheri) zhi ya wyo yo ekokpe nantsoa tula nan. thee thy faults of the past and those to follow; fulfil His favour to thee; and guide thee on the Straight Way;Ebo Soko'u deba'o fa be wyo yin yan zunbi wyozhi nazhi'a shidzo nan to nazhi ke wyo'a be jin-nan U ma'u la ni'ima' uzhi'u shekpan'uta eti wyo bo Uma'u wu wyo ba yan eko nantso yi gboro nan.

column2: That Allah may forgive thee thy faults of the past and those to follow; fulfil His favour to thee; and guide thee on the Straight Way;
column3: Ebo Soko'u deba'o fa be wyo yin yan zunbi wyozhi nazhi'a shidzo nan to nazhi ke wyo'a be jin-nan U ma'u la ni'ima' uzhi'u shekpan'uta eti wyo bo Uma'u wu wyo ba yan eko nantso yi gboro nan.

column2: And that Allah may help thee with powerful help.
column3: Soko ma' ajin'o taimako taimako nantso'a zankpe nan.

column2: It is He Who sent down tranquillity into the hearts of the Believers that they may add faith to their faith;- for to Allah belong the Forces of the heavens and the earth; and Allah is Full of Knowledge and Wisdom;-
column3: Wun ga yi Etsu nan cin yangban tacin be dan yangban Muminizhi bo nan ebo a de ba'abe imani'a be imani'a kagbocizhi kpata yan sanmazhi to yan kin Soko wun'a o akika Soko ma'afe Etsu nan yibe kpikpe yan'dondoe nan Etsu hikima.

column2: That He may admit the men and women who believe to Gardens beneath which rivers flow to dwell therein for aye and remove their ills from them;- and that is in the sight of Allah the highest achievement (for man)-
column3: Ebo'u la mumini bagizhi to mumini ynzagizhi u gan'u dan aljannazhio nanzhiy nuwanzhie je fi taakoabo na ama'a fibo fi tutun yin u ma ga etun dedeazhi kpata fin'ya wuncin ma'afe rabo nan wancin ana.

column2: And that He may punish the Hypocrites men and women and the Polytheists men and women who imagine an evil opinion of Allah. On them is a round of Evil: the Wrath of Allah is on them: He has cursed them and got Hell ready for them: and evil is it for a destination.
column3: Uma'u la munafiki bagizhi to munafikiynzagizhi to bagi nazhie la yan pa Soko baci nan' to yinzagi nazhie la yan pa Soko baci na u jin azaba za nazhie kpa-ye dede be Sokoe nan hallaka gaajin tabbata ta etia bo Soko ma'a zhe-wunbeayin uma kuti bu kpea u ma'enan yan jahannama jin shiri yaa akika zobaazhi maa biye.

column2: For to Allah belong the Forces of the heavens and the earth; and Allah is Exalted in Power Full of Wisdom.
column3: Kagbocizhi kpata yan samazhi to kin Soko wun'o akika Soko ma'afe Etsu zankpe Etsu hikima.

column2: We have truly sent thee as a witness as a bringer of Glad Tidings and as a Warner:
column3: Akika yi ya wyo tun tun wyo la'o fe za naajin ri nan to za nae ya labari yangban fa nan to za nae jin gangba nan.

column2: In order that ye (O men) may believe in Allah and His Messenger that ye may assist and honour Him and celebrate His praise morning and evening.
column3: Ebo acin'o ye'a imani jin be Sokoe to be tuciu yin ye mae jin'u taimako ye mae fe li'u tsa tsa yin to lazhin to lozun.

column2: Verily those who plight their fealty to thee do no less than plight their fealty to Allah: the Hand of Allah is over their hands: then any one who violates his oath does so to the harm of his own soul and any one who fulfils what he has covenanted with Allah- Allah will soon grant him a great Reward.
column3: Akika za nazhie jin mubaya'a (zunmatu yan baeni) be wyo yin nan akika Soko tsa ajin mubaya'a beyin'o yin nan akika Soko ta eti egwa'azhio gancin za nan ga alkawali'u lo'ya nan eti taci'u tsa'u jin gun'o zaeni ndondo na ma ga yan nan wun'ajin Soko alkawali nan she nan Soko ayau lada nan wancin nan.

column2: The desert Arabs who lagged behind will say to thee: "We were engaged in (looking after) our flocks and herds and our families: do thou then ask forgiveness for us." They say with their tongues what is not in their hearts.
