Say: "Who then has any power at all (to intervene) on your behalf with Allah if His Will is to give you some loss or to give you some profit But Allah is well acquainted with all that ye do.
column3: Bele'yin za nazhiy yi za zunmazhi na (nanzhi dzunda gunkun'ana) mini larubawa laticizhio na a gan gan: 'dukiya yizhi to iyali yizhi a yi jin shagala wyo ga jin'oba gafara ya yi. Acie gan gan be gintara'azhiy na ma ujin acin uyi dan yangban'azhi boa nan. Gan gan: ziy kangwa yandoci ya ye wo'o. Uga kpa ye be mimacinle ndoci ko ma be eyan anfani ndociy nao A'a akika Soko Etsu u yio nan yi be labari etun nazhiy ye lonae.

column2: "Nay ye thought that the Messenger and the Believers would never return to their families; this seemed pleasing in your hearts and ye conceived an evil thought for ye are a people lost (in wickedness)."
column3: U jin acin'a ye de fe kpaye-kpa gan tuci Soko to miminizhi (a ga tinya da ekun da) a aka'ra de eba iyaliazhi zhin bea sheitan ma'wuncin panin fi yangban yezhio ye ci fe kpa-ye dede zhi yecia'afe eza hallakazhi.

column2: And if any believe not in Allah and His Messenger We have prepared for those who reject Allah a Blazing Fire!
column3: Zaeni ndondo na ma ya Soko be tuci'u yin gaskiyaa nan da akika yi jin shiri yan azaba ena sa'iru ya kafirizhi.

column2: To Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth: He forgives whom He wills and He punishes whom He wills: but Allah is Oft-Forgiving Most Merciful.
column3: Soko ga wun mulki yan sanmazhi to kin yin'o fe be za nan ga ba'u nan Umae jin za na bau na azaba. Akika Soko a fe Etsu gafara Etsu yegun.

column2: Those who lagged behind (will say) when ye (are free to) march and take booty (in war): "Permit us to follow you." They wish to change Allah´s decree: Say: "Not thus will ye follow us: Allah has already declared (this) beforehand": then they will say "But ye are jealous of us." Nay but little do they understand (such things).
column3: Beleyin eza zunma wuncinzhi a gan gan kamina nan ye gae lo gani ma (arziki yan ekun) zhi'yn kuzhi nan "e lugwa yi la mitu ye yiy" e wa gan'a la egan Soko a zhe gba. Gangan: ye'ala mi tu yi yia a cinga ga Soko gan shidzo. Gannci a gan gan: u jin acin'a ye de jin yi hasada jin kawanyin. Uma yi acin'a amma'de a de'afe za nanzhiy egan'e ye'a nan sai de za degi miniabo.

column2: Say to the desert Arabs who lagged behind: "Ye shall be summoned (to fight) against a people given to vehement war: then shall ye fight or they shall submit. Then if ye show obedience Allah will grant you a goodly reward but if ye turn back as ye did before He will punish you with a grievous Penalty."
column3: Gan ya za nazhi yi za zunmazhi mini larubawa laticizhio nan; Bele yin a be yi ye lo eba jama'a ndocizhinanzhiy gboka sarawyin nan ebo ye dae gun'a kun ko ma a la lo musulunci ye ga mitu foro nan nan Sokoa yae laa da nayi wangi naye ma ga zunma zheta kendoe ye kayn jin shidzo batsozhi na Wun'a jin'e azaba nan tan sarauyin anan.

column2: No blame is there on the blind nor is there blame on the lame nor on one ill (if he joins not the war): But he that obeys Allah and his Messenger- (Allah) will admit him to Gardens beneath which rivers flow; and he who turns back (Allah) will punish him with a grievous Penalty.
column3: Leifi ta eti yebonci boa (kagan ulo ekun daa na'a) to za nan de bicia nan boa. Zaeni ndondo nan ga mitu Soko to Tuciu nan u ga'u laagandan aljannazhio nan nuwanzie je fi takoshin'u bo nan za ndondo na ma ga zunma zheta nan Wun'a jin'u azaba nan tan sarayin nan.

column2: Allah´s Good Pleasure was on the Believers when they swore Fealty to thee under the Tree: He knew what was in their hearts and He sent down Tranquillity to them; and He rewarded them with a speedy Victory;Akika Soko'a yeda jin be Muminizhiy kami nan afe jin mubaya'a be wyo yin eshin yan cigban'o nan Soko ma kpe yannanzhiy fi yangban'a bo nan Uci ci yangban tacin be yaa Ucin kezhe ya'a nasara nan tsoba nan.
And many gains will they acquire (besides): and Allah is Exalted in Power Full of Wisdom.
column3: Ganni be ganimazhiy' nan dokun nan na'ade nan Soko ma'afe Etsu zankpe Etsu hikima.

column2: Allah has promised you many gains that ye shall acquire and He has given you these beforehand; and He has restrained the hands of men from you; that it may be a Sign for the Believers and that He may guide you to a Straight Path;
column3: Soko ma kezhe jin ye alkawali ndoci yan ganima nan ye'a de nan u cia nan nan fan fi ye U maa kun ke ya ye be ekun zawangizhiy ebo ula'ufe a ya ' u ya Muminizhi U ma'u wu ye ba'u lo eko nantso yi gborona.

column2: And other gains (there are) which are not within your power but which Allah has compassed: and Allah has power over all things.
column3: To ndoci nan ye kunke wo ta etiaboa Nan akika Soko ama kezhe. Akika Soko ma de kagbo taeti yandon

column2: If the Unbelievers should fight you they would certainly turn their backs; then would they find neither protector nor helper.
column3: Da aci gan kafirizhi ga gun ye kun gun daa bici gancin ma aade Ndakata'a amaa de taimako jincia.

column2: (Such has been) the practice (approved) of Allah already in the past: no change wilt thou find in the practice (approved) of Allah.
column3: Nan nan ma ekpa yan Soko u yio nan -- gan ta eti zananzhiy shidzo nao. Wyo ma'a de egbazhe ndondo dan ekpa Soko boa.

column2: And it is He Who has restrained their hands from you and your hands from them in the midst of Makka after that He gave you the victory over them. And Allah sees well all that ye do.
column3: Wun ga yi za nan kangwa ekun 'azhi ya ye yeo nan U ci kangwa ekun ye ya atso'o zhinin yan Makabo baci nan wun'a ye la'a ta eti boani nao. Akika Soko a fe Etsu nae cin'ye le dan etun ndondo na ye gae lo nao.

column2: They are the ones who denied Revelation and hindered you from the Sacred Mosque and the sacrificial animals detained from reaching their place of sacrifice. Had there not been believing men and believing women whom ye did not know that ye were trampling down and on whose account a crime would have accrued to you without (your) knowledge (Allah would have allowed you to force your way but He held back your hands) that He may admit to His Mercy whom He will. If they had been apart We should certainly have punished the Unbelievers among them with a grievous Punishment.
column3: A ga yi za nanzhi ajin kafirinci nao acia ye kan gingandan yan Masallaci Harami nan to Hadayaotso aci u kanta a lugwa utun dannan wun'a. Kagan ujin ebo bagi Mumini ndocizhi to ynzagi Mumina ndocizhi boa nanzhiy-ma ye kpe'aye'a naa yin'a ebo ye be'a wu mimacinle ndoci be tswan ye ebo'abo ye ma kpea ma Soko ma jin'acin jin ebo u la za nan ga bau nan'U gan'u dan mini yegun'u bo. Da aci gan zawuncizhi akpe kayin kpe da Yiga kafirizhi mini-abo jin azaba nan tan sarauyin nan.

column2: While the Unbelievers got up in their hearts heat and cant - the heat and cant of ignorance- Allah sent down His Tranquillity to his Messenger and to the Believers and made them stick close to the command of self-restraint; and well were they entitled to it and worthy of it. And Allah has full knowledge of all things.
column3: Kami nan kafirizhia egya yan nanvo la'afi yangban'a zhio nan egya yan nanvo na ma yi yan jahiliyyah nan (eza'ti zhkozhi) Soko cia yangbanshi'u cin be ya Tuci'u to Muminizhi Ucia egan yan dansun Soko la'a gboka ya'a. Ama'afe shi'ubo a ga gwou'yin'o aga mayi zaba wun'o. Akika Soko yi be kpikpe yandondoe

column2: Truly did Allah fulfil the vision for His Messenger: ye shall enter the Sacred Mosque if Allah wills with minds secure heads shaved hair cut short and without fear. For He knew what ye knew not and He granted besides this a speedy victory.
column3: Akika Soko'a gaskiya nan dan enana yan Tuciubo nan la'awu'u be gaskiyae ke de ye ga gandan Masallaci Haramio nan U gaa ba Soko nan be aminciy ganni be ma'ade dansun yan dondoa soko ma kpikpe yannazhi ye-de kpikpea na Ucia nasara nantsoba nan la'gba zunma wunma.

column2: It is He Who has sent His Messenger with Guidance and the Religion of Truth to proclaim it over all religion: and enough is Allah for a Witness.
column3: Soko ga tun Tuci'u tun be bawuy ganni be adini yan gaskiya yin'o ebo u la wun'u la'u ta eti adini ndocizhio baenio. Akika Soko maa akunke yan Eri.

column2: Muhammad is the messenger of Allah; and those who are with him are strong against Unbelievers (but) compassionate amongst each other. Thou wilt see them bow and prostrate themselves (in prayer) seeking Grace from Allah and (His) Good Pleasure. On their faces are their marks (being) the traces of their prostration. This is their similitude in the Taurat; and their similitude in the Gospel is: like a seed which sends forth its blade then makes it strong; it then becomes thick and it stands on its own stem (filling) the sowers with wonder and delight. As a result it fills the Unbelievers with rage at them. Allah has promised those among them who believe and do righteous deeds forgiveness and a great Reward.
column3: (Annabi) Muhammadu Tuci Soko U yio za nazhi ma a gaskiya ya beu yin nan a gboka ama zwo lo eba kafirizhi a ma yi eza yegunzhi tsakani atso be dozhiy wyo'a le'a ye e'lo ruku'u a nae lo sujada e wa arziki za dagan eba Soko be yedau yin alamazhi dan fuskaazhio ebo ekundo yan sujadazhio kendoe a yiyi ga nan dan'o nao iriazhi madan mini Ataurao amade iriazhi dan mini Injeelao aafe ke edzo na'gwalagi uzhi laa tin ya nanaci kezhe fe gbo'uka be har maa a lekpan acia jin daidai ta'eti gbereabo Ucie ya enu nucizhi sha'wa ebo ma kafirizhi a Zhewun'agan pa'yin. Soko jin zananzhiy ga imani jin acie lo tun wangizhi na alkawali yan gafara be lada nan wancin na

column2: O Ye who believe! Put not yourselves forward before Allah and His Messenger; but fear Allah: for Allah is He Who hears and knows all things.
column3: Ya ye nanzhia imani jin nan! E ga shi Soko be Tuci'u yin dzo (eba hukunci jin'o) ma ye mae tswa Soko akika Soko Etsu nae wo gan nan U yio Etsu Kpikpe u yio.

column2: O ye who believe! Raise not your voices above the voice of the Prophet nor speak aloud to him in talk as ye may speak aloud to one another lest your deeds become vain and ye perceive not.
column3: Ya ye nanzhia imani jin nan! Ega fe la bere yezhi tu ta eti bere Annabio ma ye nae ga dzun fiu be gan'e kendoe ye dzun fi dozhi be egan'e na ma ebo etunyezhi be a nyin ya ye ma kpea ma.

column2: O ye who believe! Raise not your voices above the voice of the Prophet nor speak aloud to him in talk as ye may speak aloud to one another lest your deeds become vain and ye perceive not.
column3: Ya ye nanzhia imani jin nan! Ega fe la bere yezhi tu ta eti bere Annabio ma ye nae ga dzun fiu be gan'e kendoe ye dzun fi dozhi be egan'e na ma ebo etunyezhi be a nyin ya ye ma kpea ma.

column2: Those that lower their voices in the presence of Allah´s Messenger- their hearts has Allah tested for piety: for them is Forgiveness and a great Reward.
column3: Akika Za nanzhie da bere ci yegboro Tuci Soko nan za wuncinzhi ga Soko ma yangban'azhi cin le be dansun Soko yin'o gafara Soko ajin tabbata ya'a be lada nan wancin nan.

column2: Those who shout out to thee from without the inner apartments - most of them lack understanding.
column3: Akika za nan zhie kpogun cie yi wyo-ye katanshinzhio nan ekun dondo azhi ade ankalia.

column2: If only they had patience until thou couldst come out to them it would be best for them: but Allah is Oft-Forgiving Most Merciful.
column3: Da aci gan a ankuri jin jin har da kami nan wyo'a tinya be eba'a nan da a wuncinn'fe alheri gan ya'a Soko ma Etsu gafara uyio Etsu yegun uyio.

column2: O ye who believe! If a wicked person comes to you with any news ascertain the truth lest ye harm people unwittingly and afterwards become full of repentance for what ye have done.
column3: Ya ye nanzhia imani jin nan! Kandondo nan fasiki ga la'bari la bea ya ye nan e da wa gaskiya yan labariu za be dzo ebo ye kefi zawangizhi eti jahilincio etun wuncin beafe ngakpe (robonkpe) ya ye ma.

column2: And know that among you is Allah´s Messenger: were he in many matters to follow your (wishes) ye would certainly fall into misfortune: But Allah has endeared the Faith to you and has made it beautiful in your hearts and He has made hateful to you Unbelief wickedness and rebellion: such indeed are those who walk in righteousness;-
column3: Ye mae kpe wo ke de Tuci Soko dan taacin yebo nan da'aci gan wun'a mi tu ye tu dan ekundondo alamarizhio daa yetso ga'ajin wahala amma'de Sokoe cincin yan imani la'aya ye U ci'u panin fi yangban yezhio Ucin kafirinci be fasikanci be lemba Soko la'afe eyan gwosun ya ye. Akika zawuncinzhi ga yi za nazhia ke eko nao.

column2: A Grace and Favour from Allah; and Allah is full of Knowledge and Wisdom.
column3: (Wuncin) Arziki u yio dagan eba Soko be ni'imae akika Soko Etsu kpikpe u yio Etsu hikima uyio.

column2: If two parties among the Believers fall into a quarrel make ye peace between them: but if one of them transgresses beyond bounds against the other then fight ye (all) against the one that transgresses until it complies with the command of Allah; but if it complies then make peace between them with justice and be fair: for Allah loves those who are fair (and just).
column3: Ama ga be de jama'a yan Muminizhi nanzhia gan guba acie sunwun be dozhiy nan e jin gyara tsakaniabo be dozhiy gan cin nini miniabo gaa gwo iyaka gan ta eti ninio ye'a gunye-kan ye gun nantsoe gwo iyaka gan nan har she u ga yeda jin be hukuncin yan Sokoe u ga bea yeda jin e jin gyara tsakaniabo be adalinci ye tso mae jin adalinci akika Sokoe wa za nazhi gae jin adalinci.

column2: The Believers are but a single Brotherhood: So make peace and reconciliation between your two (contending) brothers; and fear Allah that ye may receive Mercy.
column3: Akika Muminizhi yegi dozhi a yio ebo acin'o e fe jin gyara tsakani yegi yezhio ye mae sundan Soko ebo Soko u gun'e ye.

column2: O ye who believe! Let not some men among you laugh at others: It may be that the (latter) are better than the (former): Nor let some women laugh at others: It may be that the (latter are better than the (former): Nor defame nor be sarcastic to each other nor call each other by (offensive) nicknames: Ill-seeming is a name connoting wickedness (to be used of one) after he has believed: And those who do not desist are (indeed) doing wrong.
column3: Ya ye nanzhi'a imani jin nan! Jama'a ndocizhi aga fe la jama'a ndocizhi mi ma U jin wo za nanzhiy ye la'mi daa nan afe eza alherizhi gan ye (nanzhie la'ami nan) ynzagizhio tso ma'aga la dozhi mi ma u jin wo ynzagizhio tsoma'aga la dozhi mi ma u jin wo ynzagi nanzhi ye la'mi nan ade alheri gan'a (nanzhie la'mi nan) ye mae ga tu dozhi sunna dede ma baci nan a zawuncinzhi ga yi azwalumizhio.

column2: O ye who believe! Avoid suspicion as much (as possible): for suspicion in some cases is a sin: And spy not on each other behind their backs. Would any of you like to eat the flesh of his dead brother Nay ye would abhor it...But fear Allah: For Allah is Oft-Returning Most Merciful.
column3: Ya ye nanzhia imani jin nan ekegan be ekundo yan zato (yekpa dede) jin'y akika sashi yan zatozhi lefi u yio fe mae ga ge wa aibu dozhi za ma kashiy a de za na'awa mini yebo gan wun'u gi nankan yan ye-giu naatsua ni nan Ngan ye ga'a navo. Ye mae sundan Soko Akika Soko Etsu naegwa tuba nan uyio Etsu yegun u yio.

column2: O mankind! We created you from a single (pair) of a male and a female and made you into nations and tribes that ye may know each other (not that ye may despise (each other). Verily the most honoured of you in the sight of Allah is (he who is) the most righteous of you. And Allah has full knowledge and is well acquainted (with all things).
column3: Ya ye zawangizhiy! Akika yi ga jin alitta ye yeo dagan mini ba-- be ynzagi yicia ye gan fi kin zhio be ezhimi zhiy nan yi ka kayan nan ebo ye dabae kpe dozhie ye akika za nande cinwan gan eba Soko miniebo nan u ga yi za nan gae sundan Soko gan nao Akika Soko Etsu kpikpe u yio Etsu nan de labari yandondo nan u yio.

column2: The desert Arabs say "We believe." Say "Ye have no faith; but ye (only)say ´We have submitted our wills to Allah´ For not yet has Faith entered your hearts. But if ye obey Allah and His Messenger He will not belittle aught of your deeds: for Allah is Oft-Forgiving Most Merciful."
column3: Larubawa yan laticizhi gan: "Yi ya imani ji|" gan gan: ye la'a jin imania ye de gan gan: ye ya kpatsun ta ebo nan to gbani imani la'a wo yangban ye yea amma'de ye ga mi tu Soko be tuci'u yin a de etun ye ndondo nan'a tayakpe naa. Akika Soko-Etsu gafara uyio Etsu ye gun uyio.

column2: Only those are Believers who have believed in Allah and His Messenger and have never since doubted but have striven with their belongings and their persons in the Cause of Allah: Such are the sincere ones.Akika muminizhi a ga yi za nanzhi'a imani jin be Sokoe be tuci'u yin nao amae jin kelo kezhin'a amae kezhe gun kun be dukiyaazhi be nankankpaceazhi eti eko yan Soko nan zawuncizhi ga yi eza gashiya zhio.
Say: "What! Will ye instruct Allah about your religion But Allah knows all that is in the heavens and on earth: He has full knowledge of all things.
column3: Gan gan: kashiy ye wa gan ye'a la la wu Soko gan ye'jin adini Ngban Soko yibe kpikpe yan yannazhiy fi sanmazhio to kin bo nan akika Soko yi be kpikpe yandonde.

column2: They impress on thee as a favour that they have embraced Islam. Say "Count not your Islam as a favour upon me: Nay Allah has conferred a favour upon you that He has guided you to the faith if ye be true and sincere.
column3: E sa wyozhi gan a ya zhe musulumizhi gan gan: Ega ka'ra sa mi zhi yan musulunci ye ma. Ngan Soko tsa'a sa ye zhio ebo nanwuna'a ye wuba da eko imani nan wun'a yi eza gaskiyazhi tsa ye yio nan.

column2: "Verily Allah knows the secrets of the heavens and the earth: and Allah Sees well all that ye do."
column3: Akika Soko yi be kpikpe yan yannanzhiy swo fi sanmazhio to kin bo nan Soko mae cin ye le be iri etun nanzhiy ye lo

column2: O ye who believe! Violate not the sanctity of the symbols of Allah nor of the sacred month nor of the animals brought for sacrifice nor the garlands that mark out such animals nor the people resorting to the sacred house seeking of the bounty and good pleasure of their Lord. But when ye are clear of the sacred precincts and of pilgrim garb ye may hunt and let not the hatred of some people in (once) shutting you out of the Sacred Mosque lead you to transgression (and hostility on your part). Help ye one another in righteousness and piety but help ye not one another in sin and rancour: fear Allah: for Allah is strict in punishment
column3: Ya ye nazhia imani jin na! Ega kara gigwafi ekpo yan ibada Soko zhi saya ma ye mae ga sa alfurma yan etswa alfurma ya ma to hadaya (dabba naezun etun hajio na) to yannazhi aga lagwo dabba yan hadayazhi na to za nazhie kpa ziyara kata alfurma acie wa falala yan tsocia za gannibe yardau yin na ma. Ye ma ga bea dzun tinya haramio to ye gbe gbe wo. Ye mae ga lugwa nanvo ye be zandocizhi ebona aye kan masallaci harami-ynlo na la ye da gbin iyaka tu ma. Ye mae jin dozhi taimako eti gbigba yan Soko be dansun sokoe ye mae ga jin dozhi taimako eti lefio be gbin gbintu iyakae ma ye mae tswa Soko akika Soko Etsu uyio na gbota azabao na.

column2: Forbidden to you (for food) are: dead meat blood the flesh of swine and that on which hath been invoked the name of other than Allah; that which hath been killed by strangling or by a violent blow or by a headlong fall or by being gored to death; that which hath been (partly) eaten by a wild animal; unless ye are able to slaughter it (in due form); that which is sacrificed on stone (altars); (forbidden) also is the division (of meat) by raffling with arrows: that is impiety. This day have those who reject faith given up all hope of your religion: yet fear them not but fear Me. This day have I perfected your religion for you completed My favour upon you and have chosen for you Islam as your religion. But if any is forced by hunger with no inclination to transgression Allah is indeed Oft-forgiving Most Merciful
column3: A eyan tsutsuci la'ajin haramu ya ye to egya to nakan kpu'utsun to eyan zunzunci na'atun sunna yandoci ye ta eti'ubo na'jin yan Soko'a na to dabba na'atswanni ci wu'una to na'awu be kagboe na to na pinzhin kin dagan fitio cia tsu na to na'atun yan cia tsuna to na yankungizhi sa gi na sai de na yetso ga zun na. To na'zun eti kutio na (haramu uyio). Ye mae ga ganyan tsakaniebo be cice yan akpazhi eti cacao ma wuncin kpata etun fasikanci ayio. Yinna nana kafirizhiia kawna ba'ani eti adiniyebo ebo acin'o ega sundan'a ma ye de sundan Mi (Soko). Yinna Mia adini ye gunmi yaye Mi ma ni'ima mi la'a shekpa ta eti yebo Mi ma yeda jin gan Musulunci uga yi adini (eko izhele) ye yeo. To za na hali ga beu ladan larura yan madan tsuntsunnuo na ujin gan wyun'e ya kansan ya lo eba lefi boana Soko Etsu gafara uyio Etsu yegun uyio.

column2: They ask thee what is lawful to them (as food). Say: lawful unto you are (all) things good and pure: and what ye have taught your trained hunting animals (to catch) in the manner directed to you by Allah: eat what they catch for you but pronounce the name of Allah over it: and fear Allah; for Allah is swift in taking account
column3: E' gbin wyo gan gan kizhi alajin halali ya a yao Gan gan: "A" yannazhi yi lilici na la'ajin halali yaye. To yannazhi ye ga lawu yankungizhi na'a gbe na ye laa ekpa wangi ye mae wua yanzhi mini yannazhi Soko la wu ye na. E gi dagan mini yanna aga wan aciu tswa ya ye na ye mae la sunna Sokoe tun ye etiubo ye mae sundan Soko akika Soko Etsu Uyio na fan eba egagbao na.

column2: This day are (all) things good and pure made lawful unto you. The food of the People of the Book is lawful unto you and yours is lawful unto them. (Lawful unto you in marriage) are (not only) chaste women who are believers but chaste women among the People of the Book revealed before your time- when ye give them their due dowers and desire chastity not lewdness nor secret intrigues if any one rejects faith fruitless is his work and in the Hereafter he will be in the ranks of those who have lost (all spiritual good)
column3: Yinna a yangici lilicizhi la'azhe halali yaye to yangici yan za nazhi ala litafi ya na halali uyio yaye yangici yetso ma halali uyi ya'ao. To yinzagizhi nazhie wan'tia dan na mini muminizhio to yinzagi nazhie wan'tia dan na dagan mini za nazhi'ala litafi ya shi ye dzo na kamina ye ga sadakiazhi la ya'a na ye ma'a lo lo eti yawo jin'o ujin eti yancin da boa uma jin eti eya daboa. Zandondo na ga'ajin kafirinci be imani na akika etun'u wun'a gbin ya u ma ga'a fe dan mini eza hasara zhio Efo Alkiyamiy.

column2: O ye who believe! when ye prepare for prayer wash your faces and your hands (and arms) to the elbows; Rub your heads (with water); and (wash) your feet to the ankles. If ye are in a state of ceremonial impurity bathe your whole body. But if ye are ill or on a journey or one of you cometh from offices of nature or ye have been in contact with women and ye find no water then take for yourselves clean sand or earth and rub therewith your faces and hands Allah doth not wish to place you in a difficulty but to make you clean and to complete his favour to you that ye may be grateful
column3: Ya ye nazhia imani jin na! Yega nakin cia da jin swalla yea fuskayezhi na to egwa yezhi har dabe gwakpaye mae la eti yezhie fin to bicyezhi (yeu na) har da kukungi guba'ba. Ye mae ga'fe be janabae to yea nuwan yan lili fu.Ye ma ga'fe dan ci'gun'o ko ma ye ta eti ezan'okoma zaeni miniyebo a fe tinya dagan shekpatao koma ye keba be iyaliezhiy gancin ye ci de nuwan'a to e wa danna jikanna lilici ye cie jin taimama' ye la fuska yezhie fin to egwa yezhi dagan miniubo. Sokoe wa gan wyun'U la bapin ndoci u ta ye yea amma'ade wyun'e wa wa gan wyun'u la ye yeu li. U mau la ni'ima wyun'u shekpan'u ta eti yebo. Ujin-wo be wunci'y ye yea jin yebo ya Soko.

column2: And call in remembrance the favour of Allah unto you and His covenant which He ratified with you when ye said: "We hear and we obey": And fear Allah for Allah knoweth well the secrets of your hearts
column3: Ye mae pa ni'ima Soko na ta eti yebo na to alkawaliU natso wyun'a fin ye keba be yin na kamina ye gan; "Yi wo yima emi tu". Ye mae sundan Soko akika Soko Etsu kpikpe uyio be yanna zhifi yangban zhio na.

column2: O ye who believe! stand out firmly for Allah as witnesses to fair dealing and let not the hatred of others to you make you swerve to wrong and depart from justice. Be just: that is next to piety: and fear Allah. For Allah is well-acquainted with all that ye do
column3: Ya ye nazhia imani jin na! Yea kugikini be kagboe ebo Soko ye laefe eri jincizhi be adalinciy. Ye mae ga lugwa nanvo ye be zandocizhiy a ye la har yejin adalincia ma. Ejin adalinci wuncin ga tsoba dansun Soko gan'o. Ye mae fe wo dansun Soko akika Soko yi be kpikpe yan etu nazhi ye lo na.

column2: To those who believe and do deeds of righteousness hath Allah promised forgiveness and a great reward
column3: Soko jin alkawali be za nazhia imani jin acie lo'tun wangizhi na yan gafara jin be egagba yan la'da na wancin na.

column2: Those who reject faith and deny our signs will be companions of Hell-fire
column3: Za nazhi ma'ajin kafirinci na acia aya yi yi ganmana na za wuncinzhi gayi masoyi ena zhio.

column2: O ye who believe! Call in remembrance the favour of Allah unto you when certain men formed the design to stretch out their hands against you but (Allah) held back their hands from you: so fear Allah. And on Allah let believers put (all) their trust
column3: Ya ye nazhia imani jin na! Efe pa ni'ima Soko na ta eti ye bo na lokaci na jama'a ndocizhi fe kpa gan a ta egwa egun'azhi be kpeye na Soko cia egwa'azhi kan ke ebo yezhi lugwa na ye mae fe sundan Soko muminizhi ma a la'a ya'kpe Soko.

column2: Allah did aforetime take a covenant from the Children of Israel and we appointed twelve captains among them. And Allah said: "I am with you: if ye (but) establish regular prayers practise regular charity believe in my messengers honour and assist them and loan to Allah a beautiful loan verily I will wipe out from you your evils and admit you to gardens with rivers flowing beneath; but if any of you after this resisteth faith he hath truly wandered from the path or rectitude."
column3: Akika Soko ma la alkawali be Banu Isra'ila zhiy Yi ci li nunsa guwo be gubae dagan miniabo Soko ci gan: Akika mi midan ganni be ye yin yega swalla kugikini nayecia zakka dukiya yezhi wa na yecia imani jin be Tuci mizhiy ye ci jin'a taimako yeci man Soko eyan wangi akika miga etun dede yezhi finya yaye akika Mi ma ga ye la'agandan Aljannazhio nazhi nuwan eduzhie je' fi takoabo na gancin zana gabeajin kafirinci miniebo baci wuncio na akika za wuncin'a gbin ke eko gboro lugwa.

column2: But because of their breach of their covenant We cursed them and made their hearts grow hard; they change the words from their (right) places and forget a good part of the message that was sent them nor wilt thou cease to find them- barring a few - ever bent on (new) deceits: but forgive them and overlook (their misdeeds): for Allah loveth those who are kind
column3: To ebo alkawaliazhi nazhi a lo ya na Yi yia emi bo kpea yicia yangban'azhi la'azhe wiwoci kpakparae acie zhe egan zhi'gba ke danna'azhi lugwa acia eyankozhi nazhia san'atu na batan wyo ma'ala ke yaboa wyo afe taye le hainci (eta) ye dagan eba'abo saide zadegi miniabo (tsa wa kao). Ebo acin'o fa bea yin wyo mao dzun gan hainci naejin na. Akika Sokoe wa za nazhi gaejin bolobolo na.

column2: From those too who call themselves Christians We did take a covenant but they forgot a good part of the message that was sent them: so we estranged them with enmity and hatred between the one and the other to the day of judgment. And soon will Allah show them what it is they have done
column3: Yima ke la alkawali dagan eba zanazhi gan: "Yi de akika Nasara yiyio na acia eyanko ndoci batan mini yannazhi a san'atu beyin na. Yi cia ewunsun be nanvo dozhi la'a da tsa kaniabo be dozhi harda Efo Alkiyami. Soko ma'aya'a labari yan etun nazhi afe lo (izheo) na.

column2: O people of the Book! There hath come to you our Messenger revealing to you much that ye used to hide in the Book and passing over much (that is now unnecessary): There hath come to you from Allah a (new) light and a perspicuous Book
column3: Ya ye za ba litafizhi! Akika Tuci Yi be yaye ucie jin bayani yaye yan ekundondo mini yannazhi ye fe swo dagan mini litafio na umae jin sawki yaye yan ekundondo eyanzhi. Akika haske-ko dabe ya ye dagan eba Soko ganni be Litafi na'atula na.

column2: Wherewith Allah guideth all who seek His good pleasure to ways of peace and safety and leadeth them out of darkness by His will unto the light- guideth them to a path that is straight.Be'uyin Sokoe laufe bawu ya za na ga'mitu etun nazhi ujin yerda be yin ta eti ekpa amincizhio na. U mae la'adzun tinya dagan bazhikozhio da haske be iziniu yin U mae wuaba lo eko natso yi gboro na.

In blasphemy indeed are those that say that Allah is Christ the son of Mary. Say: "Who then hath the least power against Allah if His will were to destroy Christ the son of Mary his mother and all every - one that is on the earth For to Allah belongeth the dominion of the heavens and the earth and all that is between. He createth what He pleaseth. For Allah hath power over all things."
column3: Akika za nazhi gan gan: "Akika Masihu egi Maryama U ga yi Soko na" ajin kafirinci. Gan gan: Zi'I danbo na'a kangwa yandoci wo dagan eba Soko bo Soko gaakpa gan wyunga Masihu egi Maryama to Nnau to zanazhi fi kinbo kpata na jin hallaka nao Soko ga ma wun mulki sanmazhi to kin to yannazhi fi tsakaniabo kpata nao wyun'ejin alitta yanna ga bau na. Soko ma Etsu iko Uyio ta eti yandondo.

column2: (Both) the Jews and the Christians say: "We are sons of Allah and his beloved." Say: "Why then doth He punish you for your sins Nay ye are but men- of the men he hath created: He forgiveth whom He pleaseth and He punisheth whom He pleaseth: and to Allah belongeth the dominion of the heavens and the earth and all that is between: and unto Him is the final goal (of all)"
column3: Yahuduzhi to Nasarazhi gan: "Yi ga yi egi Soko zhi to masoyiuzhio". Gan gan: To kila ucie jin ye azazba be zunubiyezhi yin'o A'a yede zawangizhiye yio mini alittauzhi bo wyun'e fa be za na ga bau na umae jin za na ga bauna azaba. Soko ga ma wun mulki sanmazhi to kin to yannazhi fi tsakaniabo nao. ebau gaboma ezhekeba dan'o.

column2: O People of the Book! Now hath come unto you making (things) clear unto you Our Messenger after the break in (the series of) our messengers lest ye should say: "There came unto us no bringer of glad tidings and no warner (from evil)": But now hath come unto you a bringer of glad tidings and a warner (from evil). And Allah hath power over all things
column3: Ya ye zaba litafizhi! Akika Tuci yi be ya ye wyun'ejin bayani ya ye eti lokaci bibatu yan Tucizhio ebo ye be gan gan: Ade zandondo nae ya labari yangban fana ko nae na wun na na be eba yi na'a akika ma zanae ya bushara yangbanfa na to za nae na-wun na dabe eba ye yeani. Soko ma Etsu iko Uyio ta eti yandondo.

column2: Remember Moses said to his people: "O my people! Call in remembrance the favour of Allah unto you when He produced prophets among you made you kings and gave you what He had not given to any other among the peoples
column3: To kamina Musa gangan be jama'a yan'uzhi na: Ya ye jama'a yan mizhi efe pa ni'ima Soko na ta eti yebo na Ula Annabizhi tinya mini yebo uma ye la'agi etsuzhi uma ya ye yanna ula ya zandondo mini alitazhi boa na.

column2: "O my people! Enter the holy land which Allah hath assigned unto you and turn not back ignominiously for then will ye be overthrown to your own ruin."
column3: Ya ye jama'a yan mizhi! Egandan kin nayi danna lilici na na Soko a ka shidzo yayena ye mae ga ya zuma ma ebo ye bea zhegba yeazhe eza asarazhi ma.

column2: They said: "O Moses! In this land are a people of exceeding strength: Never shall we enter it until they leave it: if (once) they leave then shall we enter."
column3: A gan: Ya wyoe Musa! Akika jama'a kagboci ndocizhi fi miniubo akikama yi yia gandan nin yan'ubo woa sai aga tinya dagan miniubo to aga tinya dagan miniubo gancin akika yiga gandan.

column2: (But) among (their) Allah-fearing men were two on whom Allah had bestowed His grace: They said: "Assault them at the (proper) Gate: when once ye are in victory will be yours; But on Allah put your trust if ye have faith."
column3: Eza bagi guba mini za nazhie sundan Soko na nazhi Soko twa'arya be ni'imae na a gan: E gan fia dagan eko misun'o ebona ye ga'gandan akika yega'ade zankpe ta etiabo. Soko tsa ma yea yakpeo wun'ayi muminizhi ga ya yio na.

column2: They said: "O Moses! while they remain there never shall we be able to enter to the end of time. Go thou and thy Lord and fight ye two while we sit here (and watch)."
column3: A ci gan: Ya wyoe Musa! Akika yi'a gandanbo tutunyin'a ade gayi fibo na'a ebo acin'o fe lo to wyoe to Tsoci wyoe ye fe dae gunkun akika yide babo ga yi yia zhio.

column2: He said: "O my Lord! I have power only over myself and my brother: so separate us from this rebellious people!"
column3: Ugan: Ya wyoe Tsoci mi! Akika mijin mulki zandondo woa sai eti tacin mitsobe yegi mi' yin eboacin'o a gingan la'dan tsakani yibobe jama'a nazhi yi fasikizhi na.

column2: He said: "O my Lord! I have power only over myself and my brother: so separate us from this rebellious people!"
column3: Ugan: Ya wyoe Tsoci mi! Akika mijin mulki zandondo woa sai eti tacin mitsobe yegi mi' yin eboacin'o a gingan la'dan tsakani yibobe jama'a nazhi yi fasikizhi na.

column2: Allah said: "Therefore will the land be out of their reach for forty years: In distraction will they wander through the land: But sorrow thou not over these rebellious people.
column3: (Soko) ci gan: Akika kin wunci wun'azhe haramu ya;a har yan eya shiba a fe za-zakpe ti kinbo eti kpere. Ebo acin'oga nyin yangban ya jamaa; yan fasikizhima.

column2: Recite to them the truth of the story of the two sons of Adam. Behold! they each presented a sacrifice (to Allah): It was accepted from one but not from the other. Said the latter: "Be sure I will slay thee." "Surely" said the former "Allah doth accept of the sacrifice of those who are righteous
column3: Wyo mao gba labari yan egi guba yan Adamuo ya'a be gaskiyae lokaci na a zun dabba za guba'ba acia yan zaeni gwo ama gwo yan zaba cia. Ugan: Akika mi gaowu "Uci gan" Akika de Soko ajin'ugwo etun gwo dagan eba zanazhi gae sundan Soko na.

column2: "If thou dost stretch thy hand against me to slay me it is not for me to stretch my hand against thee to slay thee: for I do fear Allah the cherisher of the worlds
column3: Akika ka wyo ga ta egwa wye be eba mi ebo wyo la mi yan'o wu mi fe zana'a tagwa be eba wyoe ebo min'la wyo yin wu na'a. Akika mie sundan Soko Etsu nae kpa alittazhi kpata na.

column2: "For me I intend to let thee draw on thyself my sin as well as thine for thou wilt be among the companions of the fire and that is the reward of those who do wrong."
column3: Akika mie kpa gan wyo lao zheban be lefimiyin keba be yan wyo yin ebo wyo laofeodan mini egi 'mi'nazhio. Wuncin gama yi egagba yan azwalumizhio.

column2: The (selfish) soul of the other led him to the murder of his brother: he murdered him and became (himself) one of the lost ones.Ucia sa fiu yan gban'o na uga yegi'uwu na uma ciu'wu ga gan cin ucia tinba wyun'afe dan mini eza hasarazhio.

Then Allah sent a raven who scratched the ground to show him how to hide the shame of his brother. "Woe is me!" said he; "Was I not even able to be as this raven and to hide the shame of my brother" then he became full of regrets
column3: Soko cia kwankwa ndoci tun tun uci fe da gba kin ebo ulau'wu'u kendoe uga swo ekun yegiu swona. Uci gan "Kasa mi re! Ngba mi ga'a gbakpan na mia jin dozhin kendoe kwankwa nana jin nana miga ekun yan yegi mi swona Ucia tinba wyun'afe dan mini za nazhieti robonkpe na.

column2: On that account: We ordained for the Children of Israel that if any one slew a person - unless it be for murder or for spreading mischief in the land - it would be as if he slew the whole people: and if any one saved a life it would be as if he saved the life of the whole people. Then although there came to them Our messengers with clear signs yet even after that many of them continued to commit excesses in the land
column3: Ebo dalili wuncin'o Yiciu la jin wajibi ta eti Bani Israilazhio kede akika zandondo na ga rayi wu na Uma yi be hakki yan rayi ndocia na koma eyan nyin kpe eti kinboa na to le fi za wuncin uyi ke yan za na'a zawangizhi kpata ku wu na za na maga rayi nini dan rayi na la'adau yi ke za na;a zawangizhi kpata dan rayi na Akika ma Tuci Yizhi be ya;a be bayanizhi gancin akika kundondo miniabo baci wuncin'o afe za nazhi nyin yan kpe eti kinbo na.

column2: The punishment of those who wage war against Allah and His Messenger and strive with might and main for mischief through the land is: execution or crucifixion or the cutting off of hands and feet from opposite sides or exile from the land: that is their disgrace in this world and a heavy punishment is theirs in the Hereafter
column3: Akika egagba yan za nazhie gun kun be Sokoe to be Tunci Uyin na acie lotun fikinbo eti eyan nyin'o na (gara da) uga yi ala'a wu ko ma ala'afosa koma ala egwa'zhi to biciazhi'a ko'aya eti cice leba dozhio koma ala'a nyan dagan kinbo.Wuncin zun yesun uyi ya'ao dan mini izheo azaba na ma wancin na ga'ajin tabbata ya'a dan emi zobao.

column2: Except for those who repent before they fall into your power: in that case know that Allah is Oft-forgiving Most Merciful
column3: Sai de za nazhi ga tuba jin tun kafi ye' de zankpe' ta eti abona. Ye mae kpe' wo ke Soko Etsu gafara uyio Etsu yegu ma uyio na.

column2: O ye who believe! Do your duty to Allah seek the means of approach unto Him and strive with might and main in his cause: that ye may prosper
column3: Ya ye nazhia imani jin na! Esundan Soko 'ye mae wa ekpa na yega'de tsonba lobau na yemaefe'jin jihadi (kokari) ta eti eko Soko (ujin wo) be wuncin'y ye ga'de robo (yan izhe to Alkiyami).

column2: As to those who reject Faith- if they had everything on earth and twice repeated to give as ransom for the penalty of the Day of Judgment it would never be accepted of them theirs would be a grievous penalty
column3: Akika za nazhia jin kafirinci na da'aci gan yannazhi fi kinbo kpata na aga wun'o to ndoci dozhin'ube ebo ala'asa etia dagan azaba Efo Alkiyamiy a gwo egwa'aboa azaba nama tan saranyinna ga'jin tabbata ya'a.

column2: Their wish will be to get out of the Fire but never will they get out therefrom: their penalty will be one that endures.
column3: E'wa gan' ala'adzun'a tin'aya dagan mini enao ama jin za nazhia dzun tinya bo na'a azaba na tsoa fedun na wun'a jin tabbata ya'a.

column2: As to the thief Male or female cut off his or her hands: a punishment by way of example from Allah for their crime: and Allah is Exalted in power
column3: To igbeci bagi to igbeci yinzagi yea egwa'azhi gubaba ko ya egagba uyio yan woce na 'ace nao azaba yan ewunna uyio dagan eba Soko. Soko ma Etsu zankpe uyio Etsu hikima uyio.

column2: But if the thief repents after his crime and amends his conduct Allah turneth to him in forgiveness; for Allah is Oft-forgiving Most Merciful
column3: Zandondo na ga tuba jin na baci yan zwalunci na ujin na uci kezhea haliu tadzu na akika Soko Etsu ga'fara uyio Etsu yegun uyio.

column2: Knowest thou not that to Allah (alone) belongeth the dominion of the heavens and the earth He punisheth whom He pleaseth and He forgiveth whom He pleaseth: and Allah hath power over all things
column3: Kashi wyo kpe kpe gan akika Soko ga wun mulki samazhi to kin yin'o wyun'ejin za na ga ba una azaba Soko ma de kagbo ta eti yandondo'.

column2: O Messenger! let not those grieve thee who race each other into unbelief: (whether it be) among those who say "We believe" with their lips but whose hearts have no faith; or it be among the Jews- men who will listen to any lie- will listen even to others who have never so much as come to thee. They change the words from their (right) times and places: they say "If ye are given this take it but if not beware!" If any one´s trial is intended by Allah thou hast no authority in the least for him against Allah. For such - it is not Allah´s will to purify their hearts. For them there is disgrace in this world and in the Hereafter a heavy punishment
column3: Ya wyoe Tuci! Ga lugwa bojin za nazhie san-ngan na fi mini kafircio na nyin wyoe yangban ma dagan mini za nazhie gan tinya misun'azhio gan: Yi yia imani jin na imani matun yangban' a na. To mini yahuduzhio nazhie dokun be tukpashi egan eza gamana zhi na nazhie shi tukpa egan zandocizhi na e be eba wyoyia sai de a fe wa gan ala eganzhia zhegba ke dan nauzhi lugwa acie gangan: "Aga ya ye nana to ye' gwo ka gan ama be la ya yee ma to etswa minie zae ni ndondo na Soko ga'akpa gan wun'a jin;u fitina na wyo gwo gwa yandondo yau wo gwata Soko boa. Za wuncinzhi ga Soko kpa be lili yangban'azhi yin'ao zunyesun ga' jin tabbata ya'a dan mini izheo azaba na ma wancin na ga jin tabbata ya'a dan Efo zobao.

column2: (They are fond of) listening to falsehood of devouring anything forbidden. If they do come to thee either judge between them or decline to interfere. If thou decline they cannot hurt thee in the least. If thou judge judge in equity between them. For Allah loveth those who judge in equity
column3: Ezazhi ayio nazhie dokun be tukpshiy ya ganmana na amae dokun be gi gi haramuy ebo acin'o aga be eba wyoe jin hukunci tsakaniabo ko ma wyo dzun gan'abo. Wyo ma ga'a dzun gan'abo ala egun ndondo tso wyoe woa wyo ma ga'ajin hukunci to jin hukunci tsakaniabo be adalinciy. Akika Soko wyun'e wa za nazhi gae jin adalinci na.

column2: But why do they come to thee for decision when they have (their own) law before them- therein is the (plain) command of Allah; yet even after that they would turn away. For they are not (really) People of Faith
column3: Ki ma la acie be ba wyoe eti hukunci bo ala'li ma litafi' Attaura danbeayin miniubo ma hukunci Soko danbo ganci acie la zunma zheta ba'aci yan bayani wuncin 'bo Za wuncinzhi nazhie jin aninga na ajin muminizhia.

column2: It was We who revealed the law (to Moses): therein was guidance and light. By its standard have been judged the Jews by the prophets who bowed (as in Islam) to Allah´s will by the rabbis and the doctors of law: for to them was entrusted the protection of Allah´s book and they were witnesses thereto: therefore fear not men but fear me and sell not my signs for a miserable price. If any do fail to judge by (the light of) what Allah hath revealed they are (no better than) Unbelievers
column3: Akika yicin litafi Attaura miniubo mabawu danbo to haske Annabizhi nazhia kpatsun ta ya foro Soko baenio na e laujinhukunci ya yahuduzhi to man nazhie wuzazhi ba lo eba Soko na to man kpikpezhi be iri yanna awa bea yin yan tswitswa litafi Soko na atsoma;afe eri yacizhi eti wuncin'o. Ebo acin'o ega sundan zawangizhi ma e sundan Mi ye maega la aya mi dashi eyan tetengi izhe ma. Zandondo na mae jin hukunci be yanna Soko cinzhin yin'ana to zawuncinzhi ga yi kafiri zhio.

column2: We ordained therein for them: "Life for life eye for eye nose or nose ear for ear tooth for tooth and wounds equal for equal." But if any one remits the retaliation by way of charity it is an act of atonement for himself. And if any fail to judge by (the light of) what Allah hath revealed they are (No better than) wrong-doers
column3: Yi ma hukunci jin tiile ta eti abo dan miniubo kede ala rayia wu na wyuntso ga rayi wuna ala eya za'awa wyuntso ga wa za eye na to eye be eye to tukpa be tukpae to yikan be yikan'e to eba eba yinzhio egagba yan jinjinga ga wunayio. Gancin za na ga be fa ucia yan wyin jin sadaka na to wuncin ga'afe kafara yau. Zandondona mae jin hukunci be yan na Soko cin be yin'a na to za wuncinzhi ga yi azwalumizhio.

column2: And in their footsteps We sent Jesus the son of Mary confirming the Law that had come before him: We sent him the Gospel: therein was guidance and light and confirmation of the Law that had come before him: a guidance and an admonition to those who fear Allah
column3: Yicia dida la'adan eti eta'azhio be Isah egi Maryamuy wyun'e ya gaskiya be yanna be shiudzo dagan mini Attaurao na yi ma litafi Injeela la'a yau miniubo bawu danbo to haske wyuntso mae ya gaskiya be yan na beshidzo dagan mini Attaurao na Uma yi bawu be wa'aziy ya za nazhi gae sundan Soko na.

column2: Let the people of the Gospel judge by what Allah hath revealed therein. If any do fail to judge by (the light of) what Allah hath revealed they are (no better than) those who rebel
column3: To jama'a yan litafi Injeeluzhi ajin hukunci be yanna Soko cin be fi bo na. Zandondo na maejin hukunci be yanna Soko cin be yin'a na to za wuncinzhi agayi fasikizhio.

column2: To thee We sent the Scripture in truth confirming the scripture that came before it and guarding it in safety: so judge between them by what Allah hath revealed and follow not their vain desires diverging from the Truth that hath come to thee. To each among you have we prescribed a law and an open way. If Allah had so willed He would have made you a single people but (His plan is) to test you in what He hath given you: so strive as in a race in all virtues. The goal of you all is to Allah; it is He that will show you the truth of the matters in which ye dispute
column3: Yi ma litafi cin bea ya wyoe be gaskiyae na mae ya gaskiya be yanna zhi be shiudzo dagan mini litafio na na ma kezhe afe etswa ta eti abo na. Ebo acin'o jin hukunci tsakaniabo be yanna Soko cin beyn na wyo mao ga la 'mi tu etun yangban'azhi ke yanna be ya wyoe dagan mini gaskiyao na lugwa ma. Zandondo mini ebo yi yia sharia la'a yau be kendoe uga' dada cia emi tu'u na. Be ma wun'a ba Soko ba da uga ye la'afe alumma nini ke'te' ammaade ebo u ma ye yeu cin'u le dan mini erytwa nazhi ula ya ye nao. Ebo acin'o efe sanganna dan jin jin alhe'ri zhio Baenio eba Soko bo ezhekebae dan'o gancin Ucia ya ye labari be yannazhi ye fe ce dozhi leba fi miniabo na.

column2: Do they then seek after a judgment of (the days of) ignorance But who for a people whose faith is assured can give better judgment than Allah
column3: Kashi hukunci yan jahilizhi (nazhi kpe Soko yea na) wyun ga e'wa zao Zi'I ma danbo na'ajin bolo gan eba hukunci jin'o na'agan Soko nao ya za nazhi imaniazhi agboka nao.

column2: O ye who believe! take not the Jews and the Christians for your friends and protectors: They are but friends and protectors to each other. And he amongst you that turns to them (for friendship) is of them. Verily Allah guideth not a people unjust
column3: Ya ye nazhia imani jin na! Ega la yahuduzhi to Nasarazhi eya mancizhi ma. Sashiazhi eya mancizhi ayio ya sashio. Zandondo na magae la'a eyamanci mini ebo na to akika wyun tso afe dan mini abo. Aakika Sokoe la-jama'a yan azwalumizhi ke eko wangia.

column2: Those in whose hearts is a disease - thou seest how eagerly they run about amongst them saying: "We do fear lest a change of fortune bring us disaster." Ah! perhaps Allah will give (thee) victory or a decision according to His will. Then will they repent of the thoughts which they secretly harboured in their hearts.
column3: Wyo a le za nazhi batan fi yangban'azhio na ye e'dinye da lo dan miniabo acie gan gan: Yi e'sundan ebo masiba ndoci be tswan yi ma. "To kengi uyio na Sokoa la eko kpe ndoci beyn koma foro ndoci dagan nko Ubo gancin acia bea fe za nazhi eti ro-- nkpe na eti eyan (dede) nazhi afe swofi yangban'azhio na.

column2: And those who believe will say: "Are these the men who swore their strongest oaths by Allah that they were with you" All that they do will be in vain and they will fall into (nothing but) ruin
column3: Za nazhi ma'aimani jin na cie gan gan: Ngba zanazhi ga zhikuti be Sokoe har da iyaka kutizhiazhi kede akika be ye yin adan'o nao Etun'azhi a gbin ya acia fe eza hasarazhi.

column2: O ye who believe! if any from among you turn back from his Faith soon will Allah produce a people whom He will love as they will love Him- lowly with the believers mighty against the rejecters fighting in the way of Allah and never afraid of the reproaches of such as find fault. That is the grace of Allah which He will bestow on whom He pleaseth. And Allah encompasseth all and He knoweth all things
column3: Ya ye nazhia imani jin na! Zaeni ndondo na ga ridda jin cia adiniu nyin ya miniebo na to Soko otso' a la zandocizhi be tinya Soko a yeboaatso maafe yebo Soko a fe dakpya ya muminizhi ama'afe wu zankpe ta eti kafirizhio. Afe jin jihadi ta eti eko Soko ama'a sun dan egan gan yan za nazhie gan'a yin na'a. Wuncin ma eryatwa uyio yan Soko na wyun'e laya za na ga bau na. Sokoma Etsu bagwo uyio Etsu kpi kpe uyio.

column2: Your (real) friends are (no less than) Allah His Messenger and the (fellowship of) believers- those who establish regular prayers and regular charity and they bow down humbly (in worship)
column3: Akika Ndakatako ye nayi eyamanciko ye na Ugayi Soko to Tuciu to zanazhia imani jin nao za nazhie ku swallah gikini na amae wa zakka na amae dokun be lulo yan ruku'-na.

column2: As to those who turn (for friendship) to Allah His Messenger and the (fellowship of) believers- it is the fellowship of Allah that must certainly triumph
column3: Zandondo na ga Soko la Ndakatako nayi eyamanciko na to Tuciu to zanazhia imani jin na to akika jama'a yan Soko zhi aga wun zankpeo.

column2: O ye who believe! take not for friends and protectors those who take your religion for a mockery or sport- whether among those who received the Scripture before you or among those who reject Faith; but fear ye Allah if ye have faith (indeed)
column3: Ya ye nazhia imani jin na! Ega la za nazhie la adini ye'mi acie la'u dzodzo dagan mini zaba litafizhi nazhi shiye dzo na to kafirizhi masoyizhi ma. Ye mae sundan Soko wun'ayi muminizhi ga ye yio na.

column2: When ye proclaim your call to prayer they take it (but) as mockery and sport; that is because they are a people without understanding
column3: Kamina Ye gae yi zazhi lo jin jin swalla na u la eyan emila be edzoe. Wuncin ma yi ebo na afe zanazhi de ankalia na.

column2: Say: "O people of the Book! Do ye disapprove of us for no other reason than that we believe in Allah and the revelation that hath come to us and that which came before (us) and (perhaps) that most of you are rebellious and disobedient"
column3: Gan gan: ya ye za ba litafizhi! Kashi ye le lefi yi le ye Wuncin dea yi ebo gaskita na yi ya be Sokoe na to yanna acin be zhiudzo na uma yi ebo na ekun dondo yezhi fasikizhi ye yio na.

column2: Say: "Shall I point out to you something much worse than this (as judged) by the treatment it received from Allah those who incurred the curse of Allah and His wrath those of whom some He transformed into apes and swine those who worshipped evil;- these are (many times) worse in rank and far more astray from the even path!"
column3: Gan gan: Ngba min ya ye labari yan yandoci na tso biye gan wuncin ega gbao eba Soko na Uga yi za na Soko u bo'mi ucia zhe wun beu yin nao ucia ndocizhi miniabo la'azhe ebegizhi tokpu'utsun zhi to nazhi wun tagutu (eyandedezhi) na. Zawunci zhi ga yi eza kinigi ba bi bi cizhio aga ma fu ya gan'o ke eko wangi lugwao.

column2: When they come to thee they say: "We believe": but in fact they enter with a mind against Faith and they go out with the same but Allah knoweth fully all that they hide
column3: Agan-gan-dan be kafirinciy atso ma de kpi kpi gan eti yan nazhi afe-swo na.

column2: Many of them dost thou see racing each other in sin and rancour and their eating of things forbidden. Evil indeed are the things that they do
column3: Wyo ma'ale kun-dondo miniabo ye afe san nin dan mini etun le'fio be gbin gbintu iyaka Sokoe to gigi azhi yan yangici haramuzhio. Akika bibi be gwosun'y ajin tabbata ya etun nazhie lo na.

column2: Why do not the rabbis and the doctors of Law forbid them from their (habit of) uttering sinful words and eating things forbidden Evil indeed are their works
column3: Ki'l la man yan Soko ye kpezhi to man wancikozhi ci kan'a egan le fizhi to gi gi yan haramua yin'o Akika bibi be gwosun'y wun'a jin tabbata ya etun nazhi a fe lo na.

column2: The Jews say: "Allah´s hand is tied up." Be their hands tied up and be they accursed for the (blasphemy) they utter. Nay both His hands are widely outstretched: He giveth and spendeth (of His bounty) as He pleaseth. But the revelation that cometh to thee from Allah increaseth in most of them their obstinate rebellion and blasphemy. Amongst them we have placed enmity and hatred till the Day of Judgment. Every time they kindle the fire of war Allah doth extinguish it; but they (ever) strive to do mischief on earth. And Allah loveth not those who do mischief
column3: Yahuduzhi ma gan: Egwa Soko a wan gwo. (u twarya wo bea ) A egwa'atso wanpa gwo kuruo ama'a bo'mi ebo egan (dede) na' agan na. A'a ujin acin'a egau guba ba kpikpeci ayio titacima'ayio gubaba' wyun'e la'aaya alittazhi kendoe ga bau na. Akika ma yan na acin be ya wyoe dagan eba Tsoci wyobo na wun;a be ekun dondo miniabo eti kagbo be kafirinciy-be. Yi ma ewun sun be nanvoe la'ace dan tsakaniabo har da Efo Alkiyami. Kandondo na aga ena dan yan ekun gun Sokoe la'u nu. Acie jin dalo dazhin fi kinbo eti eyan nyin'o ala'li ma Sokoe wa za za nazhie nyin yan na'a.

column2: If only the People of the Book had believed and been righteous We should indeed have blotted out their iniquities and admitted them to gardens of bliss
column3: Da' aci gan akika zaba litafizhi a imani jinjin aci sundan Soko da yi ga etun dedeazhi pa ya ya da yi ma ga'a lagandan Aljannazhio nazhi yi emi ni' ima na.

column2: If only they had stood fast by the Law the Gospel and all the revelation that was sent to them from their Lord they would have enjoyed happiness from every side. There is from among them a party on the right course: but many of them follow a course that is evil
column3: Da' aci gan a litafi Attaura to Injeela ku ku gikini to litafi ndoci na'acin be ya'a dagan eba Tsoci abo na da'a Soko maa fe ya'a yangici dagan fititiabo to dagan tako bicita'abo. Miniabo jama'azhi danbo nazhi yi za tatacin na ekun dondo miniabo ma etun nazhie lo na wun'a biye.

column2: O Messenger! proclaim the (message) which hath been sent to thee from thy Lord. If thou didst not thou wouldst not have fulfilled and proclaimed His mission. And Allah will defend thee from men (who mean mischief). For Allah guideth not those who reject Faith
column3: Ya wyoe Tuci! A wyan wu yan yanna acin be ya wyoe dagan eba Tsoci wyo bo na. kagan wyo ma jin acin'a to wyo wuyan etun na'atun wyo na'a dan'o na. Akika Sokoe la jama'a yan kafirizhi ke eko gunua.

column2: Say: "O People of the Book! ye have no ground to stand upon unless ye stand fast by the Law the Gospel and all the revelation that has come to you from your Lord." It is the revelation that cometh to thee from thy Lord that increaseth in most of them their obstinate rebellion and blasphemy. But sorrow thou not over (these) people without Faith
column3: Gan gan: "Ya ye zaba litafizhi! Ye yea fe ta eti yandondo yan cinwan boa sai ye ga litafi Attaura to Injeela la'a ku gikini to ndoci na'aga cin be ya ye dagan eba Tsoci ye bo na. Yan na ma'aacin be ya wyoe dagan eba Tsoci wyo bo na akika wun'a bea etikagbo be kafirinciybe. Ebo acin'o ga nyin yangban ya jama' yan kafirincizhi ma.

column2: Those who believe (in the Qur´an) those who follow the Jewish (scriptures) and the Sabians and the Christians- any who believe in Allah and the Last Day and work righteousness- on them shall be no fear nor shall they grieve
column3: Akika za nazhi imani jin nato za nazhi ga tuba jin mini yahuduzhio na to swabiuzhi(za nazhia pan ke eko lugwa na) to Nasarazhi ndondo na ga imani jin be Sokoe na to be Efo Alkiyami na uci kezhe lo tun wangi na to dansun danbo ya'a to yangban yin ndondo ma danbo ya'a.

column2: We took the covenant of the Children of Israel and sent them messengers every time there came to them a messenger with what they themselves desired not - some (of these) they called impostors and some they (go so far as to) slay
column3: Akika yi la alkawali br Bani Israilazhiyi ma tun Tucizhi fia kandondo na Tuci ga be ya'a be yan nazhi ba yangban'azhia na sashizhi u yi ganmana sashi ndoci ma a fe wu Tucizhi.

column2: They thought there would be no trial (or punishment); so they became blind and deaf; yet Allah (in mercy) turned to them; yet again many of them became blind and deaf. But Allah sees well all that they do
column3: Aci fe kpaye gan fitina ndondoa na'a gancin acia na ye a ma'a te tukpa gancin Soko ci fa bea yin gancin ekundondoazhi ci kezhea na 'ye acia te tukpa Soko mae cin'a le be iri etu nazhi e'lo na.

column2: They do blaspheme who say: "Allah is Christ the son of Mary." But said Christ: "O Children of Israel! worship Allah my Lord and your Lord." Whoever joins other gods with Allah- Allah will forbid him the garden and the Fire will be his abode. There will for the wrong-doers be no one to help
column3: Akika za nazhiga gan gan: "Akika Masihu egi Maryama gayi Soko na a jin kafirinci Masihu ma gan: "Ya ye Bani Israilazhie jin bauta ya Soko na yi Tsoci mi to Tsoci ye na. Akika zandondo nagae la yan pa Soko baci na akika Sokoa Aljanna la'azhe haramu yau ecin ba'uma yi ena azwalumizhi ma'ade zanazhia jin'a taimako na'a.

column2: They do blaspheme who say: "Allah is Christ the son of Mary." But said Christ: "O Children of Israel! worship Allah my Lord and your Lord." Whoever joins other gods with Allah- Allah will forbid him the garden and the Fire will be his abode. There will for the wrong-doers be no one to help.Akika za nazhiga gan gan: "
column3: Akika Masihu egi Maryama gayi Soko na a jin kafirinci Masihu ma gan: "Ya ye Bani Israilazhie jin bauta ya Soko na yi Tsoci mi to Tsoci ye na. Akika zandondo nagae la yan pa Soko baci na akika Sokoa Aljanna la'azhe haramu yau ecin ba'uma yi ena azwalumizhi ma'ade zanazhia jin'a taimako na'a

column2: They do blaspheme who say: Allah is one of three in a Trinity: for there is no god except One Allah. If they desist not from their word (of blasphemy) verily a grievous penalty will befall the blasphemers among them
column3: Akika za nazhi gan gan: Akika Soko za taci yan guta u yio' na a jin kafirinci ama de Tsoci ndocia sai de Tsoci nini ke'tekagan ma akegan be yannaegan na yan'a akika azaba na tan na ga'a two za nazhia jin kafirinci miniabo.

column2: Why turn they not to Allah and seek His forgiveness For Allah is Oft-forgiving Most Merciful
column3: Kashi a ga tuba jin lo eba Sokoa ama'a ba gafara be U yin'a; alali ma Soko Etsu gafara uyio Etsu yegun uma yio.

column2: Why turn they not to Allah and seek His forgiveness For Allah is Oft-forgiving Most Merciful.Kashi a ga tuba jin lo eba Sokoa ama'a ba gafara be U yin'a; alali ma Soko Etsu gafara uyio Etsu yegun uma yio.

Christ the son of Mary was no more than a messenger; many were the messengers that passed away before him. His mother was a woman of truth. They had both to eat their (daily) food. See how Allah doth make His signs clear to them; yet see in what ways they are deluded away from the truth!
column3: Masihu egi Maryama ufea sai de Tuci kawanyi Akika Tucizhima a be shiu dzoani nnau ma eza gaskiya uyio. Ama'a fe za nazhie gi yan gici na.Ngba cinle kendoe yie jin bayani ayazhi ya'a na gancin wyo mao cin'o le kendoe e'kua ke eko gaskiya lugwa na.

column2: Say: "Will ye worship besides Allah something which hath no power either to harm or benefit you But Allah- He it is that heareth and knoweth all things."
column3: Gan gan: Kashi ye ajin bauta yandoci yan Soko na de mulki ndoci ta eti eyan gun'o ko eyan anfani yaye yea na Soko ma Uga yi Etsu nae wo yandondo nao Etsu na yi be kpikpe yandondoe nao.

column2: Say: "O people of the Book! exceed not in your religion the bounds (of what is proper) trespassing beyond the truth nor follow the vain desires of people who went wrong in times gone by- who misled many and strayed (themselves) from the even way.
column3: Gan gan: Ya ye zaba litafizhi! Ega gwo iyaka gan dan adiniebo eti yan na jin gaskiya'a na ma ye mae ga la'mi tu etun yangbanzhi yan za nazhia gbin zhidzoani a ma ekun dondo zazhi gbin na ma. Atso ma'a gbin ke eko gborolugwa.

column2: Curses were pronounced on those among the Children of Israel who rejected Faith by the tongue of David and of Jesus the son of Mary: because they disobeyed and persisted in excesses
column3: A emibo kpe za nazhia jin kafirinci mini bani Israilazhio na be gintara Dawuda to Isa egi Maryamae. Wuncin ma ma yi ebo le'fia boamaafe za na zhie gbin iyaka tu na.

column2: Nor did they (usually) forbid one another the iniquities which they committed: evil indeed were the deeds which they did
column3: Afe e kan etun dede nazhie lo na'a. Akika etun nazhi afe lo na wun'a bi ye.

column2: Nor did they (usually) forbid one another the iniquities which they committed: evil indeed were the deeds which they did
column3: Afe e kan etun dede nazhie lo na'a. Akika etun nazhi afe lo na wun'a bi ye.

column2: Thou seest many of them turning in friendship to the Unbelievers. Evil indeed are (the works) which their souls have sent forward before them (with the result) that Allah´s wrath is on them and in torment will they abide
column3: Wyoa le ekundondo miniabo ye akafirizhi la masoyizhi. Akika yanna ala shidzo ya eti ta'cin'a na wun'a bi ye ebo na Sokoa zhe wun bea yin ama'afi mini azabao tutun yin.

column2: If only they had believed in Allah in the Prophet and in what hath been revealed to him never would they have taken them for friends and protectors but most of them are rebellious wrong-doers
column3: Da aci gan afe za nazhia imani jin be Sokoe to be Annabiy to yan na acin be yau na da a'la kafirizhi masoyizhia. Amma'ade ekundondo miniabo fasikizhi ayio.

column2: Strongest among men in enmity to the believers wilt thou find the Jews and Pagans; and nearest among them in love to the believers wilt thou find those who say "We are Christians": because amongst these are men devoted to learning and men who have renounced the world and they are not arrogant
column3: Akika wyoa tsun za nazhi gboka gan eba nanvo yaza nazhia imani jin na a ga yi Yahuduzhio to za nazhie la yan pa Soko baci na. Wyo ma'atsun nazhi tso ba'a gan eba cincin'o ya za nazhia imani jin na aga yi za nazhi gan gan: "Akika yi Nasarazhi yi yio nao". Wuncin ma yi ebo na ade Manzhi dan miniabo nazhia cin-dan kpikpe wao na to Man nazhi acin dan ibadao na hakikama ajin zanazhie lati dan fin'o naa.

column2: And when they listen to the revelation received by the Messenger thou wilt see their eyes overflowing with tears for they recognise the truth: they pray: "Our Lord! we believe; write us down among the witnesses
column3: Kamina aga wo yanna'acin be ya Tuci na wyo a le eyeazhi ye wun'e je egiye ebo kpikpe nazhi ade yan gaskiya na acie gan gan: "Tuci yi! yi yia gaskiya ya ebo acin'o a yi kadan mini eri jincizhio.

column2: "What cause can we have not to believe in Allah and the truth which has come to us seeing that we long for our Lord to admit us to the company of the righteous"
column3: Ki'ma dan be yi yin'o har na yi yia jin imani be Soko yin'a na yin'o to yanna be yayi yan gaskiyae naa yin'o Yi mae bavun gan Tsoci yi u la yi'u gan'udan (Aljannao) gan ni be za guruzhiy.

column2: And for this their prayer hath Allah rewarded them with gardens with rivers flowing underneath- their eternal home. Such is the recompense of those who do good
column3: Ebo acin'o Soko ci ga'a gba ebo egan na'aagan na be Aljannazhi nazhi nuwanzhie je fi takoabo na ama'fi bo fi tutun yin. Wuncin ga mayi egagba yan za nazhie jin bolobolo nao.

column2: But those who reject Faith and belie our Signs- they shall be companions of Hell-fire
column3: Zanazhi ma'ajin kafirinci na acia aya Yi zhi yi ganmana na za wuncinzhi ga yi eyamancizhi yan ena jahimao.

column2: O ye who believe! make not unlawful the good things which Allah hath made lawful for you but commit no excess: for Allah loveth not those given to excess
column3: Ya ye nazhia imani jin na! Ega la eyan managizhi na Soko la'jin halali ya ye na haramu ma ye mae ga gwo iyaka ganma. Akika Sokoe wa za nazhie gwo iyaka gan na'a.

column2: Eat of the things which Allah hath provided for you lawful and good; but fear Allah in Whom ye believe
column3: Ye mae gi dagan arziki na Soko la'ayaye na natso gayi halali uma yi lilici na ye mae sundan Soko na ye gan ye jin imani be yin na.

column2: Allah will not call you to account for what is futile in your oaths but He will call you to account for your deliberate oaths: for expiation feed ten indigent persons on a scale of the average for the food of your families; or clothe them; or give a slave his freedom. If that is beyond your means fast for three days. That is the expiation for the oaths ye have sworn. But keep to your oaths. Thus doth Allah make clear to you His signs that ye may be grateful
column3: Sokoa wan ye yea be kuti nazhi ye dazhi yan' ti kpere na'a amma'ade wyun'a wan ye be yanazhi ye ga ta kpankoro yeci zhi kuti na Ebo acin'o kafara (kutizhi ganmana) uyi yangici la ya ezagwagbagizhi guwo dagan mini yangici tatacin na ye'gi be iyali yezhi na ko ma ye' la tufuwazhie ya'ae' fan koma ye' la wuzhie sa ula'u zhe egi. Gancin zana be de nanazhia na to ufe azum yan fo guta. Wuncin ga yi kafara kutizhi yezhio ye ga kutizhi na. Yemae tswa kutizhi yezhi acin ga ga Sokoe jin bayani ayauzhi ya ye yio ujinwo be wuncin'y ye yea jin yebo (ya Soko).

column2: O ye who believe! Intoxicants and gambling (dedication of) stones and (divination by) arrows are an abomination- of Satan´s handwork: eschew such (abomination) that ye may prosper
column3: Ya ye nazhia imani jin na! Akika de' egye to caca to eyan wozhi to cice yan ekwazhi (ebo wiwa yan sa'a bo) shikan uyio dagan mini etun shetan bo 'ebo acin'o yea kpeya beu yin ujinwo be wuncin'y yega tso guri yezhi.

column2: Satan´s plan is (but) to excite enmity and hatred between you with intoxicants and gambling and hinder you from the remembrance of Allah and from prayer: will ye not then abstain
column3: Akika shetan de kpa gan wyun'ula ewunsun bedozhi to nanvo dozhi ula'u la'udan tsakani yebo be dozhi dan mini egyeo be cacae umau la ye yeu kan' uke pipa Soko to swalla jin'u lugwa. To ye lugwa gancin'a.

column2: Obey Allah and obey the Messenger and beware (of evil): if ye do turn back know ye that it is Our Messenger´s duty to proclaim (the message) in the clearest manner
column3: Ye mae la mietu Soko ye mae la mietu Tuci (Soko) ye mae tswa minie. Ye ma ga bea zunmazheta to ye kpe'wo kede yan na ta eti Tuci yibo na uga yi eyanwu na'atula nao.

column2: On those who believe and do deeds of righteousness there is no blame for what they ate (in the past) when they guard themselves from evil and believe and do deeds of righteousness- (or) again guard themselves from evil and believe- (or) again guard themselves from evil and do good. For Allah loveth those who do good
column3: Le fi danbo ta eti za nazhiga imani jin aci lo tun wangizhi dan mini yan nazhi aga gi na boa abeke aga'fe za nazhi tswa Soko naa acia imani jin aci lo tun wangizhi na gancin aci kezhe tswa Soko aci jin bolobolozhi na. Soko mae wa za nazhi gae jin bolobolo na.

column2: O ye who believe! Allah doth but make a trial of you in a little matter of game well within reach of game well within reach of your hands and your lances that He may test who feareth him unseen: any who transgress thereafter will have a grievous penalty
column3: Ya ye nazhia imani jin na! Akika Soko' amaye cinle be yandoci dagan mini egbe gbeo (Hajio) na egwa yezhi to ekpa yezhi'a wan ya ye na ebo Soko u la'u wu yan za na gae sundan Soko swiswoci na zandondona ma ga bea gbintu baci wuncin'o na to azaba na tan na ga'jin tabbata yau.

column2: O ye who believe! Kill not game while in the sacred precincts or in pilgrim garb. If any of you doth so intentionally the compensation is an offering brought to the Ka´ba of a domestic animal equivalent to the one he killed as adjudged by two just men among you; or by way of atonement the feeding of the indigent; or its equivalent in fasts: that he may taste of the penalty of his deed. Allah forgives what is past: for repetition Allah will exact from him the penalty. For Allah is Exalted and Lord of Retribution
column3: Ya ye nazhia imani jin na! Ega wu yankungi egbe ala'lima ya yi dan mini haramio ma zandondo na ga wu'u miniebo digangaena to ega gbau yi hadaya yan yanna uwu na be iriu yin dagan mini dabba emmizhio za guba nazhi yi eza adalincizhi na a la hukunci jin'a eti ubo. Wuncin'u la'u fe hadaya na'a la lo kaaba da jin na koma kafara be yangici la ya ezagwagbagizhi koma kini giba wuncin'o wyun'u fe azum. Ebo wyun tso u la egwa'u da dedebo yan alamari wyun'u da 'mi. Soko mafa be le'fi natso ga gwogan na zana ma ga kezhe da lotun dede na Soko ajin'u azaba ga Soko ma Etsu zankpe uyio Etsu jin jin ga uyio.

column2: Lawful to you is the pursuit of water-game and its use for food- for the benefit of yourselves and those who travel; but forbidden is the pursuit of land-game;- as long as ye are in the sacred precincts or in pilgrim garb. And fear Allah to Whom ye shall be gathered back.A' egbe yan yankungi edu to yagiciu la'jin halali ya ye ulaufe eyan emawou ya ye to ezan daci yezhi. Ama 'egbe yankungi yan kin la'ajin haramu ta eti yebo abeke yega yidan haramio na. Ye mae tswa Soko be dansun'uyin ebo na wyun ga yi Etsu na'a ku ye yekan zhi yegboro u bo nao.

Allah made the Ka´ba the Sacred House an asylum of security for men as also the Sacred Months the animals for offerings and the garlands that mark them: That ye may know that Allah hath knowledge of what is in the heavens and on earth and that Allah is well acquainted with all things.
column3: Sokoa ka'aba la'afe kata Alfurma tsunwan yan kukuta yan adini ya zawangizhi to Etswa Alfurma to hadayazhi to hadaya nazhi a la yan -- koro na wuncinzhi ma ebo ye debae kpe'wo kede akika Soko yi be kpikpe yannazhifi sanmazhio na to yan nazhi fi kinbo na akika ma Soko yi be kpikpe yandondoe.Surah 5:98        Know ye that Allah is strict in punishment and that Allah is Oft-forgiving Most Merciful.Ye mae kpe wo kede akika Soko Etsu na gbota azaba na bo uyioakika ma Soko Etsu gafara uyio etsu yegun uyio.Surah 5:99          The Messenger´s duty is but to proclaim (the message). But Allah knoweth all that ye reveal and ye conceal.Yan dondo ta eti Tuci boa saide eyan wu Soko ma kpe yan nazhi ye jin tula na to yan nazhie ye jin swiswoci na.

column2: Say: "Not equal are things that are bad and things that are good even though the abundance of the bad may dazzle thee; so fear Allah O ye that understand; that (so) ye may prosper."
column3: Gan gan: Eyan dede be eyan wangi aga fe nini'a ka da ekundo yan eyan dede gae ya wyo sha'awa na ebo acin'o e tswa Soko be dansun'uyin ya ye nazhi yi eza ankalizhi na ujin wo be wuncin'y ye ga'de rabo.

column2: O ye who believe! Ask not questions about things which if made plain to you may cause you trouble. But if ye ask about things when the Qur´an is being revealed they will be made plain to you Allah will forgive those: for Allah is Oft-forgiving Most Forbearing
column3: Ya ye nazhia imani jin na! Ega'gan egan gbin eti eyanzhio ma nama a ga beu jin bayani yaye yangban yezhi ga'a nyin. Ye ma gae gbin gan eti abo lokaci na agae cin kur'ranu beyn na aga hukuncizhi' jin bayani ya ye. Soko ma fa be le'fi wuncinzhi Soko ma Etsu gafara uyio Etsu hakuri uyio.

column2: Some people before you did ask such questions and on that account lost their faith.Akika za nazhi shi yedzo na gbingan wuncinzhi leani ganci aci tinba (baci na' ajin bayaniya'a na) a jin kafirinci be hukunci wuncinzhi.

It was not Allah who instituted (superstitions like those of) a slit-ear she-camel or a she-camel let loose for free pasture or idol sacrifices for twin-births in animals or stallion-camels freed from work: It is blasphemers who invent a lie against Allah; but most of them lack wisdom
column3: Soko la hukunci ndondo cici eti bahiraboa (Rakum yiwo gigi naa kotukpa acie wo ya kuti na) to sa'ibatu (rakum naa lo ya cie la wun kuti na eti wiwa nasarao na) to waswilatu (dabbanae wo ya kuti kamina rakum ga'ama gi ebazhi na) to hamu (rakum eba na'a kpe gwa eti wiwo ya kutio na) amma'de zanazhia jin kafirinci na e tswa ganmana tswa ta Soko ekun dondo ma ade ankalia.

column2: When it is said to them: "Come to what Allah hath revealed; come to the Messenger": They say: "Enough for us are the ways we found our fathers following." what! even though their fathers were void of knowledge and guidance
column3: A ma ga gan'a gan: E da beyn eba yan na Soko cin be na to eba Tuci (Soko) agan: " Yan na yi tsun Yan manciyizhi kpe eti ubona kun yikea ni Ngba! Ka da wun'ayi gan baba'zhi kpe yandondo yea ama de bawua.

column2: O ye who believe! Guard your own souls: If ye follow (right) guidance no hurt can come to you from those who stray. the goal of you all is to Allah: it is He that will show you the truth of all that ye do
column3: Ya ye nazhia imani jin na! Etswa eti tacin yezhiegun yan za na ga' gbin nan wun'a tswan ye yea ye ga fe eza bawuzhi na'a kpata ma ezhe kebae dan eba Soko gancin ucia ya ye labari yan etun nazhi ye fe lona.

column2: O ye who believe! When death approaches any of you (take) witnesses among yourselves when making bequests- two just men of your own (brotherhood) or others from outside if ye are journeying through the earth and the chance of death befalls you (thus). If ye doubt (their truth) detain them both after prayer and let them both swear by Allah: "We wish not in this for any worldly gain even though the (beneficiary) be our near relation: we shall hide not the evidence before Allah: if we do then behold! the sin be upon us!"
column3: Ya ye nazhia imani jin na! Eri yan tsakani ye be dozhi kamina ajali ga tsoba ya zaeni mini yebo na kamina ugae jin wasiyya na a wa eri guba nazhi yi eza gaskiyazhi mini yebo nako ma za gub ndocizhi kayin nazhi jin miniyeboa na kamina ye ga danzan'o kinbo masiba yan ajali ci be tswan ye na ye'lae kan'e gikini zagubaba zunma yan swallao har ala kutiazhi be sunna Sokoe; ye gae jin shakka jin:yiga gaskiya la'akun ebo ewo wa boa kada wun'ayi eza tsonba yi ma swo eri yan Sokoa. Akika yi ga jin acin yi ga fe dan mini eza le'fizhio.

column2: But if it gets known that these two were guilty of the sin (of perjury) let two others stand forth in their places- nearest in kin from among those who claim a lawful right: let them swear by Allah: "We affirm that our witness is truer than that of those two and that we have not trespassed (beyond the truth): if we did behold! the wrong be upon us!"
column3: Amma; aga bea kpedin ke zaguba'ba ajin le'fi (eri ganmana na) to a wa za guba ndocizhi agikini kingiba'bo nazhi -- yin gan zamafari zhina acia la kutiazhi be Sokoe kede: "Hakika erijin yanyi ugboka gan erijin yan'a yi ma gbin iyaka tua yima gaa gbigbintu gaskiya to hakika yi gaa fe dan mini azwalumizhio.

column2: But if it gets known that these two were guilty of the sin (of perjury) let two others stand forth in their places- nearest in kin from among those who claim a lawful right: let them swear by Allah: "We affirm that our witness is truer than that of those two and that we have not trespassed (beyond the truth): if we did behold! the wrong be upon us!"
column3: Amma; aga bea kpedin ke zaguba'ba ajin le'fi (eri ganmana na) to a wa za guba ndocizhi agikini kingiba'bo nazhi -- yin gan zamafari zhina acia la kutiazhi be Sokoe kede: "Hakika erijin yanyi ugboka gan erijin yan'a yi ma gbin iyaka tua yima gaa gbigbintu gaskiya to hakika yi gaa fe dan mini azwalumizhio.

column2: That is most suitable: that they may give the evidence in its true nature and shape or else they would fear that other oaths would be taken after their oaths. But fear Allah and listen (to His counsel): for Allah guideth not a rebellious people
column3: Wuncin ga tsoba gaskiya gan'o na aga eri jin eti kendoe uga yi yi nao amaa sundan ebo abea kutizhi laa zheban da eba (egun gicizhi) ma baci yan kutizhiazhio ma. Ye mae sundan Soko ye fe wogan (Soko). Hakika Sokoe la jamaa yan fasikizhi ke eko gurua.

column2: One day will Allah gather the messengers together and ask: "What was the response ye received (from men to your teaching)" They will say: "We have no knowledge: it is Thou Who knowest in full all that is hidden."
column3: Efo na Soko ga' ku Tucizhi yekan na gancin Ucia gan gan: " Ki'la gwo ye mio Acia gan gan: "Kpikpe ndondo dan be yi yin'a akika wyo ga yi Etsu kpikpe yan yannazhia swo nao.

column2: Then will Allah say: "O Jesus the son of Mary! Recount My favour to thee and to thy mother. Behold! I strengthened thee with the holy spirit so that thou didst speak to the people in childhood and in maturity. Behold! I taught thee the Book and Wisdom the Law and the Gospel and behold! thou makest out of clay as it were the figure of a bird by My leave and thou breathest into it and it becometh a bird by My leave and thou healest those born blind and the lepers by My leave. And behold! thou bringest forth the dead by My leave. And behold! I did restrain the Children of Israel from (violence to) thee when thou didst show them the clear Signs and the unbelievers among them said: ´This is nothing but evident magic.
column3: Lokaci na Soko gangan: "Ya wyoe Isa egi Maryamu! Fe' pa ni'ima mi na ta eti wyo bo na to na ta eti yanmanci wyo bo na yan lokaci na Mi gbowyo ka be Ruhul kudusi'I na wyo ci fe gan gan be zawangizhi ta eti yantaci mamangibo to kami yan nunsabo na. To kamina Mi wu wyo litafi to hikima to Attaura to Injeela na to kamina wyo fe jin halitta dagan egun'o na wyo san ke elugi na gancin wyoci be efe fiu uci ga'zhe elugi be izini Mi yin. Wyo mae sa gun yan zana yi be yeboe na to za na yi be bata Sokogun'y na (kuturta) be izini mi yin. To kamina wyoe la eyan tsuci tiny (be rayi) be izini mi yin na. To kamina Mi kangwa ya wyoe ke egun Banu Israilazhi lugwa na kamina wyo la hujja nazhi yi gbangba na lo eba'a na za nazhiajin kafirinci miniabo na ci gan: Akika nana ufea saide eyan ma na'atula na

column2: "And behold! I inspired the disciples to have faith in Me and Mine Messenger: they said ´We have faith and do thou bear witness that we bow to Allah as Muslims´".
column3: To kamina Mijin wahayi ya Hawariyuzhi na (saha'bi Annabi Isa zhi) kede; ye a imani jin be Mi yin to be Tuci Mi yin na. Aci gan: "yi yia imani jin wyo mao la erio jin kede akika musulumizhi yi yio na.

column2: Behold! the disciples said: "O Jesus the son of Mary! can thy Lord send down to us a table set (with viands) from heaven" Said Jesus: "Fear Allah if ye have faith."
column3: Lokaci na hawariyuzhi gan gan: "Ya wyoe Isa egi Maryamu! Ngba Tsoci yan wyoe u gbo ka na wyun;a cin yangici be ya yi wo dagan sanmao na Isa ci gan: " yede tswa Soko be dansun; uyin wun'a yi muminizhi ye yio na".

column2: They said: "We only wish to eat thereof and satisfy our hearts and to know that thou hast indeed told us the truth; and that we ourselves may be witnesses to the miracle."
column3: Aci gan: "yie wa gan yi gi dagan miniubo ebo to yangban yizhia la'shi yi ma y'kpe-ywo ke gaskiya wyo gan be yi yin'o na yi ma'y la'y fe'y ta eti ubo dan mini za nazhia eri jin na.

column2: Said Jesus the son of Mary: "O Allah our Lord! Send us from heaven a table set (with viands) that there may be for us - for the first and the last of us - a solemn festival and a sign from thee; and provide for our sustenance for thou art the best Sustainer (of our needs)."
