column2: And the earth- We have spread it out and set thereon mountains standing firm and produced therein every kind of beautiful growth (in pairs)-
column3: To kin nan Yi ta cici naa Yicia patizhi ce ta'u Yi cia yangici sun-sunzhi iri ndondo la'a tin ya bo nanzhiy ma yi wangi nan.

column2: To be observed and commemorated by every devotee turning (to Allah).
column3: Ebo ula'a fe eyan yekpa be wa'aziy ya wuzhi ndondo nae zheban da ba Soko nan.

column2: And We send down from the sky rain charted with blessing and We produce therewith gardens and Grain for harvests;
column3: Yima du ele albarka beyn dagan sanmao Yicia yangici lambuzhi laatin ya to yangici sun zhi nan zhie da ku (lati o)nan.

column2: And tall (and stately) palm-trees with shoots of fruit-stalks piled one over another;-
column3: To dobinazhi nanzhi wunkpa nan a ma yi be egizhi nazhi ta'ti dozhio nan.

column2: As sustenance for (Allah´s) Servants;- and We give (new) life therewith to land that is dead: Thus will be the Resurrection.
column3: Ebo ula'ufe arziki u ya wuzhizhi Yi maa ezhi nan yi tsutsuci na dan rayi be u yin. Acinga ga ma dzun dzun tinya dagan kabari'a yio.

column2: Before them was denied (the Hereafter) by the People of Noah the Companions of the Rass the Thamud
column3: Jamaa yan (Annabi) Nuhu zhi a (egan Soko) yi ganmanan shidzo be dzo to jama'a yan -- ga Rassizhi to Samuduzhi.

column2: The ´Ad Pharaoh the brethren of LutTo Aduzhi to Fir'auna to yegi yan Lutuzhi (atso a egan Soko yi ganmanan).
The Companions of the Wood and the People of Tubba´; each one (of them) rejected the messengers and My warning was duly fulfilled (in them).
column3: To jama'a yan Annabi shuaibuzhi to Tuba'uzhi kpata a Tucizhi yi ganmanan azaba cia jin tabbata ta eti a bo.

column2: Were We then weary with the first Creation that they should be in confused doubt about a new Creation
column3: Kashi Yi yia gbakpan gba be jin jin yan za mafari zhiy A'a ade jin kelo kezhin jin dan yi ye jin yan alittazhio.

column2: It was We Who created man and We know what dark suggestions his soul makes to him: for We are nearer to him than (his) jugular vein.
column3: Akika Yi gajin Alitta zawangio Yi ma kpe yan nanzhie je lo-zhin fi yangban'u bo nan Yi ma tso bau gan to edin nanzhi fi koro'u bo nan.

column2: Behold two (guardian angels) appointed to learn (his doings) learn (and noted them) one sitting on the right and one on the left.
column3: (E pa) kamina (Malaika) guba (na'aka ya zandondo na) gun dozhi nini ashi gwaalo nini ma'ashi gwaapin'o aci gaa fedun nan.

column2: Behold two (guardian angels) appointed to learn (his doings) learn (and noted them) one sitting on the right and one on the left.
column3: (E pa) kamina (Malaika) guba (na'aka ya zandondo na) gun dozhi nini ashi gwaalo nini ma'ashi gwaapin'o aci gaa fedun nan.

column2: Not a word does he utter but there is a sentinel by him ready (to note it).
column3: Ade egan naa tin ya misun'u bo na'a sai de (Malaika) Rakibu to Atidu a zhi baubo fe kau.

column2: Not a word does he utter but there is a sentinel by him ready (to note it).
column3: Ade egan naa tin ya misun'u bo na'a sai de (Malaika) Rakibu to Atidu a zhi baubo fe kau.

column2: And the stupor of death will bring Truth (before his eyes): "This was the thing which thou wast trying to escape!"
column3: Gancin pipe yan ajali cia be be gaskiyae wuncin ga yi yan nan wyo'e bici yaba ya nao.

column2: And the Trumpet shall be blown: that will be the Day whereof Warning (had been given).
column3: Aciga efe be fi kafo fo wuncin ga yi efo alkawali o.

column2: And there will come forth every soul: with each will be an (angel) to drive and an (angel) to bear witness.
column3: Rayi ndondo ma'abe be (foga) ganni be za nae pa'u nan be za nae jin 'ri nae.

column2: (It will be said:) "Thou wast heedless of this; now have We removed thy veil and sharp is thy sight this Day!"
column3: Akika eti alamari na nao wyo a fe dan mini eye yao yi ma ga yekan wyo zhi kpe ya ya wye bacin le wye yin nan wun'ayi nu nuci.

column2: And his Companion will say: "Here is (his Record) ready with me!"
column3: Malaika nae la'mi tu'u nan cia gan gan: Nan nan ga yi yan nan be be mi yin nao.

column2: (The sentence will be:) "Throw throw into Hell every contumacious Rejecter (of Allah)!-
column3: Yea kafiri ndondo nan ga'a gbo tika nan ye'u ce gun enao.

column2: Who forbade what was good transgressed all bounds cast doubts and suspicions;,Za nae la alheri kan zazhi nan za nae gwo iyaka Soko gan nan. U mayi za nae jin kelo kezhin nan.Surah 50:26         Who set up another god beside Allah: Throw him into a severe penalty."Za naa tsoci ndoci laapa Soko baci nan e ce'u da gun azabao nan yi tsun tsun nu na.
His Companion will say: "Our Lord! I did not make him transgress but he was (himself) far astray."
column3: Sheitan nan yi eyau nan cia gan gan: ya wyo Tsoci mi! u jin mi gbin wun'a re amma'de wuntso afe dan mini egbin nan'akpe ya nan.

column2: He will say: "Dispute not with each other in My Presence: I had already in advance sent you Warning.
column3: U gan: E ga jin husuma yeboro Mi bop ma Mia gangba la'ashidzo ya ye eti azaba boa ni.

column2: "The Word changes not before Me and I do not the least injustice to My Servants."
column3: Ezhe egan gba eba Mi boa Mi ma jin za nae jin wuzhi zwalunci na'a.

column2: One Day We will ask Hell "Art thou filled to the full" It will say "Are there any more (to come)"
column3: Efo nan Yi yia gan be jahannamae gan: Ngba wyo'a shea ni U cia gan gan: kashiy a yia de ke re na'a la be mi na

column2: (A voice will say:) "This is what was promised for you- for every one who turned (to Allah) in sincere repentance who kept (His Law)
column3: Acia gan'a gan: Nna ga yi yan nan e la jin ye alkawalinao (a mau jin shiri) ya zandondo nan gae dokun be zheke lo eba Soko nan u ma yi za nae tswa (kaida yan Soko nan).

column2: "Who feared (Allah) Most Gracious Unseen and brought a heart turned in devotion (to Him):
column3: Za nae sundan Soko swiswoci nan U ma'azheban lo eba Soko be yangban yan ekpya dae nan.

column2: "Enter ye therein in Peace and Security; this is a Day of Eternal Life!"
column3: (A cia gan'a gan): E gan dan bo be aminciy fo' wuncin ga yi efo yan dawwamao. (efo na'a zwo be a nan).

column2: There will be for them therein all that they wish- and more besides in Our Presence.
column3: Yan dondo nan a gae wa nan fi bo ya'a bibe ma kezhe dan bo eba Yi bo be.

column2: But how many generations before them did We destroy (for their sins)- stronger in power than they Then did they wander through the land: was there any place of escape (for them)
column3: Al'ummazhi danbo dokun nazhi shidzo nan Yi' ajin hallaka zawuncinzhi gboka gan'a aci be a fe za nazhie za fi ezhizhio cie wa gwagan za nan.

column2: Verily in this is a Message for any that has a heart and understanding or who gives ear and earnestly witnesses (the truth).
column3: Akika mini wuncin'o sinsantu danbo ya zandondo nan ga de ankali nan Ucia tukpa shi ya (egan Soko) ganni be yangban nae gwo gan nae.

column2: We created the heavens and the earth and all between them in Six Days nor did any sense of weariness touch Us.
column3: Akika Yi jin alitta sanmazhi to kin to yan nanzhi fi tsakaniabo nan danmini efo gutswan'ayin'o wahala ndondo ma de yi yia.

column2: Bear then with patience all that they say and celebrate the praises of thy Lord before the rising of the sun and before (its) setting.A ankuri jin be egan nanzhi e gan nan wyo mao feo li Soko tsatsa yin be yebo jin'y ya Tsoci wye kafi igidi'u la'u tin'u ya nan be kafi igidi lo mi nan.
And during part of the night (also) celebrate His praises and (so likewise) after the postures of adoration.
column3: Mini yeshio ma fe li'u tsa tsa yin wyo mao feo liu zunma yan salla ndondo.

column2: And listen for the Day when the Caller will call out from a place quiet near-
column3: Wyo mao feo shitukpa efo nan za nan kun zazhi yn yi nan U ga yia dagan bandoci nan tsoba na.

column2: The Day when they will hear a (mighty) Blast in (very) truth: that will be the Day of Resurrection.Efo nan alittazhia wo kabara yan gaskiya nan fo wuncin ga yi efo dzun-dzun tinya kabari bo.
Verily it is We Who give Life and Death; and to Us is the Final Goal-
column3: Akika Yi gae dan yan rayio Yi ga mae wu rayio eba yi ga ma alittazhi'a kezhe zhin'o.

column2: The Day when the Earth will be rent asunder from (men) hurrying out: that will be a gathering together- quite easy for Us.
column3: Efo nan kin ga'la fi acia fe dzun tinya vayin nan wuncin gungun yekan u yio nan yi finfanci eba Yi bo nao.

column2: We know best what they say; and thou art not one to overawe them by force. So admonish with the Qur´an such as fear My Warning!
column3: Yi ga de kpikpe gan eti yan nanzhi e gan nan bo wyo ma jin za nae jin'a kpaka na'a Fela Alkuranu jin wa'azi ya za nan gae sundan azaba Mi nan.Bear then with patience all that they say and celebrate the praises of thy Lord before the rising of the sun and before (its) setting.A ankuri jin be egan nanzhi e gan nan wyo mao feo li Soko tsatsa yin be yebo jin'y ya Tsoci wye kafi igidi'u la'u tin'u ya nan be kafi igidi lo mi nan.

column2: By the (Winds) that scatter broadcast;
column3: Sokoe zhi kuti be efe nae ti be kagboe nan.

column2: And those that lift and bear away heavy weights;
column3: Sokoe zhi kuti be girgjezhiy nae shi ucie la nuwa kpan nan.

column2: And those that flow with ease and gentleness;
column3: Sokoe zhi kuti be eyanuwanzhiy nanzhie dazan be kara wanciko zhiy nan.

column2: And those that distribute and apportion by Command;-
column3: Sokoe zhi kuti be Malaikazhiy nan zhie gan alamari Soko zhi za nan.

column2: Verily that which ye are promised is true;
column3: Akika yan nanzhi-e la'a jin 'ye alkawali nan gaskiya uyio.Surah 51:6  And verily Judgment and Justice must indeed come to pass.Akika ma egagba yan Alkiyami gaskiya uyio (a gau jin)

column2: By the Sky with (its) numerous Paths
column3: Soko ezhi kuti be sanmae nan yi be falakizhiy (ekozhiy) nan.

column2: Truly ye are in a doctrine discordant
column3: Akika yedan mini egan nan zhia ce leba do zhi nao.

column2: Through which are deluded (away from the Truth) such as would be deluded.
column3: A mae la'u pan zandocizhi ya dagan gaskiyao (lo ganmanan).

column2: Woe to the falsehood-mongers-
column3: Soko'a ganmanan zuncizhi bo'mi.

column2: Those who (flounder) heedless in a flood of confusion:
column3: Za nanzhi a ya ye dan igbe o izheo nan.

column2: They ask "When will be the Day of Judgment and Justice"
column3: A cie gbin gan zan gan. Ngba foci a alkiyamio.

column2: (It will be) a Day when they will be tried (and tested) over the Fire!
column3: Fo nan a ga'a ma'acin le dede ta eti ena o nan.

column2: "Taste ye your trial! This is what ye used to ask to be hastened!"
column3: Efe fin fitinan ye tsozhi nan nan ga yi azaba nan ye fe din ye yan bibe u nao

column2: As to the Righteous they will be in the midst of Gardens and Springs
column3: Akika za nazhie tswa Soko nan a fi mini Aljannazhio be nuwan nanzhie je tinya nae.

column2: Taking joy in the things which their Lord gives them because before then they lived a good life.
column3: A tso guiri be yan nan Tsocia la'ya'a nan. Akika shidzo batsozhio a fe za nazhie jin bolobolo nan.

column2: They were in the habit of sleeping but little by night
column3: A fe za nazhiy lokaci de gi mini yeshio u gae laa le le o nan.

column2: And in the hour of early dawn they (were found) praying for Forgiveness;
column3: Lokaci yan sahuru (fafa) gaajin ma ajin afe ba gafara.

column2: And in their wealth and possessions (was remembered) the right of the (needy) him who asked and him who (for some reason) was prevented (from asking).
column3: Mini dukiyaazhio ma e'tswa hakki yan za nae ba yan nan ganni be za nae wan miniu cie ba'a nan.

column2: On the earth are signs for those of assured Faith
column3: Mini kin bo ma a yazhi fibo yan sinsantu ya zananzhiy ga gaskiya ya nan.

column2: As also in your own selves: Will ye not then see
column3: To mini eti tacin'ye tso (ayazhi fi bo) kashiy ye ba ye lea.

column2: And in heaven is your Sustenance as (also) that which ye are promised.
column3: Arziki yezhi ma to yan nanzhiy a jin ye alkawali nan u fi mini sanmao.

column2: Then by the Lord of heaven and earth this is the very Truth as much as the fact that ye can speak intelligently to each other.
column3: Mi ma zhi kuti be Tsoci yan sanma be kin yin akika alamari wuncin gaskiya uyio kendoe de ye kpemi cie gan gan nan.

column2: Has the story reached thee of the honoured guests of Abraham
column3: Ngba eza yan ega (Annabi) Ibrahima tun eba wyo yia ni

column2: Behold they entered his presence and said: "Peace!" He said "Peace!" (and thought "These seem) unusual people."
column3: Ka mi nan a gandan eba'ubo nan aci gan; "Aminci ula'u jin tabbatau ya ye za nanzhiy yi kpe'a yea nan.

column2: Then he turned quickly to his household brought out a fatted calf
column3: Uci san nin lo'eba iyaliuzhi uci be be soya yan nanko gigi nan nankan nan.

column2: And placed it before them.. he said "Will ye not eat"
column3: Uci'u la'a tso ba'a U ci gan: "kashiy ye'a gia

column2: (When they did not eat) He conceived a fear of them. They said "Fear not" and they gave him glad tidings of a son endowed with knowledge.
column3: U cia ya dansun'a yin wo swiswoci Aci gan: "Ga sundan ma aci yau labari yangban fa yan egi bagi nan gaazhe Man nan.

column2: But his wife came forward (laughing) aloud: she smote her forehead and said: "A barren old woman!"
column3: Yinmin'u cia tin ya be ninmae ucia fuskau dan yan uci gan: "Ynzagi na'a kuku u nae magia nan (gbani tsa wun'a be magio)

column2: They said "Even so has thy Lord spoken: and He is full of Wisdom and Knowledge."
column3: Acigan: A cinga ga Tsoci wyo gan'o akika Etsu hikima uyio Etsu kpikpe u yio.

column2: (Abraham) said: "And what O ye Messengers is your errand (now)"
column3: U ci gan: Kiy yi akika yan nan la ye be nao Ya Tucizhiy

column2: They said "We have been sent to a people (deep) in sin;-
column3: Aci gan; Akika a tun yi tun fi jama'a ndocizhi nanzhie jin lefi kpe kin bo nan.

column2: "To bring on on them (a shower of) stones of clay (brimstone)
column3: Ebo yi be'y jin'a azaba be takunzhi yan lankpa nan yi yi pa nan.

column2: "To bring on on them (a shower of) stones of clay (brimstone)
column3: Ebo yi be'y jin'a azaba be takunzhi yan lankpa nan yi yi pa nan.

column2: Marked as from thy Lord for those who trespass beyond bounds.
column3: Nanzhiy ma a jin alaamaazhi dagan nko yan Tsoci wyo bo nan ebo a la'ajin lefi jincinzhi azaba.

column2: Then We evacuated those of the Believers who were there
column3: Yi cia zandondo nan ga yi Mumini nan la'atin ya mi nin bo.

column2: But We found not there any just (Muslim) persons except in one house:
column3: Yi ma tsun emi ndondo boa sai de emi nini nan yi yan Musulumizhi nan.

column2: But We found not there any just (Muslim) persons except in one house:
column3: Yi ma tsun emi ndondo boa sai de emi nini nan yi yan Musulumizhi nan.

column2: And We left there a Sign for such as fear the Grievous Penalty.
column3: Yima aya lugwa dan bo ebo ula'u fe sinsantu'u ya za nan zhi gae sundan azaba nan tan nan.

column2: And in Moses (was another Sign): Behold We sent him to Pharaoh with authority manifest.
column3: To mini Musao Kami nan Yi tun'u tun fi Fir'auna be hujja naa tula nan.

column2: But (Pharaoh) turned back with his Chiefs and said "A sorcerer or one possessed!"
column3: U cia zuma ce ta ganni be jamaa yan 'uzhiy ucigan: Eyan maci uyio ilanduci yio.

column2: So We took him and his forces and threw them into the sea; and his was the blame.
column3: Ebo acin'o Yi ciu wan to jamaa yan'uzhi Yi cia ceya fi mini eduo wunsto cia fe za na'a jin tacin'u zargi nan.

column2: And in the ´Ad (people) (was another Sign): Behold We sent against them the devastating Wind:
column3: To mini labari Aduzhio (aya danbo) kami nan Yi tun efe tsuntsun-nu fia nan (efe nan albarka dan'a nan).

column2: It left nothing whatever that it came up against but reduced it to ruin and rottenness.
column3: Wyn'e lu yandondo nan'uga keba be yin nan gwa'a sal u gau laafe ke tsukun gwi gwoci nan.

column2: And in the Thamud (was another Sign): Behold they were told "Enjoy (your brief day) for a little while!"
column3: To mini labari Samuduzhio kami nan a gan ya gan: Efe woma da eka degi nan.

column2: But they insolently defied the Command of their Lord: So the stunning noise (of an earthquake) seized them even while they were looking on.
column3: Acia gbo 'tika be alamari Tsocia yin kabara dede cia wan atso ma fe cin ba le.

column2: Then they could not even stand (on their feet) nor could they help themselves.Ade kagbo (kanga) nan a ga a nankin naa ama de za nazhia jin'a Taimako na'a.

column1: Surah 51:46       So were the People of Noah before them for they wickedly transgressed.
column2: To jama'a yan Nuhu zhio tso shidzo batso zhio aafe jama'a nan zhiy yi fasikizhi nan.
With power and skill did We construct the Firmament: for it is We Who create the vastness of pace.
column3: Sanma ma Yi tu'utu be kagboe akika ma Etsu iko Yi yio.

column2: And We have spread out the (spacious) earth: How excellently We do spread out!
column3: To kin yin'otso ma Yi ga ta'u cicio. Madalla be Etsu nan ta kincici parae nan.

column2: And of every thing We have created pairs: That ye may receive instruction.
column3: Yi ma eba be yiwoe jin dan mini yan dondo ebo ye lae San'e tu.

column2: Hasten ye then (at once) to Allah: I am from Him a Warner to you clear and open!
column3: Ebo acin'o efe bici da ba Soko akika gangba jinci mi yio naa tulanan nan ma fe be dagan ebau bo nan.

column2: And make not another an object of worship with Allah: I am from Him a Warner to you clear and open!
column3: Ega la tsoci ndoci a pa Soko baci ma akika gangba jinci naa tula nan u ga mi yi dagan ebau bo.

column2: Similarly no messenger came to the Peoples before them but they said (of him) in like manner "A sorcerer or one possessed"!
column3: Acinga ga alamarizhi yio kandondo nan Tuci ga lo eba za nanzhi shia dzo nan sai a ga gan gan: Eyan maci u yio ilanduci u yio.

column2: Is this the legacy they have transmitted one to another Nay they are themselves a people transgressing beyond bounds!
column3: Kashiy ajin dozhi wasiyanci jin A'a ade yi jamaa nanzhie gwo iyaka Soko gan nan.

column2: So turn away from them: not thine is the blame.
column3: Dzun'gan'abo akika wyo jin za nan a jin zargi na'a.

column2: But teach (thy Message) for teaching benefits the Believers.
column3: Wyo mao feo jin waazi akika wa'zi ejin muminizhi anfani.

column2: I have only created Jinns and men that they may serve Me.
column3: Mi ma jin alitta yan jannuzhi to zawangizhi ebo yandondo boa sai da ebo aajin bauta'a ya mi.

column2: No Sustenance do I require of them nor do I require that they should feed Me.
column3: Mi wa arziki ndondo gwata'a boa Mi ma wa gan a ya Mi yangici'a gia.

column2: For Allah is He Who gives (all) Sustenance- Lord of Power- Steadfast (for ever).
column3: Akika Soko gayi Etsu arzikio Etsu nan gboka sarauyin nan.

column2: For the Wrong-doers their portion is like unto the portion of their fellows (of earlier generations): then let them not ask Me to hasten (that portion)!
column3: Akika Zananzhi jin zwalunci nan zunubizhi ta etia bo iri zunubi nanzhi ta eti dozhin'a zhio nan ebo acin'o a ga din ye be azabae ma.

column2: Woe then to the Unbelievers on account of that Day of theirs which they have been promised!
column3: Egiti yan robokpewun'ajin tabbata ya kafirizhi dan mini efo'a nan Soko'ajin'a alkawali nao.

column2: By a Decree inscribedT
column3: o Litafi na'a ka yan fi nan.

column2: In a Scroll unfolded;
column3: Fi mini epao nan yi kpi kpe ci nan.

column2: By the much-frequented Fane;
column3: To Baitu Ma' amuri.

column2: By the Canopy Raised High;
column3: To katanti nan latu nan.

column2: And by the Ocean filled with Swell;-
column3: To edu na'ashe be nuwan'e nan.

column2: Verily the Doom of thy Lord will indeed come to pass;-
column3: Akika azaba yan Tsoci wyoe u ga'ajin tabbata.

column2: There is none can avert it;-
column3: Ade za nan kan'u gwa wo na'a.

column2: On the Day when the firmament will be in dreadful commotion.
column3: Fo nan Sanma gaa kun kun kun yan iyaka nan.

column2: And the mountains will fly hither and thither.
column3: Patizhi ci ga ala ke ya bo baenio.

column2: Then woe that Day to those that treat (Truth) as Falsehood;-
column3: Azaba yan robonkpe u ga ajin tabbata ya ganmanan zun ci zhi.

column2: That play (and paddle) in shallow trifles.
column3: Za nanzhi a cia dan edzo dzo baenio nan.

column2: That Day shall they be thrust down to the Fire of Hell irresistibly.
column3: Fo nan a daagwa lo da fi ena ya jahannamao baenio nan

column2: "This: it will be said "Is the Fire- which ye were wont to deny!
column3: (Acia gan'a gan) Ngan nana ga yi ena na ye fe yi ganmanan nao.

column2: "Is this then a fake or is it ye that do not see
column3: Ngba eyanma ga dan nao kashi ye leba ye lea

column2: "Burn ye therein: the same is it to you whether ye bear it with patience or not: Ye but receive the recompense of your (own) deeds."
column3: E gan fi bo ye'jin ankuri ko ma ye ga jin ankuri ma nini u yio ya yeo. Akika a agaegba ga be iri etun nanzhi ye fe lo nan.

column2: As to the Righteous they will be in Gardens and in Happiness-
column3: Akika za nanzhie sundan Soko nan a fi mini aljannazhio be ni'imae.

column2: Enjoying the (Bliss) which their Lord hath bestowed on them and their Lord shall deliver them from the Penalty of the Fire.
column3: Acia fe wo'ma be yan nan Tsocia la ya'a nan. Tsocia ma ga wadzun be azaba yan ena jahimuy.

column2: (To them will be said:) "Eat and drink ye with profit and health because of your (good) deeds."
column3: (Acia gan'a gan): Efe gi ye mae fe fin be ninmae egagba wuncin yi ebo etun nanzhiy ye ce lo izhe o nan.

column2: They will recline (with ease) on Thrones (of dignity) arranged in ranks; and We shall join them to Companions with beautiful big and lustrous eyes.
column3: Aci ga kpetso gadozhio nanzhi yi titacizhi nan Yi vi ga yawo jin yaa be ynzagi aljannazhiy.

column2: And those who believe and whose families follow them in Faith- to them shall We join their families: Nor shall We deprive them (of the fruit) of aught of their works: (Yet) is each individual in pledge for his deeds.
column3: Za nan zhi a imani jin nan zuriyazhi cia mi tua eti imani jin'o nanyi ga ku keba be zuriya'zhiy Yi maa ke etun'azhi tukun 'a. Zandondo'a ga etun nan'u ga lo nan la'a kpe tso'u.

column2: And We shall bestow on them of fruit and meat anything they shall desire.
column3: Yi ma'a kezhe twarya ya'abe yangici mari marizhiy to nankan mini yannanzhi a gae de sha'awau nan.

column2: They shall there exchange one with another a (loving) cup free of frivolity free of all taint of ill.
column3: A fe fin eyan managizhi atso be dozhiy fi mini'u boa le fi jinma danboa.

column2: Round about them will serve (devoted) to them young male servants (handsome) as Pearls well-guarded.
column3: Egi wawagi aljannazhi cia fe mae ke zhe wyo ga le'a ye wyoa ye gan ko alulu'I naa swo nan a yio.

column2: They will advance to each other engaging in mutual enquiry.
column3: Saashiazhi ma a ga ye zhe wu sashi acia fe gbin dozhi gan.

column2: They will say: "Aforetime we were not without fear for the sake of our people.
column3: A ci gan: Akika Yi ya fe zhidzo ba tso zhio yi fe sundan Soko dan mini iyali yi zhio.

column2:
But Allah has been good to us and has delivered us from the Penalty of the Scorching Wind.,Soko cia eryatwau la aya yi (yinnan) U cia yi gangwa be azaba nan yi tsun tsun nunae.
Surah 52:27 ,    But Allah has been good to us and has delivered us from the Penalty of the Scorching Wind.
column3: Soko cia eryatwau la aya yi (yinnan) U cia yi gangwa be azaba nan yi tsun tsun nunae.

column2: "Truly we did call unto Him from of old: truly it is He the Beneficent the Merciful!"
column3: Akika Yi ya tun izhe bastozhio yi fe ba (gwagan) be Sokoe. Akika Etsu eryatwa uyio. Etsu yegun uyio.

column2: Therefore proclaim thou the praises (of thy Lord): for by the Grace of thy Lord thou art no (vulgar) soothsayer nor art thou one possessed.
column3: Wyo mao feo jin wa'azi akika wyo jin eyan mancia wyo ma jin ilanduci be ni'ima yan Tsoci wyo yin'a.

column2: Therefore proclaim thou the praises (of thy Lord): for by the Grace of thy Lord thou art no (vulgar) soothsayer nor art thou one possessed.
column3: Wyo mao feo jin wa'azi akika wyo jin eyan mancia wyo ma jin ilanduci be ni'ima yan Tsoci wyo yin'a.

column2: Or do they say:- "A Poet! we await for him some calamity (hatched) by Time!"
column3: Kashiy e gangan gan; enikoci u yi ebo acin'o yi fi'itu'u ye be yan nan egbazhe dede yan zaman gi gun nan.

column2: Say thou: "Await ye!- I too will wait along with you!"
column3: Gan gan: Efe tuye akika mi tso dan gan-ni be ye yin eba eyetuo.

column2: Is it that their faculties of understanding urge them to this or are they but a people transgressing beyond boundsKashiy ena nan'azhi gae jin'a foro be nan nazhi yin'o Kashiy adea fe jamaa nanzhie -- iyaka Soko gan nan
Or do they say "He fabricated the (Message)" Nay they have no faith!
column3: Kashiy egan-gan gan; u tswa'u tswa A'a ade jin imani jin'a.

column2: Let them then produce a recital like unto it- If (it be) they speak the truth!
column3: Wun'ayi acin'o aabe be egan ndoci na ga ade Alkuranu nan wun'ayi gaskiya tacizhi a yio nan.

column2: Were they created of nothing or were they themselves the creators
column3: Kashiy; ujin eyan a jin alitta'a ya'a Kahiy atso tsae jin alitta dozhio.

column2: Or did they create the heavens and the earth Nay they have no firm belief.
column3: Kashiy a ga jin alitta yan Sanmazhi to kin yin'o A'a a de ya gaskiya'a.

column2: Or are the Treasures of thy Lord with them or are they the managers (of affairs)
column3: Kashiy edzunba yan arziki be'a yin u dan'o kashi aga wun I'ko ta eti zazhibo

column2: Or have they a ladder by which they can (climb up to heaven and) listen (to its secrets) Then let (such a) listener of theirs produce a manifest proof.
column3: Kashiy a yi be ekpae yi nan a tsoe a tsoe la wogan dagan sanmao nan gancin za nae wo gan be yaa na cie be yaa be hujja nanzhia latu nae

column2: Or has He only daughters and ye have sons
column3: Kashiy Wun'y (Soko) ga wun egi ynagizhio ye ci wun bagizhio

column2: Or is it that thou dost ask for a reward so that they are burdened with a load of debt-
column3: Kashiy Wyo'e gbin'agan lada gbin edu nan wyo la ta'a nan cia lukpin fia

column2: Or that the Unseen in it their hands and they write it down
column3: Kashiy eba'abo ga kpikpe swiswocizhi dan'o Ebo can'o acie ka yan nanzhi ga baa nan

column2: Or do they intend a plot (against thee) But those who defy Allah are themselves involved in a Plot!
column3: Kashiy e pa makirinci ndoci pa Akika za nazhi ajin kafirinci nan atso ga egun yan makirinci a gio.

column2: Or have they a god other than Allah Exalted is Allah far above the things they associate with Him!
column3: Kashiy a yi Tsoci ndoci yi baci Soko. Lili kpata ajin tabbata ya Soko ke yan nazhi e la pau baci nan lugwa.

column2: Were they to see a piece of the sky falling (on them) they would (only) say: "Clouds gathered in heaps!"
column3: Ama ga le kansan ndoci ye sanmao na'a sa ya zhi kin nan a gan gan; girgjezhio nan tu ta'ti dozhio nao.

column2: So leave them alone until they encounter that Day of theirs wherein they shall (perforce) swoon (with terror)-
column3: Dzun gan'a bo har da fo nan a be gun be efoa yin naajin'a azaba danbo nan.

column2: The Day when their plotting will avail them nothing and no help shall be given them.
column3: Fo nan tanadizhi wun'a kunke yaa be yandondo yin'a nan a maade za naajin'a taimako naa.

column2: And verily for those who do wrong there is another punishment besides this: But most of them understand not.
column3: Akika azaba danbo ya azwalumi zhi kayin amma'de ekun dondoazhi akpea.

column2: Now await in patience the command of thy Lord: for verily thou art in Our eyes: and celebrate the praises of thy Lord the while thou standest forth
column3: A ankuri be hukunci yan Tsoci wyo yin akika etswa Yi dan be wyo yin wyo mao fe o li Soko ganni be yebo jin ya Tsoci wyo yin Kandondo nan wyo ga nankin nan.

column2: And for part of the night also praise thou Him- and at the retreat of the stars
column3: !To mini yeshio wyo li'u tsa tsa yin to ka mi nan tswangizhi ga zunma zheta nan

column2: The Hour (of Judgment) is nigh and the moon is cleft asunder.
column3: Alkiyami'a tso ba kpankpan yin to etswa ma'a la fi. (guba)

column2: But if they see a Sign they turn away and say "This is (but) transient magic."
column3: A ma ga aya le ye a zunma zheta'u a cia gan gan: eyanmau yio na'a gwogan nan.

column2: They reject (the warning) and follow their (own) lusts but every matter has its appointed time.
column3: Aciu yi ganmanan acia emi tu etun yangban'azhi akika alamari ndondo (nan Sokoe gan nan) U ga ajin tabbata.

column2: There have already come to them Recitals wherein there is (enough) to check (them)
column3: Akika ma mini labari nanzhiy be ya'nan ade dan minia bo nanzhi yi yan waniko nan.

column2: Mature wisdom;- but (the preaching of) Warners profits them not.
column3: Hikima u yio na'a kunke nan ammade gangba jin'a anfania.

column2: Therefore (O Prophet) turn away from them. The Day that the Caller will call (them) to a terrible affair
column3: A dzun gan; abo har da efo nan za nae yi zazhi nan U gaa yia lo yan doci nan yi eyan dede nan (azaba).

column2: They will come forth- their eyes humbled - from (their) graves (torpid) like locusts scattered abroad
column3: Eyeazhi ga'gba gba Wyo'a ye gan ko borogizhio nan zhi a ga nan.

column2: Hastening with eyes transfixed towards the Caller!- "Hard is this Day!" the Unbelievers will say.
column3: Acia fe din ye lo'eba za nae yia nan kafirizhi a fe gan fo ga gan: Yinna nan nan efo nan lukpin nan uyio.

column2: Before them the People of Noah rejected (their messenger): they rejected Our servant and said "Here is one possessed!" and he was driven out.
column3: Jama'a yan Nuhu zhiotso a tucizhi yi ganmanan aci fe sha fi u.

column2: Then he called on his Lord: "I am one overcome: do Thou then help (me)!"
column3: Uci ba Tsoci'u aduwa gan: akika a mi zankpe eboacin'o Soko jin mi taimako.

column2: So We opened the gates of heaven with water pouring forth.
column3: Yicia eko yan Sanma zhi kpe be nuwan nan fe cinzhin be kagboe nan.

column2: And We caused the earth to gush forth with springs so the waters met (and rose) to the extent decreed.
column3: Yici kezhea eya nuwanzhi kpe kinbo nuwanzhi cia keba eti alamari nan Soko a kpa a ni nan.

column2: But We bore him on an (Ark) made of broad planks and caulked with palm-fibre:
column3: Yicia wuntso la dan mini eyao naakan be katankozhiy be kwontoe nan.

column2: She floats under our eyes (and care): a recompense to one who had been rejected (with scorn)!
column3: Uci fe bici be etswa Yi yin wuncin ma egagba u yio yazandondo nan aga jin kafirinci beu yin nae.

column2: And We have left this as a Sign (for all time): then is there any that will receive admonition
column3: Yiciu la'afe aya ko a de za nan a santu nan

column2: But how (terrible) was My Penalty and My Warning
column3: Ngba ke nangban azaba Mi yi yi be gangba nae jin'anan yi nao

column2: And We have indeed made the Qur´an easy to understand and remember: then is there any that will receive admonition
column3: Akika yi ya Aluranu laafe eyan finfanci ebo sinsantuo. Ngba a de za na'a gwo sin san tu nan

column2: The ´Ad (people) (too) rejected (Truth): then how terrible was My Penalty and My Warning
column3: Jama'a yan Aduzhi a Tuci yi gan manan. Ngba ke nangban azaba Mi be gangba nanzhie jin'a nan yi yi nao

column2: For We sent against them a furious wind on a Day of violent Disaster
column3: Akika Yi tun efe nan wo nan Sarauyin nan fia dan mini efo nan wonan nao na mae lo ye be ena-woe nan.

column2: Plucking out men as if they were roots of palm-trees torn up (from the ground).
column3: Wun'e gbin zawangi ya wyo'a ye gan ko cigban dobinazhi a yio nanzhi gbin cici nan.

column2: Yea how (terrible) was My Penalty and My Warning!
column3: Ngba ke nangban yan azaba Mi yi yi be gangba nae jin'a nan yi nao

column2: But We have indeed made the Qur´an easy to understand and remember: then is there any that will receive admonition
column3: Akika Yi Alkuranu la'afe fanci ebo sin santu o. Ngba ade za na'a santu nan

column2: The Thamud (also) rejected (their) Warners.
column3: Jam'a yan Samuduzhi a gangba nanzhijin'a nan yi ganma nan.

column2: For they said: "What! a man! a Solitary one from among ourselves! shall we follow such a one Truly should we then be straying in mind and mad!
column3: Aci gan: Gbani zae ni mini yi bo tsa yi yia be gbao Yi ma gaa jin acin yi yia fe dan mini egbin'o be wawaboe.

column2: "Is it that the Message is sent to him of all people amongst us Nay he is a liar an insolent one!"
column3: Kashiy wun'tsa a be tsa mini yi bo acia la wahayi'a ya wun'o A'a u jin acin'a ganmanan zunci tsa'u yio U mayi eza dede.

column2: Ah! they will know on the morrow which is the liar the insolent one!
column3: Bele yin aakpe esun. Za nan ga yi ganmanan zunci Uma yi za dede nan.

column2: For We will send the she-camel by way of trial for them. So watch them (O Salih) and possess thyself in patience!
column3: Akika Yi'a tun yiwo fia ebo ula'ufe yaa ebo acin'o ofe tuaye wyo mao la yangban'o wu.

column2: And tell them that the water is to be divided between them: Each one´s right to drink being brought forward (by suitable turns).
column3: Wyo mao ya'a labari ke nuwan ginganci u yio tsakaniabo be efo yan fin fin'u yin nan wun'alo da fin nan.

column2: But they called to their companion and he took a sword in hand and hamstrung (her).
column3: Aci yi zaba'a Uci da la ebiko cia rakum tun'yan ci'u wu.

column2: Ah! how (terrible) was My Penalty and My Warning!
column3: Ngba ke nangban yan azaba mMi yi yi be gangba nanzhi e jin'a na yi nao

column2: For We sent against them a single Mighty Blast and they became like the dry stubble used by one who pens cattle.
column3: Akika Yi tun kabara nini fia acia fe ke egwo wiwoci nan'e la ya dabbazhi gi nan.

column2: And We have indeed made the Qur´an easy to understand and remember: then is there any that will receive admonition
column3: Akika Yi'a Alkuranu la'a fe fin fanci ebo sin santuo. Ngba a de za na'a santu nan

column2: The people of Lut rejected (his) warning.
column3: Jamaa yan Lutu zhia gangba nan zhi a jin'a nan yi ganmanan.

column2: We sent against them a violent Tornado with showers of stones (which destroyed them) except Lut´s household: them We delivered by early Dawn-
column3: Akika Yi tun takunzhi fia (acia jin hallaka) sai de iyali yan (Annabi) Lutuzhi Yi yia gangwa lokaci yan sahuruy.

column2: As a Grace from Us: thus do We reward those who give thanks.
column3: Nan nan ni'ima'uyio dagan eba Yi bo acinga ga egagba yio ya zandondo nan gae jin yebo nao.

column2: And (Lut) did warn them of Our Punishment but they disputed about the Warning.
column3: Akika Ujin'a gangba be win'wan yi Yin acia gangbau gbo'mi.

column2: And they even sought to snatch away his guests from him but We blinded their eyes. (They heard:) "Now taste ye My Wrath and My Warning."
column3: Akika a wa gan ajin lalata be eganzhiy Yi eyezhi fin ya gancin e fe fin azaba Mi to gangba nanzhi a fe jin'e nan.

column2: Early on the morrow an abiding Punishment seized them:
column3: Akika azaba na'ajin tabbata nan da de'ade saka be asuba yin.Surah 54:39  "So taste ye My Wrath and My Warning."Ebo aci'o efe fin azaba Mi be gangba nanzhiy a jin'e nan.

column2: And We have indeed made the Qur´an easy to understand and remember: then is there any that will receive admonition
column3: Akika Yi'a Alkuranu la'afe fin-fanci ebo sinsan tuo. Ngba ade za na'a santu nan

column2: To the People of Pharaoh too aforetime came Warners (from Allah).
column3: Akika gangbazhi be eba iyali yan Firauna zhi.

column2: The (people) rejected all Our Signs; but We seized them with such Penalty (as comes) from One Exalted in Power able to carry out His Will.
column3: Acia aya Yizhi kpata yi ganmanan Yi cia wan win wan yan zana de zankpe Uma de I'I ko nan.

column2: Are your Unbelievers (O Quraish) better than they Or have ye an immunity in the Sacred Books
column3: Gbani kafiri yezhi ade alheri gan nanzhiy shidzonan Kashi yede wandzun ndoci de dan mini Litafio.

column2: r do they say: "We acting together can defend ourselves"
column3: Kashiy e gan gan gag: Yi jama'azhi yi yio nanzhi ga de nasara nan.

column2: Soon will their multitude be put to flight and they will show their backs.
column3: Bele yin  a ga gungun yekan'azhi ga ya aciga zunma ya cia fe bici.

column2: Nay the Hour (of Judgment) is the time promised them (for their full recompense): And that Hour will be most grievous and most bitter.
column3: A'a alkiyami tsa yi lokaci alkawalio masi-ba yan alkiyami ma u tsun u ma luku.

column2: Truly those in sin are the ones straying in mind and mad.
column3: Akika lefi jincizhi afi mini egba'o be azba yan enae.

column2: The Day they will be dragged through the Fire on their faces (they will hear:) "Taste ye the touch of Hell!"
column3: Fo nan a gba'agba eti fuskaazhio da fi enao nan (a cia gan'a gan): Efe fin nangban yan ena sakaru.

column2: Verily all things have We created in proportion and measure.
column3: Akika Yi jin yandondo jin be tsunwan'e.

column2: And Our Command is but a single (Act)- like the twinkling of an eye.
column3: Alamari Yi ma fe'a sai de yan'ni ke eya ba nan.

column2: And (oft) in the past have We destroyed gangs like unto you: then is there any that will receive admonition
column3: Akika ma Yi jin jama'a iri yezhi hallaka shidzo. Ko ade za na'a san tu minie bo nan.

column2: All that they do is noted in (their) Books (of Deeds):
column3: Akika etun ndondo nan a lo nan u yi kikaci fi Litafizhio.

column2: Every matter small and great is on record.
column3: Etun tetengi kpata to wanciko kikaci a yio.

column2: As to the Righteous they will be in the midst of Gardens and Rivers
column3: Akika za nanzhie sundan Soko nan a fi aljannazhio ba nan nuwanzhie je fi nan.

column2: In an Assembly of Truth in the Presence of a Sovereign Omnipotent.
column3: A fi edunfe ba yan gaskiyao eba Etsu mulkiko nan ma de kagbo nan.

column2: (Allah) Most Gracious!
column3: Soko (Etsu yegun).

column2: It is He Who has taught the Qur´an.
column3: Wun'a kpikpe Alkuranu la'awu alttazhi.

column2: He has created man:
column3: Wun'a alitta yan zawangi jin.

column2: He has taught him speech (and intelligence).
column3: U ci'u wu egan ye kpe.

column2: The sun and the moon follow courses (exactly) computed;
column3: Igidi to etswa e dazan da ganni be Lisafiy.

column2: And the Firmament has He raised high and He has set up the Balance (of Justice)
column3: Uma'sanma la tu U cia tsunwan la'a cici.

column2: In order that ye may not transgress (due) balance.
column3: Ebo ye ga gwo iyaka gan eba tsunwan dan'o ma.

column2: So establish weight with justice and fall not short in the balance.
column3: Ye mae la tsunwan'e kue gikini be adalinci ye mae ga ke tsunwan tukun ma.

column2: It is He Who has spread out the earth for (His) creatures:
column3: To kin ma Wun 'u la'acici ebo alittazhio.

column2: Therein is fruit and date-palms producing spathes (enclosing dates);
column3: Miniubo yangici sunsunzhi fi bo to dobinazhi nanzhiyi be kperezhiy nan.

column2: Also corn with (its) leaves and stalk for fodder and sweet-smelling plants.
column3: To eyan dzozhi nanzhiy yi be finizhiy nan to nanzhiy man a mae ya kan kan.

column2: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny
column3: Kici mini aya yan Tsoci ye zhio danbo nan ye'a yi ganmanan-nao.

column2: He created man from sounding clay like unto pottery
column3: U jin alitta yan zawangi dagan lamkpa wiwacio nan yi ke ezun pi poci nan.

column2: And He created Jinns from fire free of smoke:
column3: U ma jin alitta yan januzhi jin dagan enan cikarao.

column2: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny
column3: Kici mini a ya Tso ci yezhio danbo nan ye'a yi ganmanan nao

column2: (He is) Lord of the two Easts and Lord of the two Wests:
column3: Tsoci yan eyilazhin guba (yan zunzunka be yan ikere) to Tsoci yan eyi lozun guba.

column2: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny
column3: Kici mini aya yan Tsoci yezhio danbo nan ye'a yi ganmanan nao

column2: He has let free the two bodies of flowing water meeting together:
column3: U je edu iri guba nanzhie keba nan. (edu manangi be edu nan yi esan esan nan).

column2: Between them is a Barrier which they do not transgress:
column3: Tsakaniabo be dozhiy shamaki danbo nan la'egwo iyaka gan'a nan.

column2: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny
column3: Kici mini aya yan Tsoci yezhio danbo nan ye'a yi gan manan nao

column2: Out of them come Pearls and Coral:
column3: Miniabo e de alulu'izhi to marjanuzhi ku tin ya bo.

column2: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny
column3: Kici mini aya yan Tsoci yezhio danbo nan ye a yi ganmanan nao

column2: And His are the Ships sailing smoothly through the seas lofty as mountains:
column3: U ma yi be eya nuwanzhiy nanzhi a tswa nan e dazan kpe eti eduzhio ke pati wancikozhi nan.

column2: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye denyKici mini aya yan Tsoci yezhio danbo nan yea yi ganmanan nao
All that is on earth will perish:Z
column3: aeni ndondo nan ga ta eti izheo nan eyan zwozwoci u yio.

column2: But will abide (for ever) the Face of thy Lord- full of Majesty Bounty and Honour.
column3: Zati yan Tsoci wye gbaugi gaa keo Etsu elatu Etsu cinwan.

column2: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny
column3: Kici mini aaya yan Tsoci yezhio dan bo nan ye'a yi ganmanan nao

column2: Of Him seeks (its need) every creature in the heavens and on earth: every day in (new) Splendour doth He (shine)!
column3: Zandondo nan fi sanmazhio to kin bo nan e ba yan ba be'u yin fondondo ma u ta eti sha'anio.

column2: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny
column3: Kici mini aya yan Tsoci yezhio danbo nan ye'a yi ganmanan nao

column2: Soon shall We settle your affairs O both ye worlds!
column3: Bele yin Yi ga eda kpe ya ye (Yan egagba) Ya ye nan yi eza ekpin lucizhi nan (to zawangizhi to jannuzhi)

column2: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny
column3: Kici mini aya yan Tsoci yezhio danbo nan ye'a yi ganmanan nao

column2: O ye assembly of Jinns and men! If it be ye can pass beyond the zones of the heavens and the earth pass ye! not without authority shall ye be able to pass!
column3: Ya ye jama'a yan jannuzhi to zawangizhi ye ga de I ko nan ye'a gan dan nin yan fi-fi yan sanmazhio be kin yin nan e fe gandan ammade ye'a gandan'a woa sai de be hujjazhiy.

column2: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny
column3: Kici mini aya Tsoci yezhio danbo nan ye'a yi ganmanan nao

column2: On you will be sent (O ye evil ones twain!) a flame of fire (to burn) and a smoke (to choke): no defence will ye have:
column3: A ce enan cikara be enan wu yipae kea Ebo acin'o ye'a de nasara'a.Surah 55:36   Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye denyKici mini a yan Tsoci yezhio danbo nan ye'a yi ganmanan nao

column2: When the sky is rent asunder and it becomes red like ointment:Kami na sanma ga bea lafi nan Uci ga zhe dzuruy ke emi dzuru nan.
Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny
column3: Kici mini aya yan Tsoci yezhio danbo nan ye'a yi ganmanan nao

column2: On that Day no question will be asked of man or Jinn as to his sin.
column3: Efo wuncin a gbin zawangi a gbin zawangi ko jannu egan zunubiu gbin'a. (atso akpe yannan a ga dan'y ninbo nan).

column2: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny
column3: Kici mini aya yan Tsoci yezhio danbo nan ye'ayi gan manan nao

column2: (For) the sinners will be known by their marks: and they will be seized by their forelocks and their feet.
column3: A'kpe lefi jinci ye be alama azhiy aciga egwa sun; a yegun'azhio to biciazhio.Surah 55:42   Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye denyKici mini a ya yan Tsoci yezhio danbo nan ye'a yi ganmanan nao

column2: This is the Hell which the Sinners deny:
column3: Nna nan ga yi ena yan jahannama nan Kafirizhie yi ganmanan nao.

column2: In its midst and in the midst of boiling hot water will they wander round!
column3: A fe ma kezhe tsakani ubo nuwan yipa na'a sa nae.

column2: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny
column3: Kici mini a ya yan Tsoci yezhio danbo nan ye'a yi ganmanan nao

column2: But for such as fear the time when they will stand before (the Judgment Seat of) their Lord there will be two Gardens-
column3: Zandondo nan magae sundan gbaro din gi yegboro Tsoci bo nan wun'a de aljanna guba.

column2: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny-
column3: Kici mini aya yan Tsoci yezhio danbo nan ye a yi ganmanan nao

column2: Containing all kinds (of trees and delights);-
column3: Nna yibe gwala gubae nan.

column2: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny-
column3: Kici mini aya yan Tsoci yezhio danbo nan ye a yi ganmanan nao.

column2: In them (each) will be two Springs flowing (free);
column3: Miniabo eye nuwan guba danbo nanzhie je nan.

column2: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny-
column3: Kici mini aya yan Tsoci yezhio danbo nan ye'a yi ganmanan nao.

column2: In them will be Fruits of every kind two and two.
column3: Mini 'ubo yangici sun-sun fi bo nanzhi yi iri guba guba nan.

column2: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny
column3: Kici mini aya yan Tsoci yezhio danbo nan ye'ayi ganmanan nao

column2: They will recline on Carpets whose inner linings will be of rich brocade: the Fruit of the Gardens will be near (and easy of reach).
column3: A ga kpe tso fe woma ta eti yantacikozhio nin pa yan nin yan yantaci wuncinzhi istabrak a jin wun'o (wato silki nae ya'na nan) cigban sunsun yan aljannazhi ma ga tsoba kin kpan kpan yin (ebo fi fe gio).

column2: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny
column3: Kici mini aya yan Tsoci yezhio danbo nan ye'ayi ganmanan nao.

column2: In them will be (Maidens) chaste restraining their glances whom no man or Jinn before them has touched;-
column3: Miniabo ynzagizhi fibo nanzhie cin ba le zaanan (sai ebaa zhi). Zawangi ndondo ma la'a la egwa tu'a lea jannu ndondo mala la gwatu'a le shi dzo'a boa.

column2: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny-
column3: Kici mini aya yan Tsoci yezhio danbo nan ye'a yi ganmanan nao

column2: Like unto Rubies and coral.
column3: Ynzagi wuncinzhi wyo'a ye gan ko yakutuzhi be mirjanuzhi a yio. (takun zhi a yio nanzhie ban'nan ama de daraja nan).

column2: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny
column3: Kici mini aya yan Tsoci yezhio danbo nan ye'ayi ganmanan nao

column2: Is there any Reward for Good - other than Good
column3: Ngan egagba yan etun wangi sai de egagba wangi.

column2: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny
column3: Kici mini aya yan Tsoci yezhio danbo nan ye'a yi ganmanan nao

column2: And besides these two there are two other Gardens-
column3: Zunma wuncinzhio be aljanna guba danbo.

column2: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny-
column3: Kici mini aya yan Tsoci yezhio danbo nan yea yi ganmanan nao.

column2: Dark-green in colour (from plentiful watering).
column3: Nanzhie bannan yan aliga aliga nan kezhea shi zhiko be enaban'e nan.

column2: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny
column3: Kici mini aya yan Tsoci yezhio danbo nan ye'a yi gan manan noa

column2: In them (each) will be two Springs pouring forth water in continuous abundance:
column3: Miniabo eye nuwan guba danbo nae dzun tin ya kandondo nan.

column2: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny
column3: Kici mini aya yan Tsoci yezhio danbo nan ye'a yi ganmanan nao

column2: In them will be Fruits and dates and pomegranates:
column3: Miniabo yangi ci sunsunzhi to dobina to yangici yan rumanu fi bo.

column2: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny
column3: Kici mini aya yan Tsoci yezhio danbo nan ye'a yi ganmanan nao

column2: In them will be fair (Companions) good beautiful;-
column3: Miniabo ynzagizhi fibo nanzhi yi wangi wangi zhi nan a mayibologi bologizhi.

column2: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny-
column3: Kici mini aya yan Tsoci yezhio danbo nan yea yi ganmanan nao.

column2: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny-
column3: Kici mini aya yan Tsoci yezhio danbo nan yea yi ganmanan nao.

column2: Companions restrained (as to their glances) in (goodly) pavilions;-
column3: Ynzagi yan Hurul 'aynizhi a yio nanzhi eyeazhi fu bokun sarauyin nan Uma kezhe shi zhiko sarauyin nan a ma swo'aswo fi eswo-bagi zhio.

column2: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny-
column3: Kici mini aya yan Tsoci yezhio danbo nan ye'a yi ganmanan nao

column2: Whom no man or Jinn before them has touched;-
column3: Zawangi ndondo ko jannu u la'a la'gwa tu'a le shidzo eba'azhi boa.

column2: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny-
column3: Kici mini aya yan Tsoci yezhio danbo nan yea yi ganmanan nao

column2: Reclining on green Cushions and rich Carpets of beauty.
column3: A ga kpetso cia fe wo'man ta eti gado putu ndocizhio nan yi nuwan aliga allga nan ganni be yantaci. Kozhi nanzhiy sa wangi nan.

column2: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny
column3: Kici mini aya yan Tsoci yezhio danbo nan ye'a yi ganmanan nao

column2: Blessed be the name of thy Lord full of Majesty Bounty and Honour.
column3: Elatu a jin tabbata ya sunna Tsoci wye akika Soko Etsu cinwan U yio Etsu elatu uyio

column2: When the Event inevitable cometh to pass
column3: Kami nan yan na'ajin nan u ga bea jin nan. (U ga yi alkiyamio).

column2: Then will no (soul) entertain falsehood concerning its coming.
column3: A ma'ade zandondo na'ayi jin jin'u ganmanan na'a.

column2: (Many) will it bring low; (many) will it exalt;
column3: Efo u yio nae gba zazhi nan U ma yi efo elatu ya zandocizhi.

column2: When the earth shall be shaken to its depths
column3: Kami nan a gabe du kin du yan iya ka nan.

column2: And the mountains shall be crumbled to atoms
column3: A ci ga patizhi gwo ruku gwi gwo yan iyaka.

column2: Becoming dust scattered abroad
column3: A ci ga'fe rungba nan a ga ya nan.

column2: And ye shall be sorted out into three classes.
column3: Yeci ga' ganfi jamaazhi iri guba.

column2: Then (there will be) the Companions of the Right Hand;- What will be the Companions of the Right Hand
column3: Za ba gwalozhi danbo ki mae ye zaba gwalozhio

column2: And the Companions of the Left Hand- what will be the Companions of the Left Hand
column3: To zaba gwapinzhi danbo ki' mae ye zaba gwa 'pinzhio

column2: And those Foremost (in Faith) will be Foremost (in the Hereafter).
column3: To za nan zhie sa'gana be dozhiy eti etun alherio nan. (edzoshicizhi)

column2: These will be those Nearest to Allah:
column3: Zawuncinzhi a ga yi eza tsonbazhio.

column2: In Gardens of Bliss:
column3: A fi mini aljannazhio nanzhi yi emi ni'ima nan.

column2: A number of people from those of old
column3: A ma do kun fi tacin za mafarizhio.

column2: And a few from those of later times.
column3: A ma yi za degi mini eza zoba zhio.

column2: And a few from those of later times.
column3: A ma yi za degi mini eza zoba zhio.

column2: (They will be) on Thrones encrusted (with gold and precious stones)
column3: A kpe eti gadozhio nan'a pa nin nan.

column2: Reclining on them facing each other.
column3: Aciga' kpetso ta etiabo a fe woman cia fe cin dozhi le.

column2: Round about them will (serve) youths of perpetual (freshness)
column3: Egi dzakangizhi nanzhiy eyazhi yi nini amaa kuku'a nan cia fe ma'a kezhe.

column2: With goblets (shining) beakers and cups (filled) out of clear-flowing fountains:
column3: Be kopuzhi to darozhi to evo yan egye nae tin ya da eye yan nuwan manangi o nan.

column2: No after-ache will they receive therefrom nor will they suffer intoxication:
column3: A wo etisan be'u yin'a ama'a pea.

column2: And with fruits any that they may select:
column3: To yan gici sunsunzhi a fe tsa nan ga ba'a nan miniabo.

column2: And the flesh of fowls any that they may desire.
column3: To nankan elugi (mannagi) mini nanzhi a gae de shahawa u nan.

column2: And (there will be) Companions with beautiful big and lustrous eyes-
column3: To ynzagi yan Hurul'ainizhi nanzhi eye kosun'azhi fubokun zhikotso ma shizhiko sarauyin nan.

column2: Like unto Pearls well-guarded.
column3: Ke kwotonkwoci yan alulu'igi na'a swo nan.

column2: A Reward for the deeds of their past (life).
column3: Egagba uyio yan etun wangi nanzhiy a fe lo nan.

column2: Not frivolity will they hear therein nor any taint of ill-
column3: A shi tukpa wo egan banza boa ama'a wo egan lefi boa.

column2: Only the saying "Peace! Peace".
column3: Sai de emisa yan aminci (Sallama) tsakaniabo be dozhi.

column2: The Companions of the Right Hand- what will be the Companions of the Right Hand
column3: To za ba gwalozhi ki'ima'ala za ba gwalozhi wu wyo yao

column2: (They will be) among Lote-trees without thorns
column3: A'fimini cigbanzhio nanzhi de ekan'a za ba gwalozhi wu wyo yao

column2: Among Talh trees with flowers (or fruits) piled one above another-
column3: To cigba yabazhi nanzhia tu ta eti dozhio nan.

column2: In shade long-extended
column3: To wuru de epe nan.

column2: In shade long-extended
column3: To wuru de epe nan.

column2: By water flowing constantly
column3: To nuwan nae je tiyan nan.

column2: And fruit in abundance.
column3: To yangici sunsunzhi nan dokun nan.

column2: Whose season is not limited nor (supply) forbidden
column3: Ujin yan naa ba naa a maa la'u kan'aa.

column2: And on Thrones (of Dignity) raised high.
column3: To yantacizhi nanzhiy la tu nan.

column2: We have created (their Companions) of special creation.
column3: Akika Yi ga jin'ao jin jin nan yi wangi nan.

column2: And made them virgin - pure (and undefiled) -
column3: Yi ciga'la fe yantsugizhi.

column2: Beloved (by nature) equal in age-
column3: Nanzhi yebo ebaazhi sarawyin nan a ma yi yezun nan.

column2: For the Companions of the Right Hand.
column3: Ebo zaba gwalo zhio.

column2: A (goodly) number from those of old
column3: A dukun fi mini za mafari zhio.

column2: And a (goodly) number from those of later times.
column3: A ma ke'dokun fi mini za zunmazhio.

column2: The Companions of the Left Hand- what will be the Companions of the Left Hand
column3: To zaba gwapin zhi ki'imaala za ba gwapinzhi wu wyo yao

column2: (They will be) in the midst of a Fierce Blast of Fire and in Boiling Water
column3: A fi mini efe nan wonan da iyaka na ganni be nuwan gbingbinciy.

column2: And in the shades of Black Smoke:
column3: To wuru dagan enawu zhiko.

column2: Nothing (will there be) to refresh nor to please:
column3: U fu ye koa Umae kan igidia.

column2: For that they were wont to be indulged before that in wealth (and luxury)
column3: Akika afe zanazhiy emawo yan izhe U gaa la dan yegboro bo nan.

column2: And persisted obstinately in wickedness supreme!
column3: A maafe za nanzhi a tu ta eti zunubi wancikozhio nan.

column2: And they used to say "What! when we die and become dust and bones shall we then indeed be raised up again-
column3: Amaajin a fe gan gan: Ngbayi ga tsu cia zhe jikanan be tsukun'y ngba a ga yi san tin ya wo be

column2: And they used to say "What! when we die and become dust and bones shall we then indeed be raised up again-
column3: Amaajin a fe gan gan: Ngbayi ga tsu cia zhe jikanan be tsukun'y ngba a ga yi san tin ya wo be

column2: (We) and our fathers of old
column3: Kashiy to yanmanci yizhi nanzhi yi za mafarizhi nan (aga atso san ma).

column2: Say: "Yea those of old and those of later times
column3: Gan gan: Akika to za mafarizhi to za zunmazhi.

column2: "All will certainly be gathered together for the meeting appointed for a Day well-known.
column3: Agae kuyekan kpatae lo efo nan yi be lokaci kpikpeciy nan.

column2: "Then will ye truly- O ye that go wrong and treat (Truth) as Falsehood!-
column3: Gancin ye eza gbingbincizhi nanzhiy yi ganmanan zuncizhi nan.

column2: "Ye will surely taste of the Tree of Zaqqum.
column3: Akika yea gi yan dagan mini cigban yan zakumuo.

column2:
Then will ye fill your insides therewith,Ye ciga gbakoezhi she be'u yin pin nyin.
Surah 56:54 ,  And drink Boiling Water on top of it:
column3: Gancin ye cia fin nuwan gbin gbinci ta eti' ubo.

column2: "Indeed ye shall drink like diseased camels raging with thirst!"
column3: Yecia fe fin'u fin fin-fin yan za nan nunwo dan be yin de de nan.

column2: Such will be their entertainment on the Day of Requital!
column3: Nan nan ga yi ecinba efo egagbao.

column2: It is We Who have created you: why will ye not witness the Truth
column3: Yi ga jin alitta ye yeo kiy la yeci ya gaskiyaa yin'o

column2: Do ye then see- The (human Seed) that ye throw out-
column3: Kashiy Ye le maniy nan ye la tin ya nan yea

column2: Is it ye who create it or are We the Creators
column3: Ye gae jin alitta wun'o kashiy Yi jin wun'o

column2: We have decreed Death to be your common lot and We are not to be frustrated
column3: Yi ga kpa ajali tsakani yebo Yi ma'a ye gan gwa'a.

column2: from changing your Forms and creating you (again) in (forms) that ye know not.
column3: Eti egwasan yan ye be dozhin 'ezhi Yiciy ga ye jin dan mini yandoci nan ka atso kpea nan.

column2: And ye certainly know already the first form of creation: why then do ye not celebrate His praises
column3: Akika ma yetso kpe e caba yan alittaye ye ki-jin ye cie santu a yan'o

column2: See ye the seed that ye sow in the ground
column3: Kashiy ye le enu nan ye nu nan yea

column2: Is it ye that cause it to grow or are We the Cause
column3: Ye gae nyin'u tinydo kashi Yi ye'oyin wun'o

column2: Were it Our Will We could crumble it to dry powder and ye would be left in wonderment
column3: U ga ba yi ba Yi ga finiuzhi la'a fe wiwo ci (wun'ade anfania) gancin yecia fe jin mamaki.

column2: Were it Our Will We could crumble it to dry powder and ye would be left in wonderment
column3: U ga ba yi ba Yi ga finiuzhi la'a fe wiwo ci (wun'ade anfania) gancin yecia fe jin mamaki.

column2: (Saying) "We are indeed left with debts (for nothing):
column3: (Yecia fe gan gan): Akika a yi dan'du yi cia fe gbataci zhi.

column2: Indeed are we shut out (of the fruits of our labour)
column3: A'a a de'a yi kan anfani yan lati yn de.

column2: See ye the water which ye drink
column3: Kashiy ye le nuwan nan ye fin nan yeaSurah 56:69      Do ye bring it down (in rain) from the cloud or do WeNgba ye ga du'u zhin dagan shishi'ubo kashiy Yi tsa du'u zhin'o

column2: Were it Our Will We could make it salt (and unpalatable): then why do ye not give thanks
column3: U ga ba Yi ba Yi ga'u laafe ke esan esan nan. Ki la ye cie jin yeboa yin'o

column2: See ye the Fire which ye kindle
column3: Kashiy ye cin ena na ye gun nan lea

column2: Is it ye who grow the tree which feeds the fire or do We grow it
column3: Ngba Ye ga ca jin jin yan cigban wun'o Kashi Yi jin wun'o

column2: We have made it a memorial (of Our handiwork) and an article of comfort and convenience for the denizens of deserts.
column3: Yi ga la'u cia fe sinsantuo be eyan emawo'a ya Za nanzhie za kpe eti kinbo nao

column2: Then celebrate with praises the name of thy Lord the Supreme!
column3: Ebo acin'o fe li sunna yan Tsoci wye nan yi Etsu cinwan nan tsatsa yin.

column2: Furthermore I call to witness the setting of the Stars-
column3: U ma jin gan sai Miga zhi kuti be ecinba yan tswangizhi yin'a.

column2: And that is indeed a mighty adjuration if ye but knew-
column3: Akika ma wuncin kutizhi u yio nan wancin nan amma'ye ga kpe nan.

column2: That this is indeed a qur´an Most Honourable
column3: Akika Alkuranu u yio nan wancin nan.

column2: In Book well-guarded
column3: Fi mini Litafi nan yi eyan tswitswaci nan.

column2: Which none shall touch but those who are clean:
column3: Ade za na'a la gwa tu'u na'a sai dai zananzhi ga yizalilicizhi nan.

column2: A Revelation from the Lord of the Worlds.
column3: Eyan cin cin ci u yio dagan eba Etsu nae kpa alittazhi kpata nan.

column2: Is it such a Message that ye would hold in light esteem
column3: Ngba egan nan nan ga ye ye gba yeo

column2: And have ye made it your livelihood that ye should declare it false
column3: Yicia arziki ye la'afe gan akika ye ga'u dza ganmanan

column2: Then why do ye not (intervene) when (the soul of the dying man) reaches the throat-
column3: Ki la kaminan rayi gaatun robo nan .

column2: And ye the while (sit) looking on-
column3: Kanga yecia fe cinbale gancin.

column2: But We are nearer to him than ye and yet see not-
column3: Yi ma tsoba'u gan ye ammade ye ye le ye'a.

column2: Then why do ye not- If you are exempt from (future) account-
column3: Ki lao wun'ayi gan ye yea fe za nanzhiy a woa gbata'a nao.

column2: Call back the soul if ye are true (in the claim of independence)
column3: Yea (rayi) ye lazhin'y wun'a yi eza gaskiyazhi ye yio nan.

column2: Thus then if he be of those Nearest to Allah
column3: Amma'de de uga fe dan mini za tsonbazhio.

column2: (There is for him) Rest and Satisfaction and a Garden of Delights.
column3: Akika a ga fe fi mini efao ganni be arziki wangiy be emi aljanna yan ni'imae.

column2: And if he be of the Companions of the Right Hand
column3: Ammaa u ga' fe dan mini zabagwalozhio.

column2: (For him is the salutation) "Peace be unto thee" from the Companions of the Right Hand.
column3: Aminci yan Soko u lau jin tabbata'u ya wye dan mini zaba gwa lwozhio.

column2: And if he be of those who treat (Truth) as Falsehood who go wrong
column3: Ammaa uga fe dan mini ganmanan zuncizhio nanzhiy yi eza egbin zhi nan.

column2: For him is Entertainment with Boiling Water.
column3: Ecinba'u dan mini nuwan gbingbin-cio.Surah 56:94 And burning in Hell-Fire.Be gingandan yan ena jahimuy.

column2: Verily this is the Very Truth and Certainly.
column3: Akika nannan ga yi gaskiya yan baenio.

column2: So celebrate with praises the name of thy Lord the Supreme.
column3: Ebo acin'o fe li sunna yan Tsoci wye nan wancin nan tsa tsa yin.

column2: Whatever is in the heavens and on earth- let it declare the Praises and Glory of Allah: for He is the Exalted in Might the Wise.
column3: Yan nanzhi fi sanmazhio to kin bo nan kpatae li Soko tsatsayin. Akika Soko Etsu Zankpe uyio Etsu hikima u yio.

column2: To Him belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth: It is He Who gives Life and Death; and He has Power over all things.
column3: Wyun ga wun mulki yan sanmazhi to kin yin'o Wun'e dan rayi U mae wu rayi. Etsu u yio nan gboka dan jin jin yandondo nan.

column2: He is the First and the Last the Evident and the Immanent: and He has full knowledge of all things.
column3: Wyun ga yi Etsu nan latu gan nao Wun ga mayi Etsu nan swo gan nao u ma yi be kpikpe yan yandondoe.

column2: He it is Who created the heavens and the earth in Six Days and is moreover firmly established on the Throne (of Authority). He knows what enters within the earth and what comes forth out of it what comes down from heaven and what mounts up to it. And He is with you wheresoever ye may be. And Allah sees well all that ye do.
column3: Wyun ga jin alitta yan sanmazhio to kin dan mini efo gutsun'ayin bo gancin U cia jin dai dai ta eti Al'arashio. U yi be kpikpe yan yandondo nae lo dan kin bo nan to nae tinya bo nan to yan nae cin zhin dagan sanmao nan to nae gun lo bo nan. U ma dan ganni be ye yin bandondo nan ye ga dan nao. Akika Sokoe cin ye cin le be iri etun nanzhi ye lo nan.

column2: To Him belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth: and all affairs are referred back to Allah.
column3: Wyun ga wun mulki yan sanmanzhi to kin yin'o alamari kpata ma ebau ga a zhe ban lo.

column2: He merges Night into Day and He merges Day into Night; and He has full knowledge of the secrets of (all) hearts.
column3: Wyun'e la yeshi a gan dan mini batin'o U mae la batin a gandan mini yeshio. U ma yi be kpikpe yan yannanzhi fi yangban zhio nan.

column2: Believe in Allah and His messenger and spend (in charity) out of the (substance) whereof He has made you heirs. For those of you who believe and spend (in charity)- for them is a great Reward.
column3: Yea gaskiya ya be Sokoe to be Tuciu yin ye mae fe wu dukiya yezhi mini nanzhiy U la ya ye sungwa nan. Akika za nanzhi ga imani jin miniebo nan acie wu dukiya'azi fi eko wangio nan egagba yan lada nan wancin nan wun'ajin tabbata ya'a.

column2: What cause have ye why ye should not believe in Allah- and the Messenger invites you to believe in your Lord and has indeed taken your Covenant if ye are men of Faith.
column3: Kima la yecia jin imani be Soko yin'a yin'o Tuci mae yi ye gan ye la imanie jin be Tsoci ye yin Uma kezhea alkawali nan gboka nan la be ye yin wun'a yi Muminizhi tsa ye yio nan.

column2: He is the One Who sends to His Servant Manifest Signs that He may lead you from the depths of Darkness into the Light and verily Allah is to you most kind and Merciful.
column3: Wyun gae cin aya nanzhia tula nan be ya wuzhi wun'o ebo u la ye ye'u ku'u tin'u ya dagan bazhikozhio lo haskeo akika ma Soko Etsu tausayi uyio Etsu ye gun uyio be ye yin'o.

column2: And what cause have ye why ye should not spend in the cause of Allah- For to Allah belongs the heritage of the heavens and the earth. Not equal among you are those who spent (freely) and fought before the Victory (with those who did so later). Those are higher in rank than those who spent (freely) and fought afterwards. But to all has Allah promised a goodly (reward). And Allah is well acquainted with all that ye do.
column3: Ki ma'ajin ye ye cia wu dukiya fi eko Soko boa yin'o ngan Soko ga wun egun yan sanmazhio to kin yin'o. Za nanzhi wu dukiya a ma gunkun kafi kpikpe yan Maka nan a jin ye ni be za nanzhi wu dukiya baci yan kpikpe na'a Za wuncinzhi a wancin darajao gan za zunmazhi. Kpata ma Soko jin'a alkawali yan egagba wangi. Akika Soko de labari yan etun nanzhi ye lo nan.

column2: Who is he that will Loan to Allah a beautiful loan for (Allah) will increase it manifold to his credit and he will have (besides) a liberal Reward.
column3: Ze'I ga la gbata wangi a ma Soko Soko cia wo'u gbata nan dokun nan u maa kezhe de lada nan wancin nan be.

column2: One Day shalt thou see the believing men and the believing women- how their Light runs forward before them and by their right hands: (their greeting will be): "Good News for you this Day! Gardens beneath which flow rivers! to dwell therein for aye! This is indeed the highest Achievement!"
column3: Fo nan wo ga le Mumini bagizhi to mumini ynzagizhi ye nan askeazhi a fe dazan dan yegboro abo to gwa loa bo (acia fe gan'a gan): yangbanfai ajin tabbata yaye yin nan ganni be Aljannazhi nanzhi nuwanzhie je fi tutun yinna akika wuncin ga yi rabo nan wancin nao.

column2: One Day will the Hypocrites- men and women - say to the Believers: "Wait for us! Let us borrow (a Light) from your Light!" It will be said: "Turn ye back to your rear! then seek a Light (where ye can)!" So a wall will be put up betwixt them with a gate therein. Within it will be Mercy throughout and without it all alongside will be (Wrath and) Punishment!
column3: Fo nan Munafiki bagizhi to munafikaynzagizhi a fe gan be za nanzhia imani jin nan gan: E pata ya yi yi'I ebo yi de bae de aske ye yi sun'y. Acia gan ya'gan: E fe zheban lo izhe ) ye dae wa aske bagao aciga eban tu dan tsakaniabo be dozhi eban wuncin'a yi be kpakoe nin yan'u bo yegun danbo de yan'ubo ma azaba daanbo.

column2: (Those without) will call out "Were we not with you" (The others) will reply "True! but ye led yourselves into temptation; ye looked forward (to our ruin); ye doubted (Allah´s Promise); and (your false) desires deceived you; until there issued the Command of Allah. And the Deceiver deceived you in respect of Allah.
column3: Acia fe yia gan: Asa u jin be ye yin yi dan'a Aci gan a'a ngan ye yea fitina la'a tswan eti tacin ye yeci fe jin makirinci ye ci fe jin kelo kezhin guri yezhi cia ye ta har da lokaci nan alamari Soko da beyn nan yannanzhie taza zhi nan cia ye ta ke Soko lugwa.

column2: "This Day shall no ransom be accepted of you nor of those who rejected Allah." Your abode is the Fire: that is the proper place to claim you: and an evil refuge it is!"
column3: Yin nan a'gwo sisa ndondo egwae boa ama'a gwo dagan eba kafirizhi boa ezhe kebae ma yi ena wunga gwoe yin'o akika ezhe keba wuncin wun'a biye.

column2: Has not the Time arrived for the Believers that their hearts in all humility should engage in the remembrance of Allah and of the Truth which has been revealed (to them) and that they should not become like those to whom was given Revelation aforetime but long ages passed over them and their hearts grew hard For many among them are rebellious transgressors.
column3: To gbani eka la'akun'a ya za nan zhia imani jin naa nan yangban'azhi gaa dakpya ya pipa yan Soko na'a be yannanzhiy ucin be yan gaskiya na'a maa gafe ke za nanzhia la Litafi ya shidzo batsozhio ucia jin fo fia yangban azhi cia wo kpakparae na maa Akika ekun dondo za wuncinzhi fasikizhi yio.

column2: Know ye (all) that Allah giveth life to the earth after its death! already have We shown the Signs plainly to you that ye may learn wisdom.
column3: Ye kpe wo ke de Soko gae dan kin reyi baci nan uga tsu nao Akika Yi yia ayazhi jin bayin ya ye ebo ye lae fe eza ankalizhi.

column2: For those who give in Charity men and women and loan to Allah a Beautiful Loan it shall be increased manifold (to their credit) and they shall have (besides) a liberal reward
column3: Akika. Eza bagizhi nanzhie jin sadakanan to ynzagizhi nanzhie jin sadaka nan a mae kezhe ma Soko yan eyan wangi nan Soko ga bolo bolozhi dozhiy ya'a lada na ma wancin nan ga'jin tabbata ya'a.

column2: And those who believe in Allah and His messengers- they are the Sincere (lovers of Truth) and the witnesses (who testify) in the eyes of their Lord: They shall have their Reward and their Light. But those who reject Allah and deny Our Signs- they are the Companions of Hell-Fire.
column3: Za nanzhiy ma ga imani jin be Sokoe to Tuci'uzhi nan za wuncinzhi ga yi eza gaskiyazhio be shuhada u zhiy eba Tso cia bo lada'a ga' jin tabbata ya'a to aske. Za nan zhi maajin kafirincin acia alamari Soko yi ganmanan nan Za wuncinzhi ga yi egi mi nan yan jahi-mu zhio.

column2: Know ye (all) that the life of this world is but play and amusement pomp and mutual boasting and multiplying (in rivalry) among yourselves riches and children. Here is a similitude: How rain and the growth which it brings forth delight (the hearts of) the tillers; soon it withers; thou wilt see it grow yellow; then it becomes dry and crumbles away. But in the Hereafter is a Penalty severe (for the devotees of wrong). And Forgiveness from Allah and (His) Good Pleasure (for the devotees of Allah). And what is the life of this world but goods and chattels of deception
column3: Ye kpe wo ke de edunfe izhe edzo uyio to shagala jin tsakaniebo be dozhi be wiwa yan bibe yan dukiyazhi be egizhiy ke kwatonkwoci ele nan uyio nan eyandzo'uzhi fe ya enunucizhi shiawa na gancin ucia bea wo wyo cia leu ye dzuru-dzuruy uci gazhe yan nan de anfa'ni bea nan. Akika zoba batsozhio azaba tsuntsun nu danbo to gafara dagan eba Soko ganni be yedau yin. Akika edunfe izhe uyi yandoa sai de eyan emazhi nae ta za nan.

column2: Be ye foremost (in seeking) Forgiveness from your Lord and a Garden (of Bliss) the width whereof is as the width of heaven and earth prepared for those who believe in Allah and His messengers: that is the Grace of Allah which He bestows on whom he pleases: and Allah is the Lord of Grace abounding.
column3: Efe sa gana lo wiwa yan gafara Soko be wiwa aljanae nan epe'u yi ke epe yan sanma be kin yin nan. A jin'u shiri jin ya za nanzhia imani jin be Sokoe be Tuciuzhiy nan. Wuncin ga yi eryatwa wanciko nan wun'e la ya za na ga bau nan. Akika Soko Etsu eryatwa uyio nan wancin nan.

column2: Be ye foremost (in seeking) Forgiveness from your Lord and a Garden (of Bliss) the width whereof is as the width of heaven and earth prepared for those who believe in Allah and His messengers: that is the Grace of Allah which He bestows on whom he pleases: and Allah is the Lord of Grace abounding.
column3: Efe sa gana lo wiwa yan gafara Soko be wiwa aljanae nan epe'u yi ke epe yan sanma be kin yin nan. A jin'u shiri jin ya za nanzhia imani jin be Sokoe be Tuciuzhiy nan. Wuncin ga yi eryatwa wanciko nan wun'e la ya za na ga bau nan. Akika Soko Etsu eryatwa uyio nan wancin nan.

column2: No misfortune can happen on earth or in your souls but is recorded in a decree before We bring it into existence: That is truly easy for Allah:
column3: Yandondo na ga tswan'ye mini yan mimacin le zhio nan kinbo nan ko mini nakan kpace ye bo nan akika kikaci uyio dan mini Litafio shidzo kaafi ujin faruwa nan. Wuncin ma eba Soko eyan finfanci uyio.

column2: In order that ye may not despair over matters that pass you by nor exult over favours bestowed upon you. For Allah loveth not any vainglorious boaster-
column3: Ebo acin'o e ga nyin yangban be yan nanzhi gaa cin yebo na ma ye mae gaa gan ninma be yan nan u ga la ya ye nan ma akika Sokoe wa zandondo na gae gbo'tika cie jin fahri na'a.

column2: Such persons as are covetous and commend covetousness to men. And if any turn back (from Allah´s Way) verily Allah is Free of all Needs Worthy of all Praise.
column3: Za nanzhie tanyanbo a mae kezhe jin zazhi foro be yanbotan'e nan akika zandondo nan ga zunma zheta nan Soko Etsu kunke uyio Etsu nan zandondoe jin yebo ya nan uyio.

column2: We sent aforetime our messengers with Clear Signs and sent down with them the Book and the Balance (of Right and Wrong) that men may stand forth in justice; and We sent down Iron in which is (material for) mighty war as well as many benefits for mankind that Allah may test who it is that will help Unseen Him and His messengers: For Allah is Full of Strength Exalted in Might (and able to enforce His Will).
column3: Akika Yi tun Tuci Yizhi tun be hujjazhiy Yi ma cin Litafi zhi ya'a ganni be tsunwan'e ebo zawangizhia la'a kua gikini be adalinci. Yi ma kezhe cin yankpa be yaa mini'ubo kagbo tsuntsunnu danbo uma yi eyan anfani ya zawangizhi ebo Soko u la'uwu za na gae jin Soko be Tuciu yin taimako swiswoci nan. Akika Soko Etsu kagbo uyio. Etsu zankpe.

column2: We sent aforetime our messengers with Clear Signs and sent down with them the Book and the Balance (of Right and Wrong) that men may stand forth in justice; and We sent down Iron in which is (material for) mighty war as well as many benefits for mankind that Allah may test who it is that will help Unseen Him and His messengers: For Allah is Full of Strength Exalted in Might (and able to enforce His Will).
column3: Akika Yi tun Tuci Yizhi tun be hujjazhiy Yi ma cin Litafi zhi ya'a ganni be tsunwan'e ebo zawangizhia la'a kua gikini be adalinci. Yi ma kezhe cin yankpa be yaa mini'ubo kagbo tsuntsunnu danbo uma yi eyan anfani ya zawangizhi ebo Soko u la'uwu za na gae jin Soko be Tuciu yin taimako swiswoci nan. Akika Soko Etsu kagbo uyio. Etsu zankpe.

column2: And We sent Noah and Abraham and established in their line Prophethood and Revelation: and some of them were on right guidance. But many of them became rebellious transgressors.
column3: Akika Yi tun Nuhu to Ibrahima tun Yicia Annabizhi jin dan mini zuriya'azhio ganni be Litafiy Miniabo ade nanzhia ke eko nan ekun dondo miniabo ma fasikizhi ayio.

column2: Then in their wake We followed them up with (others of) Our messengers: We sent after them Jesus the son of Mary and bestowed on him the Gospel; and We ordained in the hearts of those who followed him Compassion and Mercy. But the Monasticism which they invented for themselves We did not prescribe for them: (We commanded) only the seeking for the Good Pleasure of Allah; but that they did not foster as they should have done. Yet We bestowed on those among them who believed their (due) reward but many of them are rebellious transgressors.
column3: Yici kezhea Tuci Yizhi gba'a zunmao Yicia (Annabi) Isa egi Maryamu gbaa zunmao be Yicia Litafi yan Linjeela la'a yau Yicia tosayi be yegun'y laadan yangban yan za nanzhia emi tu'u nan. Gwigwo gan iya'ka dan mini ibadao ma e kpe ya be wuncin'y Yi ka wuncin ta eti'a boa sai de a fea wa yeda yan Soko. A ma tswa'u kendo u gwoyin a tswau na'a. Yicia egagba wangi la'a ya za nanzhia imani jin nan ekun dondo miniabo ma fasikizhi ayio.

column2: O ye that believe! Fear Allah and believe in His Messenger and He will bestow on you a double portion of His Mercy: He will provide for you a Light by which ye shall walk (straight in your path) and He will forgive you (your past): for Allah is Oft-Forgiving Most Merciful.
column3: Ya ye nanzhia imani jin nan! E fe tswa Soko ye mae la imanie jin be Tuci'u yin Wun'a twaerya be rabo gubae mini yegun'u bo U ma ga haske la'a ya ye nan yea fe laa da zan nan Umaa fa be ye yin akika Soko Etsu gafara uyio Etsu yegun uyio.

column2: That the People of the Book may know that they have no power whatever over the Grace of Allah that (His) Grace is (entirely) in His Hand to bestow it on whomsoever He wills. For Allah is the Lord of Grace abounding.
column3: Ebo za ba Litafi zhi'a kpe'a wo ke de a de kagbo ndondo eti eryatwa Soko boa nan akika ma eryatwa kpata be Soko yin'u dan'o wun'e lau ya za nan ga bau nan akika Soko Etsu rryatwa uyio nan wancin nan.

column2: Allah has indeed heard (and accepted) the statement of the woman who pleads with thee concerning her husband and carries her complaint (in prayer) to Allah: and Allah (always) hears the arguments between both sides among you: for Allah hears and sees (all things).
column3: Akika Soko wo gan yan eza ynzagi nae gan lo gan-zhin be wyo yin eti egan eba'u bo nan. Ucie jin kara lo eba Soko. Soko mae wo eza yezhi. Akika Soko Etsu nae wo gan nan uyio Etsu nae le ba ye nan uyio.

column2: If any men among you divorce their wives by Zihar (calling them mothers) they cannot be their mothers: None can be their mothers except those who gave them birth. And in fact they use words (both) iniquitous and false: but truly Allah is one that blots out (sins) and forgives (again and again)
column3: .Za nanzhie jin zihari mini yebo be yinmiazhiy nan (aajin afe'la yinmin'azhi san tatu be nna'azhi nna'zhi yan akika a ga yi nanzhiy ma'a nao. Akika a de gan gan dedezhi tinya misun'o a mae zun ganmanan zun. Akika Soko Etsu sauki uyio Etsu gafara uyio.

column2: But those who divorce their wives by Zihar then wish to go back on the words they uttered- (It is ordained that such a one) should free a slave before they touch each other: Thus are ye admonished to perform: and Allah is well-acquainted with (all) that ye do.
column3: Za nanzhiy ma ga zihari jin be yinmiazhiy nan acia jin ake dazhin eti egan na'gan nan( ke uyi acin'a na) hukunci nan ta etiabo nan u ga yi gan a la wuzhi a ya gi shidzo kafi a la egwa'atu yinmiazhi nan. Wuncin ga yi yan nan e la jin ye waazi nao Soko ma yi be Labari yan etun nanzhi ye lo kpata nan.

column2: And if any has not (the wherewithal) he should fast for two months consecutively before they touch each other. But if any is unable to do so he should feed sixty indigent ones this that ye may show your faith in Allah and His Messenger. Those are limits (set by) Allah. For those who reject (Him) there is a grievous Penalty.
