column3: Gancin za nan be dewuzhia nan u la azum yan etswa guba nanzhiy lamitu dozhi nan'u fe kafi'u la egwa'u tu yinmiu nan. Gancin zanan be jin wuncin woa nan u la eza gwagbagizhi za shita'u ya yan'u gi. Wuncin ma yi ebo ye la imanie jin be Soko be Tuci'u yin iyaka (to hukunci) yan Soko zhi ga dan'o nao azaba na ma tan nan wun'ajin tabbata ya kafirizhi.

column2: Those who resist Allah and His Messenger will be humbled to dust as were those before them: for We have already sent down Clear Signs. And the Unbelievers (will have) a humiliating Penalty-
column3: Akika za nanzhie le Soko be Tuciu yin ba nan a ga'a gba kendoe za nanazhiy shiadzo nan gba nan akika Yi'a aya nanzhi tula nan cin bea ya wye akika ma azaba yan zun yesun a jin tabbata ya kafirizhi.

column2: On the Day that Allah will raise them all up (again) and show them the Truth (and meaning) of their conduct. Allah has reckoned its (value) though they may have forgotten it for Allah is Witness to all things.
column3: Fo nan Soko ga'a na'akin baenio nan wun'a ya' labari yan etun nanzhiy a lo nan Soko'u gwo tswa a ma'a batan akika Sokoe jin eri eti yandondo.

column2: Seest thou not that Allah doth know (all) that is in the heavens and on earth There is not a secret consultation between three but He makes the fourth among them - Nor between five but He makes the sixth- nor between fewer nor more but He is in their midst wheresoever they be: In the end will He tell them the truth of their conduct on the Day of Judgment. For Allah has full knowledge of all things.
column3: Kashi wyo le ye gan Soko kpikpe yan yannanzhi fi sanmazhio to kinbo na'a A de eza swiswoci tsakani za guta boa sai de Soko gaa fe nicia a maa yi za gutsun Soko gaafe tswanayin cia ka aga gbagba gan'acin ko aci gan'acin sai Wun'a dan gancin Ucia'ya'a labari yan etun nanzhi a lo nan efo alkiyamiy. Akika Soko de kpikpe yan yandondo.

column2: Turnest thou not thy sight towards those who were forbidden secret counsels yet revert to that which they were forbidden (to do) And they hold secret counsels among themselves for iniquity and hostility and disobedience to the Messenger. And when they come to thee they salute thee not as Allah salutes thee (but in crooked ways): And they say to themselves "Why does not Allah punish us for our words" Enough for them is Hell: In it will they burn and evil is that destination!
column3: Ngba Wyo le za nanzhi a kan'a gan a aga baza swiswoci na ma ye'a Gancin aci kezhe eti yannan akan'a gan a ga jin na ma a cie baza swiswoci eti le fio be gbin gbin tuy be lemba yan Tuciy. A ma ga be ebawye a fe sa wyo mi be yan nan Soko la sa wyo yea nan acia fe gan dan yangban'azhio gan ki la Soko ci jin yi azaba ebo yannanzhiy yi ye gan nan boa yin'o jahannama danbo nan a gandan nan akika zoba'biye.

column2: O ye who believe! When ye hold secret counsel do it not for iniquity and hostility and disobedience to the Prophet; but do it for righteousness and self-restraint; and fear Allah to Whom ye shall be brought back.
column3: Ya ye nanzhia imani jin nan kami nan ye ga'a baza swiswoci nan e ga baza eti le fio be gbingintuy be lemba Tuciy ma e baza eti emi latu Soko be dansun Sokoe yemae fe tswa Soko Etsu nan eba'u ga ye'a kezhe lo nan.

column2: Secret counsels are only (inspired) by the Evil One in order that he may cause grief to the Believers; but he cannot harm them in the least except as Allah permits; and on Allah let the Believers put their trust.
column3: Akika ezabaswiswoci (eti lefio) dagan eba Sheitan bo wun'e fe beo ebo yangban yan zananzhia imani jin nan ula'u nyin u ma jin'a egun ndondo woa sai be izini Sokoe Soko ga ma Muminizhi a ya kpe kawan yin'o.

column2: O ye who believe! When ye are told to make room in the assemblies (spread out and) make room: (ample) room will Allah provide for you. And when ye are told to rise up rise up Allah will rise up to (suitable) ranks (and degrees) those of you who believe and who have been granted (mystic) Knowledge. And Allah is well-acquainted with all ye do.
column3: Ya ye nanzhia imani jin nan a ga gan ye gan ye; kpe ba'e ya'a edunfe bao e kpe ba ya'a Soko akpe ba ya yetso ga. A ma ga gan ye gan: e nakin (eti etun Soko) ye'a nakin Soko ga za nanzhiy ga imani jin miniebo nan latu to za nanzhiy yi be kpikpe' nan Wun'a yaa darajazhi Soko ma yi be labari yan etun nanzhi ye lo nan.

column2: O ye who believe! When ye consult the Messenger in private spend something in charity before your private consultation. That will be best for you and most conducive to purity (of conduct). But if ye find not (the wherewithal) Allah is Oft-Forgiving Most Merciful.
column3: Ya ye nanzhia imani jin nan kami nan ye ga'baza be Tuciy nan ye'a sadaka la'a shidzo be-dzo. Wuncin ga yi alheri ya ye yeo u ma tadzu gan. Kagan ye be de'a akika Soko Etsu gafara u yio Etsu yegun u yio.

column2: Is it that ye are afraid of spending sums in charity before your private consultation (with him) If then ye do not so and Allah forgives you then (at least) establish regular prayer; practise regular charity; and obey Allah and His Messenger. And Allah is well-acquainted with all that ye do.
column3: Kashiy ye sundan sun (yan yaji) ye ga sadaka la'a Shidzo kafi ye baza nan Kagan ye be jin'a Soko cia fa be ye yin yea swallah ku gikini ye mae la zakkae wa ye mae la mietu Soko be Tuci uyio akika Soko de labari etun nanzhiy ye lo nan.

column2: Turnest thou not thy attention to those who turn (in friendship) to such as have the Wrath of Allah upon them They are neither of you nor of them and they swear to falsehood knowingly.
column3: Ngba Wyo le za nanzhi'a jama'a nan zhi Soko a zhe wun be yin nan la ndakatazhi nan ye'a Za wuncinzhi a dan mini ye boa a ma dan mini'a boa. A ma'ajin a fe zhi kuti eti gan manao a tso ma kpe.

column2: Allah has prepared for them a severe Penalty: evil indeed are their deeds.
column3: Sokoa shiri yan azaba nan tan nan jin ka'a akika etun nanzhiy e lo nan wun'a bi ye.

column2: They have made their oaths a screen (for their misdeeds): thus they obstruct (men) from the Path of Allah: therefore shall they have a humiliating Penalty.
column3: A' kuti nanzhiy e zhi nan la ke garkuwa nan acia eko Soko kan'eza yn da azaba yan zunyesun wun'a jin tabbata ya'a.

column2: Of no profit whatever to them against Allah will be their riches nor their sons: they will be Companions of the Fire to dwell therein (for aye)!
column3: Duki-yaazhi to egizhi a' kunke ya'be yandondoe eba Soko boa. Zawuncinzhi ma a ga yi egi mi na zhio ba ga bo a fi tu tun yin'o.

column2: One day will Allah raise them all up (for Judgment): then will they swear to Him as they swear to you: And they think that they have something (to stand upon). No indeed! they are but liars!
column3: Fo nan Soko gaa ku nankin bae nio nan acia fe zhi kuti ya'u kendoe e zhi kuti ya ye nan acia fe kpaye gan eti yandoci (nan gboka nan) bo a tao A'a ujin'acin'a akika ganmanan zuncizhi a yio.

column2: The Evil One has got the better of them: so he has made them lose the remembrance of Allah. They are the Party of the Evil One. Truly it is the Party of the Evil One that will perish!
column3: Sheitan'yin'a rukpea U cia tanba yan pipa Soko la'a ce taa za wuncizhi ga yi jama'a yan sheitan zhio akika ma jama'a yan sheitan ga yi eza hasarazhio.

column2: Those who resist Allah and His Messenger will be among those most humiliated.
column3: Akika za nanzhie le Soko be Tuci'u yin ba nan a ga yi eza gbigbaci zhio.

column2: Allah has decreed: "It is I and My messengers who must prevail": For Allah is One full of strength able to enforce His Will.
column3: Sokoe hukunci ba gan akika Mi ga de (galaba) zankpe to Mi to Tuci Mizhi. Akika Soko Etsu kagbo u yio Etsu zankpe u yio.

column2: Thou wilt not find any people who believe in Allah and the Last Day loving those who resist Allah and His Messenger even though they were their fathers or their sons or their brothers or their kindred. For such He has written Faith in their hearts and strengthened them with a spirit from Himself. And He will admit them to Gardens beneath which Rivers flow to dwell therein (for ever). Allah will be well pleased with them and they with Him. They are the Party of Allah. Truly it is the Party of Allah that will achieve Felicity.
column3: Wyo'a tsun jama'a nanzhia imani jin be Sokoe be efo zobae nan a fe de cincin ya za nae le Soko be Tuci'u yin ba na'a ka agafe mimaazhi ko egiazhi ko yegiazhi ko dangiazhi. Za wuncin zhi ga Sokoa imani jin tabbata dan yangban'azhi bo U ci kezhea ya kagbo dagan nko'u bo uma gaa la gandan aljannazhio nanzhiy nuwanzhie je fi takoshin'u bo nan baga boa fi tutun yin'o Sokoe yeda jin bea yin atso ma'a jin be Sokoe Za wuncinzhi ga yi za ba Soko akika ma za ba Soko (zhi) ga'ade nasarao.

column2: Whatever is in the heavens and on earth let it declare the Praises and Glory of Allah: for He is the Exalted in Might the Wise.
column3: Yan nazhi fi sanmazhio nan to nanzhi fi kin bo nan kpata e li Soko tsatsa yin. Akika Soko Etsu zankpe u yio Etsu hikima Uyio.

column2: It is He Who got out the Unbelievers among the People of the Book from their homes at the first gathering (of the forces). Little did ye think that they would get out: And they thought that their fortresses would defend them from Allah! But the (Wrath of) Allah came to them from quarters from which they little expected (it) and cast terror into their hearts so that they destroyed their dwellings by their own hands and the hands of the Believers take warning then O ye with eyes (to see)!
column3: Wun ga nyan kafirizhi mini zaba Litafizhi tin ya dagan emi'azhi bo ebo gungun yekan yan mafari bo. Ye yan ebankoazhi gaa a kangwa wo be Sokoe. Soko ci dzunfia banan akpaye tu'a nan. Ucia edo la'ace dan yangban'azhio atso ci fe ban emiazhi ya egwa'azhi ganni be egwa Muminizhiy e fe kpa ye re ya nanzhi yi eza hankali zhi nan.

column2: And had it not been that Allah had decreed banishment for them He would certainly have punished them in this world: And in the Hereafter they shall (certainly) have the Punishment of the Fire.
column3: Kagan ujin ebo nan Sokoa nyin-nyan ka ta etiabo na'a da U gaa jin azaba dede izheo azaba yan ena maga' jin tabbata ya'a ekuo

column2: That is because they resisted Allah and His Messenger: and if any one resists Allah verily Allah is severe in Punishment.
column3: Wuncin ma yi ebo nan a le Soko be Tuci'u yin ba nan zandondo na ma ga'a le Soko ba nan Soko Etsu tsun tsunnu u yio.

column2: Whether ye cut down (O ye Muslim!) The tender palm-trees or ye left them standing on their roots it was by leave of Allah and in order that He might cover with shame the rebellious transgresses.
column3: Cigan ndondo nan ye ga nan ko ma ye ci'u ya gikini gbaro eti gbere'u bo nan sai de be izini yan Sokoe wuncin yi ebo u'la faskizhi'u sun zunye.

column2: What Allah has bestowed on His Messenger (and taken away) from them - for this ye made no expedition with either cavalry or camelry: but Allah gives power to His messengers over any He pleases: and Allah has power over all things.
column3: Yan nan ma Soko ga nasara'u la'ucia ya Tuci'u mini (dukiya)kafirizhio nanye gun kun gunbe dokozhi ko ma yan-tuci ndoci boa akika Skoe la kagbo'u Tuci'u zhi ta eti iza nan ga bau nan Akika Soko de kangbo ta eti yandondo.

column2: What Allah has bestowed on His Messenger (and taken away) from the people of the townships- belongs to Allah- to His Messenger and to kindred and orphans the needy and the wayfarer; In order that it may not (merely) make a circuit between the wealthy among you. So take what the Messenger assigns to you and deny yourselves that which he withholds from you. And fear Allah; for Allah is strict in Punishment.
column3: Yan nan zhiy Soko ga nasarau la'a ya Tuciu mini alkaryazhio nan Soko wun dan miniu bo to Tuciu to za nanzhiy tsoba nan to ekungizhi to eza gwa gbagizhi to ezan daci ebo dukiya be'azhe yan nae dan yi dangwa ewodecizhio nama. Yandondo nan Tuci ga la cia ya ye nan ye'a emi tu'u yan nan ma u ga kan'e yin jin nan yea kpe ya beu yin ye mae fe sundan Soko akika Soko Etsu azaba nan gbota nan u yio.

column2: (Some part is due) to the indigent Muhajirs those who were expelled from their homes and their property while seeking Grace from Allah and (His) Good Pleasure and aiding Allah and His Messenger: such are indeed the sincere ones:-
column3: (A ma kezhe'a la' ya) talakazhiy nanzhia kpela nan nanzhiy a nyan tinya ezhia zhio nan acia gan be dukiyazhiy nan. A'a jin afe wa eryatwa Soko be yedan yin za.A maajin a fe jin (Eko Soko) be Tuci'u yin taimako nan Akika za wuncinzhi ga yi za gaskiyazhio.

column2: But those who before them had homes (in Medina) and had adopted the Faith- show their affection to such as came to them for refuge and entertain no desire in their hearts for things given to the (latter) but give them preference over themselves even though poverty was their (own lot). And those saved from the covetousness of their own souls- they are the ones that achieve prosperity.
column3: Zananzhiy ma fedun zhi nbo nan (Madinao) aci shiadzo naa a'jin a fe wa za nanzhi gaa kpela be tsun'a nan a mae de dukata ke dan yangban'azhio yan yan nanzhi a ga la ya'a amaajin afe tsa yegiazhi ta eti atsozhio kaa'ga yi be bukata yan yan wuncin'y zandomdo nan ga tswiswa la'adan yanbotan yan yangban'u bo nanakika zawuncinzhi ga yi za nanzhia de rabo nao.

column2: And those who came after them say: "Our Lord! Forgive us and our brethren who came before us into the Faith and leave not in our hearts rancour (or sense of injury) against those who have believed. Our Lord! Thou art indeed Full of Kindness Most Merciful."
column3: Za nan zhiy ma be zunma'abo nan e gan gan: Tsoci yi jin yi gafara to yegi yizhinan zhia shi yidzo be imaniy nan Wyo mao ga la nanvo ndondo dan yangban yi bo lo'eba za nanzhia imani jin nan ma Tsoci yi akika Wyo ga yi Etsu tosayio Wyo ga yi Etsu yegun'o.

column2: Hast thou not observed the Hypocrites say to their misbelieving brethren among the People of the Book - "If ye are expelled we too will go out with you and we will never hearken to any one in your affair; and if ye are attacked (in fight) we will help you". But Allah is witness that they are indeed liars.
column3: Wyo le za nanzhiy jin manafunci nan ye'a E gan be yegiazhi nanzhia jin kafirinci mini za ba Litafi zhio nan gan: Wallahi a ga ye nyan tin ya yi tso ga tin ya ganni be ye yin yi maa la mi tu foro yan zandondo eti ye bo san san yin'a. A ma ga gun ye kun ye kun yia jin'e taimako. Akika Soko jin'ri ke ganmanan zuncizhi a yio nan.

column2: If they are expelled never will they go out with them; and if they are attacked (in fight) they will never help them; and if they do help them they will turn their backs; so they will receive no help.
column3: Ka a ga nya tin ya a dzun tinya bea yin'a ka ama ga gun'a kun a jin'a taimakoa ka ama ga jin'a taimako a ga zunma zheta fe bici gancin a ma'a jin'a taimakoa.

column2: Of a truth ye are stronger (than they) because of the terror in their hearts (sent) by Allah. This is because they are men devoid of understanding.
column3: Akika dansun ye u gbota gan dansun Soko fi yangban'azhio wuncin mayi ebo nan a de kpikpe wangia nan.

column2: They will not fight you (even) together except in fortified townships or from behind walls. Strong is their fighting (spirit) amongst themselves: thou wouldst think they were united but their hearts are divided: that is because they are a people devoid of wisdom.
column3: A gun ye kun wo baeni boa sai de ezhi nanzhiy a ga dan gba nao ko ma zunmashin yan karazhio. Nanvo atso be dozhiy u gbota Sarauyin. (Wyo ga lea ye) Wyo'a ye gan ko kpaata'a nini a yio yangban'azhi ma kaka yin u yio wuncin ma yi ebo nan ade ankalia nan.

column2: Like those who lately preceded them they have tasted the evil result of their conduct; and (in the Hereafter there is) for them a grievous Penalty;-
column3: A yi ke Misali yan za nanzhiy Shidzo tsoba nan a'azaba yan etun dede'azhi fin azaba nan ma tan nan wun'a jin tabbata ya'a.

column2: (Their allies deceived them) like the Evil One when he says to man "Deny Allah": but when (man) denies Allah (the Evil One) says "I am free of thee: I do fear Allah the Lord of the Worlds!"
column3: Ke misali yan Sheitan nan kaminan uga gan zawangi gan: A jin kafirinci nan"kamina uga kafirincin jin zo nan u gan: Egwa mi de dan beo yin'a akika mie sundan Soko nae kpa alittazhi kpata nan.

column1: Surah 59:17         The end of both will be that they will go into the Fire dwelling therein for ever. Such is the reward of the wrong-doers.Zoba'azhi za gubaaba cia fe enao ama' fi bo fi tutunyin wuncin ga ma yi egagba yan azwalumizhio.

column2: O ye who believe! Fear Allah and let every soul look to what (provision) He has sent forth for the morrow. Yea fear Allah: for Allah is well-acquainted with (all) that ye do.
column3: Ya ye nanzhia imani jin nan e sundan Soko zandondo ma'u cin'ule'u lo yan nan uga lashidzo ya etiu ya esun alkiyamio nan ye mae sundan Soko akika Soko yi be labariy yan etun nanzhi ye lo nan.

column2: And be ye not like those who forgot Allah; and He made them forget their own souls! Such are the rebellious transgressors!
column3: Ye mae ga'a fe ke dozhin za nanzhia Soko batan na ma ebo nan Soko jin'atso a eti tacin'atso batan. Akika za wuncinzhi ga yi fasikizhio.

column2: Not equal are the Companions of the Fire and the Companions of the Garden: it is the Companions of the Garden that will achieve Felicity.
column3: Egi mi na zhi a jin ye ni be egi mi aljanna yin'a egi mi aljannazhi aga yi za nanzhia de robo nao.

column2: Had We sent down this Qur´an on a mountain verily thou wouldst have seen it humble itself and cleave asunder for fear of Allah. Such are the similitudes which We propound to men that they may reflect.
column3: Da' aci gan eti pati bo Yi cin Alkuranu nan nan tao da wyo a le pati wuncin nan nan tao da wyo a le pati wuncin ye ugaa daku uci gaa la'fi ebo dansun Soko misali wuncin ma Yie la'u la wu zawangizhi ebo ko a kpa ye.

column2: Allah is He than Whom there is no other god;- Who knows (all things) both secret and open; He Most Gracious Most Merciful.
column3: Soko ga yi Etsu nan a de tsoci ndocia sai Wun nao. Etsu nan de kpikpe yan na'a swo nan to na'a tula nan u yio Etsu rahma Etsu yegun.

column2: Allah is He than Whom there is no other god;- the Sovereign the Holy One the Source of Peace (and Perfection) the Guardian of Faith the Preserver of Safety the Exalted in Might the Irresistible the Supreme: Glory to Allah! (High is He) above the partners they attribute to Him.
column3: Soko ga yi Etsu nan a de tsoci ndocia sai Wun nao Etsu mulki Etsu lili Etsu aminci Etsu nae yedan yandondo nan Etsu zankpe Etsu Tiile Etsu cinwan. Lili kpata'ajin tabbata ya Soko ke ya nanzhie la pau baci nan lugwa.

column2: He is Allah the Creator the Evolver the Bestower of Forms (or Colours). To Him belong the Most Beautiful Names: whatever is in the heavens and on earth doth declare His Praises and Glory: and He is the Exalted in Might the Wise.
column3: Wun ga yi Soko nae jin alitta nao Etsu nae tswa yan zhi nan Etsu nae la nankankpace ya alittazhi nan Etsu nan yi be sunna wangizhi nan. Yan nanzhi fi sanmazhio to kinbo nan e li'u tsatsayin Wun ga yi Etsu zan kpe o Etsu hikima.

column2: O ye who believe! Take not my enemies and yours as friends (or protectors)- offering them (your) love even though they have rejected the Truth that has come to you and have (on the contrary) driven out the Prophet and yourselves (from your homes) (simply) because ye believe in Allah your Lord! If ye have come out to strive in My Way and to seek My Good Pleasure (take them not as friends) holding secret converse of love (and friendship) with them: for I know full well all that ye conceal and all that ye reveal. And any of you that does this has strayed from the Straight Path.
column3: Ya ye nanzhia imani jin nan e ga la makiri Mi to makiri yezhi eya manchizhi ma ye la cin cin wu'a a maa jin kafirinci be gaskiya nan be ya ye nae har e la Tuci nya dzun Mi mae jin'e gangba gan ye la imanie jin be Soko nan yi Tsoci ye nan wun'ayi gan ye tintinya ebo ekungun ta eti ekpa Mi bo nan ye' mae wa yeda Mi wa ga nan Ye' la cin cin wua swiswoci Mi ma de kpikpe yannanzhi ye swo nan to nan ye tula nan zaeni ndondo na ga jin acin miniebo nan akika wun'a ya ke eko gboro lugwa

column2: If they were to get the better of you they would behave to you as enemies and stretch forth their hands and their tongues against you for evil: and they desire that ye should reject the Truth.
column3: Ya wye Annabi Mumina ynzagizhi ga be eba wye acia mubaya'a jin (a alkawali yan imani jin) gan a'la yandondo pa Soko bacia a maayi yan'a a maa da yancin'a a ma wu egizhia a maa la egi yanci be ya ebaazhia a ma le foro wangi yan wyozhi baa wyo la mubaya'o jin bea yin(a yeda jin bea yin) wyo mao ba gafara yan Soko ya'a akika Soko Etsu gafara uyio Etsu yegun uyio.

column2: Of no profit to you will be your relatives and your children on the Day of Judgment: He will judge between you: for Allah sees well all that ye do.
column3: Dangiezhi to egiezhi a'ajin'e anfani efo alkiyamia Soko ga gin-gan laadan tsakaniebo be dozhiy akika Sokoe le ye ye be iri etun nanzhi ye lo nan.

column2: There is for you an excellent example (to follow) in Abraham and those with him when they said to their people: "We are clear of you and of whatever ye worship besides Allah: we have rejected you and there has arisen between us and you enmity and hatred for ever- unless ye believe in Allah and Him alone": But not when Abraham said to his father: "I will pray for forgiveness for thee though I have no power (to get) aught on thy behalf from Allah." (They prayed): "Our Lord! in Thee do we trust and to Thee do we turn in repentance: to Thee is (our) Final Goal.
column3: Akika ye de yesan wangi dan mini (Annabi) Ibrahimao to jama'a nanzhi dan be'uyin nan nyan kaminan a gan be jamaa yan kinmi'azhi gan: Akika Yi yia egwa yizhi wa be ye yin to yannan ye jin bauta ya ke Soko lugwa nan Yi maa ga jin kafirinci be ye yin ewunsun be nanvoe ma'a tula tsakani yi bo be ye yin har abada sai de ye ga imani jin be Sokoe gbaugi sai de egan nan Ibrahima gan be Baba'u yin nan akika mia ba gafara ya wye mi ma de mulki yandondo ya wye wo wba Soko boa. Tsoci yan yi wyo ga yi yakpeo eba wyo ga ma yia zheban zhin'o ezhe keba yi ma be wyo yin'u dan'o.

column2: "Our Lord! Make us not a (test and) trial for the Unbelievers but forgive us our Lord! for Thou art the Exalted in Might the Wise."
column3: Soko ga lugwayi ya'afe fitina ya kafirizhi ma wyo mao fa be yi yin akika wyo ga yi Etsu Zankpeo Etsu hikimao.

column2: There was indeed in them an excellent example for you to follow- for those whose hope is in Allah and in the Last Day. But if any turn away truly Allah is Free of all Wants Worthy of all Praise.
column3: Akika ye de yesan wangi dan miniabo ammaa ya za nan gae jin kauna Soko be efo zobae nan. Zaeni ndondo nan ga zunma zheta gaskiya nan akika Soko Etsu kunke uyio Etsu nan zandondoe jin'yeba ya nan uyio.

column2: It may be that Allah will grant love (and friendship) between you and those whom ye (now) hold as enemies. For Allah has power (over all things); And Allah is Oft-Forgiving Most Merciful.
column3: Kengi uyio nan Soko ga cincin laadan tsakani yebo be za nanzhi ye nanvo miniabo nan Soko de kagbo eti wuncin'o. Akika Soko Etsu gafara uyio Etsu yegun uyio.

column2: Allah forbids you not with regard to those who fight you not for (your) Faith nor drive you out of your homes from dealing kindly and justly with them: for Allah loveth those who are just.
column3: Soko kan ye (adalinci'yn jin) be zananzhiy a gun ye kun mini adini boa naa yin'a ama ke nya yedzun emi yezhi boa e da gboro ye mae jin adalinci beayin akika Sokoe wa za nanzhi gae jin adalinci nan.

column2: Allah only forbids you with regard to those who fight you for (your) Faith and drive you out of your homes and support (others) in driving you out from turning to them (for friendship and protection). It is such as turn to them (in these circumstances) that do wrong.
column3: Ammade Soko kan'ye eti za nanzhie gun ye kun dan mini adinio nan to nanzhiy nyan ye tinya emi yezhio nan to za nanzhie jin taimako eti nyin nyan ye bo nan ega kara la'a eya mancizhi ma zandondo nan ga'a la eya manci nan akika zawuncizhi ga yi azwalumi zhio.

column2: O ye who believe! When there come to you believing women refugees examine (and test) them: Allah knows best as to their Faith: if ye ascertain that they are Believers then send them not back to the Unbelievers. They are not lawful (wives) for the Unbelievers nor are the (Unbelievers) lawful (husbands) for them. But pay the Unbelievers what they have spent (on their dower) and there will be no blame on you if ye marry them on payment of their dower to them. But hold not to the guardianship of unbelieving women: ask for what ye have spent on their dowers and let the (Unbelievers) ask for what they have spent (on the dowers of women who come over to you). Such is the command of Allah: He judges (with justice) between you. And Allah is Full of Knowledge and Wisdom.
column3: Ya ye nanzhia imani jin nan kamina ynzagi Mumini nazhi ga'a kpe la be eba ye nan e ma'a cin le Soko ma de kpikpe yan imania gan U ga tula ya ye gan Muminazhi ayio e ga nyan'a kezhe da tsun kafirizhi be ma. A jin halali ya kafirizhia atso kafirizhi ma jin halali ya'a yan nan kafirizhi ga wu etiabo nan ya yan'a la ya'a Leifi ma danbo'a yetso ga yawo jin bea yin naa a beke ye ga sadaki la'a ya'a ni naa. Ye mae ga lagwa sun'a be egban yan kafirizhiy ma e gbingan yan yannanzhi ye ga wu nan atso maa gbingan yan yannanzhi a ga wu nan. Wuncin ga yi hukunci Soko nan ujin tsakani yebo nao. Akika Soko Etsu kpikpe uyio Etsu hikima uyio.

column2: And if any of your wives deserts you to the Unbelievers and ye have an accession (by the coming over of a woman from the other side) then pay to those whose wives have deserted the equivalent of what they had spent (on their dower). And fear Allah in Whom ye believe.
column3: Yandoci ga bea fan'ye gwa mini yinmi yezhio lwo eba kafirizhi yeci gun'a kun har nyan'atsozhi ci dazhin eba ye za nanzhiy nyinmiazhi ga daa nan yea kwatonci yan yannanzhi a ga wu nan la' ya'a ye mae sundan Soko nan ye jin imani be yin nan.

column2: O Prophet! When believing women come to thee to take the oath of fealty to thee that they will not associate in worship any other thing whatever with Allah that they will not steal that they will not commit adultery (or fornication) that they will not kill their children that they will not utter slander intentionally forging falsehood and that they will not disobey thee in any just matter- then do thou receive their fealty and pray to Allah for the forgiveness (of their sins): for Allah is Oft-Forgiving Most Merciful.
column3: Yaw ye Annabi Mumina ynzagizhi ga be eba wye acia mubaya'a jin (a alkwaali yan imani jin) gan a'la yandondo pa Soko bacia a maayi yan'a a maa da yancin'a a ma wu egizhia a maa la egi yanci be ya ebaazhia a ma le foro wangi yan wyozhi baa wyo la mubaya'o jin bea yin (a yeda jin bea yin) wyo mao ba gafara yan Soko ya'a akika Soko' Etsu gafara u yio Etsu yegun u yio

column2: O ye who believe! Turn not (for friendship) to people on whom is the Wrath of Allah of the Hereafter they are already in despair just as the Unbelievers are in despair about those (buried) in graves.
column3: Ya ye nanzhia imani jin nan e ga la za nanzhi Soko'a zhewun be'ayin nan eya mancizhi ma akika zawuncinzhi'a kauna ba be egagba wangi yan efo zobae kendoe kafirizhi ba kauna be ekun nanzhi fi kabarizhio na.

column2: Whatever is in the heavens and on earth let it declare the Praises and Glory of Allah: for He is the Exalted in Might the Wise.
column3: Yan nanzhi fi sanmazhio to kin bo nan a Soko li tsatsa yin Soko ga ma yi Etsu hikimao.

column2: O ye who believe! Why say ye that which ye do not
column3: Ya ye nanzhia imani jin nan ki la ye cie gan gan nanzhi ye la lo tun'a naa yin'o

column2: Grievously odious is it in the sight of Allah that ye say that which ye do not.
column3: Wun'a gbota sarauyin eba Soko nan ye'a fe gan gan ye mae la lo tun'a nan.

column2: Truly Allah loves those who fight in His Cause in battle array as if they were a solid cemented structure.
column3: Akika Soko e wa za nanzhie gunkun dan ekoubo aci yi safu nini nan ke wyoa ye gan batu ayio nanzhiy la gwa fin dozhin nan.

column2: And remember Moses said to his people: "O my people! why do ye vex and insult me though ye know that I am the messenger of Allah (sent) to you" Then when they went wrong Allah let their hearts go wrong. For Allah guides not those who are rebellious transgressors.
column3: Kaminan (Annabi) Musa gan be jamaa yan'uzhi gan: Ya ye jamaa yan mizhi ki la yecie jin mi gun'o Akika yetso ma kpe gan Tuci Soko mi yi be eba ye yeo. Kaminan a bea pan ya nan Soko cia yangban'azhi pan ya (ke eko lugwa) akika Sokoe la jamaa yan fasikizhi ke ekoa.

column2: And remember Jesus the son of Mary said: "O Children of Israel! I am the messenger of Allah (sent) to you confirming the Law (which came) before me and giving Glad Tidings of a Messenger to come after me whose name shall be Ahmad." But when he came to them with Clear Signs they said "this is evident sorcery!"
column3: To kaminan (Annabi) Isa egi Maryama gan gan: Ya ye Bani Israilazhi akika Tuci mi yi be eba ye yeo na'a gaskiya ya be Litafi nanzhiy shidzo minI Attaurao nan Mi mae ya ye labari yan yangban fa be bibe yan Tuci ndoci zunma mibo nan suna'u yi Ahamadu nan. Kaminan u be ya'a be hujjazhiy nan a cigan: Nan nan de eyan ma uyio na'a tula nan.

column2: Who doth greater wrong than one who invents falsehood against Allah even as he is being invited to Islam And Allah guides not those who do wrong.
column3: Zi'y ti binankun gan za nan tswa ganmanan ta Soko alhali ma e yi'u gan u dauzhin Musulunci nao Soko mae la jamaa yan azwalumizhi ke ekoa.

column2: Their intention is to extinguish Allah´s Light (by blowing) with their mouths: But Allah will complete (the revelation of) His Light even though the Unbelievers may detest (it).
column3: E wa gan a la aske Soko'a nu be misun'azhiy Soko ma ga askeu she ka kafirizhi ga nanvo nan.

column2: It is He Who has sent His Messenger with Guidance and the Religion of Truth that he may proclaim it over all religion even though the Pagans may detest (it).
column3: Soko ga yi Etsu nan tun Tuci'utun be bawu'y ganni be adini yan gaskiya yin'o nan ebo u la wun'u la'utu ta eti adinizhio kpata ka da Mushrikizhi ga nanvo.

column2: O ye who believe! Shall I lead you to a bargain that will save you from a grievous Penalty-
column3: Ya ye nanzhia imani jin nan ngba min wu ye ba lo woce nan yega egwa sun'u u ga ye gangwa be azaba tintan-ciy nan

column2: That ye believe in Allah and His Messenger and that ye strive (your utmost) in the Cause of Allah with your property and your persons: That will be best for you if ye but knew!
column3: Ya imani jin be Soko be Tuci'u yin ye mae fe jin jihadi (kokari wanciko) eti eko Soko be dukiya yezhi to nankan kpace zhiy wuncin ga yi alheri ya ye yeo ye ga kpe nan.

column2: He will forgive you your sins and admit you to Gardens beneath which Rivers flow and to beautiful mansions in Gardens of Eternity: that is indeed the Supreme Achievement.
column3: Wun'a fa be zunubi yezhiy Uma gae la'agan dan aljannazhio nanzhi nuwanzie je fi tako'abo nan ganni be emi wangizhiy dan mini aljannazhio nan zhi yi emi emanwo nan. Wuncin ga yi robo nan wancin nao.

column2: And another (favour will He bestow) which ye do love- help from Allah and a speedy victory. So give the Glad Tidings to the Believers.
column3: Ndoci ma danbo nan ye wa nan u ga yi nasara dagan eba Sokobo be eko kpe nan tsoba nan. Wyo mao ya Muminizhi labari yangban fa.

column2: O ye who believe! Be ye helpers of Allah: As said Jesus the son of Mary to the Disciples "Who will be my helpers to (the work of) Allah" Said the disciples "We are Allah´s helpers!" then a portion of the Children of Israel believed and a portion disbelieved: But We gave power to those who believed against their enemies and they became the ones that prevailed.
column3: Ya ye nanzhia imani jin nan ye'a fe taimako jincizhi ya (adini) Soko iri kendoe (Annabi) Isa egi Maryama gan be Hawariyuzhiy'nan (za nan zhi tu'u zunma nan): Zi'a jin mi taimako eti etun Soko bo Hawariyuzhi cigan: Yi ga yi za nanzhia jin (adini) Soko taimako nao. Sashi yan Banu Israilazhi cia imani jin sashi ma ajin kafirinci Yi cia za nanzhia imani jin nan ya zankpe be kagboe ta eti makiriazhio acia fe za nanzhia de nasara nan.

column2: Whatever is in the heavens and on earth doth declare the Praises and Glory of Allah- the Sovereign the Holy One the Exalted in Might the Wise.
column3: Kpata yan nanzhi fi mini sanmazhio nan to nazhi fi kinbo nan e'li Soko tsa tsa yin Etsu mulki Etsu lili Etsu zankpe Etsu nan yi egba (dan jin jin yandondo-o nan.

column2: It is He Who has sent amongst the Unlettered a messenger from among themselves to rehearse to them His Signs to sanctify them and to instruct them in Scripture and Wisdom- although they had been before in manifest error;-
column3: Wyun ga yi za na tun Tuci fi Larabawazhi dagan mini atso nao. Ucie gba aya Soko yaa U cie'laa li (ke shikan lugwa) Ucie wu'a kpikpe yan litafi (Soko) ganni be hikimazhi. Akika shidzo kafi Annabi'u be nan za wuncinzhi afe fi mini egbin na'a tula nan.

column2: As well as (to confer all these benefits upon) others of them who have not already joined them: And He is exalted in Might Wise.
column3: To za ndocizhi miniabo a laa be dan lokaci Annabio ganni be za lokaci'u zhi yin'a nan. (kpata Annabi Muhammadu (S.A.W) ga Soko tun fi a o) Akika Soko Etsu zankpe uyio Egba ma uyio.

column2: Such is the Bounty of Allah which He bestows on whom He will: and Allah is the Lord of the highest bounty.
column3: Wuncin ma falala uyio yan Soko nan wun'a jin u la ya za nan ga bau nan Akika Soko Etsu falala uyio nan wancin nan.

column2: The similitude of those who were charged with the (obligations of the) Mosaic Law but who subsequently failed in those (obligations) is that of a donkey which carries huge tomes (but understands them not). Evil is the similitude of people who falsify the Signs of Allah: and Allah guides not people who do wrong.
column3: Kotonci yan za nanzhi yi be kpikpe yan Attaura (litafi nan a cin be ya Annabi Musa) nan a ma lotun be yan nanzhi litafi gan naa nan a yi ke kotonci yan tyatyagi naa karazhi la nan (u de amfani ndondo boa sai wahala banza) bibi be -- sun'I wun'ajin tabbata ya za nanzhi'a aya Soko (zhi) yi ganmanan nan akika Soko'e la jamaa yan azwalumizhi ke eko guru'a.

column2: Say: "O ye that stand on Judaism! If ye think that ye are friends to Allah to the exclusion of (other) men then express your desire for Death if ye are truthful!"
column3: (Annabi gan gan). Ye Yahudizhi ye gae leye le gan ye tsayi masoyi Soko gbuwgio za na ke nazhi a jin'a ejin guri ye mae jin aduwa gan Soko u la ye'u wu. Wun'ayi za gaskiyazhi ye yio nan.

column2: But never will they express their desire (for Death) because of the (deeds) their hands have sent on before them! and Allah knows well those that do wrong!Amaa jin guri wuncin'a har abada ebo etun dede nanzhi a la shidzo nan. Akika Soko yi be kpikpe azwalumizhi ganni be etun nanzhi e lo nan.
Say: "The Death from which ye flee will truly overtake you: then will ye be sent back to the Knower of things secret and open: and He will tell you (the truth of) the things that ye did!"
column3: Gan yaa gan: ajali wuncin nan ye bici'u daa nan akika wun'a da gun'e (bandondo). A ma ga ye la da zhin eba (Soko) nan de kpikpe yan nan so nan to nan tula nan. Soko ci a ya ye labari yan etun nanzhi ye fe lo izheo nan.

column2: O ye who believe! When the call is proclaimed to prayer on Friday (the Day of Assembly) hasten earnestly to the Remembrance of Allah and leave off business (and traffic): That is best for you if ye but knew!
column3: Ye nanzhi gan ye'a imani jin nan! Kaminan a ga sallah yi yan efo jummua nan Ye'a shiri jin da (dannan) pipa Soko ye mae la woce elugwa. Wuncin nan ye'ajin nan u ga yi alhairi ya ye yeo Ye ga de kpikpe de nan.

column2: And when the Prayer is finished then may ye disperse through the land and seek of the Bounty of Allah: and celebrate the Praises of Allah often (and without stint): that ye may prosper.
column3: Kaminan a ga sallah jin zo nan ye'a ga ya kpe eti kinbo ye mae fe wa falala yan Soko. Ye mae tun Soko e ye yetun nan dokun nan. Be wuncin ga ye'a tso gurio.

column2: But when they see some bargain or some amusement they disperse headlong to it and leave thee standing. Say: "The (blessing) from the Presence of Allah is better than any amusement or bargain! and Allah is the Best to provide (for all needs)."
column3: Abeke a ga le kaaya wocezhi ye nan ko a ci wo san san edzo nan (ke eyan nan) a dzun tinya da eba eyan edzozhi. A ci ga wyo ya gi gbaro. (Annabi) gan gan: egagba nan dan be Sokoe nan u de alhairi gan' edzo ganni be woce. Akika Soko ga yi Etsu nan'e ya za arziki nan'o.

column2: When the Hypocrites come to thee they say "We bear witness that thou art indeed the Messenger of Allah." Yea Allah knoweth that thou art indeed His Messenger and Allah beareth witness that the Hypocrites are indeed liars.
column3: Kaminan Munafikizhi ga be eba wyo nan ajin'a gan gan: Yia eri jin ke akika Tuci Soko wo yio nan. Soko o tso kpe ke akika Tuci'u wo yio nan Soko o tso jin ri ke akika Munafikizhi ganmanan zunci zhi ayio nan.

column2: They have made their oaths a screen (for their misdeeds): thus they obstruct (men) from the Path of Allah: truly evil are their deeds.
column3: (Munafikizhi a kuti nae zhi be sunna Sokoe na la ke garkuwa nan a cie la zawangizhi pan ya ke eko Soko lugwa akika etun nan munafikizhie lo nan wun'a biye

column2: That is because they believed then they rejected Faith: So a seal was set on their hearts: therefore they understand not.
column3: Wuncin ma yi ebo nan (Munafikizhi) a imani jin be misun'I acie lo tun yan kafirinci nan. Soko cia basira yangban'a te aci de fahimta yandondoa (sai yan etun dedezhi).

column2: When thou lookest at them their exteriors please thee; and when they speak thou listenest to their words. They are as (worthless as hollow) pieces of timber propped up (unable to stand on their own). They think that every cry is against them. They are the enemies; so beware of them. The curse of Allah be on them! How are they deluded (away from the Truth)!
column3: (Munafikizhi) Wo ga lea ye nankan kpace'azhi a fe ya'o shahawa a man gae gan-gan wyo'ashi tukpa wo gan'a. ( Wo ga le'a ye kendoe a fedun fe zhi yegboro Annabio nan) Wyo'a ye gan ko cigbantun ayio nan a la kpetso nan. (Munafikizhi) ajin a fe kpaye gan kabara ndondo nan a ga yi nan etiabo a yi wun'o (wato ajin afe sundan gaskiya) za wuncinzhi ga yi akika yan makiyi (Soko be Tuciu yin'o) ebo acin'o e tswa'a Laana Soko ta etiabo. Kii la acie laa pan ya ke gaskiya lugwao

column2: And when it is said to them "Come the Messenger of Allah will pray for your forgiveness" they turn aside their heads and thou wouldst see them turning away their faces in arrogance.
column3: A ma ga'e gan ya munafikizhi gan: e da be ebo Tuci Soko u wa gafara'u ya ye a ga etiazhi pan wo ma ale'a ye a ga pan ya ke eko Soko lugwa aci ga' gbotika (be aya Sokoe).

column2: It is equal to them whether thou pray for their forgiveness or not. Allah will not forgive them. Truly Allah guides not rebellious transgressors.
column3: Daidai u yi etiabo ka wyo ga wa gafara ya ko ma wo'oga wa yaa ma Sokoa jin' gafara'a. Akika Soko wun'e la fasikizhi ke ekoa.

column2: They are the ones who say "Spend nothing on those who are with Allah´s Messenger to the end that they may disperse (and quit Medina)." But to Allah belong the treasures of the heavens and the earth; but the Hypocrites understand not.
column3: A (munafikizhi) ga yi za nanzhie gan gan: e ga la yangici ya za nanzhi dan eba Tuci Soko-onan ma har a la aga ya. Akika man arziki yan sanma kpata to kin eba Soko bo a dan'o ammaa de Munafikizhi a de fahimta alamari nan nan'a.

column2: They say "If we return to Medina surely the more honourable (element) will expel therefrom the meaner." But honour belongs to Allah and His Messenger and to the Believers; but the Hypocrites know not.
column3: Aci fe gan gan: Yi ga kezhe daa zhinin yan Madina za nanzhi ga yi za cinwan cizhi nan a ga za gbagbangizhi yan tinya. Akika ma zankpe be cinwan'e wun'a jin tabbata ya Soko be Tuciu yin be Muminizhi amma'a de munafikizhi a de kpikpe akika nan na'a.

column2: O ye who believe! Let not your riches or your children divert you from the remembrance of Allah. If any act thus the loss is their own.
column3: Ye nanzhi a imani jin nan ega lugwa dukiya yezhi to egiezhi a ye jin shagala ke pipa yan Soko lugwa ma. Zaeni ndondo nan ga jin a cin nan za wuncin zhi ga yi eza asara zhio.

column2: and spend something (in charity) out of the substance which We have bestowed on you before Death should come to any of you and he should say "O my Lord! why didst Thou not give me respite for a little while I should then have given (largely) in charity and I should have been one of the doers of good".
column3: Ye mae wu dukiya yezhi nan Mi la ya ye nan (fi eko wangizhio) kafi ajali'u be'u la zaeni ndondo e nan. Ega lugwa sai efo ajali ga da be man. Ye cie fe gan gan Tsoci woa pata ya mi daa eka degi'a ebo min deba nla dukiya mizhi nku njin sadaka mi ma gaafe dan mini za guru zhio.

column2: But to no soul will Allah grant respite when the time appointed (for it) has come; and Allah is well acquainted with (all) that ye do.
column3: Akika ma Soko wun'a pata ya rayi ndondoa kaminan efo ajali u ga'a tun na'a Akika Soko de labari etun nanzhi ye lo kpata nan.

column2: Whatever is in the heavens and on earth doth declare the Praises and Glory of Allah: to Him belongs dominion and to Him belongs praise: and He has power over all things.
column3: Yannanzhi fi sanmazhio kpata nan to nazhi fi kinbo nan e li Soko kandondo. Soko ga wun akika yan mulkio Wun ga man wun akika yan yebo'o. Akika Soko de iko ta eti yandondo.

column2: It is He Who has created you; and of you are some that are Unbelievers and some that are Believers: and Allah sees well all that ye do.
column3: Soko ga yi Etsu nan jin alitta yan ye nao. Miniebo a de nanzhia jin kafirinci (be Tsoci'a yin) nan. Miniebo a de nan zhia gaskiya ya a ma imani jin nan. Akika Soko Etsu nan'e cin ye le dan jin jin yandondo bo nan uyio.

column2: He has created the heavens and the earth in just proportions and has given you shape and made your shapes beautiful: and to Him is the final Goal.
column3: Sokoa alitta yan sanmazhi jin to kin ganni be gaskiyae. Ucia siffa ye jin siffa nan yi wangi nan akika yandondo a kezhe da tsun Soko.

column2: He knows what is in the heavens and on earth; and He knows what ye conceal and what ye reveal: yea Allah knows well the (secrets) of (all) hearts.
column3: Soko de kpikpe yan nanzhi fi sanmao kpata nan to nanzhi fi kinbo nan. U ma de kpikpe yandondo nan ye jin swiswoci nan to nan ye jin tula nan akika Soko de kpikpe yannanzhi fi yangban alittau zhio nan.

column2: Has not the story reached you of those who rejected Faith aforetime So they tasted the evil result of their conduct; and they had a grievous Penalty.
column3: Kashi labari yan za nanzhi shiudzo acia jin kafirinci be aya Sokoe nan u be ya ye yaa Ngan a azaba yan kafirincia fin (tun dagan izhe baabo) Soko ma kezhea shiri yan azaba nan tan nan jin kaa (efo alkiyamiy).

column2: That was because there came to them messengers with Clear Signs but they said: "Shall (mere) human beings direct us" So they rejected (the Message) and turned away. But Allah can do without (them): and Allah is free of all needs worthy of all praise.
column3: Wuncin ma yi ebo nan Tucizhi fe jin'a gangba ganni be bayanizhii aci gan zawangi (dozhin yi) ga abe la yi ke ekoo Acia jin kafirinci acia zunma zheta bawu Soko. Soko cia kunke (be yandondoe) akika Soko Etsu nan'a kunke ya ti tacin'u nan uyio Etsu nan alitta kpatae jin yebo u nan uyio.

column2: The Unbelievers think that they will not be raised up (for Judgment). Say: "Yea By my Lord Ye shall surely be raised up: then shall ye be told (the truth) of all that ye did. And that is easy for Allah."
column3: Za nanzhi a jin kafirinci nan e la wu gan: a'a nan'a' kin dagan kabari boa. Annabi gan ya'a gan: be Tsoci'i a gae la tinya kabario a maakezhe yae labari etun nan zhi ye lo kpata nan. Wuncin man eyan finfanci uyi eba Soko bo.

column2: Believe therefore in Allah and His Messenger and in the Light which we have sent down. And Allah is well acquainted with all that ye do.
column3: (Ebo acin'o) yea imani jin be Sokoe be Tuciu yin Ye man'e lae jin be (Al'kur'ani) haske nan Yi cin be be nan. Akika Soko de kpikpe yannanzhi ye jin kpaata nan.

column2: The Day that He assembles you (all) for a Day of Assembly- that will be a Day of mutual loss and gain (among you) and those who believe in Allah and work righteousness- He will remove from them their ills and He will admit them to Gardens beneath which Rivers flow to dwell therein for ever: that will be the Supreme Achievement.
column3: Efo nan Soko gae ku' yekan ebo gungun yekan (yan alittazhi kpata nan). Fo wuncin ga yi efo nan zaeni ndondo a ti robonkpe nan'o. Zaeni ndondo nan ga imani jin be Sokoe nan ucia egwa sun etun wangi-wangizhie lo nan Soko ga etun dede'uzhi fin ya U man ga la'agandan aljannao nan tso nuwan mannangizhie je fi tako'u bo nan a man'afibo fi har abada. Wuncin ga yi rabo nan wancin nan'o.

column2: But those who reject Faith and treat Our Signs as falsehoods they will be Companions of the Fire to dwell therein for aye: and evil is that Goal.
column3: Za nanzhi man ajin kafirinci acia aya Yi (Soko) yi ganmanan nan a ga yi egi mi nanzhio ba ga bo afi tutun yin'o zoba yan za nnazhi wun'a bi ye.

column2: No kind of calamity can occur except by the leave of Allah: and if any one believes in Allah (Allah) guides his heart (aright): for Allah knows all things.
column3: A de (masiba) mimacinle nan'a tswan za naa' sai be izini (banba) yan Soko. Zaeni ndondo nan ga imani jin be Sokoe nan Soko ga yangban'u jin shiri (be imani'y). Akika Soko yi be kpikpe yandondoe.

column2: So obey Allah and obey His Messenger: but if ye turn back the duty of Our Messenger is but to proclaim (the Message) clearly and openly.
column3: Ye a gba Soko Ye man'e lae gba Tuci (Soko) Ye ga be'a zunma'e zheta (Soko be Tuciu yin) (leifi ta eti Tuci boa) yan nan yi hakki ta eti Tuci'o nan  wun ga yi eyan wu ganni be bayani nan wun'a fe jin nan'o.

column2: Allah! There is no god but He: and on Allah therefore let the Believers put their trust.
column3: Soko gbuwgi gayi Soko a de zandoci (ko yandoci) nan a jin bauta ya na'a sai Soko. Ebo acin'o Muminizhi Soko gbuwgi ga a yakpeo.

column2: O ye who believe! Truly among your wives and your children are (some that are) enemies to yourselves: so beware of them! But if ye forgive and overlook and cover up (their faults) verily Allah is Oft-Forgiving Most Merciful.
column3: Ye nanzhia'a imani jin nan akika mini yinmin yezhio (to ebazhi) to egi yezhio a de nanzhi yi makiri yezhi nan ebo acin'o Ye tswa'a. Amma' ye gaafe za nan zhie fa nan ye cie jin sauki nan Ye cie jin dozhi gafara nan akika Soko Etsu gafara uyio Etsu yegun' uyio.

column2: Your riches and your children may be but a trial: but in the Presence of Allah is the highest Reward.
column3: Akika dukiya yezhi to egiezhi fitinan a yi (ya yeo) (a ga ye jin shagala ke eko Soko lugwa nan) (amma'ye ga'a la jin amfani eti eko nan Soko jin yarda be yin nan) akika egagba nan wancin nan (aljanna) wun'a jin tabbata (ya ye) dan eba Soko.

column2: So fear Allah as much as ye can; listen and obey and spend in charity for the benefit of your own soul and those saved from the covetousness of their own souls- they are the ones that achieve prosperity.
column3: Ebo acin'o e sundan Soko gwargwado iko (nan Soko ya e nan) Ye mae fe wo gan Ye mae la mie tu foro (Soko be Tuciu yin) Ye mae fe wu dukiya yezhi ebo alhairi yan eti taacin'e bo. Zaeni ndondo nan ga tswa yangban'u ke yanbotan lugwa nan akika za wuncinzhi ga tso guri ganni be rabo nan wancin nan.

column2: If ye loan to Allah a beautiful loan He will double it to your (credit) and He will grant you Forgiveness: for Allah is most Ready to appreciate (service) Most Forbearing-
column3: Ye ga la eyan wangi yezhi cia ma Soko Soko a gaegba be alhairi'uzhi nan dokun nan. U maa fa be zunubi'e zhi akika Soko Etsu nan'e jin yebo (ya wuzhi guru'uzhi) nan uyio Etsu hakuri ma uyio.

column2: Knower of what is open Exalted in Might Full of Wisdom.
column3: (Soko) Etsu nan yi be kpikpe yan yandondo nan so nan to nan tula nan uyio Etsu nan zankpe'u ta eti yandondo nan Etsu nan yi Egba dan jinjin yandondo nan u yio.

column2: O Prophet! When ye do divorce women divorce them at their prescribed periods and count (accurately) their prescribed periods: And fear Allah your Lord: and turn them not out of their houses nor shall they (themselves) leave except in case they are guilty of some open lewdness those are limits set by Allah: and any who transgresses the limits of Allah does verily wrong his (own) soul: thou knowest not if perchance Allah will bring about thereafter some new situation.
column3: Ya' wyoe Annabi (to Muminizhi kpata) kaminan ye ga la yawo be yinmi yezhi'i nan e laa yawo lokaci nan a ga al'ada yan etswa jin aci'a lo dan lili'o nan. Ye mae tswa lisafi yan efo iddauzhi (etswa guta). Ye mae sundan Soko (be tswitswa yan dokau zhi) e ga nyan'a tinya kata'abo ma atso man'a ga tinya ma sai a ga da lotun yan alfahsha nan'a tula nan (ke yancin da nan) Hukunci nan nanzhi doka yan Soko dan'o nan'o zaeni ndondo na ga doka Soko gbintu nan wun'a eti tacin'u jin gun Hakika ye kpea' ko (be edun na afe nbo acia jin idda nan) Soko a la egbazhe yan alhairi dan tsakani yebo be dozhi.

column2: Thus when they fulfil their term appointed either take them back on equitable terms or part with them on equitable terms; and take for witness two persons from among you endued with justice and establish the evidence (as) before Allah. Such is the admonition given to him who believes in Allah and the Last Day. And for those who fear Allah He (ever) prepares a way out
column3: Lokaci nan a ga idda (yan yawo la) jin zo nan Yea egwa sun'a be boloboloe (kendoe Soko ga ba hukunci nan) ko ma ye gan be'a yin be bolobolo (kendoe Soko ga ba hukunci nan). Ye mae wa za guba nanzhia gwa sun addina na ebo a jin ri (yan yawo lo ko gyara yawo la) Ye mae la erie kue gikini tsakanie be Sokoe. Hukunci nnazhi (eti yawo lao) za nanzhi ga imani jin be Sokoe acia imani jin be efo zobae nan ga a jin amfani beu yin eti dansun Soko bo. Zaeni ndondo na gae tswa Soko nan Sokoa jin egwagan ya'u ganni be eko kpe yan alhairi zhi'i.

column2: And He provides for him from (sources) he never could imagine. And if any one puts his trust in Allah sufficient is (Allah) for him. For Allah will surely accomplish his purpose: verily for all things has Allah appointed a due proportion.
column3: Soko ma akpe eko arziki zhi ya'u eko nanzhi u kpaye tu'a nan. Zaeni ndondo nan gaa yakpe Soko nan Soko a kunke yau (hali ndondo). Akika Soko'a zankpe be jin jin yandondoe akika Soko a kangi laadan alita ndondo.

column2: Such of your women as have passed the age of monthly courses for them the prescribed period if ye have any doubts is three months and for those who have no courses (it is the same): for those who carry (life within their wombs) their period is until they deliver their burdens: and for those who fear Allah He will make their path easy.
column3: Yinzagi nanzhia kuku a mae jin shikan etswa be'a nan Ye gae jin kelokezhin dan hukunci idda abo nyan'a yi etswa guta. Acinga egi yinzagi nanzhi a laa ca haila yin jin'a nan (ebo dzakanboabo) idda yan atso yi etswa guta. To yinzagi nan zhi yi be ewan'e nan ( eba'azhi ga bee ya) idda a yi kaminan a ga yan nan fi ewan azhio nan man nan (idda a zo dan'o nan). Akika zaeni ndondo nan gae sundan Soko cie tswa iyakau zhi nan Soko ga sauki la'a dan alamari ndondo'o yau.

column2: That is the Command of Allah which He has sent down to you: and if any one fears Allah He will remove his ills from him and will enlarge his reward.
column3: Doka nnazhi kpata foro Soko uyio nan u cin zhin be yaye nan. Zaeni ndondo nan gae sundan Soko cie tswa (doka u zhinan) (Soko) a fa be etun dede nanzhi u lo nae u maa gaugba be lada nan wancin nan.

column2: Let the women live (in ´iddat) in the same style as ye live according to your means: Annoy them not so as to restrict them. And if they carry (life in their wombs) then spend (your substance) on them until they deliver their burden: and if they suckle your (offspring) give them their recompense: and take mutual counsel together according to what is just and reasonable. And if ye find yourselves in difficulties let another woman suckle (the child) on the (father´s) behalf.
column3: E lugwa yinmi nanzhi ye ga ya nan afi dannan nanzhi ye tso gae fi nan (har da lokaci nan idda'a a gun mi nan). Ye mae ga jin'a gun ganni be eba yibae ma. A gaa fe za nanzhi yi be ewan'e nan (kaa wun'a yi yiya gutao) e fe ya'a yangici gi (be yandoci yan bukata'azhi) har da lokaci nan a ma yan nan fi ewan'a bo nan. A ma ga'a fedun eti eye la dan egi yezhio Ye'a la'ada (ewo etun nan a lo nan) la'a ya'a (har da lokaci nan egi awa emi ebe o nan). Ye mae fe jin bolobolo tsakanie bo be dozhi. Kagan ye be lodozhi be yinmi yin'a (eti egi kpa boa) da wa yinzagi ndoci nan'a kpa'u nan.

column2: Let the man of means spend according to his means: and the man whose resources are restricted let him spend according to what Allah has given him. Allah puts no burden on any person beyond what He has given him. After a difficulty Allah will soon grant relief.
column3: Zaeni ndondo nan Soko ga jin ba-- ya nan wyuntso ujin'u ya iyali'uzhi (to za nan zhi Soko la dan takoubo nan). Za nan ma Soko ga arziki'u fe tetengi na wuntso u jin kokari be iyali'u zhi be gwargwado yan nan Soko la ya'u nan. Sokoe la kpaka ta rayi ndondoa sai eti gwargwado kagbo nan u ga la ya'u nan. Bele yin Soko a be'a Sauki la agba ba yi ba ndondo zunma.

column2: How many populations that insolently opposed the Command of their Lord and of His messengers did We not then call to account- to severe account- and We imposed on them an exemplary Punishment.
column3: Ekun dondo yan zawangizhi nanzhi fi alkaryazhio nan (yan zaaman nanzhi shidzo nan to yan gbaani) aa le foro (umurni) yan Tsocia ba a maa le foro yan Tuci'u ba. Yicia jin hisabi (binkice) hisabi nan tan saruyin nan (izheo) Yi ma kezhea jin azaba nan yi dede nan.

column2: Then did they taste the evil result of their conduct and the End of their conduct was Perdition.
column3: Atso cife fin azaba yan masiba yan alamari nanzhi atso fi nin yin'u bo nan kanga gancin zoba yan alamaria zhi cia fe asara.

column2: Allah has prepared for them a severe Punishment (in the Hereafter). Therefore fear Allah O ye men of understanding - who have believed!- for Allah hath indeed sent down to you a Message-
column3: Soko ma a shiri jin ya'a yan azaba nan yi dede nan. Ebo acin'o Ye nanzhi yi eza ankali zhi nan Ye ma kezhea imani jin nan e tswa Soko re' ye mae fe sundan'u akika Soko a sinsantu cin bea ya ye.

column2: An Messenger who rehearses to you the Signs of Allah containing clear explanations that he may lead forth those who believe and do righteous deeds from the depths of Darkness into Light. And those who believe in Allah and work righteousness He will admit to Gardens beneath which Rivers flow to dwell therein for ever: Allah has indeed granted for them a most excellent Provision.
column3: U ga yi Tuci nan'e gba aya yan Soko nanzhia tula nan ya ye nao. Ebo u de bau la za nanzhia imani jin acie lotun guru nan a laa tin'aya dagan bazhikozhio lo haske. Akika zaeni ndondo nan ga imani jin be Sokoe nan u cie kezhe lo etun wangi wangizhi nan (Soko ga'u la gandan emi aljannazhio ba nan nuwan yan edu managizhi e je zhi taako shin'o nan. Ama'afi bo fi har abada). akika Sokoa arziki nan gye sarauyin na la'a yau.

column2: Allah is He Who created seven Firmaments and of the earth a similar number. Through the midst of them (all) descends His Command: that ye may know that Allah has power over all things and that Allah comprehends all things in (His) Knowledge.
column3: Soko ga yi Etsu nan jin alitta yan sanma gutwaba nan'o U ci kezhea kin jin dozhin acin be. Ucie cin umurni'u zhi (doka'auzhi) dan tsakani (sanma to kinbo) Ebo acin'o kpata (alittazhi) ye' kpe wo ke Soko gboka u ma de iko ta eti yandondo. Akika ma kpikpe yan Soko wun'a ma yandondo kezhe.

column2: Blessed be He in Whose hands is Dominion; and He over all things hath Power;-
column3: Cinwan be zankpe wun'a jin tabbata ya (Soko) Etsu nan wun mulki yan-dondo nan. Akika Soko gboka eti jin jin yan dondo. (Kagbo Soko ta eti yan dondo zandondo.)

column2: He Who created Death and Life that He may try which of you is best in deed: and He is the Exalted in Might Oft-Forgiving;-
column3: Soko ga yi Etsu nan jin alitta yan tsutsu be rayi nan o ebo'U de ba u ma ye'u cin'u le Zii ga lo tun wangizhi gan mini e bo Akika Soko Etsu zankpe uyio. Etsu ga fara u yio.

column2: He Who created the seven heavens one above another: No want of proportion wilt thou see in the Creation of (Allah) Most Gracious. So turn thy vision again: seest thou any flaw
column3: Soko ga yi Etsu nan jin alitta sanma gu twaba ta eti dozhio nan-o Wo'a le gbogun bo ndoci ye dan mini yan nan Soko Etsu yegun jin nan boa. Ke zhe ye ba cin le be ko wyo'a le ba ndoci nan san ko nan banfi nan-ye

column2: Again turn thy vision a second time: (thy) vision will come back to thee dull and discomfited in a state worn out.
column3: Ke zhe cin 'ule lo zhin be; eye wyotso gaabo u maale aibi ndondo ye a.

column2: And we have (from of old) adorned the lowest heaven with Lamps and We have made such (Lamps) (as) missiles to drive away the Evil Ones and have prepared for them the Penalty of the Blazing Fire.
column3: Akika yi-a sanma yan izhe pa-nin gan-ni be fitila zhi Yi ci a la afe yan nan e' ce ke shaitan zhi nan. Yi ma kezhe a shiri jin kaayan azaba enan nan yi kike ci nan.

column2: For those who reject their Lord (and Cherisher) is the Penalty of Hell: and evil is (such) Destination.
column3: Akika azaba yan jahannama wun'a jin tabbata ya za nan zhi a jin kafirici be Tsoci a yin nan. Akika zo-ba'a wun'a bi ye.

column2: When they are cast therein they will hear the (terrible) drawing in of its breath even as it blazes forth
column3: Ka mi nan a ga'a ce fi mini jahannama o nan a tso'a fe wo nan enan a fe ti be kagbo e nan u ci a fe sa be kagboe.

column2: Almost bursting with fury: Every time a Group is cast therein its Keepers will ask "Did no Warner come to you"
column3: Enan e jin ke u ga ban-ya nan ebo tsanani yan fushi ("be za nan zhi e le Soko ba nae) ka ndondo nan a ga jama'a yan ena zhi ce fi enan o nan Malaika nan zhi e tswa enan nan a gbin'a gan gan: be ke za nanzhi e san zawangizhi tu eti azaba Soko nan a be eba ye yea nan

column2: They will say: "Yes indeed; a Warner did come to us but we rejected him and said ´Allah never sent down any (Message): ye are nothing but an egregious delusion!´"
column3: Atso (egi mi nan zhi) a gan gan: e'akika za nan zhi e jin gangba nan be ba yi ama'yyi'a egan'a zhi yi gan mana. Yi ci kezhe a gan'a gan: Soko cin gangbo ndndo be a akika ye (nan zhie jin gangba nan) ye a fe dan mini egbin nan wan cin nao.

column2: They will further say: "Had we but listened or used our intelligence we should not (now) be among the Companions of the Blazing Fire!"
column3: Atso (egi mi nan zhi) cia kezhe gan gan: Da'a gan gan yi ga afe za nan zhie e wo gan nan Yi ci e kezhe la ankali dan'u nan da'yi a fe dan nimi egi mi nan yan sa'iru boa.

column2: They will then confess their sins: but far will be (Forgiveness) from the Companions of the Blazing Fire!
column3: A tso ci a emi --  eti le'fi nan zhi a jin nan akika hallaka wun'ajin tabbata ya egi mi na yan sai ru zhi.

column2: As for those who fear their Lord unseen for them is Forgiveness and a great Reward.
column3: Akika za nan zhi e sundan Tsocia swiswo ci nan gafara yan Soko wun'a jin tabbata ya'a gan ni be lada nan wancin nan.

column2: And whether ye hide your word or publish it He certainly has (full) knowledge of the secrets of (all) hearts.
column3: (Ya ye zawangizhi) U ga ba e egan gan swo ko ma ye'egan win'etu e-la' akika Soko yi be kpikpe yan yan nan zhi fi ekogi e bo nan.

column2: Should He not know- He that created and He is the One that understands the finest mysteries (and) is well-acquainted (with them).NGBA;
column3: Etsu nan jin alitta zhi kpata nan wun'a kpe'a ye'a  Akika Soko Etsu sawki u yio Etsu nan ma de labari yandondon nan u yio.

column2: It is He Who has made the earth manageable for you so traverse ye through its tracts and enjoy of the Sustenance which He furnishes: but unto Him is the Resurrection.
column3: Soko ga yi Etsu nan ta kin ci ci ya ye na-o u ci la fe di da ci. Ebo a cin'o e' dazan dan kansan ta ndondo yan kin bo ye ma e fe gi dagan arziki Soko amma ye kpe' wo ke kpatae ga'gun zhi ye gboro Soko (efo kiyama enan.)

column2: Do ye feel secure that He Who is in heaven will not cause you to be swallowed up by the earth when it shakes (as in an earthquake)
column3: Kashi ye a aminci ya ya ke Soko nan dan sanma-o nan U tan ye fi kin bo wo'a Kanga kin cia'fe du ta ti yebo be kagboe.

column2: Do ye feel secure that He Who is in heaven will not cause you to be swallowed up by the earth when it shakes (as in an earthquake)
column3: Kashi ye a aminci ya ya ke Soko nan dan sanma-o nan U tan ye fi kin bo wo'a Kanga kin cia'fe du ta ti yebo be kagboe.

column2: Or do ye feel secure that He Who is in Heaven will not send against you a violent tornado (with showers of stones) so that ye shall know how (terrible) was My warning
column3: Kashi ye'a aminci ya ya ke Soko nan dan sanma o nan U tun efeko be takun'I fi ye wo'a (ken doe a jin be za ba Annabi lutu zhi nan to jama'a yan dagba zhi nan). Akika bele yin ye'a be nan (fo nan e ga azaba le ye be eye yin nan).

column2: But indeed men before them rejected (My warning): then how (terrible) was My rejection (of them)
column3: Akika za nan zhi shidzo ba tsozhi o nan a egan nan Tuci'a zhi gan ya'nan yi ganmanan. Amma'ki be yi zo ba yan gangba nan zhi a jin'a na-o

column2: Do they not observe the birds above them spreading their wings and folding them in None can uphold them except (Allah) Most Gracious: Truly (Allah) Most Gracious: Truly it is He that watches over all things.
column3: Kashi a cin elugizhi le kpe sanmao eti a bo a A ma'a jin e la gwanpazhi ya ba za ndondo dan bo nan la gwa sun'a gi sanma o na'a sai Soko nan yi Etsu yegun nan. Akika Soko Etsu na e cin yan dondo le nan U yio.

column2: Nay who is there that can help you (even as) an army besides (Allah) Most Merciful In nothing but delusion are the Unbelievers.
column3: Kashi zii ye le ye gan wun'a fe kagboci ya ye yeo Nan'a jin ye taimako ke azaba Soko lugwa nan'o Akika kafirizhi e le izhe le kawan yin dan mini etao.

column2: Or who is there that can provide you with Sustenance if He were to withhold His provision Nay they obstinately persist in insolent impiety and flight (from the Truth).
column3: Kashi zii dan bo a ya ye arziki yan gigi be finfin yin'o ka mi nan'Soko ga arziki za nan zhi e le Soko ba nan a fe eti kagbo ci zhi nan zhi ma a kpe ya be eko guru'I nan.

column2: Is then one who walks headlong with his face grovelling better guided- or one who walks evenly on a Straight Way
column3: Ngba za nan e da zan ci a eye'u kpe nan ga ta eti ekpa gboro gan'o Kashi za nan e da zan daidai eti ekpa gboro nan

column2: Say: "It is He Who has created you (and made you grow) and made for you the faculties of hearing seeing feeling and understanding: little thanks it is ye give.
column3: (Annabi) gan gan: Soko ga yi Etsu nan ca jin jin yan alitta ye nan-o. U ci kezhea tukpa yan gan wo be eye yan ba cin le be yangban'e jin ya ye. Akika yebo jin yan ye lo eba Soko degi U yio.

column2: Say: "It is He Who has multiplied you through the earth and to Him shall ye be gathered together."
column3: (Annabi) Gan gan: Soko ga yi Etsu nan jin alitta ye kpata kpe kin bo nan-o kpata e ma ga'gun yekan zhi ye gboro u bo ( Efo kiyamae).

column2: They ask: When will this promise be (fulfilled) - If ye are telling the truth.
column3: (Kafirizhi) a jin a fe gag gan: Fo ci alkawali yan efo kiyama a beo Wun'a yi gaskiya Ye (Tuci Soko zhie) ta o nan

column2: Say: "As to the knowledge of the time it is with Allah alone: I am (sent) only to warn plainly in public."
column3: ( Annabi) Gan ya gan: Akika kpikpe yan efo kiyama U dan be Sokoe. Akika Mi (Annabi) fe dan mini ye boa; sai dai gangba jin ci nan a tu la nan.

column2: At length when they see it close at hand grieved will be the faces of the Unbelievers and it will be said (to them): "This is (the promise fulfilled) which ye were calling for!"
column3: Lokaci nan kafirizhi ga alama yan kiyama le ye nan Fuskazhi kpata ga zhe-gba Malaikazhi ci a gan'a-gan: Efo nan ye gan ye wa yeleu nan ga dan nan-o.

column2: Say: "See ye- If Allah were to destroy me and those with me or if He bestows His Mercy on us- yet who can deliver the Unbelievers from a grievous Penalty"
column3: (Annabi) gGan ya (kafiri nan zhi ekpa gan wo ola o jin hallaka nan) mi ga be'a jin ajali gan-ni be za nan zhi imani jin be mi yin nan ko U cia pata ya yi zei ga ke na'a gan kafiri zhi gwa dagan azaba jahanma nan yitintan ci nan-o

column2: Say: "He is (Allah) Most Gracious: We have believed in Him and on Him have we put our trust: So soon will ye know which (of us) it is that is in manifest error."
column3: (Annabi) Gan yan gan: Soko ga yi Etsu ye gun'o Yi ma imani jin be uyio Wun ga ma yi yakpe o Bele-yin ye kafiri zhi a be kpe za nan zhi ga fi mini egbin nan tso tula nao.

column2: Say: "See ye- If your stream be some morning lost (in the underground earth) who then can supply you with clear-flowing water"
column3: (Annabi Gan gaa: Ngba Nuwan nan zhi ye la'a jin anfani nan ga'wo zii mini alitta zhio ga la nuwan managi be ya ye yeo

column2: Nun. By the Pen and the (Record) which (men) write-
column3: Nun'Soko ezhi kuti be alkalan yin. Be yan nazhie ka nae.

column2: Thou art not by the Grace of thy Lord mad or possessed.
column3: Akika Wyo'e (Annabi) Wyo jin ilanducia gan ni be ni'ima wanciko (yan Annabci) nan Tsoci wyo'e la'a ya wyo'e na'a.

column2: Nay verily for thee is a Reward unfailing:
column3: Akika ma la'da nan tso a ba-tu'a nan wun'a jin tabbata ya wyo'e.Surah 68:4   And thou (standest) on an exalted standard of character.Akika ma Wyo ta eti hali wan gi wan-gi zhio nan zhima gbo ta sarau yin nan.

column2: Soon wilt thou see and they will see
column3: Be le yin Wo'a be le akika alamari zhi ye. To a tso kafirizhi ma a be le ye.

column2: Which of you is afflicted with madness.
column3: Zhi mini ye bo yi ilanduci be eza fitina yin'o

column2: Verily it is thy Lord that knoweth best which (among men) hath strayed from His Path: and He knoweth best those who receive (true) Guidance.
column3: Akika Tsoci yan wyo'e u ga de kpikpe gan'o yan za nan zhi ga'ya ke eko gboro lu gwa nan-o Wun ga ma de kpikpe gan-o yan za nan zhi ta eti eko gboro eti shiri Soko nan-o.

column2: So hearken not to those who deny (the Truth).
column3: (Annabi) Ga jin yarda a mi. tu gan-ma-nan zun ci zhi ma.

column2: Their desire is that thou shouldst be pliant: so would they be pliant.
column3: Kafirizhi e wa gan wo'ola o da o ci'o ya'a ebo etso a da'a ciaya Wo'e.

column2: Heed not the type of despicable men- ready with oaths
column3: (Annabi) Ga jin yarda la mi tu zae ni ndondo nan ga gan kuti-zhi na ma. Wyo ma o ga la mi tu za banza zhi ma.

column2: A slanderer going about with calumnies
column3: Za nan zhie gan za wangi zhi yin'nan Za nan zhi e ku za wan gi zhi gun wun nan.

column2: (Habitually) hindering (all) good transgressing beyond bounds deep in sin
column3: Za nan zhi e la alheri kan do-zhi nan za nan zhi e gbin iyaka Soko tu nan za nan zhi a cin dan jin jin le fi Soko nan. (Kpata za nan nan zhi'I Annabi ga jin yarda be a yin ma)

column2: Violent (and cruel)- with all that base-born-
column3: Eza eti kagbo ci zhi ba'aci siffa dede nan nan zhi'I u ke zhe yi egi nan'a ma yan cin'o nan.

column2: Because he possesses wealth and (numerous) sons.
column3: Wun'a jin u fe pe ta eti kin bo ebo nan u yi ewo de ci nan u ma kezhe yi be egi zhi'I nan.

column2: When to him are rehearsed Our Signs "Tales of the ancients" he cries!
column3: Ka ndondo nan a ga aya Mi zhi gba ya'u nan wun'a jin u gan: ecin zhi a yio yan za pa yin zhi.Surah 68:16  Soon shall We brand (the beast) on the snout!Yi ga alama dede la a ta u eti eye'u bo. (Wato a ga eye yan Walidu bn Magira din U ci ga jin duru I ke yan dagba nan).

column2: Verily We have tried them as We tried the People of the Garden when they resolved to gather the fruits of the (garden) in the morning.
column3: Akika Yi (Mi Soko) yi a maka-ci-zhi ma cin le (be azaba iri iri zhi) ken do'e Yi ma za ba lati ndoci zhi cin le nan. Lokaci nan a zhi kuti gan: a yaa sa-ka-sa da ku yangi-ci lati a zhi be asuba-yinnan'e.Surah 68:18 But made no reservation ("If it be Allah´s Will").Lokaci nan a zhi kuti nan a gan gan: (IN SHAALLAHU'A) U ga be a ba Soko'a.

column2: Then there came on the (garden) a visitation from thy Lord (which swept away) all around while they were asleep.
column3: Azaba yan Soko ci'a lati'a zhi ma ke-zhe alhali ma a fi nbo e le le.Surah 68:20 So the (garden) became by the morning like a dark and desolate spot (whose fruit had been gathered).Lati a zhi cia shi zhiko kpiri'I ke ba zhiko yeshi nan.

column2: As the morning broke they called out one to another-
column3: A ci a do zhi san lokaci nan asuba wun'a jin nan. (ebo a da la yangici lati a ku talakazhi'a ga de rabo ndondo bo ma).

column2: "Go ye to your tilth (betimes) in the morning if ye would gather the fruits."
column3: E' sa ka ye da e la yangici lati zhi e ku Niyan ye ga gbo-ka eti ku ku'u bo nan.

column2: So they departed conversing in secret low tones (saying)-
column3: A ci a ezan la a ci fe gan gan be do-zhi eti shawar'ao swiswo ci.

column2: "Let not a single indigent person break in upon you into the (garden) this day."
column3: (A fe' gan gan:) Yin nan e ga lu gwa talaka ko nini gan-dan lati o ma.

column2: And they opened the morning strong in an (unjust) resolve.
column3: A ci a tin ya be kagbo yangban'e ke yan nan a zhi kuti gan a ya jin nan sai a ga'u jin.

column2: And they opened the morning strong in an (unjust) resolve.
column3: A ci a tin ya be kagbo yangban'e ke yan nan a zhi kuti gan a ya jin nan sai a ga'u jin.

column2: But when they saw the (garden) they said: "We have surely lost our way:
column3: Lokaci nan' a tun lati nan a gan: Akika yi'a gbin ka.

column1: Surah 68:27  "Indeed we are shut out (of the fruits of our labour)!"Sa-shi'a zhi gan: Yi gbin ka'a amma'a a yi kan amfani lati yin ku ebo niyan dede nan dan be yi yin nan'e.

column2: Said one of them more just (than the rest): "Did I not say to you ´Why not glorify (Allah)´"
column3: Nan tso de ankali gan mini'a bo nan gan: asha Mi gan ya ye ; gan: ye' sun dan Soko'a

column1: Surah 68:29     They said: "Glory to our Lord! Verily we have been doing wrong!"Kpata ci gan: Lili be ela tui a jin tabbata ya Tsoci yan yi Akika yi a eti ta cin yi jin gun (ebo hakki yan talakazhi nan zhi yi la kan'a nan).

column2: Then they turned one against another in reproach.
column3: A ci a eye zhe wu do zhi ci e jin do-zhi zargi.

column2: They said: "Alas for us! We have indeed transgressed!
column3: A gan: ka sa re'! Akika yi a fe za' nan zhi a gbin iyaka Soko tu nan.

column2: "It may be that our Lord will give us in exchange a better (garden) than this: for we do turn to Him (in repentance)!"
column3: U jin-y wa-wo Tsoci yan yi Wun'a la egba zhe ndoci yan alheri nan gan yan lati nna nan ya yi. Akika yi a fe za nan zhi e jin kawana alheri lo nko Tsoci yi nan.

column2: Such is the Punishment (in this life); but greater is the Punishment in the Hereafter- if only they knew!
column3: Akika a cin ga ga azaba (Yi) yio ta eti azwalumi zhi bo tun da gan izhe ba bo)Akika ma azaba yan eku ba tso-zhi u gbo gan yan izhe amma' sai ye ga fe eza kpikpe zhi kanga ga ye a la hankali dan egan nan nan-o.

column2: Verily for the Righteous are Gardens of Delight in the Presence of their Lord.
column3: Akika za nanzhi e sundan Soko a ci e twsa doka u zhi nan aljanna nan a she gan ni be ni'ima iri iri zhi'I nan wun'a jin tabbata ya'a dan e ba Tsoci a bo.

column2: Verily for the Righteous are Gardens of Delight in the Presence of their Lord.
column3: Akika za nanzhi e sundan Soko a ci e twsa doka u zhi nan aljanna nan a she gan ni be ni'ima iri iri zhi'I nan wun'a jin tabbata ya'a dan e ba Tsoci a bo.

column2: Shall We then treat the People of Faith like the People of Sin
column3: Ka shi za nan zhi e ta kpatsun -- foro Soko ran ga'afe yan-ni be za nan zhi e le foro Soko ba nan (To izhe to eku Musulumi u ga fe yan ni be kafiri yin'a).

column2: What is the matter with you How judge ye
column3: Ke jin ye ye-o Ye ci e ba hukunci dede o (Ye a jin ye fe gan gan to Musulumi to kafiri yan ni ayio eri kpe ndondo dan boa. Egan nan nan nan za ndoci ga'jin'a azaba kiyamao nan.

column2: Or have ye a book through which ye learn-Ka shi!
column3: Ye de litafi ndoci de kayin baci ALKURA'ANU'O nan a cin be ya ye ye cie gba hukunci dede-nnan zhii bo nan

column2: That ye shall have through it whatever ye choose
column3: Mini litafi wun cin'o a ci a gan ya ye gan: ye tsa hukunci zhi ken do e u ga man fi ye yangban'o nan

column2: Or have ye Covenants with Us to oath reaching to the Day of Judgment (providing) that ye shall have whatever ye shall demand
column3: Ka shi ye de alkawali ndoci de be yi yin nan gboka har da'efo kiyama nan gan: ye fe ba hukunci zhi ken do'e u ga man fi ye nan

column2: Ask thou of them which of them will stand surety for that!
column3: (Annabi) Gabin'a gan'e za 'e mini a bo ga la egwa kun yangban 'o Ke wun'de alkawali nan gboka nan be Soko e gan: Hukunci) nan ga ba'a nan a fe a jin-o

column2: Or have they some "Partners" (in Allahhead) Then let them produce their "partners" if they are truthful!
column3: Ka shi a yi be Soko ndoci zhi'I yi kaa yin nan a pa Mi Soko ba ci nan (Annabi) gan ya gan: a la Tsoci-a zhi nan e la pa Mi ba ci nan'a tin'a ya Wun'a yi eza gaskiya zhi a yio nan.

column2: The Day that the shin shall be laid bare and they shall be summoned to bow in adoration but they shall not be able-
column3: Efo na a ga sutura kpe rogbo zae ni ndondo nan (efo nan ga za ndondo ku tso nan) a yi kafirizhi gan a be a jin sujada a ya Soko. Amma wun'a ye jin ya'aa.

column2: Their eyes will be cast down- ignominy will cover them; seeing that they had been summoned aforetime to bow in adoration while they were whole (and had refused).
column3: Eye' to fuska yan kafiri zhi to azwalumi zhi ga'a gba gba Zun ye sun ga'a wan gi Akika lokaci nan a ta eti rayi'o izhe o nan a fe yi'a gan a dakpe'a ya foro yan Soko (amma'a ebo yangici zheo be lafiya'e nan dan be a yin nan) a gan: a ya'a ta kpatsun -- foro Sokoa.

column2: Then leave Me alone with such as reject this Message: by degrees shall We punish them from directions they perceive not.
column3: (Annabi) a Mi (Soko) ya be za ndondo nan ga e yi egan Misun Soko gan-manan nan Mi (Soko) a fe daagwa lo yegboro ba nan a kpe gan hallaka egba be zun ye sun'I wun'a be ya a nan.

column2: A (long) respite will I grant them: truly powerful is My Plan.
column3: Mi (Soko) a jin'n-fe pata ya (lefi jin ci zhi be rayi kpa loe be yangici izhe'e) Akika ta anadi nan Mi Soko e jin eti win wan'a bo nan u le kpan.

column2: Or is it that thou dost ask them for a reward so that they are burdened with a load of debt-
column3: Ka shii Annabi Wo'-e gbin'a gan la'ada yan etun nan Wo'e lo na gbin Ebo wun cin'o edu yan etun wo'zhi ci'a lu kpi fi'a

column2: Or is it that thou dost ask them for a reward so that they are burdened with a load of debt-
column3: Ka shii Annabi Wo'-e gbin'a gan la'ada yan etun nan Wo'e lo na gbin Ebo wun cin'o edu yan etun wo'zhi ci'a lu kpi fi'a

column2: Or that the Unseen is in their hands so that they can write it down
column3: Ka shi'I a yi be kpi kpe yan gaibu'I yi Da gan kpikpe wun'cin'o a ci e ka (hukunci dedezhi ke ndo e ba'a nan

column2: So wait with patience for the Command of thy Lord and be not like the Companion of the Fish- when he cried out in agony.
column3: Annabi a hankuri jin be kpikpe gi-ki-ni eti hukunci yan Tsoci o bo Ga nyin yangban ma Wo mao ga zhe wun do zhin yan (Annabi Yunusa) nan ikan la yin nan ma.

column2: Had not Grace from his Lord reached him he would indeed have been cast off on the naked shore in disgrace.
column3: Ka u jin ebo ni'ima nan'a shi dzo ta eti u bo na'a' da a ga u ce-ya ci cikan'o (ba nan cigban ko fini u dan'a nan). U ci ga' fe za nan'a fe jin u zargi nan.

column2: Had not Grace from his Lord reached him he would indeed have been cast off on the naked shore in disgrace.
column3: Ka u jin ebo ni'ima nan'a shi dzo ta eti u bo na'a' da a ga u ce-ya ci cikan'o (ba nan cigban ko fini u dan'a nan). U ci ga' fe za nan'a fe jin u zargi nan.

column2: Thus did his Lord choose him and make him of the Company of the Righteous.
column3: Tsoci u ci u la a fe eza tsitsa ci U ci u la a fe dan mini za gu ru zhio.

column2: And the Unbelievers would almost trip thee up with their eyes when they hear the Message; and they say: "Surely he is possessed!"
column3: Akika Kafiri zhi fe jin tanadi nan a ga wo jin hallaka be eye dede a zhi'I nan lokaci nan a wo tukpakpe nan wo la be na a ci a jin a fe' gan gan: Akika ilanduci tsa (Muhammadu) yio.

column2: But it is nothing less than a Message to all the worlds.
column3: Akika ALKUR'ANU u fe a sai dai tukpa pa ya'alitta zhi kpaata.

column2: Alif Lam Mim Sad.
column3: Alif. Lam. Mim. Swad.

column2: A Book revealed unto thee- So let thy heart be oppressed no more by any difficulty on that account- that with it thou mightest warn (the erring) and teach the Believers).Litafi uyio na'acin be ya wyo na ga lugwa bapin ndondo lodan yangban wyo bo dagan miniuboma ebo wto feo jin'a gangba beu yin. Uma yi sinsantu ya Muminizhi.
Follow (O men!) the revelation given unto you from your Lord and follow not as friends or protectors other than Him. Little it is ye remember of admonition.
column3: Yea mi tu yanna acin be ya ye dagan eba Tsoci yebo na yemae ga la' mitu Ndakata ndocizhi zun mauboma. De'gi tsa ye yea jin yefe'kpayeo.

column2: How many towns have We destroyed (for their sins) Our punishment took them on a sudden by night or while they slept for their afternoon rest.
column3: Dokun dokun ma mini alkaryazhio Yi yia jin hallaka gancin azaba Yi ci da tsun'a yeshi ko ma kamina e'lele yigidi na.

column2: When (thus) Our punishment took them no cry did they utter but this: "Indeed we did wrong."
column3: Gancin yandondo fe yanna fe tin ya misun'abo na'a saide afe gangan: "akika yi yia fe azwalumizhi.

column2: Then shall we question those to whom Our message was sent and those by whom We sent it.
column3: Ganci ma Yi yia gbin za nazhi a tun tucizhi fi na "gan akika ma yi yia gbin tucizhio tso gan.

column2: And verily We shall recount their whole story with knowledge for We were never absent (at any time or place).
column3: Gancin ma akika Yia ya'a labari be kpikpe yimafe Etsu nazhia cin bo na'a.

column2: The balance that day will be true (to nicety): those whose scale (of good) will be heavy will prosper:
