column3: Efo wuncin a de masoyi na'a gbin gan ba nan masoyi'u dan na'a.

column2: Though they will be put in sight of each other- the sinner´s desire will be: Would that he could redeem himself from the Penalty of that Day by (sacrificing) his children
column3: Masoyi zhi a fe le dozhi ye (egi a le nda'u ye Nnan ma a le egi'u ye) Ama'a lefi jin ci ndondo a fe wa sisa dagan azaba Soko ka wun'a yi be egi'u zhi yin'o.

column2: His wife and his brother
column3: Wun'a fe wa sisa ka wun'a yi be yinmin'u yin'o to be ye gi'u zhi.

column2: His kindred who sheltered him
column3: To dangi'u zhi nan zhi'i wun'e bokeba bea yin nan.

column2: And all all that is on earth- so it could deliver him:
column3: To alitta nanzhi kpe kinbo nan wun'a wa gan a laa fe sisa'a ya wyin dagan azaba Soko.

column2: By no means! for it would be the Fire of Hell!-
column3: U jin acin'a Akika enan yan Lazwa nan'e ke be kagboe nan ga'a yi emi wun'o.

column2: Plucking out (his being) right to the skull!-
column3: Enan yan Lazwa nan'e kpan epa yan eti zawangi ya nan.

column2: Inviting (all) such as turn their backs and turn away their faces (from the Right).
column3: Wun'a jin u fe kpo gun yi za nan'a zunma zheta Soko nan Ucia jin kafirinci be bawu Sokoe nan.

column2: Inviting (all) such as turn their backs and turn away their faces (from the Right).
column3: Wun'a jin u fe kpo gun yi za nan'a zunma zheta Soko nan Ucia jin kafirinci be bawu Sokoe nan.

column2: And collect (wealth) and hide it (from use)!
column3: Wun'a fe kpo gun yi za nan'a dukiya kuyekan ciu swo har wun'e wa hakki Sokoa nan.

column2: ruly man was created very impatient;-
column3: Akika Sokoa halitta zawangi jin wun'a fe za nan de kwadari sarauyin nan.

column2: Fretful when evil touches him;
column3: Mi man cinle ndoci yan yangban yin ga de'u wun'e jin hakuri'a.

column2: And niggardly when good reaches him;-
column3: Ba-- yan alhairi ma ga da be ya'u wun'a zhi'u yan-bo tanci.

column2: Not so those devoted to Prayer;-
column3: Sai dai za nan zhie jin sallah nan(e'zhe wun'a a mae tanyan boa).

column2: Those who remain steadfast to their prayer;
column3: Za nanzhi yangban'azhi a shi dan jin jin sallao kandondo nan.

column2: And those in whose wealth is a recognised right.
column3: To za nanzhie la hakki yan Soko nan dan dukiya'a zhio nan wa nan.(ke zakka be sadakae nan).

column2: For the (needy) who asks and him who is prevented (for some reason from asking);
column3: E' laa wa ya talaka nan'e bayan za nan be talaka nan de'a u ma' yangban wu wun'e ba'yan'a nan.

column2: And those who hold to the truth of the Day of Judgment;
column3: To za nanzhi a gaskiya ya be efo egagbae nan. (Efo nan addini gbaugi ga'a gan za gwao nan).

column2: And those who fear the displeasure of their Lord-
column3: To za nanzhi a jin a fe sundan azaba Tsocia nan.

column2: For their Lord´s displeasure is the opposite of Peace and Tranquillity;-
column3: Akika Azaba yan Soko u jin yan nan eza'a ya aminci be yin na'a.

column2: And those who guard their chastity
column3: To za nanzhie la kangi dan ita'a zhi ke zina lugwa nan.

column2: And those who guard their chastity
column3: To za nanzhie la kangi dan ita'a zhi ke zina lugwa nan.

column2: Except with their wives and the (captives) whom their right hands possess- for (then) they are not to be blamed
column3: Sai dai ganni be yinmi'azhi ko wuzhi inzagizhi nan a' ga de eti ekun addini Musuluncio nan akika leifi u dan mini ema nan yea wo bea yin nan'a.

column2: But those who trespass beyond this are transgressors;-
column3: Zaeni ndondo nan ga -- iyaka nna zhi'i gan nan akika za wuncin zhi ga'e gbin iyaka Soko tu o.

column2: And those who respect their trusts and covenants;
column3: To za nanzhie tswa Amana zhi ganni be alkawali'i nan.

column2: And those who stand firm in their testimonies;
column3: To za anazhi a kpe gikini eti eri jin be gaskiyae nan.

column2: And those who guard (the sacredness) of their worship;-
column3: To za nanzhie tswa lokaci to hakki yan Sallah nan.

column2: Such will be the honoured ones in the Gardens (of Bliss).
column3: Kpata za wuncin zhi za cin wanci zhi ayio fi mini aljanna'azhio.

column2: Now what is the matter with the Unbelievers that they rush madly before thee-
column3: Ke jin kafiri zhi cia jin a fe jin dalodazhin zhi yegboro wyo bo

column2: From the right and from the left in crowds
column3: Acia jin a gunye kan ekpo ekpo to gwalo to gwapin.

column2: Does every man of them long to enter the Garden of Bliss
column3: Kashi zaeni ndondo miniabo e wa wa gan a la wun'a la gan'adan aljannao (U ma yi be etun guru ndondo yin'a).

column2: By no means! For We have created them out of the (base matter) they know!
column3: Wun'a ye jin a'cin'a Akika ye zawangizhi yetso kpe yan nan Mi (Soko) a jin alitta ye nan. (Ebo acin'o alfahri ndoci u dan bo nan yea jin fi Soko na'a).

column2: Now I do call to witness the Lord of all points in the East and the West that We can certainly-
column3: Mi (Soko) e zhi kuti be Etsu nan wun mulki ta eti eyi laa zhin to lozun'I nan Yi gboka eti jin jin yandondo.

column2: Substitute for them better (men) than they; And We are not to be defeated (in Our Plan).
column3: Na Yiga'a sangwa Yi ci'i la halitta woro zhi'i jin nanzhi de alhairi gan'a nan. Akika alitta ndondo gan Yi gwa woa.

column2: So leave them to plunge in vain talk and play about until they encounter that Day of theirs which they have been promised!-
column3: Ebo acin'o (Annabi) a' ya' a fea le izhe ganmanan'a za a ma'a fe'a dzo-dzo'a za har da fo nan a be gun be efo nan Sokoa shi-shi eti alkawalio nan.

column2: The Day whereon they will issue from their sepulchres in sudden haste as if they were rushing to a goal-post (fixed for them)-
column3: Efo nan a fe dzun tinya da gan kabari'a zhio nan acia fe sannin ke za nan zhie lo kuti wun zhi (ko eba san zhi)nan.

column2: Their eyes lowered in dejection- ignominy covering them (all over)! such is the Day the which they are promised!
column3: Fo wuncin Fuskaazhi ga gba gba egba to zunyesun ga'a rukpe'a. Akika efo wuncin ga yi efo nan Soko a jin alitta zhi kpata alkawali nan'o

column2: We sent Noah to his People (with the Command): "Do thou warn thy People before there comes to them a grievous Penalty."
column3: Akika Yia Annabi Nuhu tun fi za kin yin'uzhi (kinnan'e yi gan Kufa nan) Yi ci gan'u gan: da-da jin za ba'o zhi gangba (a ke'a gan be lemba Sokoe) tun nan azaba nan tan sarauyin nan la' tun etia nan.

column2: He said: "O my People! I am to you a Warner clear and open
column3: :Ucia gan gan: Ya ye zaba mizhi! Akika gangba jinci mi yi be eba ye yeo U ma yi gangba eti alamari nan tula nan.

column2: "That ye should worship Allah fear Him and obey me:
column3: E' jin bauta ya Soko Ye mae fe tswa doka'u zhi ye mae la mie tu umurni'u zhi baenio.

column2: "So He may forgive you your sins and give you respite for a stated Term: for when the Term given by Allah is accomplished it cannot be put forward: if ye only knew."
column3: Soko a fa be zunubie zhi'i U ma'a pata alhairi ya'e har da lokaci nan yi kikaci nan. Akika eka yan Soko ga'a gun aa pa'u ta'a. Da'aci gan ye de akika kpikpe alamari nan nan de (da ye ga imani jin be Sokoe).

column2: He said: "O my Lord! I have called to my People night and day:
column3: Annabi Nuhu gan: Tsoci Mie yi za ba mizhi (be eko addini Musulunci) to yeshi to yigidi.

column2: "But my call only increases (their) flight (from the Right).
column3: Yi-yi mi zhi kpata ma u be'a yan'doa sai kpikpeya be gaskiyae.

column2: "And every time I have called to them that Thou mightest forgive them they have (only) thrust their fingers into their ears covered themselves up with their garments grown obstinate and given themselves up to arrogance.
column3: Akika ma kandondo nan mi ga yi'a ebo wo jin'a gafara nan a ga egwa gin-ginia zhi ku fi tukpa zhio aci ga ede'azhi kpeti a ci ga kpe ta eti lefi jin'o acia fe gbotika nan'a -- iyaka gan nan."So I have called to them aloud;Mi mae kezhe yi'a lokaci nan a ga zhi tacin jamaa zhio nan.

column2: "Further I have spoken to them in public and secretly in privateAkika mi fe la bere tu mi ma fe yia to swisoci.
"Saying ´Ask forgiveness from your Lord; for He is Oft-Forgiving;Mi ma gan ya  gan: e' ba gafara be Tsocie yin akika Soko Etsu gafara uyio.
"´He will send rain to you in abundance;Soko a du ele nan dokun be albarka'e nan be ya ye.
"´Give you increase in wealth and sons; and bestow on you gardens and bestow on you rivers (of flowing water).
column3: Soko ma a jin ba-- yan dukiya to egi albarkazhi ya ye U ma ga albarka la'adan yangici latie zhi U ma twa'e rya be nuwan ji je ci zhi'i.

column2: "´What is the matter with you that ye place not your hope for kindness and long-suffering in Allah-
column3: Ke' jin ye zawangizhi cie wan Soko cin kendoe u -- yin naa yin'o

column2: "´Seeing that it is He that has created you in diverse stages
column3: Alhali ma wun'a halitta ye zhi jin ekpo ekpo. (da gan mani 'bo da egya da tsoka da har lokaci nan a ma za nan).

column2: "´Seeing that it is He that has created you in diverse stages
column3: Alhali ma wun'a halitta ye zhi jin ekpo ekpo. (da gan mani 'bo da egya da tsoka da har lokaci nan a ma za nan).

column2: "´See ye not how Allah has created the seven heavens one above another
column3: Ye le kendoe Soko jin halitta sanma gutwaba ta eti dozhio nan ye'a

column2: "´See ye not how Allah has created the seven heavens one above another
column3: Ye le kendoe Soko jin halitta sanma gutwaba ta eti dozhio nan ye'a

column2: "´And made the moon a light in their midst and made the sun as a (Glorious) Lamp
column3: Ucia etswa la'a fe haske dan mini fitio. Ucia igidi la'a fe fitila nan wancin nan.

column2: "´And made the moon a light in their midst and made the sun as a (Glorious) Lamp
column3: Ucia etswa la'a fe haske dan mini fitio. Ucia igidi la'a fe fitila nan wancin nan.

column2: "´And Allah has produced you from the earth growing (gradually)
column3: Soko ga yi Etsu nan ku ye tinya dagan kinbo nan'o. (kendoe u la yangici ye zhi cie tinya kinbo nan).

column2: "´And in the End He will return you into the (earth) and raise you forth (again at the Resurrection)
column3: Ucia kezhe a ye laa gun kinbo be (kaminan'e ga'tsu nan) Ucia kezhe a ye ku tinya baenio (efo kiyamae).

column2: "´And Allah has made the earth for you as a carpet (spread out)
column3: Soko ga yi Etsu nan ta kin ci ci ya ye. Paa rae nao.

column2: "´That ye may go about therein in spacious roads.´"
column3: Ebo ye de ba'e za'e fi mini eko u zhio nan dokun nan.

column2: Noah said: "O my Lord! They have disobeyed me but they follow (men) whose wealth and children give them no increase but only Loss.
column3: Annabi Nuhu gan: Tsoci akika za nan nan zhi'i a' zunma ce ta eko nan mie yi'a gan a be'a da nan. Acia emi tu ewo de cia zhi nanzhi ewo'a zhi to egi'azhi a be'a yandondo (eku boa) sai hassara nan

column2: "And they have devised a tremendous Plot.
column3: Acie jin makirinci ma'kirinci nan wancin sarauyin nan.

column2: "And they have said (to each other) ´Abandon not your gods: Abandon neither Wadd nor Suwa´ neither Yaguth nor Ya´uq nor Nasr´;-
column3: Nunsa'zhi cia gan ya'gan: e ga kara jin yarda ye'a gan' be kutie zhi' ma. E ga kpe ya be waddae ma ye mae ga kpe ya be kuti su'wa'ae ma to kuti yagusu to kuti ya'u'ka to kuti NASRA. (kpata ya' egwa sun'a gbanyin be jin jin bauta.

column2: "They have already misled many; and grant Thou no increase to the wrong-doers but in straying (from their mark)."
column3: Akika a ekun dondo yan zazhi ku fi egbin'o. Ebo acin'o (Soko) mie ba be wyo yin ga la yandondo be azwalumi zhi ma sai egbin be hallakae.

column2: Because of their sins they were drowned (in the flood) and were made to enter the Fire (of Punishment): and they found- in lieu of Allah- none to help them.
column3: Ebo iri lefi nanzhi a fe jin nan Tsoci a jin hallaka be nuwan yan (TUFANUI) Gancin Soko Soko cia ku fi enan'o. A ma de zandondo nan'a jin'a taimako baci Soko' nan'a.

column2: And Noah said: "O my Lord! Leave not of the Unbelievers a single one on earth!
column3: Annabi Nuhu ci ba adu'wa be Sokoe Tsoci ga lu emi ko nini gwa ya kafiri zhi ta eti kinbo ma.

column2: "For if Thou dost leave (any of) them they will but mislead Thy devotees and they will breed none but wicked ungrateful ones.
column3: Akika Soko wo ga kafirizhi ya kpe kinbo a ga wuzhi wyozhi ku fi egbin'o Zuriya'azhi ma ga' fe' lefi jin ci zhi kafirizhi.

column2: "O my Lord! Forgive me my parents all who enter my house in Faith and (all) believing men and believing women: and to the wrong-doers grant Thou no increase but in perdition!"
column3: Tsoci fa be mi yin Wyo mao fa be yanmanci mizhi'i Wyo mao fa be zandondo nan ga dan emi mi bo U ma yi mumini nan Wyo mao fa be Muminizhi'i kpata to bagi to inzagi. Wyo mao ga la yandondo be azwalumi zhi ma sai dai zunyesun be hallakae (to izhe to eku)

column2: Say: It has been revealed to me that a company of Jinns listened (to the Qur´an). They said ´We have really heard a wonderful Recital!
column3: Annabi Gan ya al'umma wo zhi gan: Tsoci jin wahyi ya Mi ke jama'a yan jannuzhi a shi tukpa ya (gbigba yan Alkur'anu nan) aci gan: Akika yi shi tukpa ya ka'tun Alkur'anu nan yi eyan mamaki u ma'e din hankali za nan.

column2: ´It gives guidance to the Right and we have believed therein: we shall not join (in worship) any (gods) with our Lord.
column3: (Alkur'anu) Wun'e jin zawangizhi shiri lo eko wangi ebo acin'o Yi'a imani jin be'u yin yi ma'a kaa ra la yandondo ko zandondo pa Soko nan yi Tsoci yi nan baci bea.

column2: ´And Exalted is the Majesty of our Lord: He has taken neither a wife nor a son.
column3: Akika Tsoci yi nan wancin nan Wun'a li ke aibu kpata lugwa. U de yin min'a U ma de egi'a.

column2: ´There were some foolish ones among us who used to utter extravagant lies against Allah;
column3: Akika ma a de wa-wa ndoci zhi fi mini yibo a'jin a fe gan gan naa -- iyaka gan nan eti Soko.

column2: ´But we do think that no man or spirit should say aught that untrue against Allah.
column3: Akika pa yinnan Yi kpa ye gan zawangi danbo ko aljani nan'a zun ganmanan ta Soko na'a.

column2: ´True there were persons among mankind who took shelter with persons among the Jinns but they increased them in folly.
column3: Akika a de zandoci zhi mini zawangizhio a'jin a fe wa cigbe yan etswa dagan eba aljani ndocihio Wuncin nan'e jin nan u be'a yandocia sai egbin be hallakae.

column2: ´And they (came to) think as ye thought that Allah would not raise up any one (to Judgment).
column3: Akika a de dan mini zawangi zhio kendo'e a de dan mini yetso jannuzhio'nan nanzhie jin za to ke Sokoa san zawangizhi ba ci ajali bo bea nan.

column2: ´And we pried into the secrets of heaven; but we found it filled with stern guards and flaming fires.
column3: Akika yi jannuzhi gun lo sanma yi ci da tsun a sanma she be mala'ikazhi nanzhie pa'u nan to enan nan'e jin za hallaka nan.

column2: ´We used indeed to sit there in (hidden) stations to (steal) a hearing; but any who listen now will find a flaming fire watching him in ambush.
column3: Akika ma yi yi be edunfe bazhi pa'a yin dan sanmao nan yi ya jin yi fe shitukpa egan zhi nan. Am ma; zaeni ndondo nan ga lo tukpa-shi-zhi gbani nan a ga'u jin hallaka ganni be ena'e.

column2: ´And we understand not whether ill is intended to those on earth or whether their Lord (really) intends to guide them to right conduct.
column3: Akika yi jannu zhi ma yi kpe'a ko Tsocie kpa sharri ndoci kpa be za nanzhi kpe kinbo nan kash wun'e kpakpa gan wun'a la'ake eko guru.

column2: ´There are among us some that are righteous and some the contrary: we follow divergent paths.
column3: Akika mini yi jannu zhio za guru zhi nanzhie sundan Soko nan danbo Ama de nanzhi e' sundan Sokoa nan. Akika Yi jannu zhi a fe eza ka-ka yin (Musulumizhi to kafirizhi).

column2: ´But we think that we can by no means frustrate Allah throughout the earth nor can we frustrate Him by flight.
column3: Yi ma' gaskiya ya ke zaeni ndondo gan Soko' gwa' kin' bo be'e ci yin'a na.

column2: ´And as for us since we have listened to the Guidance we have accepted it: and any who believes in his Lord has no fear either of a short (account) or of any injustice.
column3: Akika lokaci nan Yi wo bawu yan Alkur'ani nan yia imani jin beu yin Akika zandondo nan ga imani jin be Tsoci'u yin nan Wun'a sundan kike yan tsun'wan etun guru wun'a. U ma'a sundan bibe yan tsun wan etun dede'u zhia.

column2: ´Amongst us are some that submit their wills (to Allah) and some that swerve from justice. Now those who submit their wills - they have sought out (the path) of right conduct:
column3: Akika mini yibo a de Musulumi guru zhi (nan zhi'a kpatsun ta ya foro Soko ba'enio nan) a ma de eza kandan zhi fi mini yibo. Akika zandondo nan ga kpatsun ta ya foro Soko nan za wuncin zhi ga ta eti eko shiri bo.

column2: ´But those who swerve- they are (but) fuel for Hell-fire´-
column3: Akika za nanzhi a kan ke eko Soko lugwa nan a ga yi cigban tun yan jahanna mao.

column2: ´But those who swerve- they are (but) fuel for Hell-fire´-
column3: Akika za nanzhi a kan ke eko Soko lugwa nan a ga yi cigban tun yan jahanna mao.

column2: (And Allah´s Message is): "If they (the Pagans) had (only) remained on the (right) Way We should certainly have bestowed on them Rain in abundance.
column3: Da'acigan alittazhi a kpe-kpe gikini eti sharia Soko daa yi a ya' nuwan fin nan dokun nan.(U ga yi arziki nan dokun albarkao nao).

column2: "That We might try them by that (means). But if any turns away from the remembrance of his Lord He will cause him to undergo a severe Penalty.
column3: (Yi ga arziki la ya ye) Ebo yi ma ye yi cin'i le zandondo nan ga pan ya ke pi pa Tsociu lugwa nan Tsoci ga'u la'a dan mini azaba nanzhi tan sarauyin nan.

column2: "And the places of worship are for Allah (alone): So invoke not any one along with Allah;
column3: Akika dan nan nan zhi e' jin sujada dan nan (ke masallaci zhi nan) yan Soko gbu'ugi ayio ebo acin'o e ga fe da yi za ndoci ye a pa ma be Sokoe ma.

column2: "Yet when the Devotee of Allah stands forth to invoke Him they just make round him a dense crowd."
column3: Akika lokaci nan wuzhi Soko (Annabi Muhammadu) a ku gikini fe wun Soko (be kur'anu gba'e nan) jannu zhi fe'jin ke a ga mu bo'u nan.

column2: Say: "I do no more than invoke my Lord and I join not with Him any (false god)."
column3: Annabi Gan ya gan: Akika Tsoci mi gbu'ugi ga mie jin ba'uta ya'o. Mi ma la yandondo a pau bacia.

column2: Say: "I do no more than invoke my Lord and I join not with Him any (false god)."
column3: Annabi Gan ya gan: Akika Tsoci mi gbu'ugi ga mie jin ba'uta ya'o. Mi ma la yandondo a pau bacia.

column2: Say: "It is not in my power to cause you harm or to bring you to right conduct."
column3: Akika Mi (Annabi) mi kan gwa egu ndondo ya ye wo'a Mi ma la alhairi ndondo ya ye wo'a. (alamari zhi kpata to yan mi to yan ye fi egwa Soko).

column2: Say: "No one can deliver me from Allah (If I were to disobey Him) nor should I find refuge except in Him
column3: Annabi Gan ya' gan: zaeni ndondo miniebo U gan mi gwa wo ke azaba Soko lugwa'a Mi ma de eba zaeni ndondo a bici lo'a sai eba Soko.

column2: "Unless I proclaim what I receive from Allah and His Messages: for any that disobey Allah and His Messenger- for them is Hell: they shall dwell therein for ever."
column3: Yan'nan a ganmi gwa eba Soko nan U ga yi eyan wu da gan eba Soko be yan nanzhi'u laa tun mi tun fie nan. Akika zaeni ndondo nan ga'e le foro Soko be Tuci'u yin ba nan enan yan jahannama ga'jin tabbata yau a maa fi nin yin'u bo har abada.

column2: At length when they see (with their own eyes) that which they are promised- then will they know who it is that is weakest in (his) helper and least important in point of numbers.
column3: Efo nan (za nan zhie' la yan pa Soko ba ci nan) a ga azaba nan Sokoe jin'a alkawali nan le ye nan Fo wuncin a kpe za nan ga togbogun gan eba kagbo to eba ekundo nan.

column2: Say: "I know not whether the (Punishment) which ye are promised is near or whether my Lord will appoint for it a distant term.
column3: Annabi Gan ya' gan: Mi kpe akika yan efo nan Sokoe jin'e alkawali gan' wun'a be na'a ko yan nan Tsoba nan uyio kashi yan nan yi fo jin re nan uyio.

column2: "He (alone) knows the Unseen nor does He make any one acquainted with His Mysteries-
column3: Soko ga wun kpikpe yan nan'a so nan'o zandondo danbo nan kpe gaibu ye nan'a sai Soko.

column2: "Except a messenger whom He has chosen: and then He makes a band of watchers march before him and behind him
column3: Sai dai za nan U ga jin yarda ya mini Tucio nan. Uci ga mala'ika nanzhia fe tswau nan la'a dan'u yegboro to zun ma'o.

column2: "That He may know that they have (truly) brought and delivered the Messages of their Lord: and He surrounds (all the mysteries) that are with them and takes account of every single thing."
column3: Ebo Soko u  la'u wu halitta zhi ke Tucizhi a e yan yan Tsocia zhi wu ya za zhi nan. Soko ma'a alamari'a zhi kpata ma kezhe U ma kezhe yi be lisafi yandondoe gungunci

column2: O thou folded in garments!
column3: Ya wyoe Annabi na' a ede lakpe ba nan.

column2: Stand (to prayer) by night but not all night-
column3: A' nan kin dan jin jin ibadao be yeshi kpaata sai dai lokaci degi ga wo'a fa'o.

column2: Half of it- or a little less
column3: A gan-fi yeshi jin sallah kpaata. Ko ma u la'u gba gan fi yeshi de'gi.

column2: Or a little more; and recite the Qur´an in slow measured rhythmic tones.
column3: koma wo fe'o jin sallah'o dan lokaci nan a be ta eti gan-fi yeshio nan. Wo mao feo gba Alkur'anu gbi gba nan yi wangi nan.

column2: Soon shall We send down to thee a weighty Message.
column3: Akika yi (Soko)'a la kara yan  egan nan lukpin sarauyin nan ta wyoe.(kara adini).

column2: Truly the rising by night is most potent for governing (the soul) and most suitable for (framing) the Word (of Prayer and Praise).
column3: Akika ekin nan dan jin jin ibadao be yeshi'i Wun'e ya za yangban cin ta nan wancin. Uma jin dai dai gan eba eza nan eza'aba be Tsoci'u yin nae.

column2: True there is for thee by day prolonged occupation with ordinary duties:
column3: Akika wo yi be etun nanzhi'i dokun nan (eti eko lili yan Soko'); be yigidi'i.

column2: But keep in remembrance the name of thy Lord and devote thyself to Him whole-heartedly.
column3: Wyo mao dokun be yetun yan Tsoci'o yin Wyo mao la tacin'o tu baenio. Dan jin jin ibadao ya Soko.

column2: (He is) Lord of the East and the West: there is no god but He: take Him therefore for (thy) Disposer of Affairs.
column3: Tsoci nan wun mulki eyi lazhin nan to eyi lozun nan akika a de za ndoci ko yandoci nan kun'a cin a jin bauta ya na'a sai dai Soko. Ebo acin'o a gwa sun Soko gban yin.

column2: And have patience with what they say and leave them with noble (dignity).
column3: Wyo mao la hakuri'o jin be egan (banza) nanzhie gan nan wyo mao kpeo ya be'ayin kpikpeya nan yi wangi nan. (Ga jin'a zwalunci ma Wyo mao ga gia toko ma).

column2: And leave Me (alone to deal with) those in possession of the good things of life who (yet) deny the Truth; and bear with them for a little while.
column3: (Annabi) a Mi (Soko) ya ganni be za nanzhi'e yi alamari adini ganmanan nan ebo nan a yi be ni'ima izhe' nan wo mao pata'o ya'a de'gi (wo'a le yan nan Soko ajin bea yin nan ye).

column2: With Us are Fetters (to bind them) and a Fire (to burn them)
column3: Akika  Yia shiri yan kuruzhi (nan lukpin sarauyin nan) jin ka'a kiyamao to enan nan tan sarauyin nan.

column2: And a Food that chokes and a Penalty Grievous.
column3: To yangici dede nan'e yi gan (zakumu nan) ganna be azaba nan tan sarauyin nan.

column2: And a Food that chokes and a Penalty Grievous.
column3: To yangici dede nan'e yi gan (zakumu nan) ganna be azaba nan tan sarauyin nan.

column2: One Day the earth and the mountains will be in violent commotion. And the mountains will be as a heap of sand poured out and flowing down.
column3: (Efo kiyama) Efo u yio nan kin to patizhi a' fe du dudu yan iyaka nan. Patizhi ci ga zhe ke jikanna nan'a ku ye kan zhi-zhi nan. (wun'a de kagbo ndondo bea).

column2: We have sent to you (O men!) a messenger to be a witness concerning you even as We sent a messenger to Pharaoh.
column3: Akika Yia Tuci tun fi ye Ebo u la'u fe eri'u ya etun nanzhi ye'lo nan kendoe Yi tun Tuci fi Fir'auna na.

column2: But Pharaoh disobeyed the messenger; so We seized him with a heavy Punishment.
column3: Fir'auna cia le bawu yan Tuci (Soko) ba Yi ci'u wan win'wan nan yi kpantsuku nan.

column2: Then how shall ye if ye deny (Allah) guard yourselves against a Day that will make children hoary-headed-
column3: Ke ye'a be jin jin be kafirinci nan ye' jin be Sokoe nan' efo kiyama'e nan'o Efo wuncin nan (ebo ekpin lu'u bo) wun'e la dzakangizhi a yin tin yin bokun' nan'o

column2: Whereon the sky will be cleft asunder His Promise needs must be accomplished.
column3: Fo wuncin sanma ga'a ban-fi akika nan nan alkawali uyio nan ga' jin faruwa nan.

column2: Whereon the sky will be cleft asunder His Promise needs must be accomplished.
column3: Fo wuncin sanma ga'a ban-fi akika nan nan alkawali uyio nan ga' jin faruwa nan.

column2: Verily this is an Admonition: therefore whoso will let him take a (straight) path to his Lord!
column3: Akika nan nan tukpa pa tsa' U yio za nan u ga be ba nan U la gwa'u sun etun guru zhi u fe'u lo har da fo nan wun'a be be tsun Tsoci'u nan.

column2: Thy Lord doth know that thou standest forth (to prayer) nigh two-thirds of the night or half the night or a third of the night and so doth a party of those with thee. But Allah doth appoint night and day in due measure He knoweth that ye are unable to keep count thereof. So He hath turned to you (in mercy): read ye therefore of the Qur´an as much as may be easy for you. He knoweth that there may be (some) among you in ill-health; others travelling through the land seeking of Allah´s bounty; yet others fighting in Allah´s Cause read ye therefore as much of the Qur´an as may be easy (for you); and establish regular Prayer and give regular Charity; and loan to Allah a Beautiful Loan. And whatever good ye send forth for your souls ye shall find it in Allah´s Presence- yea better and greater in Reward and seek ye the Grace of Allah: for Allah is Oft-Forgiving Most Merciful.
column3: Akika Tsoci wyoe de kpikpe ke Wyoe nan kin jin ibada ke ekpa-lo yan kansan guba yan yeshii nan ka'ndoci ma kasan nini yan guta yan yeshi'i. Ganni be sashi za nan zhia imani jin be wo yin nan. Akika Soko ga wun iko eti ekpa-lo yan yeshi to igidi bo. Soko kpe ke ye de kagbo nan ye ga jin ibada yeshi'i kpata naa ebo acin'o wun'a sauki jin ya ye. Da gan gbani e' fe jin sallah yeshi to katun alkur'anu gwargwado kendoe u ga fan fie nan. Soko kpe ke aabe de za nanzhi'a wo maa miniebo nan (ebo acin'o a jin sallah yeshi wo'a) Ndocizhi ma'a fe jin kodagba za kpe eti kinbo a a fe wa arziki za dagan eba Soko ndocizhi ma a'fe jin jihadi dan kinbo ebo adini Soko'u la'u la'u tu. Ebo acin'o ejin Sallah yeshi be Alkur'anu gba'e gwargwado nan ga fan fie nan. Ye mae la salla farillazhie ku'egikini wangi ye mae fe wa zakka dukiya yezhi Ye mae fe la eyan wangi ye zhi Ye' la'e ma Soko (eti sadakao). Yandondo nan Ye ga la shidzo yan alhairi nan Ye'a be tsun'u eba Soko be egagba na wancin

column2: O thou wrapped up (in the mantle)!
column3: Ya wyoe nan'a ede yan katifa kpe ba nan (uga yi Annabi Muhammadu'o).

column2: Arise and deliver thy warning!
column3: A'nan kin wo da'o jin zawangizhi gangba.

column2: And thy Lord do thou magnify!
column3: Wo mao la cinwan be zankpe kpata'o ya Tsoci Wyoe. ( Ga sundan yandondo ko zandondo ma sai Soko).

column2: And thy garments keep free from stain!
column3: Wyo mao la tufuwa wyo zhio tadzu. U yi lili ci kandondo.

column2: And all abomination shun!
column3: Wyo mao la'o kpe o ya be kuti nanzhi kafiri zhie jin bauta ya nan.(zaeni ndond nan e jin kuti nan kafiri uyio).

column2: Nor expect in giving any increase (for thyself)!
column3: Wyoma'o ga twa'rya ya za fe tu yan nan gan wun cin nan ye be U yin ma.

column2: But for thy Lord´s (Cause) be patient and constant!
column3: Wyoma'o fe'o jin hakuri ebo Tsoci-o bo.

column2: Finally when the Trumpet is sounded
column3: Akika Efo nan a ga' busa be fi mini kafo'nan.

column2: That will be- that Day - a Day of Distress-
column3: Efo'wun cin akika efo nan lukpi u ma de wahala nan u yio.

column2: Far from easy for those without Faith.
column3: Ujin efo sawki wun'a yi ya kafiria.

column2: Leave Me alone (to deal) with the (creature) whom I created (bare and) alone!-
column3: Annabi a Mi (Soko) ya gan-ni be eza (shakki) wun cin nan Mi jin halitta'u gbu'u nan.

column2: To whom I granted resources in abundance
column3: Mi ci ke zhe'a dukiya nan do-kun nan la a ya u nan.

column2: And sons to be by his side!-
column3: To egi nan zhi do kun Soko ma'a lu gwa yau nan.

column2: And sons to be by his side!-
column3: To egi nan zhi do kun Soko ma'a lu gwa yau nan.

column2: To whom I made (life) smooth and comfortable!
column3: Mi ci a yan dondo yan izhe la a ya' u ba'e ni'o-nan.

column2: Yet is he greedy-that I should add (yet more);-
column3: Uci e ke zhe jin kwada-ri gan Min ya win bi be eti wuncin zhi o be-nan.

column2: By no means! For to Our Signs he has been refractory!
column3: Akika (Walidu egi Mugira) wun'a fe za nan e gbo ti ka be a ya Mi Sokoe nan.

column2: Soon will I visit him with a mount of calamities!
column3: Akika Mi ga'u po nan be enan nan tan saraw-yin nan'e.

column2: For he thought and he plotted;-
column3: Akika (Walidu) fe kpa ye de'de' eti yan nan wun'a gan eti Alkur'anu'o nan U ci a yan nan wun'a gan nan dan tsunwan.

column2: And woe to him! How he plotted!-
column3: La'a'nan yan Soko wun'a jin jin tabbata ya'U eti ye kpa de'de ' nan' u jin eti Alkur'anu' o nan.

column2: Yea Woe to him; How he plotted!-
column3: La'anan yan Soko u ke zhe'u la'u'jin tabbata eti u bo ebo yekpa de'de'nan ukpa eti Alkur'anu'o nan.

column2: hen he looked round;
column3: U ci ke zhe'a tunani ye jin.

column2: Then he frowned and he scowled;
column3: U ci a 'fuska u yin ci'u fin'gban yin.

column2: Then said he: "This is nothing but magic derived from of old;
column3: U ci gan:Akika Alkur'anu nan nan shiri tsa u yio nan Muhammado'e da -- be eba za gbako zhi'o nanzhie man yan nan.

column2: Then said he: "This is nothing but magic derived from of old;
column3: U ci gan:Akika Alkur'anu nan nan shiri tsa u yio nan Muhammado'e da -- be eba za gbako zhi'o nanzhie man yan nan.

column2: Then he turned back and was haughty;
column3: U ci a zunma zhe ta U ci fe wo ti'u san.

column2: "This is nothing but the word of a mortal!"
column3: Akika Alkur'anu nan nan egan mi sun za wangi u yio.

column2: Soon will I cast him into Hell-Fire!
column3: Mi ga'u la'a dan enan yan sakaru'o.

column2: And what will explain to thee what Hell-Fire is
column3: Annabi ki'I ma a ya wyoe kpikpe yan enan'nan e' yi gan sakaru nan-o

column2: Naught doth it permit to endure and naught doth it leave alone!-
column3: Wun'e'ya yan ndondo nan ga gun nini' yun'u bo na'a U ma'a U ma'a lu'u gwa u' tsu'a.

column2: Darkening and changing the colour of man!
column3: Enan kike ci u yio nan'e gi epa yan nan-kan za nan.

column2: Over it are Nineteen.E
column3: ti enan wun cin'o Malaika guwo be gu twani kpe bo.

column2: And We have set none but angels as Guardians of the Fire; and We have fixed their number only as a trial for Unbelievers- in order that the People of the Book may arrive at certainty and the Believers may increase in Faith- and that no doubts may be left for the People of the Book and the Believers and that those in whose hearts is a disease and the Unbelievers may say "What symbol doth Allah intend by this" Thus doth Allah leave to stray whom He pleaseth and guide whom He pleaseth: and none can know the forces of thy Lord except He and this is no other than a warning to mankind.
column3: Akika za nan zhi yi la gan a'fe'a tswa enan nan Mala'ika zhi a yio Adadia'a (za shi din nni) nan yi tun ye nan fitana tsa u yi ya kafiri zhio Ebo za nan zhi'a la litafi ya nan a be gaskiya ya (be Annabi to Alkur'anu U ma'u la u fe bibe yan imani'u' ya Muminizhi. A ma'a ga fe jin kelo-ke-zhi (dan adadi yan Mula'ika zhio ma)

column2: Nay verily: By the Moon
column3: Akika  Mi e zhi kuti be etswa e.

column2: And by the Night as it retreateth
column3: To'ye shi lokaci nan u ga zunma zhe ta nan.

column2: And by the Dawn as it shineth forth-
column3: To la'zhin lokaci nan eba ga'tin nan..

column2: This is but one of the mighty (portents)
column3: Akika enan yan Jahannama Masiba nan wan-cin nan u yio.

column2: A warning to mankind-
column3: Gangba wanciko u yio ya halitta zhi (ebo za'e ni ndondo u tswa Soko).

column2: To any of you that chooses to press forward or to follow behind;-
column3: Ya za na gae wa mini e bo gan wun'u de tsonba Soko (be etun guru zhi'I nan) ko u la'u kpe'u ya be Soko e (be etun zunubi zhi nan).

column2: Every soul will be (held) in pledge for its deeds.
column3: Akika rayi ndondo yan-nan-zhi u ga Jin'nan a wu yan ya'u.

column2: Except the Companions of the Right Hand.
column3: Sai dai Muminizhi (akika aga 'tso guri).

column2: (They will be) in Gardens (of Delight): they will question each other
column3: A fi mini aljannan zhio a fe gbin do zhi gan>

column2: And (ask) of the Sinners:
column3: A'fe gbin le-fi jin-ci-zhi gan. (egan gbin yan tsa ma).

column2: "What led you into Hell Fire"Kii la ye gan dan enan yan sakaru bo
They will say: "We were not of those who prayed;
column3: Egi mi nan-zhi ci'a gan gan: Yi fe dan mini za nanzhi e tswa jin jin sallah nan boa.

column2: "Nor were we of those who fed the indigent;
column3: Yi ma'e ya'talaka zhi yan gi ci gi'a.

column2: "Nor were we of those who fed the indigent;
column3: Yi ma'e ya'talaka zhi yan gi ci gi'a.

column2: "But we used to talk vanities with vain talkers;
column3: Yi ma fe le izhe eti ganmanan'o be edzo dzo'e gan ni be eza egbin zhi'i.

column2: "And we used to deny the Day of Judgment
column3: Yi ma fe yi alamari efo alkiyami ganma-nan.

column2: "Until there came to us (the Hour) that is certain."
column3: Eti hali de'de' wun cin ga bo yi kpe'o har ajali ci be la yi yio.

column2: Then will no intercession of (any) intercessors profit them.
column3: Ebo a cin'o gwa' tan yan za nan zhi a tan gwa nan wun'a jin'a anfani'a.

column2: Then what is the matter with them that they turn away from admonition-
column3: Ki jin'a o Aci'a jin a fe bici wa'zi yan gaskiyao

column2: As if they were affrighted asses
column3: Wo'a ye gan ko (kafiri zhi to le fi jin ci zhi tyatyagizhi yio nan zhi a jin firgita nan.

column2: As if they were affrighted asses
column3: Wo'a ye gan ko (kafiri zhi to le fi jin ci zhi tyatyagizhi yio nan zhi a jin firgita nan.

column2: Fleeing from a lion!
column3: Nan zhi e bici da gan egun yan gaba'o nan.

column2: Forsooth each one of them wants to be given scrolls (of revelation) spread out!
column3: Ka shii Za eni ndondo mini (kafiri zhio to munafiki zhi) e wa wa gan a' cin wahyi'a be'a ya'a.

column2: By no means! But they fear not the Hereafter
column3: Akika a fe za nan zhi'e' sundan efo zo-ba'naa.

column2: By no means! But they fear not the Hereafter
column3: Akika a fe za nan zhi'e' sundan efo zo-ba'naa.

column2: Nay this surely is an admonition:
column3: Akika Alkur'anu tukpa pa wan ciko u yio.

column2: Let any who will keep it in remembrance!
column3: Za nan'u ga ba nan u la gwa'u sun'u gban-yin.

column2: But none will keep it in remembrance except as Allah wills: He is the Lord of Righteousness and the Lord of Forgiveness.
column3: Za wan-gi-zhi ma a'shi tukpa ya wa'azi Alkur'anu'a sai za nan ga ba Sokonan ga yi Etsu nan -- yin za ndondo'a sun-dan'u nan-o Wun'ga ma yi Etsu nan fa be ezae wo nan-o.

column2: I do call to witness the Resurrection Day;
column3: Mie zhi kuti be efo kiyama'e

column2: And I do call to witness the self-reproaching spirit: (Eschew Evil).
column3: Mi (Soko) ma'e zhi kuti be rayi nan'a jin'u fe jin titacin'u zargi nan.

column2: Does man think that We cannot assemble his bones
column3: Kashi zawangi'e kpaye kpa gan Yi (Soko) la ku-ku yekan dan tsukun'u zhio woa

column2: Nay We are able to put together in perfect order the very tips of his fingers.
column3: Akika Mi (Soko) gboka nan Yi ga to egwa gin'gini'u zhi ye jin dai dai nan.

column2: But man wishes to do wrong (even) in the time in front of him.
column3: Akika zawangi e' wa gan wun'fe'u lotun dede'u lo. U ma'u la efo wanciko nan dan yegboro'u bo nan'u yi ganmanan.

column2: He questions: "When is the Day of Resurrection"
column3: Ucie gbin gan gan: Fo ci ajin kiyamao

column2: At length when the sight is dazed
column3: Efo nan eye zawangizhia fe sa nan nan. (Uci ga'zhi).

column2: At length when the sight is dazed
column3: Efo nan eye zawangizhia fe sa nan nan. (Uci ga'zhi).

column2: And the moon is buried in darkness.
column3: haske yan etswa ci da'u da nan. (eba ciga' shizhiko).

column2: And the sun and moon are joined together-
column3: Aci ga igidi to Etswa ku yekan nan.

column2: That Day will Man say: "Where is the refuge"
column3: Zawangi fo wuncin Wun'a fe gan gan: bai Yi'a da ci gan gwa'o

column2: By no means! No place of safety!
column3: A'a bandondo danbo nan yia lo ci gangwa na'a.

column2: By no means! No place of safety!
column3: A'a bandondo danbo nan yia lo ci gangwa na'a.

column2: Before thy Lord (alone) that Day will be the place of rest.
column3: Zoba yan alamari zandondo fo wuncin u dan be Tsoci wyo yin.

column2: That Day will Man be told (all) that he put forward and all that he put back.Fo wuncin a' ya zandondo labari yan etun nanzhi u lo shidzo nan to nanzhi u lugwa u lo'a nan.
Nay man will be evidence against himself
column3: Fo wuncin zandondo a le iri etun nanzhi u lo kpata nan ye.

column2: Even though he were to put up his excuses.
column3: Ka' eza ma ga uzuri'u zhi ta fo wuncin a'shi tukpa ya wun'a.

column2: Move not thy tongue concerning the (Qur´an) to make haste therewith.
column3: (Annabi) ga fe jin mini' wyoe bauta be gbi gba yan Alkur'anui elo be zhin'i ma. Wyo mao ga dinye be ku ku fi ti'u yin ma.

column2: It is for Us to collect it and to promulgate it:
column3: Akika Yi ga'u ku yekan fi yangban wyo bo.Yi ma ga gbigba'u -- tswa ya wyoe.

column2: But when We have promulgated it follow thou its recital (as promulgated):
column3: Kaminan Malaika jibreelu ga'e gba'u ya wyo nan a mi tu kendoe u gae gba'u nan.

column2: Nay more it is for Us to explain it (and make it clear):
column3: Kanga gancin to bayani'u zhi Yi ga'u jin ya wyoe.

column2: Nay (ye men!) but ye love the fleeting life
column3: A'a akika ekundondo yan zawangizhi e wa izhe nan fan'yinzo nan.

column2: And leave alone the Hereafter.
column3: Ye' ma'a alamari kiyama baci zunmao.

column2: Some faces that Day will beam (in brightness and beauty);-
column3: Fuska yan muminizhi a fe jin haske fo wuncin.

column2: Looking towards their Lord;
column3: Aci'a fe cin (Soko) Tsoci'a le.

column2: And some faces that Day will be sad and dismal
column3: Fuska yan zandoci zhi ma ga shizhiko.

column2: In the thought that some back-breaking calamity was about to be inflicted on them;
column3: A' fe tuye gan acin masiba wanciko nan'e ban tsukun zunma nan ta'a.

column2: Yea when (the soul) reaches to the collar-bone (in its exit)
column3: A'a akika lokaci nan rayi zawangi ga'a tun mako-- ro nan.

column2: And there will be a cry "Who is a magician (to restore him)"
column3: kanga eza'u zhi a fe gan gan: Zi'i kpe cigbe ye wangi nan'a sa batan nan nan nan'o

column2: And he will conclude that it was (the Time) of Parting;
column3: Kanga wun tso nan yi be batan'e nan U ga gaskiya ya ke wun' ga' gan be izhe nan.

column2: And one leg will be joined with another:
column3: Bici rogbo'u zhi ci ga' la-ba dozhi.

column2: That Day the Drive will be (all) to thy Lord!
column3: E zan nan dan bici'u bo 'fo wuncin nan sai eba Tsoci wyo bo wun'a da cin'o.(ko Aljanna ko enan).

column2: So he gave nothing in charity nor did he pray!-
column3: Egi mi nanzhi a ya'gaskiya be Alkur'anu yan'a a ma' tswa' jin jin yan salla'a.Surah 75:32  But on the contrary he rejected Truth and turned away!Akika wun'a Alkur'anu yi ganmana. Ucia zunma zheta bawu Soko.

column2: Then did he stalk to his family in full conceit!
column3: Kanga gancin U ci fe dazan alfahri dan tacin eza'u zhio.

column2: Woe to thee (O men!) yea woe!
column3: Hallaka wun'a jin tabbata ta eti wyo bo. Hallaka wuncin ma'a -- ' wo yin.

column2: Again Woe to thee (O men!) yea woe!
column3: Hallaka wanciko ndoci be wun'a jin tabbata ta eti'o bo. Hallaka wuncin man'a -- 'yin.

column2: Does man think that he will be left uncontrolled (without purpose)
column3: Zawangi'e' kpa ye kpa gan Soko u la wun'u ya'ke 'banza' nan

column2: Was he not a drop of sperm emitted (in lowly form)
column3: A' sha ujin dagan mani'i bo a jin hallita' wun'a

column2: Then did he become a leech-like clot; then did (Allah) make and fashion (him) in due proportion.
column3: Kanga Uci bea zhe egya tsuntsun ci Soko cia hallita'u jin wangi a

column2: And of him He made two sexes male and female.
column3: Dagan mini mani'i bo Soko cia hallita zhi jin eba be yiwoe.

column2: Has not He (the same) the power to give life to the dead
column3: A sha Etsu nan jin aninga nan U de kagbo nan U ga eyan' tsu tsuci dan rayi na

column2: Has there not been over Man a long period of Time when he was nothing - (not even) mentioned
column3: Akika lokaci be shidzo batsozhio nan zawangi u 'y yandondo nan'a tunye naa na.

column2: Verily We created Man from a drop of mingled sperm in order to try him: So We gave him (the gifts) of Hearing and Sight.
column3: Akika Yia halitta yan zawangi jin dagan nuwan yan mani'i bo nan'a bo keba (tsakani bagi be inzagi'i nan). Ebo ma yi'i ma wun'i cin'ile Yi ciu ya tukpa yan gan wo Yi ci kezhe'u ya eye nan'u ga cin ba le nan.

column2: We showed him the Way: whether he be grateful or ungrateful (rests on his will).
column3: Yi ma' zawangi wuba lo eko nan tso yi gboro nan U ga bau u la'u fe za nan'e jin yebo ya Soko nan(be emi latu foro'u yin) U ga bau U lau cin mannan'ubo be Sokoe (U fe'u le umurni Soko u ba).

column2: For the Rejecters we have prepared chains yokes and a blazing Fire.
column3: Akika Yia shiri jin ka kafirizhi be dzari'i to kuru to enan yan Sa'iru'i.

column2: As to the Righteous they shall drink of a Cup (of Wine) mixed with Kafur-
column3: Akika eza kirkizhi a fe fin nuwan mannan gizhi nan a zhin keba be kafuru'i nan.

column2: A Fountain where the Devotees of Allah do drink making it flow in unstinted abundance.
column3: (Kafur'nan nan) nuwan mannan gi uyio nan wuzhi Soko guru zhi a fe de yan'a fin kandondo nan.

column2: They perform (their) vows and they fear a Day whose evil flies far and wide.
column3: Za nanzhie la tun lo eti emi nanzhi a ga she be Soko enan. A maajin a fe' sundan efo nan sharri'u dokun nan. (Efo kiyama dan'o nan).

column2: They perform (their) vows and they fear a Day whose evil flies far and wide.
column3: Za nanzhie la tun lo eti emi nanzhi a ga she be Soko enan. A maajin a fe' sundan efo nan sharri'u dokun nan. (Efo kiyama dan'o nan).

column2: And they feed for the love of Allah the indigent the orphan and the captive-
column3: A ma'a jin a fe' la yangici ya eza gwagbagizhi be ekungi zhi to za nanzhi a ga wan ekunda'o nan alhali'I ma'a tso yi be bukatau yin.

column2: (Saying)"We feed you for the sake of Allah alone: no reward do we desire from you nor thanks.
column3: (Acia jin a fe' gan'gan): Akika Yi ye' ya ye yangici yagi ebo wiwa yan yarda Soko. Yi mae wa egagba ndoci ko yebo jin dagan eba ye boa.

column2: "We only fear a Day of distressful Wrath from the side of our Lord."
column3: Akika Yie sundan azaba dagan eba Tsoci yibo yan efo nan fuska ekundondo zazhi ga'a shizhiko nan Efo nan lukpin sarauyin nan.

column2: But Allah will deliver them from the evil of that Day and will shed over them a Light of Beauty and (blissful) Joy.
column3: Soko ci'a gan' gwa be sharri yan efo wuncin Ucia la gun be haske ganni be yangban fa'e.

column2: And because they were patient and constant He will reward them with a Garden and (garments of) silk.
column3: Soko cia egagba wangi la'a yaa yan aljanna be tufuwa yan silki zhi'i ebo hakuri nan a fe' jin eti emi latu foro Soko nan.

column2: Reclining in the (Garden) on raised thrones they will see there neither the sun´s (excessive heat) nor (the moon´s) excessive cold.
column3: Aci ga kpetso ta eti gadoa zhio mini aljanna'o a'wo ba nan gun'a ama'a wo bayeko tsuntsun nua.

column2: And the shades of the (Garden) will come low over them and the bunches (of fruit) there will hang low in humility.
column3: Wuru yan cigban aljannazhi ga'a tso ba'a aci ga to yangici sun-sun'u zhi la'zhin kin baenio.

column2: And amongst them will be passed round vessels of silver and goblets of crystal-
column3: A ma'a fe man'a kezhe be evo yan azarfa zhi'i (yan yangici mannangi zhi) to kopu zhi nan zhie ban nan nan.

column2: Crystal-clear made of silver: they will determine the measure thereof (according to their wishes).
column3: Evo wuncin zhi a jin-a-jin' be azarfae aci'u dan tsunwan be gwargwado bukata zandondoe.

column2: And they will be given to drink there of a Cup (of Wine) mixed with Zanjabil
column3: -A ma'a kezhe ya' nuwan egye mannagi zhi fin Nuwan egye wuncin a zhin'u zhin ke ba be "zanjabi'la'e".(Zanjabi'ila nuwan yan ekan' uyio nan ela yangici de ekan sarauyin nan).

column2: A fountain there called Salsabil.
column3: Nuwan ndoci ke' danbo nan e yi gan salsabi'ila nan. (nan egi aljanna zhi a de fin nan).

column2: And round about them will (serve) youths of perpetual (freshness): If thou seest them thou wouldst think them scattered Pearls.
column3: Egi wawagi ndoci zhi afe ma'egi mi aljanna zhi kezhe (egi wuncin zhi a ga jin tabbata ta eti dzakan bo'a bo be egye'a bo. Wyo ga la eye cin'a le Wyoa ye gan ko alulu'izhio nan'a gaya zhi-zhi nan.

column2: And when thou lookest it is there thou wilt see a Bliss and a Realm Magnificent.
column3: Wyo ga' yan nanzhi fi aljanna'o nan leye wyo'a le eyan ni'ima iri-iri zhi ye ganni be mulki nan wanci sarauyin nan.

column2: Upon them will be green Garments of fine silk and heavy brocade and they will be adorned with Bracelets of silver; and their Lord will give to them to drink of a Wine Pure and Holy.
column3: Tufuwa' nan tso latu gan nanu ga yi yan silikio nuwan aliga U mae ban nan. Aci ga'a panin be azarfa zhi. Baci wuncin'o acia ke zhe ya'a nuwan lilici zhi fin.

column2: "Verily this is a Reward for you and your Endeavour is accepted and recognised."
column3: Akika egagba nan nan zhi kpata yan ye' ayio. Akika etun nanzhi ye fe lo izheo nan Sokoa yarda jin bea yin.

column2: It is We Who have sent down the Qur´an to thee by stages.
column3: Akika Yi ga cin Alkur'anu be ya wyo nini nini'o.

column2: It is We Who have sent down the Qur´an to thee by stages.Akika Yi ga cin Alkur'anu be ya wyo nini nini'o.
Therefore be patient with constancy to the Command of thy Lord and hearken not to the sinner or the ingrate among them.
column3: (Annabi) a hakuri jin be hukunci nanzhi Tsoci wyoe la ya wyo nan. Wyo mao ga la mitu za nanzhie' le Soko ba to kafirizhi na ma.

column2: And celebrate the name of thy Lord morning and evening
column3: Wyo mao fe'o dokun be yetuu yan Tsoci Wyo yin to lazhin to lozun.

column2: And part of the night prostrate thyself to Him; and glorify Him a long night through.
column3: Eye gaashi fe dokun be jin jin yan sujadae Wyo mao feo li Soko lokaci nan lokpa nan dan mini yeshio.

column2: As to these they love the fleeting life and put away behind them a Day (that will be) hard.
column3: Akika (kafirizhi to munafikizhi) za wuncin zhi kpata izhe nan fan'yin zo nan ugae'e' de cin cin yao acia efo nan tso lukpin sarauyin nan yaci zunmao

column2: It is We Who created them and We have made their joints strong; but when We will We can substitute the like of them by a complete change.
column3: Yi ga jin alitta'a o Yicia' kagbo laa dan gaba-gaba zhio. U ga ba Yi Yi ga jin hallaka Yici ga zandoci zhi jin (nanzhia fe jin bauta ya Soko nan).

column2: It is We Who created them and We have made their joints strong; but when We will We can substitute the like of them by a complete change.
column3: Yi ga jin alitta'a o Yicia' kagbo laa dan gaba-gaba zhio. U ga ba Yi Yi ga jin hallaka Yici ga zandoci zhi jin (nanzhia fe jin bauta ya Soko nan).

column2: This is an admonition: Whosoever will let him take a (straight) Path to his Lord.
column3: Akika aya nan nan zhi tukpa pa ayio za nan'u ga ba nan ula gwa'u sun etun guruzhi'u fe'ulo U ma'u ta eti eko nan Tsociu la cici nan.

column2: But ye will not except as Allah wills; for Allah is full of Knowledge and Wisdom.
column3: Yandondo nan ma gae ba ye nan sai u ga ba Soko shidzo bedzo. Akika Soko Etsu kpikpe uyio. Egba u ma yi dan jin jin yandondo bo.

column2: He will admit to His Mercy whom He will; But the wrong-doers- for them has He prepared a grievous Penalty.
column3: Sokoa jin u la za nan ga bau na aa gandan mini yegun'u bo Soko ma shiri yan azaba nan tan nan jin ka

column2: By the (Winds) sent forth one after another (to man´s profit);
column3: Sokoe zhi kuti be efe (azaba) nanzhi a jin a fe la mitu dozhi nan.

column2: Which then blow violently in tempestuous Gusts
column3: U mae zhi kuti be efe (azaba) nan a jin'u fe ku be kagboe nan.

column2: And scatter (things) far and wide;
column3: U mae zhi kuti be mala'ikauzhi nanzhia jin a fe gan rahama Soko lo bandondo nan.

column2: Then separate them one from another
column3: U mae zhe kuti be malaika nan'e la wahayi lo da ya Annabi zhi nan Ucie la gaskiya kperi be ganmanae nan.

column2: Then spread abroad a Message
column3: U mae zhi kuti be mala'ika nan'e la tukpapa lo da ya Annabi zhi nan.

column2: Whether of Justification or of Warning;-
column3: Ebo uzuri ndoci nan dan be ayin nan ko ebo gangba be ewun nan'e.

column2: Assuredly what ye are promised must come to pass.
column3: Akika yan nanzhi Sokoe la jin ye alkawali nan kpatau gaa jin faruwa.

column2: Then when the stars become dim;
column3: Lokaci nan a ga haske yan tswangi zhi kpata fin-ya nan.

column2: When the heaven is cleft asunder;
column3: Lokaci nan a ga to sanma ban fi nan.

column2: When the mountains are scattered (to the winds) as dust;
column3: Lokaci nan patizhi to takun zhi kpata ga'la ruku nan.

column2: And when the messengers are (all) appointed a time (to collect);-
column3: Kaminan a ga lokaci ba ya Tuci Soko ndondo nan. (ebo egan nan a gbin'a nan).

column2: For what Day are these (portents) deferred
column3: Ebo ki'ibo Soko cia pi pata la'a dan Efo wuncin'oS

column2: For what Day are these (portents) deferred
column3: Ebo ki'ibo Soko cia pi pata la'a dan Efo wuncin'o

column2: For the Day of Sorting out.
column3: Uyi ebo efo eri kpe'o. (Efo nan a ga gaskiya kperi be ganmanan'e nan.

column2: And what will explain to thee what is the Day of Sorting out
column3: Ki'i ma a ya Wyoe kpikpe yan akika efo nan e yi gan efo eri kpe nan'o

column2: Ah woe that Day to the Rejecters of Truth!
column3: Azaba yan hallaka wun'a jin tabbata ya za nanzhi a alamari addini (musulumci) la ganmanan na fo wuncin.

column2: Did We not destroy the men of old (for their evil)
column3: Ngba eza mafari nanzhi shidzo be le'fi Sokoe nan Yi jin'a hallaka'a

column2: So shall We make later (generations) follow them.
column3: Aci ga ga Yia be'a hallaka la'a gba za zuma'azhi zunmao.(atso ga'fe za nanzhi e le Soko ba nan).

column2: Thus do We deal with men of sin.
column3: Acinga ga Yi' a jin yi-jin be za nan zhie le umurni Soko ba nan' yin'o.

column2: Ah woe that Day to the Rejecters of Truth!
column3: Azaba yan hallaka wun'a jin tabbata ya za nanzhia alamari adinni musulunci yi ganmanan nan fo wuncin.

column2: Have We not created you from a fluid (held) despicable-
column3: A sha Yi jin alitta ye jin dagan nuwan gbigba ci boa

column2: The which We placed in a place of rest firmly fixed
column3: Yi ci'a mani'i la'a fi mini eba ndoci'o nan de aminci nan(u ga yi ewan'o).

column2: For a period (of gestation) determined (according to need)
column3: Har da lokaci ndoci nan yi eyan kpikpeci eba Soko'o nan.

column2: For We do determine (according to need); for We are the best to determine (things).
column3: Yi cia iko la'a wu ma'adanla be Etsu nan wun iko u ma de kagbo eti jin jin yandondo nan.

column2: Ah woe that Day! to the Rejecters of Truth!
column3: Azaba yan hallaka wun'ajin tabbata fo wun cim ta eti za zhi e la alamari adini musulunci ganmanan nan.

column2: Have We not made the earth (as a place) to draw together.
column3: A sha Yi la kin nan nan wun'a fe danna yan kuku kan ye yea'

column2: The living and the dead
column3: Za nan zhi'I yi be rayi'I nan a kpe ti kinbo. Za nan zhi'I a tsu'a ni nanfi nini yan kin bo.

column2: And made therein mountains standing firm lofty (in stature); and provided for you water sweet (and wholesome)
column3: Yi ci a pati nan zhi wan-cin nan la'a ta fo wuncin ta eti za nan zhi e' la alamari wangi nan man nan fin.

column2: Ah woe that Day to the Rejecters of Truth!
column3: Azaba yan hallaka wun'a jin tabbata fo wuncin ta eti za nan zhi e' la alamari adini musulunci ganmana nan.

column2: (It will be said:) "Depart ye to that which ye used to reject as false!
column3: Acia gan'a gan: e be da tsun azaba jahannama nan ye fe' yi ganmanan izhe'o nan.

column2: "Depart ye to a Shadow (of smoke ascending) in three columns
column3: E fe' lo da gan dan mini wuru yan enan jahannamao nan'a kpe fi gwa la guta nan.

column2:
(Which yields) no shade of coolness and is of no use against the fierce Blaze.,Wuru' uyio nan de anfani ndondoa nan. U ma kan gwa enan azaba woa.
Surah 77:32 ,  Indeed it throws about sparks (huge) as Forts
column3: Enan wuncin wun'a jin u fe' ce enan cikara yipa zhi nan cinwan'azhi yi ke eban wanciko nan a tu gikini nan.

column2: "As if there were (a string of) yellow camels (marching swiftly)."
column3: Enan cikara yipa wuncin cia fe bici tinya jahannamao ke ra'akun ya'ran zhi nan.

column2: Ah woe that Day to the Rejecters of Truth!
column3: Azaba yan hallaka wun'ajin tabbata fo wuncin ta eti za nanzhi e'la alamari adini Musulunci ganmanan nan.

column2: That will be a Day when they shall not be able to speak.
column3: Yinnan nan nan efo uyio nan egi mi nanzhi a de egan ndondo gan'a nan'o.

column2: Nor will it be open to them to put forth pleas.
column3: A' ya'a izini yan egan gan'o tso'a a cia gan gan' uzuri ndocia.

column2: Ah woe that Day to the Rejecters of Truth!
column3: Azaba yan hallaka wun'ajin tabbata fo' wuncin ta eti za nanzhi e la alamari adini Musulunci ganmanan nan.

column2: That will be a Day of Sorting out! We shall gather you together and those before (you)!
column3: Yinnan ga yi efo eri kpe tsakani gaskiya be ganmanan yin'o Yi maa' Ye kuye kan'a ni ganni be za mafari zhi.(ebo egagbao).

column2: Now if ye have a trick (or plot) use it against Me!
column3: Ye ga de tanadi ndoci de nan yea jin be mi yin nan e jin be yi le ye.

column2: Ah woe that Day to the Rejecters of Truth!
column3: Azaba yan hallaka wun'a jin tabbata fo wuncin ta eti za nanzhi e' la alamari adini musulunci ganmanan nan

column2: As to the Righteous they shall be amidst (cool) shades and springs (of water).
column3: Akika za nanzhie sundan Soko a mae tswa umurni'u zhi nan a fi mini wuru'o ganni be nuwan mannan gi zhi.

column2: And (they shall have) fruits- all they desire.To yangici mari-mari zhi nan zhi a' ga de shahawa a nan.
"Eat ye and drink ye to your heart´s content: for that ye worked (Righteousness).
column3: Acia gan'a gan: e fe gi ye man'e' fe fin yangban fa a yi ya ye yeo ebo iri etun wangi nanzhi ye fe' lo izheo nan.

column2: Thus do We certainly reward the Doers of Good.
column3: Akika acinga' ga yi'a jin Yie la egagba wanciko ya za nanzhi gae lotun wangi nao.

column2: Ah woe that Day to the Rejecters of Truth!
column3: Azaba yan hallaka wun'a jin tabbata fo wuncin ta eti za nanzhi e' la alamari adini musulunci ganmanan nan'o.

column2: (O ye unjust!) Eat ye and enjoy yourselves (but) a little while for that ye are Sinners.
column3: A'ci a' gan ya egi mi nanzhi gan: e' fe' gi yannanzhi ga ba ye nan izheo ye man'e fe wo man kendoe ga bae nan izheo akika yandondo nan ga dan egwa e' bo nan tetengi uyio. Ebo nan lefi jinci zhi ye yio. Zobae ma yi enan.

column2: Ah woe that Day to the Rejecters of Truth!
column3: Azaba yan hallaka wun'a jin tabbata fo wuncin ta eti za nanzhi la alamari adini musulunci ganmanan nan.

column2: And when it is said to them "Prostrate yourselves!" they do not so.
column3: Ama ga'e gan ya' gan: e' dakpya ya Soko eba jin jin yan sallao e' ye'gan a dakpyaa.

column2: Ah woe that Day to the Rejecters of Truth!
column3: Azaba yan hallaka wun'a jin tabbata fo wuncin ta eti za nanzhie' la alamari adini musulunci ganmanan nan.

column2: Then what Message after that will they believe in
column3: Ka gan zawangi ya gaskiya be egan Alkur'anu yin'a egan yan litafi ki ci ke wun'a ya gaskiya be yin'

column2: Concerning what are they disputing
column3: Eti kibo kafirizhi egbin dozhi gan kandondo'o

column2: Concerning the Great News
column3: Uyi eti labari na gbo uman wancin sarauyin nan.

column2: About which they cannot agree.
column3: A' cia fe zanazhie gbomi be dozhi etiubo nan.

column2: Verily they shall soon (come to) know!
column3: A'a (alamari Soko yi acin'a) ammaa yea be de kpikpe.

column2: Verily verily they shall soon (come to)
column3: know!Gaskiya uyio bele yin yea be de kpikpe.

column2: Have We not made the earth as a wide expanse
column3: Asa ujin yi gata kin cici ya ye para yin'a

column2: And the mountains as pegs
column3: Yi'ma'a patizhi kangikini be kagboe yin'a

column2: And (have We not) created you in pairs
column3: Yimma' alitta ye jin eba be yiwo yin'a

column2: And made your sleep for rest
column3: Yima ele leye jin cia fe efa ya rayi ye ya'a

column2: And made the night as a covering
column3: Yima' yeshi jin cia fe asiri swo ya ye ya'a

column2: And made the day as a means of subsistence
column3: Yima Yigidi jin cia fe lokaci yangici wa ya ye ya'a

column2: And (have We not) built over you the seven firmaments
column3: Yima' kezhea saman gutwaba tuta fiti yebo be kagbo yin'a

column2: And placed (therein) a Light of Splendour
column3: Yima yigidi jin wun'a fe haske wangi ya ye ya'a.

column2: And placed (therein) a Light of Splendour
column3: Yima yigidi jin wun'a fe haske wangi ya ye ya'a.

column2: And do We not send down from the clouds water in abundance
column3: Yima'e du ele na dokun na be ya ye dagan shishi nyan sanma'o.

column2: That We may produce therewith corn and vegetables
column3: Ebo yii la yangici lati yezhi'u tin'u yau ya ye.Surah 78:16 And gardens of luxurious growthEbo cigban to fini lati yezhi ulau gye wangi.

column2: Verily the Day of Sorting out is a thing appointed
column3: Akika efo egagba efo uyio na yibe lokaciu yin nan.

column2: The Day that the Trumpet shall be sounded and ye shall come forth in crowds;
column3: Efo uyio na a be busa fi mini kafo'o nan zawangizhi cia fe tinya kabario jama'a-jama'azhi.

column2: And the heavens shall be opened as if there were doors
column3: Aciga sanma kpe u ci ga' sa eko ekozhi

column2: And the mountains shall vanish as if they were a mirage.
column3: Aciga patizhi to takunzhi la'azhe ke rungba nan.

column2: Truly Hell is as a place of ambush
column3: Akika Enan jahannaman kata azaba uyio.

column2: For the transgressors a place of destination:
column3: Ya zanazhi e jin lefi Soko kpata na emi lecia ga dan'o nan'o.

column2: They will dwell therein for ages.
column3: Ba gabo aman' a fio lokaci nan lokpa sarauyin nan.

column2: Nothing cool shall they taste therein nor any drink
column3: A ma' awo yeko-yeko ndondoa ama'ade nuwan fin'a.

column2: Save a boiling fluid and a fluid dark murky intensely cold
column3: Sai de nuwan yipa be nuwan yan etin nae ma-tswan nan

column2: A fitting recompense (for them).
column3: Egagba nannan wun'a jin dai dai be etun'a yin. (na'alo yizheo nan)

column2: For that they used not to fear any account (for their deeds)
column3: Akia ajin zanazhie jin kauna egagba wangi ya eti ta'acin'a naa.

column2: But they (impudently) treated Our Signs as false.
column3: A maa aya yan Soko (zhi) yi ganmannan da iyaka.

column2: And all things have We preserved on record.
column3: Yandondo ma yi yiu jin lisafi kikaci. (fi mini takadae bo).

column2: "So taste ye (the fruits of your deeds); for no increase shall We grant you except in Punishment."
column3: Efe fin azaba Yi ya'a be ye yandondoa sai de azaba.

column2: Verily for the Righteous there will be a fulfilment of (the heart´s) desires;
column3: Akika egagba yan emawo wun'a jin tabbata ya zanazhi'e sundan Soko nan.

column2: Gardens enclosed and grapevines;
column3: Ganni be yangici lati zhi nanzhi wancin nan be yangici yan inabi.

column2: And voluptuous women of equal age;
column3: Ganni be inzagi nazhi yi yezun nan.

column2: And a cup full (to the brim).
column3: Ganni be kopu nazhia she be nuwan managizhi nan.

column2: No vanity shall they hear therein nor Untruth:-
column3: Ama'awo egan banza ko ganmanan mini aljana boa.

column2: Recompense from thy Lord a gift (amply) sufficient
column3: Egagba nannan zhi eryatwa yan Tsoci wyo uyio

column2: (From) the Lord of the heavens and the earth and all between (Allah) Most Gracious: None shall have power to argue with Him.
column3: Tsoci wuncin ugae kpa samazhio to kin to yan nazhi dan tsakani a bo nan'o. Etsu yegun uyio efo kiyama ga dabe zandondo kun acin ugan gan'a.

column2: The Day that the Spirit and the angels will stand forth in ranks none shall speak except any who is permitted by (Allah) Most Gracious and He will say what is right.
column3: Efo kiyama ga dabe malaika Jibrilu to Malaikazhi kpata aga' nakin gi gbaro' ade zana'a kpemi gangan' na'a sai dai be izini yan Etsu yegun'y uma gaa gangan gboro wun'a gan'o.

column2: That Day will be the sure Reality: Therefore whoso will let him take a (straight) return to his Lord
column3: !Efo wuncin ugayi Efo gaskiya-o zaenindondo nan ula bananu' gwausun etun wangizhi ulo lo nko Tsociu.

column2: Verily We have warned you of a Penalty near the Day when man will see (the deeds) which his hands have sent forth and the Unbeliever will say "Woe unto me! Would that I were (metre) dust!"
column3: Akika yiya jinye gangba nyan azaba natso-atsoba nan Efo nan zawangi'a cin le lo yan na egwauzhi la shidzo yau (lo Alkiyami na) kafiri cia gangan "kaasa mi re! E'gangan jian na a jin mi yin'a

column2: By the (angels) who tear out (the souls of the wicked) with violence;
column3: Sokoe zhi kuti be Malaikauzhi nazhi' edza rayi yan kafirizhi be kagbo-enan.

column2: By those who gently draw out (the souls of the blessed);
column3: Soko ezhi kuti be Mala'ikauzhi nazhi ewa rayi yan muminizhi karayin be yegun'inan.

column2: And by those who glide along (on errands of mercy)
column3: Sokoezhi kuti be Mala'ikauzhi nazhi edin-yin dan lulo etun Soko'o nan.

column2: Then press forward as in a race
column3: Soko ezhi kuti be Mala'ikazhi nanzhie bichi dan lulo etun-ona Ke eci maci zhi nan.

column2: Then arrange to do (the Commands of their Lord)
column3: Soko ezhi kuti be Mala'ikazhi nazhi elayedan alamari Soko dan izheo nan.

column2: One Day everything that can be in commotion will be in violent commotion
column3: (Efe pa) Efona aabe kafo nyan mafari nan.

column2: Followed by oft-repeated (commotions):
column3: Kafo nyan ba-ci ciabe lamitu'u nan.

column2: Hearts that Day will be in agitation;
column3: Yangban yan kundondo zazhi ga'a wodan fowuncin.

column2: Cast down will be (their owners´) eyes.
column3: Fuska nyan kundondo zazhi ga'a gbagba fowuncin.

column2: They say (now): "What! shall we indeed be returned to (our) former state
column3: Aciafe gangan beke agayi dan rayi dan da kendoe yiyi pa-yin-na

column2: They say (now): "What! shall we indeed be returned to (our) former state
column3: Aciafe gangan beke agayi dan rayi dan da kendoe yiyi pa-yin-na

column2: What! - when we shall have become rotten bones
column3: Ba 'aci na yiazhe tsukun nazhi agiya acia ban nan.

column2: They say: "It would in that case be a return with loss!"
column3: Acigan: u dema'ayi acin'o kundondo zazhi ga'ajin asara.

column2: They say: "It would in that case be a return with loss!"
column3: Acigan: u dema'ayi acin'o kundondo zazhi ga'ajin asara.

column2: But verily it will be but a single (Compelling) Cry
column3: Akika al'amari' nyan ekin-na efo kiyama ewuti nin kete un'ga'a kunke'o.

column2: When behold they will be in the (full) awakening (to Judgment).
column3: Eda-na agae be'una alittazhi kpa'ata ga'gunyekan zhi fili ega-gba'o.

column2: Has the story of Moses reached thee
column3: Ya'a wye Annabi ngba labari yan (Annabi) Musa be-ebawo ya' nin

column2: Behold thy Lord did call to him in the sacred valley of Tuwa:-
column3: Nyan kakun-na Tsociu yin pati nayi lilici naeyigan tuwa-nao.

column2: "Go thou to Pharaoh for he has indeed transgressed all bounds:
column3: Soko cigan ya'u gan; u naukin u'loeba fir'auna ebona fir'auna a gbin nugun nyan Soko tu.

column2: "And say to him ´Wouldst thou that thou shouldst be purified (from sin)
column3: -Wyo gan-oyan'u gan: Wun- awa lili ya eti tacin-wyun'a

column2: "´And that I guide thee to thy Lord so thou shouldst fear Him´"
column3: Ebo wyo gaewa min' la eko nyan Tsocin wuwye wolaofezanae sundan Soko nan.

column2: Then did (Moses) show him the Great Sign.(Annabi Musa) Cila a'ya nawancin-na wu fir'auna.

column1: Surah 79:21 But (Pharaoh) rejected it and disobeyed (guidance);
column2: Amma' Fir'auna a'aya Soko yi ganmanan u ci fe le sokoba loyegboro.
Further he turned his back striving hard (against Allah).
column3: Ucia Zummazhe cie jin yanna bauna.

column2: Then he collected (his men) and made a proclamation
column3: U cia jama'a zhi kuyekan Zhizhi uci ya mi yaa.

column2: Saying "I am your Lord Most High".
column3: Uci fe-gan gan: mi (Fir'auna) gayi tsoci ye natso latu gan nan-o.

column2: But Allah did punish him (and made an) example of him - in the Hereafter as in this life.
column3: Soko ciu wan ebo lefi natso-u jin zunma-o na to yan mafari na-ujin nan.

column2: Verily in this is an instructive warning for whosoever feareth (Allah).
column3: Akikawuncin-na'ajin be fir'auna nan uga afe gan-gba ya zanazhi gae-sudan Soko nan.

column2: What! Are ye the more difficult to create or the heaven (above) (Allah) hath constructed it:
column3: Yegayi alita natso gboka gan-nao Kashi sanma (Gutwaba) nayi tu gikin-ni bekagbo e'nan

column2: On high hath He raised its canopy and He hath given it order and perfection.
column3: Soko cia sama latu uci kezhi'u jin daidai.

column2: Its night doth He endow with darkness and its splendour doth He bring out (with light).
column3: Soko cia Yeshiu laa shi Zhiko ucia yigidi'u la'ana-behaske.

column2: And the earth moreover hath He extended (to a wide expanse);
column3: Ba'aci wuncin'o ucia ta cici pa'arae.

column2: He draweth out therefrom its moisture and its pasture;
column3: Ucia nuwan la'dzunzhin dagan mini-u-bo gangani be yangici nyan dabbazhi.

column2: And the mountains hath He firmly fixed;-
column3: Soko ma kezhea patizhi kan gikinbo be kagboe.

column2: For use and convenience to you and your cattle.
column3: (Kpata (Yannazhi) ebo alaafe eyan emawoa yayezawangizhi to dabba yezhi.

column2: Therefore when there comes the great overwhelming (Event)-
column3: (Amma'de) Efona ebazhe wanciko nyan kiyama gabe dabe nan.

column2: The Day when man shall remember (all) that he strove for
column3: Efo wuncin Zawangi-ndondo wun apa iri etun nazhi u lo izhe-o-nana.

column2: And Hell-Fire shall be placed in full view for (all) to see-
column3: Aciga ena nyan jahimi la'akefili yazanazhi ga-- yin a liuye nan.

column2: Then for such as had transgressed all bounds
column3: Akika Zandondo naga'afe zanaegbin iyaka Soko tunan.

column2: And had preferred the life of this world
column3: Uci Kezhiea' cincin nyan-izhe la'agboka dan yangban'ubo a gan yan alkiyami na.

column2: The Abode will be Hell-Fire;
column3: Akika ena nyan jahimu ga'ayi' ezhe-keba-wun-o.

column2: And for such as had entertained the fear of standing before their Lord´s (tribunal) and had restrained (their) soul from lower desires
column3: Amma'de Zandondo naga'afe zanae'sundan kinigi yegboro yan Tsoci-u- bonan ucia eyan sha'hawa yizhe la'akan yangban'u na.

column2: Their abode will be the Garden.
column3: Akika Aljanna-ga'ayi ezhe keba wun-o.

column2: They ask thee about the Hour-´When will be its appointed time
column3: (Kafirizhi) A'ajin afe gbinwyogan-gan:Fociotsa a'jin Kiyama-o

column2: Wherein art thou (concerned) with the declaration thereof
column3: Kinigiba kici wyoga' 'akpe akika yan efo kiyama yeo

column2: With thy Lord in the Limit fixed therefor.
column3: Kpikpe yan alamari Kiyama Kpata dan-be Sokoe.

column2: Thou art but a Warner for such as fear it.
column3: Etun yan-wyo-de wyojin ganga'oya zanazhi gae sundan efo kiyama-nan.

column2: The Day they see it (It will be) as if they had tarried but a single evening or (at most till) the following morn!
column3: Fondondo nan aga efo kiyama leyena zandondo-afe leye ke edunfe wyin kabario uyi daidai be lokaci yeshi nini-nan ko ke lokaci yan wallae na.

column2: They ask thee concerning (things taken as) spoils of war. Say: "(such) spoils are at the disposal of Allah and the Messenger: So fear Allah and keep straight the relations between yourselves: Obey Allah and His Messenger if ye do believe."
column3: E'gbin wyogan eti hukunci yan Gani'imao Gangan:- Gani'ima (naagade kunda yanmusuluncio na) yan Soko uyio Toci ebo acin'o esundan Soko ye mae fe jin gyara tsakani ebo be dozhi yemae fe gba Soko to Tuciu wun'ayi muminizhiye yiona.

column2: For Believers are those who when Allah is mentioned feel a tremor in their hearts and when they hear His signs rehearsed find their faith strengthened and put (all) their trust in their Lord;
column3: Hakika de zanazhie ye muminizhia agayi zanazhi kandondo na aga sunna Soko tunye yangban'azhie la'she be dansun (Sokoe) nao ama ga aya Soko zhigba ya'a wun'ajin ubea imani jin (be Sokoe) Tsociama wyun gae yakpe dan hali ndondo bo.

column2: For Believers are those who when Allah is mentioned feel a tremor in their hearts and when they hear His signs rehearsed find their faith strengthened and put (all) their trust in their Lord;
column3: Hakika de zanazhie ye muminizhia agayi zanazhi kandondo na aga sunna Soko tunye yangban'azhie la'she be dansun (Sokoe) nao ama ga aya Soko zhigba ya'a wun'ajin ubea imani jin (be Sokoe) Tsociama wyun gae yakpe dan hali ndondo bo.

column2: Who establish regular prayers and spend (freely) out of the gifts We have given them for sustenance:
column3: Zanazhie ku sallah gikini na ama'ajin afe wu dukiya'azhi mini arziki nazhi Yi la ya'a na (fi eko Soko'o).

column2: Such in truth are the believers: they have grades of dignity with their Lord and forgiveness and generous sustenance:
column3: Za wuncinzhi agayi muminizhi yan gaskiyao. Ayi be daraja kozhi dan eba Tsociabo to gafara (na Wyun'ajin'ana) to arziki na wancin na.

column2: Such in truth are the believers: they have grades of dignity with their Lord and forgiveness and generous sustenance:
column3: Za wuncinzhi agayi muminizhi yan gaskiyao. Ayi be daraja kozhi dan eba Tsociabo to gafara (na Wyun'ajin'ana) to arziki na wancin na.

column2: Just as thy Lord ordered thee out of thy house in truth even though a party among the Believers disliked it
column3: Kendoe Tsoci wyoe la wyo tinya dagan emi wyobo be gaskiyae na hakika Sashi Mini muminizhio ajin afe navo.(na'atinya nbo ebo Soko'o na.

column2: Disputing with thee concerning the truth after it was made manifest as if they were being driven to death and they (actually) saw it.
column3: Acia jin afe gbomi bewyoyin dan mini alamari gaskiya'a latu'ani na (acie jin bojin) ke wyoa gangan e'da'agwa da lo eba ajali na ala'alima amae'leu ye.

column2: Behold! Allah promised you one of the two (enemy) parties that it should be yours: Ye wished that the one unarmed should be yours but Allah willed to justify the Truth according to His words and to cut off the roots of the Unbelievers;-
column3: To kamina Soko jin ye alkawali yan nasara ta etijama'a ninio mini jama'a gubabao nao kede Wyunga ye la'ata'atio na ye cie kpaye gan jam'a nazhi de eyan kun'ana aga Sokoa la yaye yeo na Soko ma'akpa shizo gan wyunga gaskiyala'ajin tabbata be hukunci uyin Umau la edzo yan kafirizhiu dzau ya.

column2: That He might justify Truth and prove Falsehood false distasteful though it be to those in guilt.
column3: Ebo ula gaskiya'u la'ujin tabbata Umaula ganmana'u nyin'u ya kadalefi jincizhi ga navo na.

column2: Remember ye implored the assistance of your Lord and He answered you: "I will assist you with a thousand of the angels ranks on ranks."
column3: (Ye'pa) Kamina ye fe ba taimako dagan eba Tsoci yebo na Umacia aduwa ye gwo kede :- hakika mia jin ye taimako be malaika kpu'utsun'y nazhia lami latu dozhi na.

column2: Allah made it but a message of hope and an assurance to your hearts: (in any case) there is no help except from Allah: and Allah is Exalted in Power Wise.
column3: Soko ma la wuncin la fea saide yangbanfa alheri ebo ma to yangban yezhi ala'ashi tsu'uyin beu yin ye mae kpe'ewo kede nasara udan be zando yin'a sai be Sokoe na : Hakika Soko Etsu zankpe uyio.Etsu hikima uyio.

column2: Remember He covered you with a sort of drowsiness to give you calm as from Himself and he caused rain to descend on you from heaven to clean you therewith to remove from you the stain of Satan to strengthen your hearts and to plant your feet firmly therewith.
column3: (Epa) Kamina Soko la yi-gbe ta cia la'akpe ye na Ucia fe aminci yaye dagan eba ubo Uci fe du ele be yaye dagan sanmao ebo ula ye yeu li beu yin Uma'ula shikan yan shetan yan'u kpe'u ya be yin ebo ma ula yan gban yezhiu wan'u pa be kagbo imani uma'u la bici kinpa yezhiu g okau ta eti kinbo.

column2: Remember thy Lord inspired the angels (with the message): "I am with you: give firmness to the Believers: I will instil terror into the hearts of the Unbelievers: smite ye above their necks and smite all their finger-tips off them."
column3: Kamina Tsoci wyoe fe jin wahayi fi Malaikazhi na kede ;Hakika mi dan be ye yin ebo acin'o egbo yangban yan muminizhi ka be imani bele yin yin Miga edo be dansun'i ce dan yangban yan za nazhia jin kafirinci nao ebo aci'n'o ewua eti koroazhio ye mae wua vundunugiazhio.

column2: This because they contended against Allah and His Messenger: If any contend against Allah and His Messenger Allah is strict in punishment.
column3: Wuncin mayi ebo na a le Soko be Tuciu yin ba nao. Zan dondo na ma gae le Soko be Tuciu yin ba na to hakika Soko gbota eba azaba jin'o.

column2: Thus (will it be said): "Taste ye then of the (punishment): for those who resist Allah is the penalty of the Fire."
column3: Wuncin zhi ga dan'o nao efe fin azaba Soko hakika ma azaba yan ena uga'ajin tabbata ya kafirizhi.

column2: O ye who believe! when ye meet the Unbelievers in hostile array never turn your backs to them.
column3: Ya yenazhia imani jin na! kandondo na ye ga'gun be kafirizhi ekundao na to ega kara zhe zunmayezhi ya'a ma.

column2: If any do turn his back to them on such a day - unless it be in a stratagem of war or to retreat to a troop (of his own)- he draws on himself the wrath of Allah and his abode is Hell- an evil refuge (indeed)!
column3: Zandondo na ga zunmauzhe cie bici efo iri wuncin'ina sai de wyo gae wa gan wyoa ye enasa ya ekungun na koma wyoa zheban da tsun ekun gunci nayncin wyozhi na (ka gan ujin be uzuri yin'a) to zawuncin'a zheban zhe be ewunzhe dagan eba Soko ezhekebau mayi ena jahanna ma bibi ma'jin tabbata ya zoba wuncin.

column2: It is not ye who slew them; it was Allah: when thou threwest (a handful of dust) it was not thy act but Allah´s: in order that He might test the Believers by a gracious trial from Himself: for Allah is He Who heareth and knoweth (all things).
column3: Uma jin ye wu a amma'de Soko wu'ao:umaji wyo ce yan ke'a kamina wyo ce yan na'a. Amma'de Soko ce yan'o :Ebo ma Wyun'uma Muminizhiu cin'ule be mima cin le wangi'I dagan eba ubo.Hakika Soko Etsu nae wo na uyioEtsu kpikpe uyio.Surah 8:18     That and also because Allah is He Who makes feeble the plans and stratagem of the Unbelievers.Wuncinzhi ga dan'o nao hakika ma Soko ga tanadi yan kafirizhi to gbogun.

column2: (O Unbelievers!) if ye prayed for victory and judgment now hath the judgment come to you: if ye desist (from wrong) it will be best for you: if ye return (to the attack) so shall We. Not the least good will your forces be to you even if they were multiplied: for verily Allah is with those who believe!
column3: Wun'ayi gan nassara ye'e wao to nassara dabe yaye yeani ye ma ga etun dede lugwa to wuncin gayi alheri ya yeo ye ma ga ke dazhin (eti ewun sun'o)yi tso ma'ake dazhin (be azabze) jama'a nazhi ma ye aga dokun gan'acin. Hakika ma Soko dan be Muminizhi.

column2: O ye who believe! Obey Allah and His Messenger and turn not away from him when ye hear (him speak).Ya ye nazhia imani jin na ye'a gba Soko to Tuci'u ye mae ga zhe zunma ta alamari Soko ma alaali ma ye tsoe wo (na wyun'e yie na).
Nor be like those who say "We hear" but listen not:
column3: Ye mae ga'a fe iri yan zanazhi gangan:"yi wo" ala'alima e'woa na ma.

column2: For the worst of beasts in the sight of Allah are the deaf and the dumb- those who understand not.
column3: Hakika dabba na biyegan mini dabbazhi eba Soko'o na agayi zanazhia te tukpa (e'wogan Soko'a) acie zhe edingizhi ama'afe zanazhie lo'tun be hankalia yin'a na.

column2: If Allah had found in them any good. He would indeed have made them listen: (As it is) if He had made them listen they would but have turned back and declined (Faith).
column3: Soko ga tsun alheri tsun fi bea yin da wyun'a ya'a iko yan wiwo (ama jin eza alheri zhia) ka'Uga yaa iiko wiwo hakika aga zunmazheta (gaskiya) aci ga keu lugwa.

column2: O ye who believe! give your response to Allah and His Messenger when He calleth you to that which will give you life; and know that Allah cometh in between a man and his heart and that it is He to Whom ye shall (all) be gathered.
column3: Ya ye nazhia imani jin na! Efe ye yiyi Soko be yan Tuciy kandondo na uga yie lo eba yan na'a be rayi be rayuwa wangi na:Ye mae kpe wo kede Soko wyun'ajin'ulo dan tsakani zawangi be yan nazhigae sa fi yangban'una (be ajali'i) hakika ma Etsu uyio na ga ye kpata kuyekan zhiyegboro'ubo na.

column2: And fear tumult or oppression which affecteth not in particular (only) those of you who do wrong: and know that Allah is strict in punishment.
column3: Ye mae tswa fitina na masiibau wun'a kan eti azwalumi nazhi din'u be kawan yin'a na ye mae kpee wo kede hakika Soko Etsu na gbota eba jinjin azaba bona uyio.

column2: Call to mind when ye were a small (band) despised through the land and afraid that men might despoil and kidnap you; But He provided a safe asylum for you strengthened you with His aid and gave you Good things for sustenance: that ye might be grateful.
column3: Ye mae pa lokacina yea fe ezadegi nama'afe eza gbogunnzhi fi kinbo na ye ci fe sundan na zandoncizhia bea ye fe la na Soko cia ye ya ecinba (yan yangbanshi madinao) Ucia ye ya kagbo be nasara uyin uci kezhea ye ya arziki dagan mini yangici wangizhio ebo ujinwo be wuncinzhi ye ga'afe za nazhie jin yebo ya Soko na.

column2: O ye that believe! betray not the trust of Allah and the Messenger nor misappropriate knowingly things entrusted to you.
