column3: Ya ye nazhia imani jin na! E ga fe ta Soko to Tuciu be jinjin hainci'ima ye tso mae ga jin dozhi hainci'fe gi amana dozhi ma  ala'ali ma yetso kpewo ke ugyea na.

column2: And know ye that your possessions and your progeny are but a trial; and that it is Allah with Whom lies your highest reward.
column3: Ye mae kpe kede hakika dukiya yezhi to egi yezhi fitina ayio na hakika ma (zana ga tswa Soko danbo na) egagba na wancin na ga'ajin tabatta yau dan eba Soko.

column2: O ye who believe! if ye fear Allah He will grant you a criterion (to judge between right and wrong) remove from you (all) evil (that may afflict) you and forgive you: for Allah is the Lord of grace unbounded.Ya ye nazhia imani jin na!
column3: Ye ga'afe za nazhie tswa Soko cie sundan una uga etsazhi be erikpe wangizhi la'aya ye uma ga etun dede yezhi kpata paya ya ye uma'afe be yin Soko ma Etsu falala uyio na wancin na.

column2: Remember how the Unbelievers plotted against thee to keep thee in bonds or slay thee or get thee out (of thy home). They plot and plan and Allah too plans; but the best of planners is Allah.
column3: Wyo mao pa lokaci na zanazhia jin kafirinci na fe pa makirinci eti wyobo na ebo ala wyo'a kan'adan koma ala wyo ya'a wu koma ala wyo ya'a nyan adzun ezhio na. Acie dinyin fe jin makirinci. Soko otso mae woa gbata be makirincia yin Soko ma ta eti zanazhie jin makirinci kpata na.

column2: Remember how the Unbelievers plotted against thee to keep thee in bonds or slay thee or get thee out (of thy home). They plot and plan and Allah too plans; but the best of planners is Allah.
column3: Wyo mao pa lokaci na zanazhia jin kafirinci na fe pa makirinci eti wyobo na ebo ala wyo'a kan'adan koma ala wyo ya'a wu koma ala wyo ya'a nyan adzun ezhio na. Acie dinyin fe jin makirinci. Soko otso mae woa gbata be makirincia yin Soko ma ta eti zanazhie jin makirinci kpata na.

column2: When Our Signs are rehearsed to them they say: "We have heard this (before): if we wished we could say (words) like these: these are nothing but tales of the ancients."Ama ga gba aya Yizhi yaa ajin agangan: "
column3: Hakika yiwo nana (leani) uga bayi tso da yitso agan iri nana ma nana de  ufea saide ecin yan zamafarizhi.

column2: Remember how they said: "O Allah if this is indeed the Truth from Thee rain down on us a shower of stones form the sky or send us a grievous penalty."
column3: To kamina agan gan: ya wyoe Soko! Wun'ayi gan alamari nana wyun gayi gaskiya na fe be dagan eba wyobo nao to dule yan takun azaba be kpeyi dagan sanmao koma wyo'obe'o yayi be azaba ndoci na tan na.

column2: But Allah was not going to send them a penalty whilst thou wast amongst them; nor was He going to send it whilst they could ask for pardon.
column3: Soko mafe Etsu na ajin'a azaba na'a al'alima wyo yidan ta'acin'abo na'a Soko mafe Etsu na'ajin'a azaba na'a ala'lima afe zanazhie ba gafara na'a.

column2: But what plea have they that Allah should not punish them when they keep out (men) from the sacred Mosque - and they are not its guardians No men can be its guardians except the righteous; but most of them do not understand.
column3: Ki'ma dan bea yin'o na'ala Soko cia jin'azaba na'a yin'o ala'alima ekan zawangizhi ke masalaci Harami lugwa nao Uma jin atsawun hak yan tswi tswa wun'a. Hakika zanazhi wun hakika yan tswi tswa'una aga yi zanazhi gae tswa Soko acie sundan'Unao. Amma'de ekun dondo azhi ade kpikpea.

column2: Their prayer at the House (of Allah) is nothing but whistling and clapping of hands: (Its only answer can be) "Taste ye the penalty because ye blasphemed."
column3: Salla'azhi ma eba kata (ka'abao) ufea sai de iko-be be egwa-koe: eboacin'o efe fin azaba ebo iri etun kafirinci nazhi ye fe lo na.

column2: The Unbelievers spend their wealth to hinder (man) from the path of Allah and so will they continue to spend; but in the end they will have (only) regrets and sighs; at length they will be overcome: and the Unbelievers will be gathered together to Hell;-
column3: Hakika zanazhia jin kafirinci be Sokoe na ajin afe wu dukiya azhi ebo adeba'akan zawangi zhi ezan ta eti ekpa Soko: to aga dukiya'zhi wugagancin uci ga'afe ro-- n kpe yaa gancin be aciga'a zankpe zanazhi ma'ajin kafirinci na a kuaku yekan lo ena jahanama.

column2: In order that Allah may separate the impure from the pure put the impure one on another heap them together and cast them into Hell. They will be the ones to have lost.
column3: Ebo Soko debau la eyan dedezhiu tsa'u ya dagan mini eyan wangi zhio Uciu la eyan dedezhiu ku'ukpe eti sashio uci ga'u la'afe dan mini ena jahanamao. Zawun ci zhi aga yi eza hassarazhio

column2: Say to the Unbelievers if (now) they desist (from Unbelief) their past would be forgiven them; but if they persist the punishment of those before them is already (a matter of warning for them).
column3: Gan ya zanazhia jin kafirinci na aga gwa kpe eti yan na Sokoa kan na aafa beayin yan yannazhi ajin shidzo na hakika ekpa hallaka yan za mafari zhi wun'a shidzoa ni.

column2: And fight them on until there is no more tumult or oppression and there prevail justice and faith in Allah altogether and everywhere; but if they cease verily Allah doth see all that they do.
column3: Ye mae gun'akun har fitina ndondo uga ke ma gancin adini jin baenio ulauzhe ebo Soko ya Soko gbu'ugi. To aga bea egwa kpebo to hakika Sokoe cin'ale be iri etun nazhi e'lo na.

column2: If they refuse be sure that Allah is your Protector - the best to protect and the best to help.
column3: Ama ga zunma zheta to ye kpe wo dan'ona kede hakika Soko gayi Ndakata ye yeona: Madanla be Etsu na yi Ndakatana Madanla be Etsu taimakoe.

column2: And know that out of all the booty that ye may acquire (in war) a fifth share is assigned to Allah- and to the Messenger and to near relatives orphans the needy and the wayfarer- if ye do believe in Allah and in the revelation We sent down to Our servant on the Day of Testing- the Day of the meeting of the two forces. For Allah hath power over all things.
column3: Ye mae kpe wo kede yan dondo na ye gade yan ganima na to Soko ga wun nini yan gutsun wun'o to yan Tuci to eza tsonbazhi to ekungizhi to eza gwa gbagizhi ye ga'afe gan yea imani jin be Sokoe be yanna yi cin be ya wuzhi Yi (MUHAMMADU)efo ekun-erikpe na efo na jama'a guba da gun dozhi na. Soko ma Etsu iko uyio ta eti yandondo.

column2: Remember ye were on the hither side of the valley and they on the farther side and the caravan on lower ground than ye. Even if ye had made a mutual appointment to meet ye would certainly have failed in the appointment: But (thus ye met) that Allah might accomplish a matter already enacted; that those who died might die after a clear Sign (had been given) and those who lived might live after a Clear Sign (had been given). And verily Allah is He Who heareth and knoweth (all things).
column3: Ye mae pa kamina yedan kansanta natso tsoba na ama dan kansata natsoa kpe ya na gancin kodagba'azhi ma (afe kpankpanyin be eba ye) aci dan tako yebo. Kada ye ga jin dozhi alkawali jin eti (ezan) aningao da yega ce leba dozhi eba lokaci alkawalio; Amma'a Soko'u la'afe aninga ebo ula hukunci'u ba eti alamari ndoci na wyun'e wa gan ulaaufe na. Ebo ma zana ga'jin hallaka na un'jin hallaka eti bayanio Uma'ula zana'Ugaa dan rayi na'U dan rayi be dalili. Hakika ma Soko Etsu nae wo yandondo na uyio Etsu kpikpe uyio.

column2: Remember in thy dream Allah showed them to thee as few: if He had shown them to thee as many ye would surely have been discouraged and ye would surely have disputed in (your) decision; but Allah saved (you): for He knoweth well the (secrets) of (all) hearts.
column3: Wyo mao pa kamina Soko fe la'a wu wye dan mini eleo ke jama'a degi ayio na daaci gan ula'a lawu wye kendoe adokun na da' ye ga'a wo dansun ye ga'a to gbogun ye ma'afe gbomi be dozhi eti alamari wuncin'o amma'ade Sokoa egwa kan: Hakika wyin (Soko) Uyi be kpikpe yan yannazhi fi yangban zawangizhio na.

column2: And remember when ye met He showed them to you as few in your eyes and He made you appear as contemptible in their eyes: that Allah might accomplish a matter already enacted. For to Allah do all questions go back (for decision).
column3: Epa kamina ufe la'a wu ye na kamina ye bea gun be dozhi na eye yebo afe eza de gi umaa yetso la'fe eza de'gi dan eyeabo ebo Soko'ula hukunci'uba eti alamari ndoci na ga fe na: Alamari kpata ma eba Soko ga a kezhe lo'o.

column2: O ye who believe! When ye meet a force be firm and call Allah in remembrance much (and often); that ye may prosper:
column3: Ya ye nazhia imani jin na! ye ga bea gun gun be jama' ndocizhi eti ekun'o to yea kpe gikini. Ye mae fe tun Sokoe ye sarauyin ujin wo be wuncin yega tso guri.

column2: And obey Allah and His Messenger; and fall into no disputes lest ye lose heart and your power depart; and be patient and persevering: For Allah is with those who patiently persevere:
column3: Ye mae la mie tu Soko be Tuci'u yin ye mae ga gbomi (yan cen leba) be dozhi ma kacin'a ye ga to gbogun gancin kagboe ma ga'a gan be yin ye mae la hakurie jin. Hakika Soko ajin udan be zanazhi gae jin hakuri nae.

column2: And be not like those who started from their homes insolently and to be seen of men and to hinder (men) from the path of Allah: For Allah compasseth round about all that they do.
column3: Ye mae ga'afe ke dozhin zanazhi tinya eti fahri jin'o be ebo zawangizhia leaye na ma acie kan zawangizhi ezanda ta eti ekpa Soko: Soko maa etun nazhie lo kpatana makezhe.

column2: Remember Satan made their (sinful) acts seem alluring to them and said: "No one among men can overcome you this day while I am near to you": But when the two forces came in sight of each other he turned on his heels and said: "Lo! I am clear of you; lo! I see what ye see not; Lo! I fear Allah: for Allah is strict in punishment."
column3: To kamina shaitan yin'a etun dedeazhi la'a pa nin fia na Uci gan: zandondo danbo mini zawangizhio na'a zan yekpe na mi ma dan be ye yin kpan-yin "Gancin kamina jama'a guba 'ba bea gunbe dozhi na shaitan cida'uda zunma Uci gan: "Hakika mia egwa mi wa be ye yin! mi mae le yannazhi ye le yea na ye mi mae sundan Soko: Soko ma Etsu uyio na gbota azaba jin'ona.

column2: Lo! the hypocrites say and those in whose hearts is a disease: "These people- their religion has misled them." But if any trust in Allah behold! Allah is Exalted in might Wise.
column3: To lokaci na munafukzhi to zanazhi batan dan yangban'abo na fe gangan gan: " Adini yan za nanazhi wun'a ta fi egbin'o" zaeni ndondo na ga'a yakpe Soko na to hakika Soko Etsu zankpe uyio Etsu hikima uyio.

column2: If thou couldst see when the angels take the souls of the Unbelievers (at death) (How) they smite their faces and their backs (saying): "Taste the penalty of the blazing Fire-
column3: Be ma da aci gan wyo le ye lokaci na malaikazhi gae gwo rayi yan za nazhi ajin kafirinci na malaikazhie ciafe wua fuska'azhio to zunma'azhioacia fe gan'agan: "E fe fin azaba yan ena kikeci

column2: "Because of (the deeds) which your (own) hands sent forth; for Allah is never unjust to His servants:
column3: Wuncin mayi ebo iri etun dede na egwa yetsozhi lashidzo ye'nao hakika ma Soko ujin Etsu azwalumi lo eba wuzhi ndondoa.

column2: "(Deeds) after the manner of the people of Pharaoh and of those before them: They rejected the Signs of Allah and Allah punished them for their crimes: for Allah is Strong and Strict in punishment:
column3: Kendoe alada yan jama'a yan fir'auna be zanazhi shiadzo na ajin kafirinci be aya Soko zhi Soko cia wan be lefiazhi hakika Soko Etsu kagbo uyio Etsu na ma gbota eba azaba jin'o na uyio.

column2: "Because Allah will never change the grace which He hath bestowed on a people until they change what is in their (own) souls: and verily Allah is He Who heareth and knoweth (all things)."
column3: Wuncin ma afe ebona hakika Soko ufe Etsu naela egbazhe de de dan mini ni'ima na uga la ya jama'a ndoci eti Eman'o na'a sai de atso ga egbazhe de de la'adan yangban'azhio. Hakika Soko ma Etsu kpikpe uyio.

column2: (Deeds) after the manner of the people of Pharaoh and those before them": They treated as false the Signs of their Lord: so We destroyed them for their crimes and We drowned the people of Pharaoh: for they were all oppressors and wrong-doers.
column3: Kenadoe alada yan jama'a yan firaunazhi yi na to zanazhi shia dzo na to Yi cia jin hallaka be zunubia zhi yi cia jama'a yan fir'auna zhi gbin fi nuwan eduo kpata'ama afe azwalumizhi.

column2: For the worst of beasts in the sight of Allah are those who reject Him: They will not believe.
column3: Hakika dabba na biye uma wuye gan mini dabbazhio na eba Soko'ona aga yi zanazhi-ajin kafirinci aci ye gan ajin imanianao.

column2: They are those with whom thou didst make a covenant but they break their covenant every time and they have not the fear (of Allah).
column3: Zanazhi wyo pa alkawali be yin miniabo na gancin acia jin afe lo alkawali ya kandondo na ama'afe za nazhie tswa Sokoa amae sundan wyun'a na.

column2: If ye gain the mastery over them in war disperse with them those who follow them that they may remember.
column3: To wyo ga bea tswo gwa mini ekun'o aala fe misali ya zazumaa'azhi ebo ala'abici ujin wo be wuncin'y uga afe sin san tu ya'a.

column2: If thou fearest treachery from any group throw back (their covenant) to them (so as to be) on equal terms: for Allah loveth not the treacherous.
column3: Wyo ma gae be sundan yan (TITA) hainci dagan gwata jama'a ndoci zhio to a alkawalia ceya ya'a kendoe atso jin na: hakika Sokoe wa zanazhi gae jin hainci na'a.

column2: Let not the unbelievers think that they can get the better (of the godly): they will never frustrate (them).
column3: Zanazhi ma'ajin kafirnci na aga fe kpa ye gan ayea gan gwa ma: hakika a gangwa'a.

column2: Against them make ready your strength to the utmost of your power including steeds of war to strike terror into (the hearts of) the enemies of Allah and your enemies and others besides whom ye may not know but whom Allah doth know. Whatever ye shall spend in the cause of Allah shall be repaid unto you and ye shall not be treated unjustly.
column3: Ye mae dan shiri boe ka'a be gwargwado yan yanna ye ga de kagbou yan kagbo na to doko yan ekun zhina ebo ye lae li makiyi Soko zhi dan to makiyi ye tso zhi to ndoci zhi nazhi jin ayeana ye kpea yea Soko de kpea ye yan dondo na ma ye ga wu fi eko Soko-ona Soko gaa egagba alheri shekpan ya ye ye ma'ade zana'ajin ye zwalunci na'a.

column2: But if the enemy incline towards peace do thou (also) incline towards peace and trust in Allah: for He is One that heareth and knoweth (all things).
column3: Ama ga'ya kasan lo wi wa yan edun fe lafiya (be ye yin) to wyotso-oya kasan'olo wuncin wyomao lao yao kpe Soko: Hakika wyun ga yi Etsu na ma yi be kpi kpe yandondo nao Etsu na ma yi be kpikpe yandondoe na.

column2: Should they intend to deceive thee- verily Allah sufficeth thee: He it is That hath strengthened thee with His aid and with (the company of) the Believers;
column3: Ama ga'akpa gan a'ta wyoe to hakika Soko tsa'kun ke ya wyo-yao wyun ga yi Etsu na gbo wyo ka be taimakou yin nao to be muminizhi nao.

column2: And (moreover) He hath put affection between their hearts: not if thou hadst spent all that is in the earth couldst thou have produced that affection but Allah hath done it: for He is Exalted in might Wise.
column3: Ucia cin cin la'adan tsakani yangban'azhio be dozhi kada wyo ga yannazhifi kin bo kpatana wu ya'a wyo la cincin dan tsakani yangba yangban'azhio woa amma'ade Sokoa cincin la'adan tsakaniabo. Hakika Soko Etsu kpikpe uyio Etsu hikima ma uyio.

column2: O Prophet! sufficient unto thee is Allah- (unto thee) and unto those who follow thee among the Believers.
column3: Ya wyoe Annabi! Sokoa kunke ya wyo ya'ani to zanazhi ga mi tu wyoe mini muminizhio na.

column2: O Prophet! rouse the Believers to the fight. If there are twenty amongst you patient and persevering they will vanquish two hundred: if a hundred they will vanquish a thousand of the Unbelievers: for these are a people without understanding.
column3: Ya wyoe Annabi! A evunba yan ekun la'alo dan yangban yan muminizhio a ga de eza 'shi mini yebo nazhia hankuri jin na aga'ade zankpe (galaba) ta eti eza kpako'a ama ga de eza shitsun mini yebo aga'a de zankpe ta eti za kpu'u tsun'o mini zanazhia jin kafirinci nao ebo na a'ezazhia ayio na egan'e ye ana.

column2: O Prophet! rouse the Believers to the fight. If there are twenty amongst you patient and persevering they will vanquish two hundred: if a hundred they will vanquish a thousand of the Unbelievers: for these are a people without understanding.
column3: Ya wyoe Annabi! A evunba yan ekun la'alo dan yangban yan muminizhio a ga de eza 'shi mini yebo nazhia hankuri jin na aga'ade zankpe (galaba) ta eti eza kpako'a ama ga de eza shitsun mini yebo aga'a de zankpe ta eti za kpu'u tsun'o mini zanazhia jin kafirinci nao ebo na a'ezazhia ayio na egan'e ye ana.

column2: For the present Allah hath lightened your (task) for He knoweth that there is a weak spot in you: But (even so) if there are a hundred of you patient and persevering they will vanquish two hundred and if a thousand they will vanquish two thousand with the leave of Allah: for Allah is with those who patiently persevere.
column3: Gbani Sokoa sauki jin ya ye uma kpe-wo ke gbogun to wun'a lo ye na. Eboacin'o aga de eza shitsun na de hankurina dan mini ye bo aga'de(galaba) zankpe ta eti za kpako ama ga de za kpu'utsun mini ye bo aga'ade zankpeta eti za kpu'utsun gubae be izini Sokoe. Soko mae dan be zanazhi gae jin hankuri nae.

column2: It is not fitting for a prophet that he should have prisoners of war until he hath thoroughly subdued the land. Ye look for the temporal goods of this world; but Allah looketh to the Hereafter: And Allah is Exalted in might Wise.
column3: Ugwoyin ya Annabi ndondo na wyun'ade wuzhi zhi yan ekun na'a sai de uga gun kun ucia de zankpe ta eti kinbo. Ye ye kpa dide yan eyan zwoci yan izhe zhi Soko ma Etsu zan kpe uyio Etsu hikima ma uyio.

column2: Had it not been for a previous ordainment from Allah a severe penalty would have reached you for the (ransom) that ye took.
column3: Kagan ujin ebo hukunci Sokona'ashidzo dan litafio na'a da'a azaba na gbota na gae de ebo yannazhi yegwo eti sisa'abo na.

column2: But (now) enjoy what ye took in war lawful and good: but fear Allah: for Allah is Oft-forgiving Most Merciful.
column3: Eboacin'o egi mini ganima nazhi yega de ekun dao uci yi halali umayi wangi na. Ye mae tswa Soko be edansun' uyin hakika Soko Etsu gafara uyio Etsu ye gun uyio.

column2: But (now) enjoy what ye took in war lawful and good: but fear Allah: for Allah is Oft-forgiving Most Merciful.
column3: Eboacin'o egi mini ganima nazhi yega de ekun dao uci yi halali umayi wangi na. Ye mae tswa Soko be edansun' uyin hakika Soko Etsu gafara uyio Etsu ye gun uyio.

column2: O Prophet! say to those who are captives in your hands: "If Allah findeth any good in your hearts He will give you something better than what has been taken from you and He will forgive you: for Allah is Oft-forgiving Most Merciful."Ya wyoe Annabi! Gan ya za nazhi fi gwa ye bo ama yi za win wan ci zhi na: Soko ga tsun alheri fi mini yangban ye zhio wyun'a yae alheri natso gan yanna agwo be ye yin nae uma'ajin'e gafara. Soko ma Etsu ye gun uyio.

But if they have treacherous designs against thee (O Messenger!) they have already been in treason against Allah and so hath He given (thee) power over them. And Allah so He Who hath (full) knowledge and wisdom.
column3: Ama gae kpa gan ajin wyoe ha'ainci hakika ajin to Soko'otso hainci leani Soko cia wyo ya kagbo ta eti abo. Soko ma Etsu kpikpe uyio Etsu hikima uyio.

column2: Those who believed and adopted exile and fought for the Faith with their property and their persons in the cause of Allah as well as those who gave (them) asylum and aid- these are (all) friends and protectors one of another. As to those who believed but came not into exile ye owe no duty of protection to them until they come into exile; but if they seek your aid in religion it is your duty to help them except against a people with whom ye have a treaty of mutual alliance. And (remember) Allah seeth all that ye do.
column3: Hakika zanazhia imani jin na aci kezhea kpe la (ke eyan de de lugwa) na aci jin jiadi (kokari) be dukiya'azhi to zanazhi twarya yan ecinbazhi na aci ke zhe jin taimako na za wuncin zhi maso yi zhi ayio ya dozhi. Zanazhi ma'a imani jin na ama kpe la'a na ye de yandoci na'abo ye keba be dozhi na'a sai kamina aga'a kpela na. Ama ga wa taimako be ye yin mini adinio ejin'a taimako sai de uga'azhe eti zandoci nazhi alkawali ndoci dan tsakani yebo bea yin na. Soko mae cin ye cin le be iri etun nazhi ye lo na.

column2: The Unbelievers are protectors one of another: Unless ye do this (protect each other) there would be tumult and oppression on earth and great mischief.
column3: Zanazhi ma'ajin kafirinci na sashiazhi masoyi saashizhi ayio kagan ye jin acin'a (yeci wa dozhia) fitina ndoci ga'ajin tabatta dan kinbo gan-ni be eyan nyin na wancin nae.

column2: Those who believe and adopt exile and fight for the Faith in the cause of Allah as well as those who give (them) asylum and aid- these are (all) in very truth the Believers: for them is the forgiveness of sins and a provision most generous.
column3: Zanazhi ma'a imani jin na acia kpe'la na aci jin jihadi (kokari) ta eti ekpa Soko ona to zanazhi twarya ecinbazhi (ya muhajiruzhi) na ama kezhe jin taimako na to za wuncinzhi gayi mumini yan gaskiya zhio gafara ga'jin tabbata ya'a to arziki na wancin na.

column2: And those who accept Faith subsequently and adopt exile and fight for the Faith in your company- they are of you. But kindred by blood have prior rights against each other in the Book of Allah. Verily Allah is well-acquainted with all things.
column3: Zanazhi ma ga imani jin dagan zumao na acia kpe la aci kezhe jin jihadi (kokari) keba be yeyin na to za wuncinzhi gayi zaba yezhio. Dangizhi-ma sashizhi tsoba dozhi gan sashi dan mini litafi Soko. Hakika Soko ma Etsu kpikpe uyio yan yandondo.

column2: (The Prophet) frowned and turned away
column3: (Annabi Muhammadu) Wun'a eyeu fin uci kezhe'a zunman zheta.

column2: Because there came to him the blind man (interrupting).
column3: Ebona Yebonci dade-ebau'nan.

column2: But what could tell thee but that perchance he might grow (in spiritual understanding)-
column3: Annabi Wyo kpe-ko u-be-be ebo u-biu de lili yan ibada'u

column2: Or that he might receive admonition and the teaching might profit him
column3: Ko-ma wun-a shitukpa ya tukpapa natso a'jin'u anfaninan..

column2: As to one who regards Himself as self-sufficient
column3: Zanazhi-ewo kunkunke nyan-tita acin ana

column2: To him dost thou attend;
column3: Zawuncinzhi ga wyoe shitukpa yao.

column2: Though it is no blame to thee if he grow not (in spiritual understanding).
column3: Kinci to wyo bo Kagan uli etitacin'u be bawu Nyan Alkuranu yan yan'anao

column2: But as to him who came to thee striving earnestly
column3: Eza-na-ma be 'ba wye be yangban wangi cie-wa ekoke nan.

column2: And with fear (in his heart)
column3: Umayi Eza dansun Soko nan.

column2: Of him wast thou unmindful.
column3: Wyocin dzun gan'u-bo wyo shitukpa ya wun'a

column2: By no means (should it be so)! For it is indeed a Message of instruction:
column3: A'a akika Alkur'anu Tukpapa Tsa'u yio.

column2: Therefore let whoso will keep it in remembrance.
column3: Zana ugabe-bana u la egwau-sun uman'ujin beu-yin.

column2: (It is) in Books held (greatly) in honour
column3: (Tukpapa-nanma) fi mini litafi nayi cin-wacinao.

column2: Exalted (in dignity) kept pure and holy
column3: Litafi Na Latuna u mayi lilic-nan.

column2: (Written) by the hands of scribes-
column3: (Alkur'anu na' sun gwa mala'ika Lilici zhio nan.

column2: Honourable and Pious and Just.
column3: (Egwa) yan za-cinwan cizhi nanzhi a'li ke lefi Soko lugwa na.

column2: Woe to man! What hath made him reject Allah;
column3: Hallaka a'jin tabbata ya zawangi kila Eza Ciejin kafiri-ci be tsociw -yin o

column2: From what stuff hath He created him
column3: Beke' kpe yannan Soko a' jin alittau na anan

column2: From a sperm-drop: He hath created him and then mouldeth him in due proportions;
column3: Ngan Dagan Maniy (Yan Ba'agi be Yinzagi) unga'ajin alitta-wun-o Uci kezhea nakan kpace-u tswa wangi.

column2: Then doth He make His path smooth for him;
column3: Uci Kezhea eko (Buka'tauzhi) La'afe Finfanci yaw.

column2: Then doth He make His path smooth for him;
column3: Uci Kezhea eko (Buka'tauzhi) La'afe Finfanci yaw.

column2: Then He causeth him to die and putteth him in his grave;
column3: (Soko ma) wun-a kezhe bea zawangi wu aci gau la'adan kabario.

column2: Then when it is His Will He will raise him up (again).
column3: Lokaci-na-gabe ba Soko na aa kezhe-u-dan ra'yibe (ebo u beu wo gbata etun na ulo yizheo-nan).

column2: By no means hath he fulfilled what Allah hath commanded him.
column3: Akika de zawangi La'a lagwasun foro na Soko jin-wu-na wangia.

column2: Then let man look at his food (and how We provide it):
column3: Zawangi dondo u cin yangici na wun egina ule.

column2: For that We pour forth water in abundanceNgan yi (Soko) gaedu-ele na dokunna (be yayeyeo).

column1: Surah 80:26   And We split the earth in fragments
column2: Yici kezhe-a kin kpemi ebo yangici nazhi yedzo na u deba u tin'u ya.
And produce therein corn
column3: Yicia yangici sunsun yezhi la yin tin-ya yaye.

column2: And produce therein corn
column3: Yicia yangici sunsun yezhi la yin tin-ya yaye.

column2: And Grapes and nutritious plants
column3: To yangici inabi gani-be finizhi nazhi yela'lunina

column2: And Olives and Dates
column3: Ganni-be cigban nyan emin yiri yirizhi be cigban dobinazhi.

column2: And enclosed Gardens dense with lofty trees
column3: Ganni be latizhi nazhi de cigban nazhi wancin sarauyin nan amakezhe- dokun nan.

column2: And fruits and fodder-
column3: Ganni be yangici shahawazhi (ke yaba man-- ro lemu na) be e-- zhi na dabbazhi eginan.

column2: For use and convenience to you and your cattle.
column3: Kpa' ta yan nanzhi ebo emawo yebo ganibe nyan dabba yezhi.

column2: At length when there comes the Deafening Noise-
column3: Ammade (Yiye Paye tukpa) lokaci na-agabea kafo be (efo ekinnan nyan kiyamae na).

column2: That Day shall a man flee from his own brother
column3: Efo wuncin zawangi afe bici yegiuzhi.

column2: And from his mother and his father
column3: (Egi) afe bici nna namawun ganna be nda na mawunan.

column2: And from his wife and his children.
column3: Eba' a' fe bici yinmiwzhi u ma-afe bici egiwzhi.

column2: Each one of them that Day will have enough concern (of his own) to make him indifferent to the others.
column3: Zaenin dondo miniabo efowuncin alamariu ga'a zan'w kpe.

column2: Some faces that Day will be beaming
column3: Efo kiyama ga-dabe fuska nyan zandacizhia fe na-be haske.

column2: Laughing rejoicing.
column3: Za'wuncinzhi afe ma-tsan ama' fe fa yangba.

column2: And other faces that Day will be dust-stained
column3: Fuska yan zandocima fowuncin rungba ga'akukpeu.

column2: Blackness will cover them:
column3: Egba to zunyesun ga'u wangi.

column2: Such will be the Rejecters of Allah the doers of iniquity
column3: Za-wuncinzhi gayi kafirizhio-be lefi jin ci zhiy

column2: When the sun (with its spacious light) is folded up;
column3: Sokoe zhi kuti be lokacinan a bea yigidi fan ke sama lugwa-nan.

column2: When the stars fall losing their lustre;
column3: Sokoe zhikuti be lokacina tswangizhi kpa ata a bea kpanya nanSurah 81:3  When the mountains vanish (like a mirage);Sokoe zhi kuti be lokacina tswangizhi kpa ata a bea kpanya nan

column2: When the she-camels ten months with young are left untended;
column3: Sokoe zhi kuti be lokaci nan rakun yiwozhi nazhiyibe egizhina abea dzun gan'abo nan.

column2: When the wild beasts are herded together (in the human habitations);
column3: Sokoe zhi kuti be lokacina abea dabba yan kusozhii kuyekan zhi-bae nio nan.

column1: Surah 81:6 . When the oceans boil over with a swell;.Sokoe zhi kuti be lokacina edu nyan nuwanzhi kpa'ata ga'a ke-ena-nan.

column2: When the oceans boil over with a swell;
column3: Sokoe zhi kuti be lokacina edu nyan nuwanzhi kpa'ata ga'a ke-ena-nan.

column2: When the souls are sorted out (being joined like with like);
column3: Sokoe zhi kuti be lokacina a bea rayizhi kufi mini nakan kpace alittazhi-onan (Wato ba'acinnan aga kafo yan zubaci be nan).

column2: When the female (infant) buried alive is questioned -
column3: .Sokoe zhi kuti be lokacinan a'gbin egi-yin zagi- mamangizhi nazhi aso fi koshao be rayizhi nan gan nan.

column2: For what crime she was killed;
column3: Lefikici yejin aci wuye be rayiye yin'o

column2: When the scrolls are laid open;
column3: Sokoe zhi kuti be lokacinan a'bea litafi etun zawangizhi kpezhizhi nan.

column2: When the world on High is unveiled;
column3: Sokoe zhi kuti be lokacinan a'bea sanma kpe nan.

column2: When the Blazing Fire is kindled to fierce heat;
column3: Sokoe zhi kuti be lokacinan a'bea ena yan jahimi dan na.

column2: And when the Garden is brought near;-
column3: Sokoe zhi kuti be lokacinan a'bea (eko) Aljannazhi kpe Tsoba Muminizhinan.

column2: (Then) shall each soul know what it has put forward.
column3: Rayi ndondo fowuncin wun-ade kpikpe nyan etun nazhi-ulo shidzun be kiyamanan .

column2: So verily I call to witness the planets - that recede
column3: Mie zhikuti be tswangi nazhie dazan fi sanmao be yigidi acia so nan.

column2: Go straight or hide;
column3: Gani be Tswangi nazhie dazan fisanmao be yeshi acie la so nan.

column2: And the Night as it dissipates;
column3: Sokoe zhikuti be yeshi-I lokachina ugaeda'-yin shi zhi nan.

column2: And the Dawn as it breathes away the darkness;-
column3: Sokoe zhikuti be lokaci yan asuba'ayin lokacina eba gae da yintinzhi nan.

column2: Verily this is the word of a most honourable Messenger
column3: Akika (Alkur'anui) egan'n uyio danga misun tuci nayi zacinwanci nan.

column2: Endued with Power with rank before the Lord of the ThroneTuci nayi za kagboci na umayi za cinwanci eba Etsu na wun Al'arashi na.
With authority there (and) faithful to his trust.
column3: Za nan a' lamitu nan uyio umakezheyi eza amana be.

column2: And (O people!) your companion is not one possessed;
column3: (Annabi Muhammadu) nayi masoyiyena ujin yilan ducia.

column2: And without doubt he saw him in the clear horizon.
column3: Akika (Annabi Muhammadu) le mala'ika jibrilu ye'fi'li yan sanmao nama atin yenan.

column2: Neither doth he withhold grudgingly a knowledge of the Unseen.
column3: (Annabi Muhammadu S.A.W) ujin zanaeso egan na Soko gababiuyin uman ga'afe bawu yaye na'a.

column2: Nor is it the word of an evil spirit accursed.
column3: Alkur'anu majin egan yan shaitanzhi nazhiyi eza laana Soko naa.

column2: When whither go ye
column3: Ye! (Zawangizhi) biibo yeyelo-o

column2: Verily this is no less than a Message to (all) the Worlds:
column3: Akika Alkur'anu tukpapa uyio gangba uyio ya alittazhi kpa'ata.

column2: (With profit) to whoever among you wills to go straight:
column3: (Tukpapa uyio) ya zana ugaba gan wun-ake eko gboro nan.

column2: But ye shall not will except as Allah wills- the Cherisher of the Worlds.
column3: Iri yandondo nagae bayena (wun'ayedea) saidai ugaa ba Soko Etsu naekpa alittazhi kpa'ata nan

column2: When the Sky is cleft asunder;
column3: Sokoe zhi-kuti be sanmae ka mina ugabea banfi nan.

column2: When the Stars are scattered;
column3: Sokoe zhi-kuti be Tswangi zhi kamina agabea gaya nan.

column2: When the Oceans are suffered to burst forth;
column3: Sokoe zhi-kuti be edu nuwanzhi-lokacina agabea lashe landondo nan.

column2: And when the Graves are turned upside down;-
column3: Sokoe zhi-kuti be koshazhi-I lokacina agabea ekun nazhi finin yinwobo ku tinya nan.

column2: (Then) shall each soul know what it hath sent forward and (what it hath) kept back.
column3: Rayi ndondo a'kpe fowunci Etun nazhi uga'lo shidzo na be nazhi ulo'anae.

column2: O man! What has seduced thee from thy Lord Most Beneficent-
column3: Ya wyoe zawangi kiyi yanae ta wyoe ciela wyo gan be emilatu foro yan tsoci-wyoe nayi Etsu cinwanci nao.

column2: Him Who created thee. Fashioned thee in due proportion and gave thee a just bias;
column3: Etsu najin alitta wyona u cikezhe'awojin daidai cikezhea wojin dan ta'cin ta cin alittazhio nan.

column2: In whatever Form He wills does He put thee together.
column3: Soko ma'awo jin dan sura wangi'o kendoe u bawna uci kezhea wyo tu tati dozhio.

column2: Nay! But ye do reject Right and Judgment!
column3: Yan'na de ejin yena' yeya gaskiya be egagba yan efo alkiyami yin'a.

column2: But verily over you (are appointed angels) to protect you-
column3: Akika Soko jin (alitta mala'ikazhi) nazhi etswa etun yezhi nan.

column2: Kind and honourable- Writing down (your deeds):
column3: (Mala'ika Wuncinzhi) eza cinwancizhia yio aga maeka etun na zandondo elo nan'o.

column2: They know (and understand) all that ye do.
column3: Amade kpikpe yan etun nazae nindondo ye elo nan.

column2: As for the Righteous they will be in bliss;
column3: Akika zanazhi gaelamitu foro Soko na a'fi mini ni'imani'o.

column2: And the Wicked - they will be in the Fire
column3: Akika ma leifi jin cizhi a'fi mini enan yan jahimu-o.

column2: Which they will enter on the Day of Judgment
column3: (Lefi jincizhi) aga'a ganfi ena wuncin'o efo egagbae.

column2: And they will not be able to keep away therefrom.
column3: Ama'de zana agangwa bonan'a

column2: And what will explain to thee what the Day of Judgment is(Annabi)!
column3: Zae ma a'ta akika yan efo egagba yawo yao

column2: Again what will explain to thee what the Day of Judgment is
column3: Gancin zaedanbo na'ala'akika yan efo egagba wuwye nan'o

column2: (It will be) the Day when no soul shall have power (to do) aught for another: For the command that Day will be (wholly) with Allah.
column3: Efo Wuncin a'de rayi na'agikini ya rayindondo wo eti yandondo na'a kagbo yan jin jin yandondo foga'a danba Soko.

column2: Woe to those that deal in fraud
column3: Aza'aba yan zunyesun wun'ajin tabbata ta eti zanazhie ke tsunwan tukun nan.

column2: Those who when they have to receive by measure from men exact full measure
column3: (Azaba yan zunyesun) wun 'ajin tabbata ta' eti) zanazhie kaimina agae  dan eba zazhio nan a'jin afewa shishe yan tsunwan nan.

column2: But when they have to give by measure or weight to men give less than due.
column3: Ammaa kakun nan agae dan tsunwan ya'ezazhi nan a'jin afewa shishe yan tsunwan nan.Surah 83:4    Do they not think that they will be called to account(Zanazhie ke tsunwan tukun nan) beke aya gaskiya ya gan Sokoa' beasan ba'aci ajalia bo'a na

column2: On a Mighty Day
column3: Ebo efo na wancin sarauyin nan.

column2: A Day when (all) mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds
column3: Efo nan zawangizhi kpa'ata aa gikini yegboro Tsoci nae kpa halittazhi kpa'ata nan.

column2: Nay! Surely the record of the wicked is (preserved) in Sijjin.
column3: Akika litafi etun yan leifi jinci zhi udan mini sijjinuo.

column2: Nay! Surely the record of the wicked is (preserved) in Sijjin.
column3: Akika litafi etun yan leifi jinci zhi udan mini sijjinuo.

column2: And what will explain to thee what Sijjin is
column3: Ki'ma ayawe labari yanna'e ye sijjanu nao

column2: Woe that Day to those that deny
column3: Azaba yan zunyesun wun'ajin tabbataefo wuncin ta'eti ganmanna zunci zhio.

column2: Those that deny the Day of Judgment.
column3: Zanazhie yi efo egagba ganmanan nan.

column2: And none can deny it but the Transgressor beyond bounds the Sinner!
column3: Ama'ade zanae dza efonna wan na'a saidai zaenin dondo nagae gbin iya'ke Soko tunan umayi leifi jinci nan.

column2: When Our Signs are rehearsed to him he says Tales of the ancients!
column3: Kandondo nagae gba katun yan a'yayi (Soko) ya'unan ugan: ecin yan za pa'ayinzhi uyio.

column2: By no means! but on their hearts is the stain of the (ill) which they do!
column3: Akika  etun dede be leife na zawuncinzhi ejin na wun'a yangban la'a akpe kazo.

column2: By no means! but on their hearts is the stain of the (ill) which they do!
column3: Akika  etun dede be leife na zawuncinzhi ejin na wun'a yangban la'a akpe kazo.

column2: Verily from (the Light of) their Lord that Day will they be veiled.
column3: Akika efo wuncin aga'a zawun cizhi kanye ke yegun Soko lugwa.

column2: Further they will enter the Fire of Hell.
column3: Ba'aci acingao aa da'aganfi enan yan jahimuo.

column2: Further it will be said to them: This is the (reality) which ye rejected as false!
column3: Kanga acia ganya'a gan: 'Nannan ugayi (azaba) nayefe yigan ganman nan.

column2: Day verily the record of the Righteous is (preserved) in ´Illiyin.
column3: Aika litafi yan etun yan zagunguru zhi udan mini iliyyuna'o.

column2: And what will explain to thee what ´Illiyun is
column3: Ki'ima ala kpikpen yan yanna'eye illiyyuna nan wu wyo yao

column2: (There is) a Register (fully) inscribed
column3: Litafi uyio na eka etun yan muminizhi fi nan.

column2: To which bear witness those Nearest (to Allah).
column3: Za nazhi yi ezaq tsonba Soko nan e'jinri yan alamari wuncin.

column2: Truly the Righteous will be in Bliss:
column3: Akika zanazhie' lamitu foro Soko nan afi mini emanwoo.

column2: On Thrones (of Dignity) will they command a sight (of all things):
column3: Aga'a kpetso fi mini aljanna abo acia fecin yan dondo le.

column2: Thou wilt recognise in their faces the beaming brightness of Bliss.
column3: Woa'tsun fuska zawuncinzhi (muminizhi) wunejin haske ebo ni'iman nan dan beayin nan.

column2: But they had not been sent as keepers over them!
column3: (Soko ma) utun kafirizhi gan afea cin etun musulumizhiotso a matsan kpe kafirizhi.

column2: Their thirst will be slaked with Pure Wine sealed:
column3: Aciaaya egye lilici fin (ege) na'alafi evo kpikpecio nan.

column2: The seal thereof will be Musk: And for this let those aspire who have aspirations:
column3: Kpere na a'kpeunan ugayi almisiko eboacin'o zanazhi gaewa irinnan nan a'dinyin betungurui

column2: With it will be (given) a mixture of Tasnim:
column3: Amagaa egye wuncin zhin keba be yan nae' yigan tasnimu nan.

column2: A spring from (the waters) whereof drink those Nearest to Allah.
column3: (Wa'ato; tasnimu wuncin) nuwan uyio nan eza tsonba Soko (zhi)efinnan.

column2: With it will be (given) a mixture of Tasnim:
column3: Amagaa egye wuncin zhin keba be yan nae' yigan tasnimu nan.

column2: A spring from (the waters) whereof drink those Nearest to Allah.
column3: (Wa'ato; tasnimu wuncin) nuwan uyio nan eza tsonba Soko (zhi)efinnan.

column2: Those in sin used to laugh at those who believed
column3: Akika zanazhi yi eza leifi zhina a'jin afe matsan kpe zanazhia imani jin be Sokoe nan.

column2: And whenever they passed by them used to wink at each other (in mockery);
column3: Kamindondo nam an Musulumizhi gae ganna a'jin afe yeaye afe kadozhi tikpa (eti emi la o).

column2: And when they returned to their own people they would return jesting;
column3: Kamina ma agabea kezhe da'eba zaba'azhina aa'jin afe la'Musulumizhi mi.

column2: And whenever they saw them they would say Behold! These are the people truly astray!
column3: Kamindondo nama aga le musulumizhi ye nan agan: eza egbinzhi elo nan.

column2: And whenever they saw them they would say Behold! These are the people truly astray!
column3: Kamindondo nama aga le musulumizhi ye nan agan: eza egbinzhi elo nan.

column2: But they had not been sent as keepers over them!
column3: (Soko ma) utun kafirizhi gan afea cin etun musulumizhiotso a matsan kpe kafirizhi.

column2: But on this Day the Believers will laugh at the Unbelievers:
column3: Yinna (Wa'ato efo kiyama) muminizhiotsoa matsan kpe kafirizhi.

column2: On Thrones (of Dignity) they will command (a sight) (of all things).
column3: Muminizhi ga'akpetso dan mini aljannan abo acia fe cin yandondo le.

column2: Will not the Unbelievers have been paid back for what they did
column3: (Ye! Muminizhi) ngba ala azaba na kafirizhi yin nan ya'aa

column2: When the sky is rent asunder
column3: Sokoe zhikuti be lokacina sanma'gabea lafilafi nan

column2: And hearkens to (the Command of) its Lord and it must needs (do so);-
column3: Gangani be izini yan tsoci uyin kendoe u-- yin nan.

column2: And when the earth is flattened out
column3: Sokoe zhikuti be lokacina agabea kin (to yanna kpeti kin-bonan) ta cici pa'arae nan.

column2: And casts forth what is within it and becomes (clean) empty
column3: Kanga gancin kin ciga yanazhifi nin yan'ubo kpa'atana ceta fili-o ciga'ake foto e.

column2: And hearkens to (the Command of) its Lord- and it must needs (do so);- (then will come Home the full reality).
column3: Ganganni be izini yan tsoci uyin kendoe u-- yin nan.

column2: O thou man! Verily thou art ever toiling on towards thy Lord- painfully toiling- but thou shalt meet Him.
column3: Ya'a wyoe zawangi akika wodan mini jin jin bawtao natsu man woa dzunboa har da fona wo'ada gunbe Tsoci oyin nan.

column2: Then he who is given his Record in his right hand
column3: Amma'ade zaenindondo na'agabe' litafi etun layau be gwalou yin nan.

column2: Soon will his account be taken by an easy reckoning
column3: A-gaugba egagba natso yi fifanci nan.

column2: Soon will his account be taken by an easy reckoning
column3: A-gaugba egagba natso yi fifanci nan.

column2: And he will turn to his people rejoicing!
column3: Kanga ucin kezhe da'eba yegiwzhi be nimma'e.

column2: But he who is given his Record behind his back-
column3: Amma'ade zaenindondo na'aga litafi etun layau egwa zunao nan.

column2: Soon will he cry for perdition
column3: Zawuncinzhi a kpogun ebo azaba hallaka na aleyenan.

column2: And he will enter a Blazing Fire.
column3: Uma'ada agan dan ena yan sa'irao.

column2: Truly did he go about among his people rejoicing!
column3: (Akika kamina u dan izheonan) ufe manini gun ta-cin iya'iluzhio ebo yan izhe nan gwa'u bo nao.

column2: Truly did he think that he would not have to return (to Us)!
column3: Akika ufe jin zatto ko wyun'a zhebae da tsun Sokoa.

column2: Nay nay! for his Lord was (ever) watchful of him!
column3: Akika Soko ecin zaenindondo le (Be iri enanzandondo gae jin nan).

column2: So I do call to witness the ruddy glow of Sunset;
column3: (Soko-gan) Miezhikuti be igidi yan shafaki. ("Shafaki igidi uyio na'ajin u-tinya ba'acina igidi ga'alomi na. Shafaki nan nan eyi lo'ozun bo u kpeo. Sai uga akpanya sarauyin kanga sallah risha ejin'o).

column2: The Night and its Homing;
column3: Soko ezhikuti ganni be yeshi be nyannazhi yeshi kuyekan kpa'ata nan.

column2: And the Moon in her fullness:
column3: Sokoe zhikuti be etswa'e lokacinauga'anan sarauyin nan.

column2: Ye shall surely travel from stage to stage.
column3: Akika yeya'a fe dzun tinya dangan hali ninio lo hali woro.(Acinga ga hali edunfe yizhe yio wogae dzun nnao wofe lo-woro).

column2: What then is the matter with them that they believe not-
column3: Ki jin'ao acie ya gaskiya'a yin'o

column2: And when the Qur´an is read to them they fall not prostrate
column3: Kandondo nama agaegba alkur'anu ya'ana e'dakpya ya Sokoa.

column2: But on the contrary the Unbelievers reject (it).
column3: Akika de kafirizhi ajin'a fe yi aya' Soko ganman nan.

column2: But Allah has full knowledge of what they secrete (in their breasts)
column3: Akika Soko dekpikpe yan nazhi asodan eko giazhio nan. (Yangban azhionan).

column2: So announce to them a Penalty Grievous
column3: Ebo acin'o ( Annabi) ya'a la'abari yan azaba ba tan na.

column2: Except to those who believe and work righteous deeds: For them is a Reward that will never fail.
column3: Saidai zanazhi ga imani jin-na acie kezhe lotun wangi wangizhi na egagba na'azoanan wun'ajin tabbata ya'a.

column2: By the sky (displaying) the Zodiacal Signs;
column3: Sokoe zhikuti be sanma'e nayibe ecinba yan tswangizhi-ina.

column2: By the promised Day (of Judgment);
column3: Sokoe zhikuti be efonini nan wun'ajin halittazhi kpa'ata alkawali na (ugayi efo kiyama'o).

column2: By one that witnesses and the subject of the witness;-
column3: Sokoe zhikuti be zanae jin rina be yana' ejinri ti'ubo na.

column2: Woe to the makers of the pit (of fire)
column3: La'ana yan Soko wun'ajin tabbata ya zanazhi egbagu- she aza'aba ya muminizhi nan.

column2: Fire supplied (abundantly) with fuel:
column3: Aciele gushe wuncinzhi she be-enan kikeci-ina.

column2: Fire supplied (abundantly) with fuel:
column3: Aciele gushe wuncinzhi she be-enan kikeci-ina.

column2: Behold! they sat over against the (fire)
column3: Kanga atso nunsa-kafirizhi cia fedun -- ba enan na'agun nan.

column2: And they witnessed (all) that they were doing against the Believers.
column3: Acife cin iri azba naejin muminizhi na le.

column2: And they ill-treated them for no other reason than that they believed in Allah Exalted in Power Worthy of all Praise!-A
column3: mae jin'a azaba nnazhi jin'a sai dai ebo gaskiya na'aya be Sokoe nan. Etsu na yi Etsu zankpe na Etsu na zandondoe jin yebo ya na.

column2: Him to Whom belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth! And Allah is Witness to all things.
column3: Etsu nawun mulki sanma be kin yin kpa'atana akika Soko ecin yandondo le

column2: Those who persecute (or draw into temptation) the Believers men and women and do not turn in repentance will have the Penalty of Hell: They will have the Penalty of the Burning Fire.
column3: Akika zanazhi ajin afe la fitina datsun mumini ba'agizhi be mumina yinzagizhina ama ba gafara be Soko yan'ana azaba yan jahannama wun'ajin tabbata ya'a azaba na'e po zana wun'ajin tabbata ta etiabo.

column2: For those who believe and do righteous deeds will be Gardens; beneath which rivers flow: That is the great Salvation (the fulfilment of all desires)
column3: Akika zanazhi ga imani jin na acie kezhe lotun wangi wangizhina aljanna na Soko panin be nuwan lilici na wun'ajin tabbata ya'a akika nanan Robo wanciko uyio.

column2: Truly strong is the Grip (and Power) of thy Lord.
column3: Akika winwan (azaba) yan Tsoci wye u tsanin sarauyin.

column2: It is He Who creates from the very beginning and He can restore (life).
column3: Akika Soko gaeca jin jin halittazhio wun gama a kezhe bea ye rayi dan ba'aci ajali'abo.

column2: And He is the Oft-Forgiving Full of Loving-Kindness
column3: Soko gama yi Etsu nae jin wuzhi gaafara nan'o u mayi Etsu nade cincin ya halittazhi kpata nan.

column2: Lord of the Throne of Glory
column3: Soko gawun gado mulki yan Al'arashi na wancin nao.

column2: Doer (without let) of all that He intends.
column3: Soko Etsu uyio nae jin yan'na bau na.

column2: Has the story reached thee of the forces-
column3: Annabi! Ngba wyo de la'bari yan ekunguncizhi'anii

column2: Of Pharaoh and the Thamud
column3: Ekungunci yan Fir'auna be Samuduzhi.

column2: And yet the Unbelievers (persist) in rejecting (the Truth)!
column3: Akika kafirizhi'ajin afe yi aya Soko ganmana.

column2: But Allah doth encompass them from behind!
column3: Soko ma'a alamarizhi makezhe zunmao baenio.

column2: Day this is a Glorious Qur´an
column3: Akika egan nnazhi kpata yan alkur'anu na wancin nan ayio.

column2: (Inscribed) in a Tablet Preserved!
column3: Na dan mini elo nayi tswitswaci nan.

column2: By the Sky and the Night-Visitant (therein);-
column3: Sokoe zhi kuti be tswangi nazhi etinya yeshi nan.

column2: And what will explain to thee what the Night-Visitant is-
column3: (Annabi ki-ma ala kpikpe yan yan'na-eya ta'riquna wu wyo yao

column2: (It is) the Star of piercing brightness;-
column3: Tswangi Uyio na'ajin'u na-tinya sarauyin be yeshi na.

column2: There is no soul but has a protector over it.
column3: Akika rayi ndondo nae sunsun na Sokoa Malaika nazhi atswau na jin yau.

column2: Now let man but think from what he is created!
column3: Zawangi ndondo ucin'ule'u lo' ngba dangan ki-ibo Soko a'jin alitta wun'o

column2: He is created from a drop emitted-
column3: Akika Soko jin alittau jin dagan nuwan na'ajin u fe dagwa tinya nao.

column2: Proceeding from between the backbone and the ribs:(
column3: Nuwan wuncin) na ajin'u tinya dangan tsukun zumao be edin yan yangban'e nan.Surah 86:8   Surely (Allah) is able to bring him back (to life)!Akika Soko de kagbo na uga'a dan zawangi rayi ba'aci ajali'u bo nan.

column2: The Day that (all) things secret will be tested
column3: (Sokoe pa ye tukpea) efona aa bea asiri zhi kuzhizhi filio nan

column2: (Man) will have no power and no helper.
column3: Akika efo wuncin zaenindondo' ade kagboa uma ade zana'ajin'u taimako na'a.Surah 86:11  By the Firmament which returns (in its round)Sokoe zhi kuti be sanma'e na'ajin udule zhin kin nan.

column2: And by the Earth which opens out (for the gushing of springs or the sprouting of vegetation)-
column3: Sokoe zhi kuti be kin yin na'ajin u kpemi ebo yangici yezhi'u tinya nan

column2: Behold this is the Word that distinguishes (Good from Evil):
column3: Akika egan nnazhi kpata gaskiya ayio.

column2: It is not a thing for amusement.
column3: Egan Sokoma ujin egan edzoa.

column2: As for them they are but plotting a scheme
column3: Akika kafirizhi ajin afe jin tanadi dede.

column2: And I am planning a scheme.
column3: Mi Soko ma Mie jin tanadi azaba ka'atso na wancin nan.

column2: Therefore grant a delay to the Unbelievers: Give respite to them gently (for awhile).
column3: Ebo acin'o Annabi ga dinye ya azaba na'ajin kafirizhi nama akika Mie cin-ta cinya'a degi har da lokacina Mia be cin azaba ta'a nan.

column2: Woe to those that deal in fraud-
column3: Aza'aba yan zunyesun wun'ajin tabbata ta eti zanazhie ke tsunwan tukun nan.

column2: Those who when they have to receive by measure from men exact full measure
column3: (Azaba yan zunyesun) wun 'ajin tabbata ta' eti) zanazhie kaimina agae -- -dan eba zazhio nan a'jin afewa shishe yan tsunwan nan.

column2: But when they have to give by measure or weight to men give less than due.
column3: Ammaa kakun nan agae dan tsunwan ya'ezazhi nan a'jin afewa shishe yan tsunwan nan.

column2: Do they not think that they will be called to account-
column3: (Zanazhie ke tsunwan tukun nan) beke aya gaskiya ya gan Sokoa' beasan ba'aci ajalia bo'a na

column2: On a Mighty Day
column3: Ebo efo na wancin sarauyin nan.

column3: Efo nan zawangizhi kpa'ata aa gikini yegboro Tsoci nae kpa halittazhi kpa'ata nan.

column2: Nay! Surely the record of the wicked is (preserved) in Sijjin.
column3: Akika litafi etun yan leifi jinci zhi udan mini sijjinuo.

column2: And what will explain to thee what Sijjin is
column3: Ki'ma ayawe labari yanna'e ye sijjanu nao

column2: (There is) a Register (fully) inscribed.
column3: Lita fi uyio nan eka etun'nyan leifi jincizhi fi nan.

column2: Woe that Day to those that deny-
column3: Azaba yan zunyesun wun'ajin tabbataefo wuncin ta'eti ganmanna zunci zhio.
Those that deny the Day of Judgment.Zanazhie yi efo egagba ganmanan nan.

column3: Ama'ade zanae dza efonna wan na'a saidai zaenin dondo nagae gbin iya'ke Soko tu-nan umayi leifi jinci nan.

column3: Kandondo nagae gba katun yan a'yayi (Soko) ya'unan ugan: ecin yan za pa'ayinzhi uyio.

column3: Akika efo wuncin aga'a zawun cizhi kanye ke yegun Soko lugwa.

column3: Ki'ima ala kpikpen yan yanna'eye illiyyuna nan wu wyo yao

column3: Litafi uyio na eka etun yan muminizhi fi nan.

column2: To which bear witness those Nearest (to Allah).
column3: Za nazhi yi ezaq tsonba Soko nan e'jinri yan alamari wuncin.

column2: Truly the Righteous will be in Bliss:
column3: Akika zanazhie' lamitu foro Soko nan afi mini emanwo-o.

column2: Truly the Righteous will be in Bliss:
column3: Akika zanazhie' lamitu foro Soko nan afi mini emanwo-o.

column2: On Thrones (of Dignity) will they command a sight (of all things):
column3: Aga'a kpetso fi mini aljanna abo acia fecin yan dondo le.

column2: Thou wilt recognise in their faces the beaming brightness of Bliss.
column3: Woa'tsun fuska zawuncinzhi (muminizhi) wun-ejin haske ebo ni'iman nan dan beayin nan.

column2: Their thirst will be slaked with Pure Wine sealed:
column3: Aciaaya egye lilici fin (ege) na'alafi evo kpikpecio nan.

column2: Their thirst will be slaked with Pure Wine sealed:
column3: Aciaaya egye lilici fin (ege) na'alafi evo kpikpecio nan.

column2: The seal thereof will be Musk: And for this let those aspire who have aspirations:
column4: Kpere na a'kpeunan ugayi almisiko ebo-acin'o zanazhi gaewa irin-nan nan a'dinyin betungurui

column2: With it will be (given) a mixture of Tasnim:
column3: Amagaa egye wuncin zhin keba be yan nae' yigan tasnimu nan.

column2: A spring from (the waters) whereof drink those Nearest to Allah.
column3: (Wa'ato; tasnimu wuncin) nuwan uyio nan eza tsonba Soko (zhi)-efin-nan.

column2: Those in sin used to laugh at those who believed
column3: Akika zanazhi yi eza leifi zhina a'jin afe matsan kpe zanazhi-a imani jin be Soko-e nan.

column2: And whenever they passed by them used to wink at each other (in mockery);
column3: Kamindondo nam an Musulumizhi gae--- gan-na a'jin afe yea-ye afe kadozhi tikpa (eti emi la o).

column2: And when they returned to their own people they would return jesting;
column3: Kamina ma agabea kezhe da'eba zaba'azhina aa'jin afe la'Musulumizhi mi.

column2: And whenever they saw them they would say "Behold! These are the people truly astray!"
column3: Kamindondo nama aga le musulumizhi ye nan agan: eza egbinzhi elo nan.

column2: But they had not been sent as keepers over them!
column3: (Soko ma) utun kafirizhi gan afea cin etun musulumizhi-otso a matsan kpe kafirizhi.

column2: But on this Day the Believers will laugh at the Unbelievers:
column3: Yinna (Wa'ato efo kiyama) muminizhi-otsoa matsan kpe kafirizhi.

column2: On Thrones (of Dignity) they will command (a sight) (of all things).
column3: Muminizhi ga'akpetso dan mini aljannan abo acia fe cin yandondo le.

column2: Will not the Unbelievers have been paid back for what they did
column3: (Ye! Muminizhi) ngba ala azaba na-- kafirizhi yin nan ya'aa

column2: By the break of Day
column3: Sokoe zhi kuti be lokaci yan alfijiri-i.

column2: By the Nights twice five;
column3: Sokoe zhi kuti be yeshi guwo (yan mafari yan etswa zulhijja nan).

column2: By the even and odd (contrasted);
column3: Sokoe zhi kuti be yanazhi yibe tsudoe na be yanayi nini ude tsudoa nan.

column2: By the even and odd (contrasted);
column3: Sokoe zhi kuti be yanazhi yibe tsudoe na be yanayi nini ude tsudoa nan.

column2: And by the Night when it passeth away;-
column3: Sokoe zhi kuti be yeshi'i lokacina ugae dazan'da zobau nan.

column2: Is there (not) in these an adjuration (or evidence) for those who understand
column3: Asa kutizhi kedan bawuncin'o ya zae zhi de ankali na

column2: Seest thou not how thy Lord dealt with the ´Ad (people)-
column3: Wyo le kendoe Tsoci wye jinjin be za kin yan Aduzhi-I na yea (Adu nanazhi aga Soko tun Annabi Hudu fio).

column2: Of the (city of) Iram with lofty pillars
column3: To Irama nazhi etu kata nazhi yibe ekpo wancikozhi-I nan. (za' ezhimi yan Aduzhi gabo atso dan'o eza kin yan Irama nanzhi-I ayi be katazhi nazhi latu sarauyin na Soko ma jin kpawun be kagboe ya'a sarauyin).

column2: The like of which were not produced in (all) the land
column3: Nama ajin halitta ndoci dozhin yan Irama zhi dan kin ndondo bea na.

column2: And with the Thamud (people) who cut out (huge) rocks in the valley-
column3: Be kendoe Soko jin jin be Samuduzhi-ina zanazhi gboka tun ekpona a' jin afe ban takun to pati wancikozhi be egwa'azhi'ina acie laujin kata lilecizhina.

column2: And with Pharaoh lord of stakes
column3: Be kendoe Soko jin be Fir'auna na yibe kangari (nawun'e la jin zawangizhi azaba na).Surah 89:10  And with Pharaoh lord of stakesBe kendoe Soko jin be Fir'auna na yibe kangari (nawun'e la jin zawangizhi azaba na).

column2: (All) these transgressed beyond bounds in the lands
column3: Kp'ata zanazhi'a tunye da'ana agbin iyaka Soko tu dan kinmiazhio.

column2: And heaped therein mischief (on mischief).
column3: Ama fe nyi yanzhi sarauyin fi kinbo.

column2: Therefore did thy Lord pour on them a scourge of diverse chastisements:
column3: Soko' ci cin azaba yan hallaka na tan sarauyin na be yaa kpa'ata.

column2: For thy Lord is (as a Guardian) on a watch-tower.
column3: Akika Sokoe cin yana zandondo'e jin na le.

column2: Now as for man when his Lord trieth him giving him honour and gifts then saith he (puffed up) "My Lord hath honoured me."
column3: Udan mini tabia dede yan zawangio kami ndondo na Soko gau macinle be eryatwa yan cinwan ko be arziki yan emawo yizhe na wun'a fe pe' u fe leye gan kagbo'u tsayi yana din arziki wuncin be ya wun'o nan.

column2: But when He trieth him restricting his subsistence for him then saith he (in despair) "My Lord hath humiliated me!"
column3: Soko ma gau ma cinle ucia eko yan arziki'uzhi ke tukun wun'a fe kpo gun za gan: Soko'a wun gba wun'a wun sunzunye.

column2: Nay nay! but ye honour not the orphans!
column3: (Akika ma Soko sunza zunyea sai dai zana ga shi zunyesun na. Nimi etun dede yan ye zawangizhio) yeye-ya ekungizhi cinwan'a.

column2: Nor do ye encourage one another to feed the poor!-
column3: Ye mae jin dozhi kwadaria eti yangici na yea la twarya ya talakazhi to eza gwagbagizhi na'a.

column2: And ye devour inheritance - all with greed
column3: Ye ma'ajin yefe gi dukiya yan ekungizhi kendoe ga man fi ye nan.

column2: And ye love wealth with inordinate love!
column3: Ye mae wa dukiya yizhe wa eko ndond wiwa yan baeni.

column2: Nay! When the earth is pounded to powder
column3: Amaa'de Sokoe pa ye tukpa yan lokaci na kin nana agau -- ruku kpata na.

column2: And thy Lord cometh and His angels rank upon rank
column3: Kanga mala'ikazhi ci gaa dzunzhin be foro Sokoe aciga' ta safu-safu.

column2: And Hell that Day is brought (face to face)- on that Day will man remember but how will that remembrance profit him
column3: Ama gaa enan yan jahannama la' dzunzhin zaeni ndondo'a fe pa iri etun nazhi ulo yizheo nan ammaa pipa wuncin wun'ajin amfani fo gaa.

column2: He will say: "Ah! Would that I had sent forth (good deeds) for (this) my (Future) Life!"
column3: Zawangi cia fe gangan kaasa're ngan miga kpekpe gan aninga efo kiyama yio mia to tun guruzhi na mia de amfaniu yinnan nan.

column2: For that Day His Chastisement will be such as none (else) can inflict
column3: Efo wuncin a'jin zawangi azaba iri na a laa jin alitta ndondo lea nan.

column2: And His bonds will be such as none (other) can bind.
column3: Amaga zawangi pa fo gaa pipa iri naa laa pa alitta ndondo lea na.

column2: (To the righteous soul will be said:) "O (thou) soul in (complete) rest and satisfaction!
column3: Ya ye rayi yan muminizhi nazhi'a funin be (pipa) Sokoe nan.

column2: "Come back thou to thy Lord- well pleased (thyself) and well-pleasing unto Him!
column3: Ekezhe dazhin eba Tsoci ye nae kpa ye na efe fa yangban be ni'ima Sokoe kendoe Soko otso'e fa yangban be etun yezhi'i. na

column2: "Enter thou then among My devotees!
column3: Ebo acin'o a gandan taacin wuzhi Mi zhio.

column2: "Yea enter thou My Heaven!
column3: Wyo mao lao gan'o dan Aljanna Mi bo.

column2: A (declaration) of immunity from Allah and His Messenger to those of the Pagans with whom ye have contracted mutual alliances:-
column3: Egwa-wa danna dagan eba Soko to Tuciu lo eba zanazhi ye jin alkawali beyin mini zanazhie la yan pa Soko baci nao.

column2: Go ye then for four months backwards and forwards (as ye will) throughout the land but know ye that ye cannot frustrate Allah (by your falsehood) but that Allah will cover with shame those who reject Him.
column3: Ebo acin'o efe dazan kpe eti kinbo har etswa gunni (kafa uyio na Soko ya kafirizhi na) ye mae kpe-ewo kede ye yegan Soko gwa woa na hakika ma Soko ga kafirizhi sunzunye.

column1: Surah 9:3                               And an announcement from Allah and His Messenger to the people (assembled) on the day o
column2: f the Great Pilgrimage- that Allah and His Messenger dissolve (treaty) obligations with the Pagans. If then ye repent it were best for you; but if ye turn away know ye that ye cannot frustrate Allah. And proclaim a grievous penalty to those who reject Faith.
column3: Emi-ya ma danna dagan eba Soko to Tuciuyin lo eba zawangizhi efo haji wanciko kede hakika Soko to Tuciu agwa'a wa be zanazhie la yan pa Soko baci nae. Ebo acin'o ye ga tuba jin to wuncin'afe alheri yae gan ye ma ga zunma zheta to yekpe-ewo kede hakika ye gan Soko gwa'a na wyo mao ya zanazhia jin kafirinci na labari yan azaba na yi tintanci na.

column2: (But the treaties are) not dissolved with those Pagans with whom ye have entered into alliance and who have not subsequently failed you in aught nor aided any one against you. So fulfil your engagements with them to the end of their term: for Allah loveth the righteous.
column3: Sai de zanazhi ye ga jin alkawali be yin mini zanazhie la yan pa Soko baci gancin ma ake ye yandondoa na amajin zandondo taimako be gunye kun'ana to yea alkawaliazhi she ya'har da lokaci na yega jin yeda bedozhina. Hakika Soko wyun'e wa zanazhi gaetswa Soko cie sundan'una.

column2: But when the forbidden months are past then fight and slay the Pagans wherever ye find them an seize them beleaguer them and lie in wait for them in every stratagem (of war); but if they repent and establish regular prayers and practise regular charity then open the way for them: for Allah is Oft-forgiving Most Merciful.
column3: Gancin-ma etswa yan alfurma zhi ga'a gwo gan to egun mushirikizhi kun bandondo na ye ga tswo'a gwa-na ye mae la'ae wan ye mae la'ae kan'edan ye mae tsoe ka'a ecinba ndondo. Gancin aga bea tuba jin acia sallah ku gikini acia zakka dukiya'azhi wa to yea ekoa ya ya'a. Hakika Soko Etsu gafara uyio Etsu yegun ma uyio

column2: If one amongst the Pagans ask thee for asylum grant it to him so that he may hear the word of Allah; and then escort him to where he can be secure. That is because they are men without knowledge.
column3: Za eni ndondo mini mushirikizhio na ga wa tsonba wyoe ebo tswitswa'ona egwo'u tswa har u-wo egan Soko gancin ye cie la wyun'elobana uga'de aminci na wuncin mayi ebo na a'fe jama'a nazhi de kpikpea na.

column2: How can there be a league before Allah and His Messenger with the Pagans except those with whom ye made a treaty near the sacred Mosque As long as these stand true to you stand ye true to them: for Allah doth love the righteous.
column3: Ke wun'a yi yi mushirikizhi cia de alkawali ndoci dan be Sokoe to be Tuci'u yin nao Sai de nazhi ye ga jin alkawali be yin eba massalaci haramio na. To atso gaa da gboro be ye yin to yetso a da b-- ro bea yin. Hakika Sokoe wa zanazhi gae tswau acie sundan'u na.

column2: How (can there be such a league) seeing that if they get an advantage over you they respect not in you the ties either of kinship or of covenant With (fair words from) their mouths they entice you but their hearts are averse from you; and most of them are rebellious and wicked.
column3: Ke'u yi yi nao ala'lima aga'ade zankpe ta eti yebo a'atswa zumunci ndondo ko amana be yin'a yin'o Ade'ajin afe jin yeda be ye yin yan misun'azhi yangban'azhi mae navo. Ekun-dondo ma fasikizhi ayio.

column2: The Signs of Allah have they sold for a miserable price and (many) have they hindered from His way: evil indeed are the deeds they have done
column3: .A aya Soko zhi la'ashi ewo-izhe na yi te ten gi na gancin acie kan zawangi zhi ezan ta eti ekpa Soko. Hakika zawuncin zhi etun nae lo na a biye.

column2: In a Believer they respect not the ties either of kinship or of covenant! It is they who have transgressed all bounds.E tswa zumun ci ndondo ya muminia baleotso acia gangan alkawalia zawuncin zhi ma aga yi zanazhie gbin iya ka tu nao.
But (even so) if they repent establish regular prayers and practise regular charity- they are your brethren in Faith: (thus) do We explain the Signs in detail for those who understand.
column3: To aga bea tuba jin acia sallah ku gikini acia zakka dukiya'azhi wa to a'zhe yegi yezhi'ani dan'ona mini adinio. Yi mae kpe ayazhi ye ka ka yin ya zanazhi ga de kpikpe na.

column2: But (even so) if they repent establish regular prayers and practise regular charity- they are your brethren in Faith: (thus) do We explain the Signs in detail for those who understand.
column3: To aga bea tuba jin acia sallah ku gikini acia zakka dukiya'azhi wa to a'zhe yegi yezhi'ani dan'ona mini adinio. Yi mae kpe ayazhi ye ka ka yin ya zanazhi ga de kpikpe na.

column2: But if they violate their oaths after their covenant and taunt you for your Faith- fight ye the chiefs of Unfaith: for their oaths are nothing to them: that thus they may be restrained.
column3: Ama ga kuti nazhia zhi na lo ya baci na a alkawali jin na acie ke zhe tun adini ye zhi yan (be egan de de zhi) to egun dzoshicin yan kafirin ci zhi kun. Hakika a ade kuti zhi yan gaskiya dan bea yin'a: ujin wo be wunci'y aga egwa kpe yan na akan-nao.

column2: Will ye not fight people who violated their oaths plotted to expel the Messenger and took the aggressive by being the first (to assault) you Do ye fear them Nay it is Allah Whom ye should more justly fear if ye believe!
column3: Kashi ye'a gun zana zhia kutizhiazhi leba na kun'a ama kezhea kpa gan aga tuci nyan-dzun na'a agama ka'yn dzun fi ye eti wun bo Soko tsa gwoyin na yea sundan'u nao wun'a yi mumini zhi ye yio na.

column2: Will ye not fight people who violated their oaths plotted to expel the Messenger and took the aggressive by being the first (to assault) you Do ye fear them Nay it is Allah Whom ye should more justly fear if ye believe!
column3: Kashi ye'a gun zana zhia kutizhiazhi leba na kun'a ama kezhea kpa gan aga tuci nyan-dzun na'a agama ka'yn dzun fi ye eti wun bo Soko tsa gwoyin na yea sundan'u nao wun'a yi mumini zhi ye yio na.

column2: Fight them and Allah will punish them by your hands cover them with shame help you (to victory) over them heal the breasts of Believers
column3: E gun'a kun Soko'ajin'a azaba be egwa ye zhi uma ga'a sun zun ye uma'a jin'e taimako ta etiabo uma ga fifo la'adan yangban mumini zhio.

column2: And still the indignation of their hearts. For Allah will turn (in mercy) to whom He will; and Allah is All-Knowing All-Wise.
column3: U m a ga ewunzhe na fi yangba'azhio na la keyabo Soko ma'agwo tuba yan za na ga ba una. Soko ma Etsu hikima Uyio.

column2: Or think ye that ye shall be abandoned as though Allah did not know those among you who strive with might and main and take none for friends and protectors except Allah His Messenger and the (community of) Believers But Allah is well-acquainted with (all) that ye do.
column3: Kashi ye kpa ye kpa gan ala ye yea lugwa tun Soko la'ala elatu dan zanazhie jin jihidi mini yebo ama la zandondo zunma Soko be tuciu yin be mumini zhi eya man cia na Sokoma yi be kpikpe yan etun nazhi ye lo na.

column2: It is not for such as join gods with Allah to visit or maintain the mosques of Allah while they witness against their own souls to infidelity. The works of such bear no fruit: In Fire shall they dwell.
column3: Ugwoyin ya mushiriki zhi na'afe layedan masallaci Soko na'a ala'ali ma atso jin ri ya titaacin'a be etun kafirinci nae lo na. Zawuncinzhi etun'azhi kpata-agbin ya ena bo amaa'afi tu tun yin'o.

column2: The mosques of Allah shall be visited and maintained by such as believe in Allah and the Last Day establish regular prayers and practise regular charity and fear none (at all) except Allah. It is they who are expected to be on true guidance.
column3: Hakika de zanazhia la yedan masallaci Soko na aga yi zana zhi ga imani jin be Sokoe nao to be efo zobae ucia sallah kugikini na ucia zakka dukiya'u wa nao gancin umae sundan zandoa sai de Soko. To kengi uyio zawuncin zhia la'afe dan mini eza bawuzhio.

column2: Do ye make the giving of drink to pilgrims or the maintenance of the Sacred Mosque equal to (the pious service of) those who believe in Allah and the Last Day and strive with might and main in the cause of Allah They are not comparable in the sight of Allah: and Allah guides not those who do wrong.
column3: Kashi ye ga eyanfinci na ye la ya alhaji zhi na to eye na ye ladan masallaci harami na lasan tatu be zana'a imani jin be Sokoe to be efo-zobae uci kezhe jin kokari ta ekpa Soko ebo elatu musulun ciona A'fe ye'ni eba Soko boa. Soko mae la jama'a yan azwalumi zhi ke eko gurua.

column2: Those who believe and suffer exile and strive with might and main in Allah´s cause with their goods and their persons have the highest rank in the sight of Allah: they are the people who will achieve (salvation).
column3: Zana zhia imani jin na acia kpe la ke eyan de de lugwa na acie jin kokari ta eti ekpa Soko be dukiya'a zhi to rayia zhi na ayibe daraja na wancin gan na eba Soko zawunci zhi maaga yi eza rabo zhio.

column2: Their Lord doth give them glad tidings of a Mercy from Himself of His good pleasure and of gardens for them wherein are delights that endure:
column3: Tsocia mae ya'a labari yangbanfa be yegun ndoci dagan eba ubo ganna be yeda jin-y be emi aljanna zhi miniabo eman zhi danbo na'azoa na.

column2: They will dwell therein for ever. Verily in Allah´s presence is a reward the greatest (of all).
column3: Ba'gabo ma afi tutun yin-o.Hakika egagba na wancin na udan be sokoe.

column2: O ye who believe! take not for protectors your fathers and your brothers if they love infidelity above Faith: if any of you do so they do wrong.
column3: Ya ye nazhia imani jin na! Ega la mima'ezhi to ye gi ezhi masoyi zhi ma a beke aga cin cin la'aya kafirinci ta eti imanio na. Za eni ndondo miniebo na ga la'a masoyi na to zawunci zhi aga yi azwalumi zhio.

column2: Say: If it be that your fathers your sons your brothers your mates or your kindred; the wealth that ye have gained; the commerce in which ye fear a decline: or the dwellings in which ye delight - are dearer to you than Allah or His Messenger or the striving in His cause;- then wait until Allah brings about His decision: and Allah guides not the rebellious.
column3: Gan cin : wun'a yi gan ba ba ye zhi to egi ye zhi to yegi ye zhi to nyimi ye zhi (ko eba yazhi) to dangi ye zhi to dukiya nazhi ye kuyekan na to woce na ye sundan zunzunyana aga baye gan Soko to tuciu to kokari jin ta ekpa Soko-bo to eda zhi zhie har da kamina Sokoga'la umurni (foro)ndoci be na! Soko mae la jama'a yan fasiki zhi ke ekoa.

column2: Assuredly Allah did help you in many battle-fields and on the day of Hunain: Behold! your great numbers elated you but they availed you naught: the land for all that it is wide did constrain you and ye turned back in retreat.
column3: Hakika Soko jin ye taimako danna nazhi dokun nao to Efo Hunaynu kamina ekundo ye fe ya ye shaawa na uma kunke yaye wo be yandondo yin'a gancin ma kin cia yiku yaye bana ugwo dakan na gan cin yecia zunma zheta fe lo.

column2: But Allah did pour His calm on the Messenger and on the Believers and sent down forces which ye saw not: He punished the Unbelievers; thus doth He reward those without Faith.
column3: Gancin Soko cia yangban shiu cin be ya tuciu to ya muminizhi uci cin ekun gun ci ndoci zhi be-yn na ye lea ye'a na uci jin zanazhia kafirinci jin na azaba wuncin ga ma yi egagba yan kafirizhio.

column2: Again will Allah after this turn (in mercy) to whom He will: for Allah is Oft-forgiving Most Merciful.
column3: Gancin zunma wuncin'o Soko cia -- tuba yan zanaga ba'una Soko ma Etsu gafara uyio Etsu yegun uyio

column2: O ye who believe! Truly the Pagans are unclean; so let them not after this year of theirs approach the Sacred Mosque. And if ye fear poverty soon will Allah enrich you if He wills out of His bounty for Allah is All-knowing All-wise.
column3: Ya ye nazhi imani jin na! Hakika mushirikizhi (nazhie la yan pa Soko baci na) Shikan ayio ebo acin'o aga kara ye ba masallaci Harami baci eya'a nanao ma. Ye ma gae sundan talauci to bele'yin Sokoa jin kunkunke yaye dagan mini arzikiubo uga bau na. Hakika Soko Etsu kpikpe UyioEtsu hikima Uyio.

column2: Fight those who believe not in Allah nor the Last Day nor hold that forbidden which hath been forbidden by Allah and His Messenger nor acknowledge the religion of Truth (even if they are) of the People of the Book until they pay the Jizya with willing submission and feel themselves subdued.
column3: E gun zanazhie jin imani be Soko yin'ana to be Efozoba yin'ana ekun amae la yan na Soko be Tuci'u yin gaa lazhe haramu na haramua na amae jin adini yan gaskiya tsoa fi mini zanazhi ala litafi ya na har sai aga edu yan jizya ya be egwa'ayin ama' la'afe eza gbagbangizhi.

column2: The Jews call ´Uzair a son of Allah and the Christians call Christ the son of Allah. That is a saying from their mouth; (in this) they but imitate what the unbelievers of old used to say. Allah´s curse be on them: how they are deluded away from the Truth!
column3: Ya huduzhi ma gan: uzairu egi Soko uyio" Nasarazhi ma gan: "Masihu egi Soko uyi" wuncin de egan'uyio nae dagan be misun'zhina. Amae san. La'ana Soko (kuti) ta eti abo! Ki-ila acie pan'a ke eko guru lugwao

column2: They take their priests and their anchorites to be their lords in derogation of Allah and (they take as their Lord) Christ the son of Mary; yet they were commanded to worship but One Allah: there is no god but He. Praise and glory to Him: (Far is He) from having the partners they associate (with Him).
column3: (Yahuduzhi) A' man yan'azhi la to (Nasarazhi) a man-yan'azhi la tsocizhi baci Soko acia Masihu egi maryamu la acinga. Ama jin'a umurni ndoci jin'a saide ajin bau ta'aya Tsoci Nini ke te gbu'ugi. Ade Tsoci ndocia sai wyun'y Lili ma'ajin tabbata ya Soko ke yan nazhi e-la pau baci na. lugwa

column2: Fain would they extinguish Allah´s light with their mouths but Allah will not allow but that His light should be perfected even though the Unbelievers may detest (it).
column3: E-wa gan a la haske-Soko'a nua ya be missun'zhi Soko mae navo sai de uga haske u gun-mi ka'a da ma kafiri zhi ga navo na.

column2: It is He Who hath sent His Messenger with guidance and the Religion of Truth to proclaim it over all religion even though the Pagans may detest (it).
column3: Wyun gayi Etsu na tun Tuci'u tun be bawu'ito be adini yan gaskiya yin'o na ebo ula wyun'u la'u ta eti Adinizhio kpata ka'a da ma mushrikunazhi (nazhie la yan pa Soko baci na ) ga navo na

column2: O ye who believe! there are indeed many among the priests and anchorites who in Falsehood devour the substance of men and hinder (them) from the way of Allah. And there are those who bury gold and silver and spend it not in the way of Allah: announce unto them a most grievous penalty-Ya ye nazhia imani jin na!
column3: Hakika kundondo dagan mini Ahbaruzhio (man yan yahuduzhi) to Ruhba nuzhi (man yan Nasarazhi) a jin'afe gi dukiya zazhi eti ganmanao ama'ajin afe kan zazhi eko Soko yin-da. Za nazhi mae ku dukiya zinzriya be azarfae yekan na amae wu'a fi eko Soko boa na to yan azaba na yi tintanci na.

column2: On the Day when heat will be produced out of that (wealth) in the fire of Hell and with it will be branded their foreheads their flanks and their backs their flanks and their backs.- "This is the (treasure) which ye buried for yourselves: taste ye then the (treasures) ye buried!"
column3: Fo na aga po'u ta eti dukiyao dan mini ena jahannamao na aci gau la'aba'a ye gun'azhio to kansan'azhio to zunma'azhio(acia fe gan'a gan):"Nana ga yi yanna ye tso ku yekan zhi-zhi ya eti tacin-yetso nao ebo acio'o efe fin azaba yan yannazhi yetso fe ku yekan (izheo na)

column2: The number of months in the sight of Allah is twelve (in a year)- so ordained by Him the day He created the heavens and the earth; of them four are sacred: that is the straight usage. So wrong not yourselves therein and fight the Pagans all together as they fight you all together. But know that Allah is with those who restrain themselves.
column3: Hakika lisafi yan etswazhi (nadan eya ninio) eba Soko'o na uga yi etswa gu wo be guba yin'o kendoe uyi dan litafi Soko dagan fo-na ajin alitta sanmazhi to kin na miniabo ma gunni danbo nazhi yi Etswa alfurmazhi na. Wuncin ga yi adini yan gboro. Ebo acin'o ega jin ti tacin yezhi zwalunci fi bo ma. Ye mae gun mushrikizhi bae nio kendoe atsoe gun ye baenio na. Ye mae kpe ewo kede hakika Soko ajin udan be zanazhi gae tswau acie sundan'unae.

column2: The number of months in the sight of Allah is twelve (in a year)- so ordained by Him the day He created the heavens and the earth; of them four are sacred: that is the straight usage. So wrong not yourselves therein and fight the Pagans all together as they fight you all together. But know that Allah is with those who restrain themselves.
column3: Hakika lisafi yan etswazhi (nadan eya ninio) eba Soko'o na uga yi etswa gu wo be guba yin'o kendoe uyi dan litafi Soko dagan fo-na ajin alitta sanmazhi to kin na miniabo ma gunni danbo nazhi yi Etswa alfurmazhi na. Wuncin ga yi adini yan gboro. Ebo acin'o ega jin ti tacin yezhi zwalunci fi bo ma. Ye mae gun mushrikizhi bae nio kendoe atsoe gun ye baenio na. Ye mae kpe ewo kede hakika Soko ajin udan be zanazhi gae tswau acie sundan'unae.

column2: Verily the transposing (of a prohibited month) is an addition to Unbelief: the Unbelievers are led to wrong thereby: for they make it lawful one year and forbidden another year in order to adjust the number of months forbidden by Allah and make such forbidden ones lawful. The evil of their course seems pleasing to them. But Allah guideth not those who reject Faith.
column3: Hakika de lila-lo yegboro (yan Etswa Alfurma) Na ye jin na bibe uyio dan mini kafirincio be wun cin'y ma zanazhi'ajin kafirinci na ela'agbin ke eko wangi lugwa :e'la etswa la'azhe halali eya-ndoci eyandoci ma u'u'la'azhe haramu ebo de ala emigun'a la'adan lisafi yane tswa na Soko lazhe haramu nao. Ajin afe la yan-na Soko'a la jin haramu na a'ula'zhe halali. A etun dedezhi panin fia Soko mae la kafirizhi ke ekoa.

column2: O ye who believe! what is the matter with you that when ye are asked to go forth in the cause of Allah ye cling heavily to the earth Do ye prefer the life of this world to the Hereafter But little is the comfort of this life as compared with the Hereafter.
column3: Ya ye nazhia imani jin na! ki'i jin ye yeo kandondo na aga gan ye gan: "E nakin gun kun ta eti ekpa Soko na "ye ajin yea nakanzhi lukpin kpe eti kinbo nao Kashi ye-yea ye dajin be eman edunfe izhe agan yan Efo zobaa Edunfe izhe ma ufe yandondo dan mini eku boa sai de te tengi.

column2: Unless ye go forth He will punish you with a grievous penalty and put others in your place; but Him ye would not harm in the least. For Allah hath power over all things.
column3: Kagan ye dzu tinya da gunkun'a Sokoa jin'e azaba na tan na uma ga'a egwa-san la'adan'e be jama'a ndocizhi na jin ye yana (kinigibae bo) ye maa la egun ndondo tso'u woa. Soko ma Etsu uyio na de kagbo ta eti yan dondo na.

column2: If ye help not (your leader) (it is no matter): for Allah did indeed help him when the Unbelievers drove him out: he had no more than one companion; they two were in the cave and he said to his companion "Have no fear for Allah is with us": then Allah sent down His peace upon him and strengthened him with forces which ye saw not and humbled to the depths the word of the Unbelievers. But the word of Allah is exalted to the heights: for Allah is Exalted in might Wise.
column3: Ka-gan ye jin'u taimakoa to hakika Soko'uujin taimako ni kamina kafiri zhi nyan'u dzun tinya uma yi zabaci yan zaguba kamina afi mini kpankoro na kamina ufe gan be masoyiu yin na: ga nyinyangban ma hakika Soko danbo be yi yin Soko cia yangban shi cin bea yau uci jin'u taimako be ekun gunci zhi na ye lea yea na ucia kalma yan kafiri zhi la'agba ci takotako kalma yan Soko ma ugayi elatu cio. Soko ma Etsu zankpe uyio Etsu hikima uyio.
